text.body:
|| śrīḥ ||
sarasvatīkaṇṭhābharaṇasya bhojadevasya
sanātanakavi-revāprasāda-dvivedinā saṃśodhitamūlapāṭhaḥ
sāhityaprakāśo nāma
śṛṅgāraprakāśaḥ
prathamaḥ prakāśaḥ
prakṛtyādiprakāśātmā
acchinnamekhala - malabdhadṛ̣dhopagūḍha - maprāptacumbana-mavīkṣita-vaktrakānti |
kāntāvimiśravapuṣaḥ kṛtavipralambhasambhogasakhyamiva pātu vapuḥ purāreḥ|| 1 ||
yatpādapaṅkajarajaḥparimārjiteṣu cetaḥsu darpaṇatalā 'malatāṃ gateṣu |
śabdārthasaṃpada udāratarāḥ sphuranti vighnacchide 'stu bhagavān sa gaṇādhināthaḥ || 2 ||
ātmasthitaṃ guṇaviśeṣamahaṅkṛtasya śṛṅgāramāhuriha jīvitamātmayoneḥ |
tasyātmarakti / śaktirasanīyatayā rasatvaṃ yuktasya yena rasiko 'yamiti pravādaḥ || 3 ||
sattvātmanāmamaladharma/janmaviśeṣajanmā janmāntarānubhavanirmitavāsanotthaḥ |
sarvātmasaṃpadudayātiśayaikaheturjjāgartti ko 'pi hṛdi mānamayo/vato vikāraḥ || 4 ||
1. 2.उच्यते चाभिनवेन 'येषां काव्यानुशीलनाभ्यासवशाद् विशदीभूते मनोमुकुरे वर्णनीयतन्मयीभवनयोग्यता ते हृदयसंवादभाजः सहृदया' इति ध्वन्यालोकलोचने । 3.उक्तं रत्नेश्‍वरेण रूढाहङ्कारतौर्जित्यमित्यस्य व्याख्याने स.क.(१.१०९) तात्कालिकनिमित्तोपनिपाते वासनाविकासात् तमोनिर्भेदस्थानेषु सुप्तप्रबुद्ध इव स्थायिभिरसंसृज्यमानः प्रथम—प्रादुर्भूतोऽभिमानोऽहङ्कारः ॥ रक्‍तिरित्येव युक्‍तः पाठः शृङ्गारादेः रत्यादिवासनावतैव सचेतसा अनुभूतेः । 4.यथा चोच्यते सरस्वतीकण्ठाभरणालङ्कारे—
विशिष्टादृष्टजन्मायं जन्मिनामन्तरात्मसु ।
आत्मसंपद्गुणोद्भूतेरेको हेतुः प्रकाशते ॥ इति (५.२)
tātparyameva vacasi dhvanireva kāvye saubhāgyameva guṇasaṃpadi vallabhasya |
lāvaṇyameva vapuṣi svadate 'ṅganāyāḥ śṛṅgāra eva hṛdi mānavato janasya || 5 ||
śṛṅgāra-vīra-karuṇādbhuta-raudra-hāsya-bībhatsa-vatsala-bhayānaka-śānta-nāmnaḥ |
āmnāsiṣurdaśa rasān sudhiyo vayaṃ tu śṛṅgārameva rasanād rasamāmanāmaḥ || 6 ||
vīrādbhutādiṣu ca yeha rasaprasiddhiḥ siddhā kuto 'pi vaṭayakṣavadāvibhāti |
loke gatānugatitvavaśādupetāmetāṃ nivarttayitumeṣa pariśramo naḥ || 7 ||
aprātikūlikatayā manaso mudāderyaḥ saṃvido 'nubhavaheturihābhimānaḥ |
jñeyo rasaḥ sa rasanīyatayā ' 'tmaśa/rakte ratyādibhūmani punarvitathā rasoktiḥ || 8 ||
ratyādayo 'rdhaśatamekavivarjitā hi bhāvāḥ pṛthagvidhavibhāvabhuvo bhavanti |
śṛṅgāratattvamabhitaḥ parivārayantaḥ suptārcciṣaṃ dyuticayā iva vardhayanti || 9 ||
ā bhāvanodayamananyadhiyā janena yo bhāvyate manasi bhāvanayā sa bhāvaḥ |
yo bhāvanāpathamatītya vivarttamānaḥ sāhaṅkṛte hṛdi paraṃ svadate raso 'sau || 10 ||
ratyādayo yadi rasāḥ syuratiprakarṣe harṣādibhiḥ kimaparāddhamatad‌vibhinnaiḥ |
asthāyinasta iti ced bhayahāsaśokakrodhādayo vada/bata kiyacciramullasanti || 11 ||
sthāyitvamatra viṣayātiśayānmataṃ ceccintādayaḥ kuta uta prakṛtervaśena |
tulyaiva sātmani bhavedatha vāsanāyāḥ sandīpanāt, tadubhayatra samānameva || 12 ||
ataḥ siddhametad 1. ratyādayaḥ śṛṅgāraprabhavā ekonapañcāśad bhāvāḥ, 2. vīrādayo mithyārasapravādāḥ, 3. śṛṅgāra evaikaścaturvargaikakāraṇaṃ rasa iti | sa cānubhavaikagamyatvād asarvaviṣayatvācca duravaseyaḥ, samyagabhinayeṣu vā vidagdhaśailūṣaiḥ pradarśyamānaḥ sāmājikairava —dhāryyate, prabandheṣu vā mahākavibhiryāvadākhyāyamāno viduṣāṃ manīṣāviṣayamavatarati | tatra
5. vacasīti vārttālāpo vivakṣitaḥ | yathātathetivacanayojanena neyo 'tra vākyārthaḥ yathā vivakṣāviṣayībhūto 'rtho vacasi tātparyamiti paribhāṣyate, kāvye dhvaniriti, vallabhaguṇasaṃpadi saubhāgyamiti, uttamāvayavavinyāsata evāṅganāpadavācyāyāṃ lāvaṇyamiti tathaiva mānini jane śṛṅgāra iti | 10. sāhaṅkṛtāviti rā., sāhaṅkṛtinīti tadā yuktaṃ vacaḥ |
na tathā padārthāḥ pratyakṣeṇa pratīyamānāḥ svadante, yathā vāggmināṃ vacobhirāvedyamānāḥ |
tadāha—
atthaṇivesā ṇa hu taha cittaviāsaṃ kuṇaṃti saccaviā1 |
jaha uṇa te ummillaṃtā sukaïvaohiṃ susīsaṃtā2|| 13|| iti |
(arthaniveśā na hi tathā cittavikāsaṃ kurvanti saṃdṛṣṭāḥ |
yathā punasta unmilantaḥ sukavi—vacobhiḥ sukathyamānāḥ||)
ato 'bhinetṛbhyaḥ kavīneva bahumanyāmahe, abhinayebhyaśca kāvyameveti |
(kāvyalakṣaṇam)
tat (kāvyaṃ) punaḥ śabdārthayoḥ sāhityamāmananti | tad yathā 'śabdārthau sahitau kāvyami'ti (bhāmahā. 1.16) |
kaḥ punaḥ śabdaḥ?
yenoccāritenārthaḥ pratīyate (mabhā. paspaśā.)
sa (śabdaḥ) dvādaśadhā* 1. prakṛtiḥ, 2. pratyayaḥ, 3. upaskāraḥ, 4. upapadam, 5. prātipadikam, 6. vibhak‍tiḥ, 7. upasarjanam, 8. samāsaḥ, 9. padam, 10. vākyam, 11. prakaraṇam, 12 prabandha iti|
ko 'rthaḥ (kaḥ punararthaḥ)?
yaḥ śabdena pratyāyyate |
sa ca (arthaḥ) dvādaśadhā 1. kriyā, 2. kālaḥ, 3. kārakam, 4. puruṣaḥ, 5. upādhiḥ, 6. pradhānam, 7. upaskārārthaḥ, 8. prātipadikārthaḥ, 9. vibhaktyarthaḥ, 10. vṛttyarthaḥ, 11. padārthaḥ, 12. vākyārtha iti |
kiṃ sāhityam?
yaḥ śabdārthayoḥ sambandhaḥ |
sa ca(sambandhaḥ) dvādaśadhā 1. abhidhā, 2. vivakṣā, 3. tātparyam, 4. pravibhāgaḥ, 5. vyapekṣā, 6. sāmarthyam, 7. anvayaḥ, 8. ekārthībhāvaḥ, 9. doṣahānam, 10. guṇopādānam, 11. alaṅkārayogaḥ, 12. rasāviyoga iti |
1. prākṛtaṃ padametat tad‌bhavatvena neyaṃ 'satyāpitā' ityasya mūlasya, susīsaṃtā iti ca kasyacidaparasyā 'prasiddhasya saṃskṛtapadasya, ādiguruṇā bharatamuninā prākṛtasya saṃskṛtavikṛtitvena gṛhītacaratvāt | nāṭyaśāstre 17.02 2. vāmanāḥ punaḥ sandarbheṣu daśarūpakaṃ śreya' iti vadanti | *1–4 śabdabhedāḥ prathamaprakāśe, 5–6 dvitīyaprakāśe, 9–12 tṛtīyaprakāśe nirūpitāḥ |
tatra yadyapi 'na kevalā prakṛtiḥ prayok‍tavyā, na ca kevalaḥ pratyayaḥ' (mabhā. 1.2.64) tathāpi dharmaniyamāya śāstrakriyāvyavahāre prakṛtipratyayavibhāgakalpanā | (tatra)
(1. prakṛtiḥ)
śabdārthabhāvanāyāṃ pratyayāt prathamamupādānakāraṇamiva yopādīyate tāṃ prakṛtiriti1 vyapadiśanti |
sā (prakṛtiḥ) tridhā— (ka) dhāturūpā, (kha) pratyayarūpā, (ga) prātipadikarūpā ca |
(ka. dhāturūpā prakṛtiḥ)
dhātavaḥ ṣọdhā 1. paripaṭhitā, 2. aparipaṭhitāḥ, 3. paripaṭhitā 'paripaṭhitāḥ, 4. pratyayadhātavaḥ, 5. nāmadhātavaḥ, 6. pratyayanāmadhātavaś‍ceti | teṣu—
1. paripaṭhitā bhūvādayaḥ | yathā—
bhūyāt teṣāṃ kule janma jā/?/ntāṃ teṣu sampadaḥ |
yeṣāṃ svamiti manvānāḥ svīkurvanti svamarthinaḥ || 14 ||
kaviḥ sṛjati kāvyāni hṛdyādadhati sajjanāḥ |
sūte muktāḥ payorāśirvahanti taruṇīstanāḥ || 15 ||
na ruṇatsīndriyagrāmaṃ na śṛṇoṣi gurorvacaḥ |
no varṇayasi mitrāṇi kathaṃ gṛhaṇāsyariśriyaḥ || 16 ||
2. aparipaṭhitā āndolayatyādayaḥ | yathā—
nīpānāndolayanneṣa preṅkholayati me manaḥ |
pavano bījayannāśā mānāśāmucculumpati || 17 ||2
taḍitkhacayatīvāśā nasante3 śarmma varhiṇaḥ |
pānthastrīś‍vāsavegauṣṇyaṃ vidhamantyadbavāyavaḥ || 18 ||
milantyāśāsu jīmūtā viklavante divi grahāḥ |
tāpaṃ kṣapayati prāvṛṭ kṣīyante kāmivigrahāḥ || 19 ||
1. tathā ca kāśikā 'prakṛtirupādānakāraṇam' (sū॰ 5.1.12) | atratyā kāśikā 'vaśyameva draṣṭavyā | 2. ucculumpati vilopayati | 3. nasatirāpnotikarmā (nirukte 7.17) | jasante yānti |
3. ye sūtreṣveva paṭhyante, na bhūvādiṣu, te paripaṭhitā 'paripāṭhitāḥ, 'sku' ityādayaḥ | yathā—
anuskunuhi mā mantūn, vasanto māna—ghasmaraḥ |
dūti! drutamṛtīyasya jijāvayiṣati smaraḥ || 20 ||1
musalakṣepahuṅkārastobhaiḥ kalama—kaṇḍini! |
kucaviṣkambhamuttabhnan nistubhnātīva te smaraḥ || 21 ||2
patayālūni ceṣṭāsu manāṃsi gṛhayālavaḥ |
yūnāmekena rūpeṇa yoṣito dāhyasātayaḥ || 22 ||3
4. sanādyantāḥ pratyayadhātavaḥ | yathā—
mīmāṃsase na śāstrārthān kṛtārthayasi nārthinaḥ |
gopāyasi na santrastān kimuddhatamaṭāṭyase || 23 ||
sūryīyati sudhāraśmiṃ narakīyati nandane |
akāmaṃ kāmayānā tvāṃ sā jīvantī mṛtāyate || 24 ||
kapolau lohitāyete bāṣpāyete vilocane |
priyapraṇāmakāmyantī kṛśāṅgi! kalahāyase || 25 ||
5. kaṇvādayo nāmadhātavaḥ | yathā—
kaṇḍūyati na yo marma narmaṇā yo hṛṇīyate |
na kuṣyati ruṣaṃ yaḥ sa rājā rājyaṃ bhiṣajyati || 26 ||4
1. mantūnaparādhān mā 'nuskunuhi modāhara | skuñ ud‌dharaṇe | ṛtī ghṛṇāgatyoḥ | ghṛṇā dayā | ṛtīyasva dayasva | jijāva/payiṣati | ju vegitāyāṃ gatāvityasyeti rāghavaḥ | japatestu grahe jijāpayiṣati sāhasakaulīnaś‍vabhre pātayitumicchatītyarthaḥ | 2. kaṇḍanaṃ pratītacaraṃ gāhāsu, na tu khaṇḍanam | viṣkambhaḥ stūpaḥ | uttambhaḥ ullāsaḥ | nistubhnāti gāyati | 3. sātiḥ sukham | dāhyebhyaḥ sātiḥ sukham | yoṣitsu sātipadārthā ' 'ropaḥ | 4. kaṇḍūyati spṛśati | hṛṇīyate lajjate | kuṣ prakāśe daivādikaḥ, kuṣyati prakāśayati | bhiṣajyati cikitsate | bhiṣaj cikitsāyām | rāghavo 'tra taimirikāyate |
valgūyati na yo 'sādhumasūyati na sādhave |
mantūyati na mānyāya mahatsu na mahīyate || 27 ||1
kamiṣudhyantu yajvānaḥ kaṃ magadhyantu māgadhāḥ |
kamarthinaḥ kuṣubhyantu rāme 'raṇyaṃ bhuraṇyati || 28 ||2
dhātuprakaraṇād dhātuḥ kasya cāsañjanādapi |
āha cāyamimaṃ dīrghaṃ manye dhāturvibhāṣitaḥ ||
(mabhā. 3.1.27 bhāṣyam)
(6. pratyayanāmadhātavaḥ)
yebhyaḥ paripaṭhitadhātubhyo nāmatvasiddhaye, nāmabhyo vā dhātutvasiddhaye kvibādipratyayā lupyante te pratyaye nāmani ca dhātava i(ś‍ce)ti pratyayanāmadhātavaḥ | yathā hoḍa—galbha— klībaprabhṛtayaḥ | yathā—
giro gaurbrahmakāmāśīḥ śriyaḥ pratibhuvau bhruvau |
śatruśīrmitrapūrbāhuryudhi te bandhutā sajūḥ || 29 ||
brahma brāhmaṇāḥ, teṣāṃ kāmānāśāste iti brahmakāmāśīḥ kāmagavī | śatrūṁn śāstīti śatruśīḥ, mitrāṇi pṛṇātīti mitrapūḥ | sajūḥ sahajoṣaṇaḥ |
hoḍase nābhijāteṣu klībase nābhimāniṣu |
vidagdhasi na mugdheṣu nā 'pragalbheṣu galbhase || 30 ||
hoḍṛ anādare, klīb adhārṣṭye, galbha dhārṣṭye |
savitā vidhavati, vidhurapi savitarati, tathā dinanti yāminyaḥ |
yāminayanti dinānyapi sukhaduḥkhavaśīkṛte manasi3 || 31 ||
1. valgu manojñam | valgūyati priyaṃmanute | mantuḥ krut | mantūyati krudhyati | mahīyate maha pūjāyāmityasya | mahatsu na mahīyate pūjyammanyatāṃ vṛṇute | 2. iṣudha astradhāraṇe, yajvānaḥ kaṃ vīram, iṣudhyantu iṣudhimantaṃ kuryuḥ, magadhyantu pariveṣṭayantu, magadha pariveṣṭana ityasya | kuṣubha paropamarddenopatiṣṭhantām | bhuraṇyati bhuraṇa gatau | bhuraṇyati vrajati | kaṇvādirnāmadhātuś‍ca bhavati | 3. sādhāraṇadharmasya bhinnatvānnotropameyopamā, tṛtīyasadṛśavyavacchedā 'ghaṭanāt |
evaṃ
1. 'kaṃsavadhamācaṣṭe kaṃsaṃ ghātayati',
2. 'ārātri vivāsamācaṣṭe rātriṃ vivāsayati',
3. 'puṣyacandrayogaṃ jānāti puṣyeṇa candraṃ yojayati',
4. ujjayinītaḥ prasthito māhiṣmatyāṃ sūryod‌gamaṃ prāpnoti māhiṣmatyāṃ sūryamud‌gamayatī'—ti |
'ākhyānāt kṛtastadācaṣṭa iti ṇic' kṛlluk prakṛtipratyāpattiḥ prakṛtivacca kārakam', 'āṅlopaś‍ca kālātyantasaṃyoge maryādāyām', nakṣatrayoge jñi', 'citrīkaraṇe prāpī'—ti smaryyate |
prakṛtiḥ ṣaṭprakāraiṣā dhāturūpā nirūpitā |
atha pratyayarūpāpi ṣaṭprakāraiva kathyate || 32 ||
(kha. pratyayarūpā prakṛtiḥ)
pratyayā hi 1sup—2tiṅ—3kṛt—taddhita4—dhātupratyaya5—strīpratyaya6—bhedāt ṣaṭ prakārāḥ | tadantā prakṛtirapi pratyayarūpā ṣaṭprakāraiva bhavati | sā (dra. aṣṭādhyāyyāḥ 3–6 adhyāyāḥ)
1. suppratyayāntā yathā— ahaṃyuḥ, śubhaṃyuḥ, sāyantanam, cirantanam, tvayakā, mayakā, āmuṣyāyaṇaḥ apsavyaḥ (6.3.18), prāh‍ṇetarām, pragetarām, pūrvāh‍ṇetanam, samāṃsamīnā iti |
2. tiṅpratyayāntā yathā— pacatitarām, gacchatitamām, spṛśatirūpam, jalpatikalpam, jighratideśyam, paśyatideśīyam, āstikaḥ, nāstikaḥ, pacataki, bhindhaki, pacatabhṛjjata, khādatamodata iti |
3. kṛtpratyayāntā yathā— kṛttrimam, hṛtrimam pākimam, sekimam, sāṃkūṭinam sāṃrāviṇam, vyāvakrośī, vyāvahāsī, śyainampātā, tailampātā, jitvarī, ạ̄dhyaṅkaraṇī iti |
4. taddhitapratyayāntā yathā— gārgyāyaṇaḥ, dākṣāyaṇaḥ, vārṣyāyaṇiḥ, vārṣyāyaṇīyaḥ, phāṇṭāhṛtaḥ, phāṇṭāhṛtāyaniḥ, ābhijityaḥ, kauñjāyanyaḥ, kutastyaḥ, tatratyaḥ, pacatitarām, pacatitamām iti |
5. dhātusaṃjñāpratyayāntā yathā— cikīrṣā, kaṇḍūyā, putrīyā, kāraṇā, miśraṇā, mṛgayā, aṭāṭyā, sāsahiḥ, yāyāvaraḥ, yāyajūkaḥ, cikīrṣuḥ, caṅkramaṇa iti |
6. strīpratyayāntā yathā— gāṅgeyaḥ, saudāmeyaḥ, kārīṣagandheyaḥ, draupadeyaḥ, gaureyaḥ, śārṅgaraveyaḥ, krādraveyaḥ, kāmaṇḍaleyaḥ, yauvateyaḥ, saurabheyaḥ, bahustrīkaḥ, suvadhūka iti |
atha kathaṃ yauvateya iti pratyayaprakṛtāvudāhṛtam, yāvatā 'yūnasti' (4.1.77) iti etasya taddhitasaṃjñayā prātipadikatvameva |
satyametat | strīsāmānyaparyāyo yuvatiśabdaḥ prakṛtyantaramasti | yathāha 'dharmārthāṅga— vidyākālānanuparodhayan kāmasūtraṃ tadaṅgavidyāś‍ca puruṣo 'dhīyīta, prāg yauvanād yuvatiḥ' iti | tasya |
'yūnastiḥ' ityetasyaiva vā, 'erak‍tina' iti vibhāṣitaṅīṣo ḍhagutpattiḥ | yathā— āditeyaḥ, saurabheya iti |
atha kādraveyaḥ kāmaṇḍaleya iti katham? ṅyāporaprātipadikatve 'pi hi 'ṅ‌yāpprātipadikād' (4.1.1) iti viśeṣavidhānāt | yūnastirityetasya tu taddhitatvāt astu subutpattiḥ, ūṅastu pratyayatvena sā na siddhyati, samarthācca taddhitena bhavitavyam | antādivad‌bhāvād bhaviṣyati, tathāhi 'brahmabandhūri'—tyādau 'akaḥsavarṇe dīrghaḥ' (6.1.101) iti dvayorekatvaṃ bhavati |
yadyevaṃ 'strībhyo ḍhag' (4.1.120) iti ḍhak (ṅ) na sidhyati, so 'pyādyantavad‌bhāvād bhaviṣyatī'ti | 'sā 'sya devatā' (4.2.24) iti jñāpakād ūṅutpatteḥ prāgeva vā subutpattiriti |
uktā ṣọdhaivameṣā 'pi prakṛtiḥ pratyayātmikā |
athātaḥ prātipadikarūpā ṣọdhaiva kathyate || 33 ||
(ga. prātipadikarūpā prakṛtiḥ)
tatra— 1nāmā '2vyayā 'nukaraṇa3—kṛt4—taddhita5—samāsāḥ6 prātipadikāni | tadāha—
1. 'arthavadadhāturapratyayaḥ prātipadikam' (1.2.45),
2. 'kṛttaddhitasamāsāś‍ca' (1.2.46),
3. nipātasya cānarthakasya prātipadikasaṃjñā vak‍tavyā | (1.2.46 mabhā. vārttikam)
tatrārthavad‌grahaṇena nāmāvyayānukaraṇāni gṛhyante | kṛttaddhitasamāsāstu kaṇṭhoktyā | iti | nanvete 'pyarthavanta eva |
satyametat | kintu kṛttaddhitāś‍ca pratyayāḥ, teṣāmaprātipadikagrahaṇāt prātipadikasaṃjñā na prāpnotīti kṛttaddhitagrahaṇena tadupasaṃgṛh‍ṇāti |
samāsagrahaṇena tvarthavatsamudāyasya samāsasyaiva prātipadikasaṃjñeti jñāpayan tathāvidhasya vākyasyaitāṃ nivarttayati | tatra—
(1. nāmaprātipadikam)
anapekṣitaśabdavyutpattīni sattvabhūtārthābhidhāyīni ca nāmāni |
tāni dvidhā— 1. āviṣṭaliṅgāni 2. anāviṣṭaliṅgāni ceti | teṣu —
1. jātidravyaparimāṇābhidhāyīnyāviṣṭaliṅgāni | tatra —
jātirdvidhā 1. ākṛtivyaṅgyā 2. upadeśavyaṅgyā ca |
tayorādyā yathā— gauḥ, mṛgaḥ, pakṣī, sarpaḥ, siṃhaḥ, vṛkṣaḥ, kumārī, kuṇḍam, strī, pumān, napuṃsakam iti |
dvitīyā yathā— brāhmaṇaḥ, gārgyaḥ, kaṭhaḥ, kṣatriyaḥ, vaiśyaḥ, śūdraḥ, mūrddhābhiṣikta ambaṣṭhaḥ, pāraśavaḥ, sūtaḥ, vaidehakaḥ, caṇḍāla iti |
dravyaṃ dvidhā 1. sāpekṣam 2. anapekṣaṃ ca |
tayorādyaṃ guruḥ, pitā, putraḥ, bhrātā, jāmātā, mitram, mātā, svasā, duhitā, yātā, nanāndā, bhāryā iti |
dvitīyaṃ yathā— caitraḥ, maitraḥ, indraḥ, upendraḥ, candraḥ, sūryaḥ, kālaḥ, ākāśaḥ, prācī, pratīcī, śacī, lakṣmīriti |
parimāṇaṃ dvidhā 1. niyatam 2. aniyatañca |
tayorādyaṃ yathā— droṇaḥ, khārī, palam, bhāraḥ, krośaḥ, yojanam, nivarttanam, nalvaḥ (talpaḥ), paṇaḥ, purāṇaḥ, gaṇaḥ, akṣauhiṇī—ti |
dvitīyaṃ yathā— saṃghaḥ, pūgaḥ, sārthaḥ, samājaḥ, vargaḥ, śreṇiḥ, kuṭumbam, pariṣat, paṅktiḥ, yūtham, vanam, senā iti |
2. guṇasaṃkhyāvacanasarvanāmānyanāviṣṭaliṅgāni | teṣu guṇo dvidhā 1. anurañjakaḥ 2. ananurañjakaśca |
tatrā 'nurañjakayogāt tadanuraktāni yathā ś‍vetā, svādu, śīghraṃ, mandaṃ, dīrghaṃ, hrasvam,
ṛju, vakram, mṛdu, kaṭhinaṃ, yuvā, vṛddha iti |
ananurañjakayogāt tad‌viparītāni yathā— dakṣaḥ, jihma—jaḍa—prājña—khala— sādhu—snigdha—krūra—śūra—bhīru—laghu—guru—riti |
saṃkhyā dvidhā 1. liṅgavatī 2. aliṅgā ceti | tayoḥ —
ādyā liṅgavatī yathā— ekaḥ, ekā, ekam, dvau, dve, ubhau, ubhe, trayaḥ, tistraḥ, trīṇi, catvāraḥ, catastraḥ, catvārīti |
dvitīyā (aliṅgavatī) yathā— pañca prātipadikārthāḥ (mabhā. 5.3.74), pañca vṛttayaḥ, pañca padajātāni, ṣaḍ viṣayāḥ, ṣaḍ buddhayaḥ, ṣaḍindriyāṇi, aṣṭau vasavaḥ, aṣṭau mūrttayaḥ, aṣṭau varṇasthānāni, daśa diśaḥ, ṣoḍaśa padārthāḥ, aṣṭādaśa purāṇāni' iti |
sarvanāmāni dvidhā 1. sarvādīni 2. asarvādīni ca | teṣu—
ādyāni yathā — 'sarva, viś‍va, anya, itara, katama, yaḥ, saḥ, eṣaḥ, ayaṃ, tvam aham' iti |
dvitīyāni yathā— 'prathama—carama—alpa—katipaya—pūrva—para—apara—dakṣiṇa—uttara— sva—antara—sakala—kṛtsnam' iti |
(2. avyayaprātipadikam)
prāyeṇā 'liṅgasaṃkhyāśaktīnyavyayāni | tāni ṣọdhā—
'1avyaya—2nipāta— 3gatyupasarga4 —karmapravacanīya5—vibhaktipratirūpa6bhedāt | teṣu prāyeṇa śaktisaṃkhyā 'yogāt svarādīnyavyayāni | yadāha (mabhā. 1.1.38)
sadṛśaṃ triṣu liṅgeṣu sarvāsu ca vibhaktiṣu |
vacaneṣu ca sarveṣu yanna vyeti tadavyayam || 34 || iti
(1. avyayaprātipadikeṣu avyayāni)
tāni (avyayāni) dvidhā 1. sattvagandhīni 2. asattvagandhīni ca | teṣu— sattvagandhīni ṣọdhā 1. dravyarūpāṇi, 2. guṇarūpāṇi, 3, kriyārūpāṇi, 4. jātirūpāṇi, 5. saṃjñārūpāṇi, 6. sambandhirūpāṇīti |
asattvagandhīnyapi ṣọdhaiva
1. kriyāpekṣīṇi, 2. kriyādravyāpekṣīṇi, 3. kriyāviśeṣaṇāni, 4. kriyādravyaviśeṣaṇāni, 5. kriyāviśiṣṭarūpāṇi, 6. kriyādravyaviśiṣṭarūpāṇi ceti | tatra—
sattvagandhibhedeṣu
1. dravyarūpāṇi yathā— svaḥ, divaṃ, bhuvaḥ, vihāyasā, rodasī, āpaḥ, bhūḥ, ṛcaḥ, śam, mahaḥ, tapaḥ, hāhā, hūhū, iti |
2. guṇarūpāṇi yathā— śaś‍vat, āpat, nṛpat, kūpata, kuvit, sāmi, sāci, drāk, strāk, jyok, manāk, īṣad iti |
3. kriyārūpāṇi yathā—namaḥ, svasti, svāhā, svadhā, vaṣaṭ, vauṣaṭ, śrauṣaṭ, hanta, accha, avaḥ, parivaḥ eva iti |
4. jātirūpāṇi yathā— kam, śaṃyoḥ mayaḥ, sāyam, prātaḥ, astam, nak‍tam, divā, doṣā, hyaḥ, ś‍vaḥ' iti |
5. saṃjñārūpāṇi yathā— k‍ivam, saḥ, som, svāhā, hrām, hrīm, brūm, diṅ, hneṅ, ṛṅ, duṅ iti |
6. saṃbandhirūpāṇi yathā— antaḥ, antarā, ūrdhvam, bahiḥ, pāre, madhye, samayā, nikaṣā, ārāt, viṣvak, puraḥ, paś‍cāt iti |
asattvagandhibhedeṣu
1. kriyāpekṣīṇi yathā— dvandvam, yathāyatham, mithaḥ, anyonyam, parasparam, itaretarām, paroparām, uttarādharam, adharottaramiti |
2. kriyādravyāpekṣīṇi yathā— sākam, sārdham, saha, samam, amā, vinā, ṛte, pṛthak, nānā, apṛthagiti |
3. kriyāviśeṣaṇāni yathā— abhīkṣṇam, muhuḥ, punaḥ, bhūyaḥ, yugapat, ajastram, aniśam, śanaiḥ, upāṃśu, maṅkṣu, jhaṭiti, prāya iti |
4. kriyādravyaviśeṣaṇāni yathā— alam, balavat, suṣṭhu, mṛṣā, vṛthā, mithyā, mudhā, ad‌dhā, ṛdhak, uccaiḥ, nīcairiti |
5. kriyāviśiṣṭarūpāṇi yathā— śaś‍vat, sapadi, saṃprati, purā, asaṃprati, sanātanam, sāmpratam, jātu, bāḍham, phāṇṭam, svayam, kāmam iti |
6. kriyādravyaviśiṣṭarūpāṇi yathā— āviḥ, prāduḥ, tiras, sākṣāt, alam, prādhvam, sat, asat, dhik, hiruk, tūṣṇīm, joṣam iti |
(2. avyayaprātipadikeṣu nipātāḥ)
jātyādipravṛttinimittānupagrāhitvena asattvabhūtārthābhidhāyino 'liṅgasaṃkhyāśaktaya uccāvaceṣvartheṣu nipatantītyavyayaviśeṣā eva cādayo nipātāḥ | yadāha—'cādayo 'sattve' (1.4.57) iti |
te (nipātāḥ) khalu 1. vidhyaryāḥ, 2. arthavādārthāḥ, 3. anuvādārthāḥ, 4. niṣedhārthā. 5. vidhiniṣedhārthāḥ, 6. avidhiniṣedhārthāś‍ceti ṣọdhā saṃbhavanti | teṣu—
1. (vidhiḥ) 1. maṅgalam, 2. adhikāraḥ, 3. saṃbhramaḥ, 4. niyogaḥ, 5. samuccayaḥ, 6. vikalpa iti vidhiḥ |
2. (arthavādaḥ) 1. kutsā, 2. praśaṃsā, 3. viṣādaḥ, 4. harṣaḥ, 5. īrṣyā, 6. vismaya, ityarthavādaḥ |
3. (anuvādaḥ) 1. smaraṇam, 2. upamā, 3. abhyupagamaḥ, 4. anupraś‍naḥ, 5. parakṛtiḥ, 6. purākalpa ityanuvādaḥ |
4. (niṣedhaḥ) 1. pratiṣedhaḥ, 2. nivāraṇam, 3. apākaraṇam, 4. asūyā, 5. garhaṇā, 6. vinigraha iti niṣedhaḥ |
5. (vidhiniṣedhaḥ) 1. saṃbodhanam, 2. anukampā, 3. vitarkaḥ, 4. praś‍naḥ, 5. pakṣāntaram, 6. hetvapadeśa iti vidhiniṣedhaḥ |
6. (avidhiniṣedhaḥ) 1. padapūraṇam, 2. pādapūraṇam, 3. vākyapūraṇam, 4. alaṅkārapūraṇam, 5. vākyālaṅkāraḥ, 6. padasaṃskāra ityavidhiniṣedhaḥ |
teṣu —
(1. vidhyarthā nipātāḥ)
(1.1 maṅgalārthāḥ) om, atha, svasti, diṣṭyā, naha, sma, śaś‍vat, kacciditi maṅgalārthā | yathā —
'om agnimīḍe purohitam' (ṛve. 1.1.1),
'athāto brahmajijñāsā' (brasū. 1.1.1),
svasti no mimītāmaś‍vinā bhagaḥ' (ṛve. 5.51.11),
diṣṭyā vardhase,
naha bhokṣyase bhogan, (kāśikā 8.1.31)
ūrdhvaṃ muhūrttāt kaṭaṃ karotu sma bhavān, (kāśikā 3.3.165)
śaś‍vadadhyeṣyāmahe, (saka. 1.1.118)
kaccidadhyeṣyāmahe | (saka. 1.1.118)
(1.2 adhikārārthāḥ) atha, atho, yāvat, tāvat, anu, punaḥ, paś‍cād, bhūya ityadhikārārthāḥ | yathā—
atha śabdānuśāsanam, (mabhā. 1.1.1) |
atho tvameṣyasi,
yāvat saṃbhavastāvad vidhiḥ,
muniḥ kaṇādamanvataḥ, (pābhā.)
punaḥ prabhātaṃ punareva śarvarī,
paś‍cādāvāṃ virahaguṇitam, (megha. 108)
bhūyaś‍cāha tvamasi śayane, (megha. 109)
(1.3 saṃbhramārthakāḥ) yāvat, tāvat, nanu, purā, aṅga, hi, hanta, sīm iti saṃbhramārthāḥ |
yathā—'yāvat sa samayaḥ samameva tāvat' (kāśikā 8.1.42) |
'nanu gacchāmi bhoḥ' (kāśikā 8.1.42)
'adhīṣva māṇavaka! purā vidyotate vidyut', (kāśikā 8.1.42)
'aṅga paca, na hi paca', (kāśikā 8.1.34)
'hanta praśādhi', (kāśikā 8.1.34)
'pra sīmādityo 'sṛjat, prāsṛjat sarvatra āditya' ityarthaḥ | (ṛve.2.28.4)
(1.4 niyogārthakāḥ) param, vai, vāva, eva, ha, aha, tu, u iti niyogārthāḥ | yathā— dharmmaḥ sakhā paramaho paralokayāne,
vedo vai dharmmamūlam,
dve vāva brahmaṇo rūpe, (bṛpa. 3.2.1)
ātmaivedamagra āsīt, (bṛpa. 1.4.1) |
sa hovāca, (kāśikā 8.1.61) |
tvamaha grāmaṃ gaccha, (kāśikā 8.1.56) |
ākhyāsyāmi tu te, (kāśikā 8.1.56) |
satyamu te vadanti, (1.5.3) |
(1.5 samuccayārthakāḥ)
ca, vā, ā, api, uta, atha, atho, tathā iti samuccayārthāḥ |
yathā—'ahaṃ ca tvaṃ ca vṛtrahan', (ṛve. 8.62.11)
'vāyurvā tvā, manurvā tvā', (1.7.7.2)
'devebhyaś‍ca pitṛbhya ā', (ṛve. 10.16.11)
'dantairapi nakhairapi', (taibrā. 3.6.6)
'daivyāḥ śamitāra uta manuṣyāḥ', (taibrā. 3.6.6)
'devānatha pitṝn stuhi',
'atho khalvāhuḥ',
'hārīto 'trirahaṃ tathā' iti |
(1.6. vikalpārthakāḥ)—
vā, atha, atho, yadi, caṇ, cet, net, mā iti vikalpārthāḥ
yathā—'rājyaṃ vā karttavyaṃ bhāṣyaṃ vā śrotavyam',
'ṛtau vyaveyādathā 'nṛtau parvavarjam',
'nadīṣu snāyādatho devakhāte',
'yadi śamaḥ kiṃ tapasā',
'tvaṃ ca gantā kimatra me',
'upādhyāyaś‍cedāgacched āśaṃse yukto 'dhīyīya', (mabhā. 3.3.133)
'nejjihmayantyo narakaṃ patāma', (niruktam 1.11.1)
mā kadācididamāpi syāt' iti | evamanye 'pi prayogā 'nusārato draṣṭavyāḥ |
ete ca vidheranyatrāpi veditavyā iti ||
(2. arthavādārthā nipātāḥ) arthavāde—
(2.1 kutsārthāḥ) hā, dhik, cit, nāma, kim, ha, api, jātviti kutsārthāḥ |
yathā— hā kimevaṃ pravarttase, dhik pramādaḥ, (mavīca. 5.46, 47)
kulmāṣāṁś‍cidāhara, (niruktam 1.4.12)
ko nāmāyaṃ saviturudayo yatra na sve sphuranti,
kimadhīte devadattaḥ, (kāśikā 1.4.96)
tvaṃ ha brāhmaṇo 'si, (kāśikā 8.1.39)
api siñcet palāṇḍum, (kāśikā 8.1.40)
tatra jātu gamiṣyasi, (kāśikā 8.1.37) iti |
(2.2 praśaṃsārthāḥ)
tu, paśya, paśyata, aha, aho, yathā, yāvat, cid iti praśaṃsārthāḥ |
yathā yastu māṇavako bhuṅkte,
paśya māṇavako bhuṅkte, (kāśikā 1.4.96)
paśyata māṇavako bhuṅkte, (kāśikā 8.1.39)
aha māṇavako bhuṅkte, (kāśikā 8.1.40)
aho devadattaḥ pacati śobhanam, (kāśikā 8.1.37)
yathā pacati śobhanam,
yāvat karoti cāru,
ācāryaś‍cididaṃ brūyāt iti (niruktam 1.4.12)
(2.3 viṣādārthakāḥ)
hī, ī, hā, hanta, bata, nāma, bhoḥ, kaṣṭamiti viṣādārthāḥ |
yathā—hī mahīśo dṛśyate,
ī īdṛśaḥ saṃsāraḥ, (gara. 1.9 tilakaḥ)
hā priye jānaki!, (urāca. 3.9)
nirāśrayā hanta hatā manasvitā, (kirātā. 1.43)
aho bata mahat kaṣṭam, (mabhāra. vana. 2.64, gītā—1)
kva nāma gamiṣyasi,
bhoḥ śrānto 'si,
kaṣṭaṃ bhoḥ kaṣṭam, (mavīca. 3.41, māmā. 9.20) iti |
(2.4 harṣārthāḥ)
diṣṭyā, hanta, bata, baṭ, bāṭ, kat, katham, kacciditi harṣārthāḥ |
yathā— diṣṭyā na mṛto 'si sakhe!,
hanta jīvitāḥ smaḥ,
saiveyaṃ bata me priyā,
baḍ mahān asi sūrya, (ṛve. 8.101.12)
bāṭ tābhyaḥ svāhā, (śuya. 18.40)
kad rudrāya pracetase, (ṛve. 1.43.1)
kathaṃ vatso me rāmabhadraḥ,
kaccijjīvati pārvatī iti (kāśikā 8.1.60, 61, 106)
(2.5 īrṣyārthāḥ)
ha, aha, pratyuta, parama, kintu 'api nāma' 'yadināme'—tīrṣyārthāḥ |
yathā— svayaṃ haudanaṃ bhuṅkte 3,
upādhyāyaṃ sak‍tūn pāyayati,
svayamaha sthena yāti 3,
upādhyāyaṃ padātiṃ gamayati,
pratyuta māmupālabhase,
devo bhavān paraṃ bhṛṅgiriṭiḥ,
vidvānasi kintu kitavaḥ,
mātaryapi mṛtāyāṃ dīvyasi,
bhavatu nāma kāmacārī tathāpyasau patireva,
asi tapasvī yadi nāma mūrkhaḥ iti |
(2.6 vismayārthāḥ) hī, aho, ahaha, cana, nāma, paśya, paśyata, bateti vismayārthāḥ |
yathā— hatavidhilalitānāṃ hī vicitro vipākaḥ, (māgha. 11.64)
aho rūpamasyāḥ, (saka. (alaṃ) 2)
ahaha māhātmyaṃ mahīpateḥ,
yācitā naiva kupyanti puruṣāḥ kecanaiva te,
andho nāma parvatamārokṣyati,
paśya māṇavako brūte,
paśyatākāśena yāti,
ko 'yaṃ bata dṛśyate iti |
evamanye 'pi yathā prayogamanusarttavyāḥ |
ete cārthavādādanyatrāpi veditavyā iti ||
(3. anuvādārthā nipātāḥ)
(3.1. smaraṇārthāḥ)
ām, āḥ, aye, nāma, nūnam, hum, omiti smaraṇārthāḥ |
yathā— ām, saiṣā pañcavaṭī,
āḥ, sa tasyāḥ saṃlāpaḥ,
ā jñātaṃ sa jaṭāyureṣaḥ, (udāttarāghave 2.31)
aye devo dāśarathiḥ,
sa nāmā 'yaṃ bhaviṣyati,
nūnameṣā jānakī,
huṃ maaraṃdo, (māmā. 7.1)
omevametat iti |
(3.2 upamānārthāḥ)
iva, vā, yathā, cit, na, nakiḥ, nu prati ityupamānārthāḥ |
yathā— rājeva brūyāt,
maṇīvoṣṭrasya lambete, (mabhāra. 171.12)
jyeṣṭho bhrātā yathā pitā,
agniś‍cid bhāyāt,
mṛgo na bhīmo kucaro giriṣṭhāḥ, (ṛve, 1.154.2)
pāvako nakirmāṇavakaḥ,
vṛkṣasya nu te puruhūtavayāḥ, (ṛve. 6.24.3 nirukta 1.419)
abhimanyurarjunataḥ prati, (kāśikā 1.4.92) iti |
(3.3 abhyupagamārthāḥ)
oma, tathā, ām, nāma, athakim, śrat, satyam, vāḍhamityabhyupagamārthāḥ yathā— omiti hovāca,
sa tatheti pratijñāya, (kusaṃ. 6.3)
ām yathā bravīṣi,
evaṃ nāma bhavatu,
gamiṣyati bhavān ? athakim,
śraddadhe yathā ' 'ttha,
satyamasāraḥ saṃsāraḥ,
vāḍhameṣo 'smi kāmandakī saṃvṛttaḥ (māmā. 1 prastāvanā) iti |
(3.4 anupraśnārthāḥ)
nanu, hī, nu,api, hum, na, kila, nanu, kila, evam, śaśvadityanupraśnārthāḥ |
yathā— akārṣīḥ kaṭaṃ devadatta? nanu karomi bhoḥ, (kāśikā 3.2.120)
akārṣaṁ hī hyaḥ, (kāśikā 8.2.93)
kathaṃ nu kariṣyāmi, (niruktam 1.4.17)
api bhavān makarandaḥ? (māmā. 9.41)
hum sa evāsmi, (niruktam 1.5.7)
na kilaivam, (niruktam 1.5.7)
nanu kilaivam, (niruktam 1.5.7)
evametat? (niruktam 1.5.11)
śaś‍vadevam iti | (niruktam 1.5.11)
3.5. (parakṛtyarthāḥ)
iti, evaṃ kila, khalu, nanu, sma, api, nāma iti parakṛtyarthāḥ |
yathā— nityaḥ śabda iti mīmāṃsakāḥ, anitya eveti tārkikāḥ,
evaṃ kilopādhyāyaḥ paṭhati, (kāśikā 3.2.119)
dhanyāḥ khalu dharmamācaranti,
nanvetadakārṣīt sarvo 'pi,
iti smopādhyāyaḥ kathayati,
so 'pi jānātyeva,
ko nāma na manyata iti |
3.6. (purākalpārthāḥ)
purā, śaś‍vat, iti ha, iti kila, iti sma, iti hasma, yatkila śaś‍vatkila iti purākalpārthāḥ |
yathā— nalena sma purādhīyate, (kāśikā 3.2.118,122)
evaṃ śaś‍vaditi, (kāśikā 3.2.116)
iti ha cakāra,
iti kila śrūyate purāṇeṣu,
iti sma brahmavādinaḥ pūrve vadanti,
iti ha sma tatrabhavān bhāgurāyaṇaḥ,
evamiha gurubhyaḥ śrūyate,
yat kileha taruṣaṇḍe pāṇḍavā ūṣuḥ,
śaś‍vat kiledamitthaṃ babhūva,
evamanye 'pi yathā prayogamanusarttavyāḥ,
ete cā 'nuvādato 'nyatrāpi veditavyā iti |
(4. niṣedhārthā nipātāḥ)
(4.1 pratiṣedhārthakāḥ)
na, nañ, a, ana, no, nakir, kiṃ, na hi iti pratiṣedhārthāḥ |
yathā— yugapanna ekadharmāṇām,
nendraṃ devamamaṃsata, (ṛve. 8.3.4)
śaś‍vat tvam abrāhmaṇa iva bhāṣase,
anopamā te buddhiḥ,
tasya tulyo 'pi no bhavān,
na kirgrāmaṃ gamiṣyasi,
kiṃ gatena kariṣyasi, na hi premā nimitte sati iti |
(4.2. nivāraṇārthakāḥ)
mā, māṅ, mā sma, mākir, alam, khalu kṛtam, paryāptam iti nivāraṇārthāḥ |
yathā— mā kariṣyasi,
mā kārṣīḥ, (niruktam 1.5.8)
mā sma karoḥ,
mākirneśanmākīṃ riṣat, (ṛve. 6.54.7)
alaṃ kṛtvā,
khalu kṛtvā,
kṛtaṃ sāhasena,
paryāptaṃ bhayena iti |
(4.3 apākaraṇārthāḥ)
āḥ, ī, om, hum, phaṭ, dhik, khar, are ityapākaraṇārthāḥ ||
yathā— āḥ pāpa! pratihato 'si,
ī ito niṣpata,
om kimevaṃ vadasi,
huṃ ṇillajja osara,
phaṭ apakhyākaro 'si,
dhik tvā jālma,
khar duṣṭe piśāci,
are durātman iti |
(4.4 asūyārthāḥ)
aṅgaḥ, hi, aho, huṃ, he, haye, āre, arare ityasūyārthāḥ |
yathā— aṅga! kūja—3 idānīṃ jñāsyasi jālma,
sa hi vyāharatu kathaṃ hi vyākariṣyati, (niruk‍tam 1.5.5)
vṛṣalagrāmamaho gamiṣyasi,
huṃ gamiṣyāmi grāmam,
he devadatta!, (kāśikā 8.2.85)
haye jāye manasā tiṣṭha ghore, (ṛve. 10.15.1)
āre nāhamunmattaḥ,
arare mahārājaṃ prati kutaḥ kṣattriyāḥ iti | (urāca. 4.27/28)
(4.5 garhaṇārthāḥ)
katham, yat, yadi, yadā, jātu, api, yacca, yatreti garhaṇārthāḥ |
yathā— kathaṃ nāmā 'trabhavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayet,
yat tatrabhavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayet,
yadi tatrabhavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayet,
yadā tatrabhavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayet,
jātu tatrabhavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayet,
api tatrabhavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayet,
yacca tatrabhavān vṛṣalamayājayiṣyat,
yatra tatrabhavān vṛṣalamayājayiṣya iti |
(4.6 vinigrahārthāḥ)
ha, aha, tuvai, tvai, vai, vāva, varam, nanu iti vinigrahārthāḥ |
yathā— ayamidaṃ ha kariṣyati, (niruk‍tam 1.5.2)
ayamahedaṃ karotu, (niruk‍tam 1.5.2)
ayaṃ tuvai tatra gantā,
ayaṃ tvai te niyogaḥ,
bṛhaspatirvai devānāṃ purohita āsīt,
ayaṃ vāva hasta āsīt, (kāśikā 8.1.64)
varamadyakapotaḥ ś‍vomayūrāt, (kāsū. 1.2.29)
nanu vak‍tṛviśeṣaniḥspṛhā guṇagṛhyā vacane vipaś‍citaḥ (kirātā.2) iti,
evamanye 'pi yathāprayogamanusarttavyāḥ,
ete ca niṣedhato 'nyatrāpi draṣṭavyā iti |
(5. vidhiniṣedhārthā nipātāḥ)
(5.1 saṃbodhanārthāḥ)
he, hai, ayi, aṅga, ho, aho, haṃho, bhoḥ iti saṃbodhanārthāḥ |
yathā— he devadatta,
hai yajñadatta, mabhā. 8.2.85)
ayi viṣṇumitra,
aṅga māṇavaka,
ho agnihotrin,
aho mahārāja,
haṃ ho mahābrāhmaṇa,
bhoḥ pāntha! pravarttasva nivarttasva vā iti |
(5.2 anukampārthāḥ)
'a, i, u, e, o, ā, ī, ū' ityanukampārthāḥ |
yathā— a avehi,
i indraṃ paśya,
u uttiṣṭha,
e ita ehi,
o oṣati tvāṃ taraṇiḥ,
ā āgataste tātaḥ,
ī īkṣito 'si gaccha,
ū ūṣare bījaṃ vapasi iti |
(5.3 vitarkārthāḥ)
kim, nu, nūnam, āho, uta, svit, vā, iva iti vitarkārthāḥ |
yathā— kimayaṃ sthāṇuḥ kiṃ puruṣaḥ,
ahirnu rajjurnu, (kāśikā 8.2.98)
na nūnamasti no ś‍vaḥ, (ṛve. 1.170.1, niruktam 1.6.2)
sthāṇurayamāho puruṣaḥ,
dhūmo 'yamuta kapotaḥ,
padmametanmukhaṃ svid bhāti,
hantāhaṃ pṛthivīmimāṃ nidadhānīha veha vā, (ṛve. 10.119.9, niruktam. 1.4.23)
tāmyatīva me vatso makarandaḥ (māmā 3.18) iti |
(5.4 praśnārthāḥ)
satyam, kim, hi, kaccit, evam, api, atha, uta iti praśnārthāḥ | yathā—
satyaṃ bhokṣyase?, (kāśikā 8.1.32)
kiṃ devadattaḥ pacati?,
kaṭaṃ kariṣyasi hi?, (kāśikā 8.2.93)
kaccijjīvati me mātā?, (kāśikā 3.3.153)
evametad devadatta?,
api kriyārthaṃ sulabhaṃ samitkuśam, (kusaṃ. 5.33)
devo 'yamatha mānuṣaḥ,
uta daṇḍaḥ patiṣyati? (kāśikā 3.3.152) iti |
(5.5. pakṣāntarārthāḥ)
nanu, punaḥ, hi, tu, tarhi, yāvat, yāvatā, atho, cid iti pakṣāntarārthāḥ |
yathā— nanvaraṇyametanna gṛham,
sa paṭhati ayaṃ śete,
idaṃ hi kariṣyati,
yat sa rodityayaṃ tu hasati,
yadyevaṃ tarhi gamyate,
jāne 'nyo '(yam) yāvat sa eva,
jāne gato bhavān yāvatā 'dyāpi na yāti, (nāyāti)
atho śarastena madarthamujjhitaḥ, (saka. pṛ. 33)
kaś—cid bhuṅkte, kaś—cid bhojayati, iti |
(5.6 hetvapadeśārthāḥ)
hi, nu, ataḥ, iti, yat, tat, yena, tene'ti hetvapadeśārthāḥ |
yathā— idaṃ kariṣyati hi vatsaka ehi/idaṃ hi kariṣyati (si vatsaka ehi)
kimiha nu dhānakāḥ,
atastvāmarthayāmi,
hastīti palāyate,
yadayaṃ dadāti tat subhagaḥ,
yena labhate tena stauti iti,
evamanye 'pi yathāprayogamanusarttavyāḥ,
ete ca vidhiniṣedhādanyatrāpi veditavyā iti |
(6. avidhiniṣedhārthā nipātāḥ)
(6.1 padapūraṇārthāḥ)
u, uta, āho, vai, hi, vā, khalu, sviditi padapūraṇārthāḥ |
yathā— kimu, kimuta, utāho, navai, nahi, athavā, nakhalu, āhosvid iti |
(6.2 pādapūraṇārthāḥ)
kam, īm, sīm, it, u, tu, hi, ca iti pādapūraṇārthāḥ |
yathā— śiśiraṃ jīvanāya kam, (nirukta 1.10.1)
e (ā+ī) maṃ sṛjatā sute, (ṛve. 1.9.2, niruktam 1.10.2)
pra sīmādityo ṛ sṛjad vidharttā, (ṛve.2.28.4, niruktam 1.7.3)
tamid (m i) d‌vardhantu no giraḥ, (ṛve.8.92.21,niruktam 1.10.3)
ayam u te samatasi, (ṛve. 1.30.4; nirukta 1.11.4)
devaḥ sa tu, na mānuṣaḥ,
indavo vāmuśanti hi, (ṛveḥ 1.2.4)
viloladṛṣṭaṃ hariṇāṅganāsu ca (kusaṃ. 5.13) iti |
(6.3 vākyapūraṇārthāḥ)
ete ca, anye ca, nūnam, iva, eva iti khalu ityādayo vākyapūraṇārthāḥ |
yathā— vi sīm ataḥ suruco vena āvaḥ, (taisaṃ. 4.2.8.2 nirukta 1.7.3)
naraṃ ca nārāyaṇameva ceti,
nūnaṃ sā te prati varaṃ jaritre, (ṛve. 2.11.21, niruktam 1.7.1)
kathamiva etad bhaviṣyati,
evā hyeva evā hīndra, (taiā. 1.20, kāśikā 6.3.136)
atho khalvāhuḥ,
abhīṣuṇaḥ sakhīnām, (ṛve.4.31.3,kāśikā6.3.134;
8.3.107, 8.4.27)
ā evaṃ nu manyase iti | (mabhā. kāśikā 1.1.14)
(6.4. alaṅkārapūraṇārthāḥ)
bhaṅgaśleṣa—bhāṣāś‍leṣa—yamaka—vakrokti—citra—anuprāsa—padāvṛtti—
praśnottara—prabhṛtayo 'laṅkārāḥ | tadarthāḥ yathā—
(bhaṅgaś‍leṣārthāḥ)
na vāryante, na cāryante, na smāryante, na hasanti, na hīyante na vairāyate iti bhaṅgaś‍leṣe,
(bhāṣāś‍leṣārthāḥ)
sa hi aho raṇe katthatepi yonarāyā iti bhāṣāś‍leṣe,
(yamakaś‍loke)
yoṣitāṃ gātraṃ na khalūnaṃ nakhalūnamiti yamakaś‍loke,
(vakroktau)
śastraṃ na khalu voḍhavyamiti vakroktau,
(citre)
nanu ho mathanā rāgho ghorā nātha maho nu na' iti citre,
(anuprāse)
'sa hi mahīśo varttata' ityanuprāse,
prāse prāso 'munā raṇe iti padāvṛttau,
kā nanāda timirādapi kālī iti praś‍nośnottare' iti |
(6.5 vākyālaṅkārārthāḥ)
ārṣika, ārṣiputraka, ārṣīka, vaidikādi—vākyānāmalaṅkāra—hetavo vākyālaṅkārārthāḥ yathā—
atho, khalu, tvayi, tarhi, 'atha khalu etarhi', 'aho nu khalu bhoḥ',
'iti ha sma bhagavān punarvasurātreyaḥ',
na ha vai saśarīrasya sataḥ priyā 'priyayorapahatirasti, (chāu. 8.12.1)
na vā are jāyāyai kāmāya jāyā priyā bhavati, (bṛu. 4.5)
na vā u etanmriyase na riṣyasi iti | (ṛve. 1.162.21)
(6.6 padasaṃskārārthāḥ)
padasaṃskārastu dvidhā vidhiniṣedharūpābhyām | tayoḥ —
1. plutavidhiḥ, 2. dvirvacanavidhiḥ, 3. laḍādividhiḥ, 4. pararūpādividhiriti vidhirūpaḥ |
1. pararūpādipratiṣedhaḥ, 2. saṃhitādipratiṣedhaḥ, 3. padādeśādipratiṣedhaḥ,
4. nighātapratiṣedha iti niṣedharūpaḥ | tatra —
(6.6.1 vidhirūpaḥ padasaṃskārārthāḥ)
(1. plutavidhiḥ)
hai he prayoge haihayoḥ,
omabhyādāne,
brūhi preṣya śrauṣaḍ vauṣaḍāvahānāmādeḥ (8.2.85—87—91) iti
plutavidhiḥ |
yathā— devadatta hai 3,
he 3 devadatta,
om 3 agnimīḍe purohitam,
agnimā 3 vaha, (taibrā. 3.5.3.2)
astu śrau 3 ṣaṭ, (taisaṃ. 1.6.11.1.2)
vau 3 ṣaṭ iti |
(2. dvirvacanavidhiḥ)
parervarjana (8.1.5),
prasamupodaḥ pādapūraṇe (8.1.6),
uparyadhyasaḥ sāmīpye (8.1.7) iti dvirvacanavidhiḥ |
yathā— pari pari trigarttebhyo vṛṣṭo devaḥ, (kāśikā 8.1.5)
pra prāyamagnirbharatasya śrṛṇve, (ṛve. 7.8.4)
saṃ samid‌yuvase vṛṣan, (ṛve. 10.191.1)
upopa me parāmṛśa, (ṛve. 1.126.7)
kiṃ no dudu harṣase dātayā u, (ṛve. 4.1.9)
uparyupari grāmam |
(3. laḍādividhiḥ)
yāvatpurānipātayorlaṭ (3.3.4),
jātuyadorliṅ (3.3.147),
alaṃkhalvoḥ pratiṣedhayoḥ prācāṃ ktvā (3.4.18) iti laḍādividhiḥ |
yathā— yāvad bhuṅkte,
purā vrajati,
jātu tatrabhavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayet,
alaṃ kṛtvā,
khalu kṛtvā iti |
(4. pararūpādividhiḥ)
omāṅoś‍ca‌ (6.1.95),
avyaktānukaraṇasyāta itau (6.1.98),
āṅ‌māṅoś‍ca (6.1.74) iti pararūpādividhiḥ |
yathā— adyom, ādyọdhā, adyeva, jhaḍiti, ācchādayati, mācchidaditi |
(6.6.2 niṣedharūpāḥ padasaṃskārārthāḥ)
(1. pararūpādipratiṣedhaḥ)
eve cāniyoge,
nāmreḍitasya,
na māṅyoge (6.1.94 vā. 99;) iti pararūpādipratiṣedhaḥ |
yathā— adyaiva gaccha,
ihaiva tiṣṭha,
'paṭat paṭadi'—ti karoti
mā kārṣīt,
mā sma kārṣīt,
mā sma karot iti |
(2. saṃhitādipratiṣedhaḥ)
nipāta ekājanāṅ (1.1.14),
ot (1.1.15),
saṃbuddhau śākalyāsyetāvanārṣe (1.1.16) iti saṃhitāpratiṣedhaḥ |
yathā— a avehi,
i indraṃ paśya,
u uttiṣṭha,
ā evaṃ nu manyase,
aho āś‍caryam,
bhāno iti |
(3. padādeśādipratiṣedhaḥ)
na cavāhāhaivayukte (7.1.24),
nānorjñaḥ (1.3.58),
samāse 'nañpūrve ktvo lyap (7.1.37) iti padodaśādipratiṣedhaḥ |
yathā— grāmo yuṣmākaṃ ca grāmo 'smākaṃ ca
grāmo yuṣmākameva grāmo 'smākameva
putramanujijñāsati
asnātvā bhuṅkte iti |
(4. nighātapratiṣedhaḥ)
nipātairyad‌yadihantakuvinnecceccaṇkaccid‌yatrayuktam (8.1.30),
cādiṣu ca (8.1.58),
cavāyoge prathamā (8.1.59) iti nighātapratiṣedhaḥ |
yathā— yad devadattaḥ pacati,
yadi devadattaḥ pacati,
devadattaḥ pacati ca khādati ca
devadattaḥ pacati vā khādati vā,
garddabhāṁś‍ca kālayati vīṇāṃ ca parivādayati,
garddabhān vā kālayati vīṇāṃ vā parivādayati iti ||
(3. avyayaprātipadikeṣu gatisaṃjñāḥ)
samāsārhā nipātā eva katipaye 'pi gatayaḥ |
tad‌yathā—(aṣṭādhyāyīsūtrāṇi)
prādayaḥ 1.4.58 prapacati, parākaroti
kriyāyoge 1.4.59
gatiś‍ca 1.4.60
ūryādicviḍācaś‍ca 1.4.61 ūrīkaroti
anukaraṇaṃ cānitiparam 1.4.62 khāṭkṛtam, khāṭkaroti
ādarānādarayoḥ sadasatī 1.4.63 satkṛtya, satkṛtam, yat satkaroti, asatkṛtam, yadasatkaroti
bhūṣaṇe 'lam 1.4.64 alaṅkṛtya, alaṃkṛtam, yadalaṅkaroti
antaraparigrahe 1.4.65 antarhatya, antarhatam, yadantarhanti
kaṇemanasī śraddhāpratīghāte 1.4.66 kaṇehatya payaḥ pibati, mano hatya payaḥ pibati
puro 'vyayam 1.4.67 puraskṛtya, puraskṛtam, yatpuraskaroti
astaṃ ca 1.4.68 astaṅgatya savitā punarudeti, astaṅgatāni dhanāni, yadastaṅgacchati
acchagatyarthavadeṣu 1.4.69 acchagatya, acchagatam, yadacchagacchati, acchodya, acchoditam, yadacchagacchati
ado 'nupadeśe 1.4.70 adaḥkṛtya, adaḥ kṛtam, yadadaḥkaroti | upedaśo madhyamā vāk
tiro 'ntardhau 1.4.71 tirobhūya, tirobhūtam, yat tirobhavati tiraḥ
vibhāṣākṛñi 1.4.72 tiraḥkṛtya, tiraskṛtya, tiraskṛtam, yat‌tiraskaroti, tiraskṛtvā, tiraḥkṛtvā
upāje 'nvāje 1.4.73 upājekṛtya/kṛtvā, anvājekṛtya/kṛtvā
sākṣātprabhṛtīni ca 1.4.74 sākṣātkṛtya, sākṣātkṛtvā, mithyākṛtya, mithyākṛtvā (21—śabdāḥ)
anatyādhāna urasimanasī 1.4.75 urasikṛtya, urasikṛtvā, manasikṛtya, manasikṛtvā
madhye pade nivacane ca 1.4.76 madhyekṛtya, madhyekṛtvā, padekṛtya, padekṛtvā, nivacanekṛtya/kṛtvā
nityaṃ hastepāṇāvupayamane 1.4.77 hastekṛtya, pāṇaukṛtya | upayamanaṃ dārakarma
prādhvaṃ bandhane 1.4.78 prādhvaṃkṛtya
jīvikopaniṣadāvaupamye 1.4.79 jīvikākṛtya, upaniṣatkṛtya, upaniṣatkṛtam
te prāgdhāteḥ 1.4.80 (te upasargāḥ)
chandasi pare 'pi 1.4.81 yāti ni hastinā, niyāti hastinā, hanti ni muṣṭinā, muṣṭinā nihanti
vyavahitāś‍ca 1.4.82 āmandrairindra! haribhiryāhi | āyāhi |
(4. avyayaprātipadikeṣu upasargāḥ)
gativiśeṣā eva prādaya upasargāḥ |
pra—parā 'pa—samanvava—nirdurvyāṅnyadhayo 'pyatisūdabhayaś‍ca |
pratinā saha lakṣayitavyāḥ paryupayorapi lakṣaṇamatra || 35 ||
(nyāse 1.1.14)
vaṣṭi bhāgurirallopamavāpyorupasargayoḥ || 36 || (6.2.37)
hitādiṣu samo mlopaṃ pāṭhaṃ cā 'tra śradantaroḥ || 37 || (nyāse 3.3.106)
evamete viṃśatirvapisaśradantarbhissaha pañcaviṃśatirbhavanti (va<ava, pi<api, sa+śrad+antara) (niruktam 1.3.3—22)
te khalu (upasargāḥ)— 1. vācakāḥ, 2. dyotakāḥ, 3. viśeṣakāḥ, 4. sahābhidhāyakāḥ, 5. kāryārthakāḥ, 6. nirarthakāś‍ceti ṣọdhā hi viprathante | teṣu —
(1. vācakā)
vācakā yathā 'pragatā ṛṣabhā asmād vanāt prarṣabhaṃ vanam (mabhā. 1.4.60)
parāgatā asavo 'syeti parāsuḥ
apagato manyurasya apamanyuḥ
saṅgatamakṣeṇa samakṣam (kāśikā 5.4.107)
anuprāpto nāsikāmanunāsikaḥ,
avakruṣṭaḥ kokilayā avakokilaḥ (mabhā. 1.4.79),
makṣikāṇāmabhāvo nirmakṣikam (mabhā. 2.1.6),
ṛddh‌yabhāvo yavanānāṃ duryavanam,
viruddhaḥ pakṣo vipakṣaḥ,
ādāya yudhyate tiditi āyudham (mabhā. 3.3.58),
atyayo vātasya nivātam,
adhigatamakṣeṇa adhyakṣam,
apihitaḥ śalaḥ apiśalaḥ,
atītaḥ ś‍vānamatiś‍vo varāhaḥ (kāśikā 5.4.86),
samṛddhirmadrāṇāṃ sumadram (kāśikā 2.1.6),
ud‌bhūto 'tyarthamuttamaḥ,
abhilakṣyaṃ mukhamasyābhimukhaḥ,
pratinidheyaḥ kāyaḥ pratikāyaḥ,
parimlāno 'dhyayanāya paryadhyayanaḥ (kāśikā 1.4.79),
upetyādhīyate 'smādityupādhyāyaḥ (mabhā. 3.3.20) |
evam avagatavān koṭam avakoṭaḥ,
apihitaḥ kāyatīti pikaḥ
saṃpannaṃ brahma bābhravāṇāṃ sabrahma (kāśikā 2.1.6),
śraddhīyata iti śraddhā (mabhā 1.4.59),
antardhīyate (iti) antardhiḥ (mabhā. 1.4.65),
(2. dyotakāḥ)
dyotakā yathā— pratiṣṭhate, parākramate, apakaroti, saṃkrīḍati, anukampate,
avadhatte, nirviveśa, durlalitaḥ, vyādadāti, āhvayate, niśamayati,
adhikuruṣva, apidadhāti, atiśete, surabhiḥ, utpādayati, abhidhatte,
pratīkṣate, pariṇamate, upāyaṃsta |
evaṃ vadhatte, pidhatte śrad‌dhatte, sahitaḥ, antardadhāti iti ||
(3. viśeṣakāḥ)
viśeṣakāstu dvidhā prakṛtyarthaviśeṣakāḥ, pratyayārthaviśeṣakāś‍ca | teṣu —
prakṛtyarthaviśeṣakā yathā—
pravardhate, palāyate, apavadate, saṃsarati, anumanyate, avalokate, niṣkarṣati, durbhavati, vilokate, ālokate, niṣīdati, adhivasati, apinahyati, ativarttata, subhavati, ud‌bhavati, abhyeti, pratipadyate, parigaṇayati, upadadhāti evaṃ 'vataṃsaḥ pinaddhavān satatam śraddhanaḥ antarbhavati |
pratyayārthaviśeṣakā yathā—
manasvī, subhavati, sumanāyate (3.1.12), durbhavati, durmanāyate (3.1.12) evam atimanāyate | pucchamudasyati, utpucchayate, (3.1.20) vyasyati, vipucchayate, paryasyati, paripucchayate, bhāṇḍaṃ samāracayati saṃbhāṇḍayate, cīvaraṃ sañcinoti sañcīvarayate (3.1.20), hastenāpakṣipati apahastayati, varmaṇā saṃnahyati saṃvarmayati, pāśena saṃyacchati saṃpāśayati, cūrṇairavadhvaṃsayati avacūrṇayati, tūlairavakuṣṇāti avatūlayati, hastinā 'tikrāmati atihastayati, senayābhiyāti abhiṣeṇayati, vīṇayopagāyati upavīṇayati, vāsyā paricchinatti parivāsayati, ś‍lokairupastauti upaś‍lokayati, lomānyanumārṣṭi anulomayati, pāśān vimocayati vipāśayati, tūstāni vihanti vitūstayati, rūpaṃ nirīkṣate nirūpayati vastraṃ paridadhāti parivastrayati, paryyāṇamuttānayati utparyāṇayati iti ||
nanu ete 'pi kriyāviśeṣāṇāṃ vācakāḥ kasmānna bhavanti ? yad‌dhi yatprayogādavagamyate tat tasya vācyaṃ bhavati |
naivam, 'bhṛśādibhyo bhuvyacveḥ' (3.1.12) ityādibhirbhavatyādyartha eva pratyayotpatteḥ |
maivaṃ vocaḥ, nāhaṃ kyaṅantaṃ pṛcchāmi |
kiṃ tarhi ?
ṇyantam | tatra 'śabdavairakalahā 'bhrakaṇvameghebhyaḥ karaṇe' (3.1.17) iti varttate | tataś‍ca karotyarthalakṣaṇe dhātvarthasāmānye ṇiṅ‌ṇicorvidhānāt, pucchasyodasanaṃ karotyutpucchayate, senayābhiyānaṃ karotyabhiṣeṇayati iti karotyarthasya pratyayena udasanābhiyānādestūpasargeṇāvidhāne vācakatvameṣāṃ bhaviṣyatīti |
ucyate— neha 'karaṇe' ityanena sakaladhātvarthānuyāyikriyāsvamānyaṃ pratinirdiśyate, api tvanavadhāritātmasvarūpā udasanābhiyānādayaḥ kriyāviśeṣā eva |
kathamidaṃ jñāyate iti cet,
ācāryapravṛttirjñāpayati—yadayaṃ
(1) 'muṇḍa—miśra—ś‍lakṣṇa—lavaṇebhyaḥ karaṇamātre pratyayamudāharati | tad‌yathā— muṇḍaṃ karoti muṇḍayati, evaṃ miśrayati, ś‍lakṣṇayati, lavaṇayati
(2) halikalikṛta tūstebhyo grahaṇalakṣaṇe tad‌viśeṣe (pratyayamudāharati) |
yathā— halimagrahīt ajahalat, kalimagrahīd acakalat, kṛtaṃ gṛh‍ṇāti kṛtayati, tvacaṃ gṛh‍ṇāti tvacayati,
(3) varṇasatyārthavedebhyastadācaṣṭe (3.1.25) ityupasargaviśiṣṭe dhātvarthe |
yathā— varṇamācaṣṭe varṇayati, satyamācaṣṭe satyāpayati, arthamācaṣṭe '— rthāpayati, vedamācaṣṭe vedāpayati iti;
(4) vratād bhojane tannivṛttau ca | yathā payo vratayati, vṛṣalānnaṃ vratayati—
ato 'vamamyate karaṇa ityanenā 'navadhāritaviśeṣo dhātvarthaḥ pratyayābhidheyatayā 'dhikriyata' iti |
evaṃ tarhi 'saviśeṣaṇasyaiva kriyāviśeṣasya pratyayenoktatvād abhiṣeṇayatyādiṣu upasargaprayogo na prāpnoti, yathā śyena ivācarati śyenāyata bāṣpamud‌vamati bāṣpāyate, hastena nirasyati hastayate evaṃ pādayate' iti
bhavedetat yatraika eva pratyayārthaḥ | yathā— upamānādācāre (3.1.10), 'bāṣpoṣmabhyāmud‌vamane (3.1.16), aṅgānnirasana iti |
iha tu bahavaḥ pratyayārthāḥ | yathā— 'pucchādudadasane vyasane paryasane ca', 'bhāṇḍāt samāracane vibhajane ca', 'cībarādarjane paridhāne ca, muṇḍādibhyaḥ 'tatkaroti, tadācaṣṭe, tenātikrāmati' ityādāviti, tatra upāttasyāpi kriyāviśeṣasya pratyayato rūpasāmānyādanavadhāraṇe tadavacchedāyopasargaviśeṣaḥ prayujyate | yathā pratyayārthaviśeṣaṇapakṣe manaḥśabdādutpannena kyaṅaivopasargārthaviśiṣṭapratyayābhidhāne 'sumanāyate,' 'durmanāyate', 'abhimanāyata' iti sudurabhayaḥ prayujyante |
evaṃ tarhi 'hastinātikrāmatyatihastayatī'—tyādivat 'ś‍vetāś‍vamācaṣṭe ś‍vetayati', 'aś‍vataramācaṣṭe aś‍vayati', 'gāloḍitamācaṣṭe gāloḍayati' 'āhvarakamācaṣṭe
āhvarayati' ityādāvāṅprayogaḥ prāpnoti |
naivam, atrāḍaḥ sahā 'bhidhāyakatvāt | na hi krāmatītyādivac caṣṭe ityasyaikākinaḥ svārthā 'bhidhāne sāmarthyamasti | ato viśeṣakatvamevaiṣām, na vācakatvamiti ||
(4. sahābhidhāyakāḥ)
atha sahābhidhāyakāḥ, yathā— prasnute, prāṇiti, prañcate, prāpnoti, saṃgrāmayate, saṃcaṣṭe, saṃrambhate, saṃdhukṣayati, anurudhyate, viklabate, vilokate, viśrāṇayati, ācaṣṭe, āśāste, ācāmati, ātaṅkayati, nidrāyati, niyamayate, adhīte, adhyeti, abhivādayate, pariṣvajate, ujjāsayati, uttaṃsayati' iti |
(5. kāryārthāḥ)
kāryārthāḥ | yathā— 'vijayate, parājayate, nyavikṣata, samagaṃsta, anvakarot, parākarot, virarām, upararāma, udasiṣyati, udasiṣyate, apaskirate, praticaskāra, upaskurute, plāyate, prārṣabhīyati, niṣṭapati, abhiṣeṇayati, viṣahate, pariṣvajate, viṣṇavati, prahiṇoti, praṇaśyati, pariṇeṣyati, antarṇayati' (kāśikā 8.3.65)
(6. nirarthakāḥ)
nirarthakāḥ, yathā— prārabhate, pralambate, prasūyate, prayacchati, apaharati, apatrapate, apahnute, abhiṣuṇoti, nimīlati, nivāryate, niṣṭhīvati, nimajjati, nikhañjati, vigāhate, virājate, vijānāti, vinaśyati, vikatthate, vidīryate, āśrayati, āś‍liṣyati, saṃyujyate, adhyāgacchati, paryāgacchati iti ||
(5. avyayaprātipadikeṣu karmapravacanīyāḥ —11)
prādaya eva kriyāviśeṣopajanitasaṃbandhāvacchedahetavaḥ karmmapravacanīyāḥ | yadāha—
kriyāviśeṣajanyānāṃ saṃbandhānāṃ prakāśane |
karmmapravacanīyāḥ syurnimittamavadhāritāḥ || 38 || iti |
(saṃvādī cā 'tra bhartṛhariḥ vākyapadīye 2.199, 2.204 kārikābhyām)
kiṃ punaramīṣāmavadhāraṇam ?
karmapravacanīyasaṃjñādhikāre 'anuprabhṛtayaḥ śabdā ekādaśa, lakṣaṇādayo 'rthā dvāviṃśati | tad‍yathā 'anurlakṣaṇe, tṛtīyārthe, hīne (1.4.84—86), lakṣaṇetthaṃbhūtākhyānabhāgavīpsāsu
pratiparyanavaḥ (1.4.90), abhirabhāge (1.4.91), pratiḥ pratinidhipratidānayoḥ (1.4.92), adhiparī anarthakau (1.4.93), suḥ pūjāyām (1.4.9), atiratikramaṇe (1.4.9), apiḥ padārthasaṃbhāvanā 'nvavasarga—garhā—samuccayeṣu (1.4.96), adhirīś‍vare (1.4. 97), vibhāṣā kṛñi (1.4.98) |
evam 'anu', upa, apa, pari, āṅ, prati, abhi, adhi, su, ati api' ityekādaśa śabdāḥ |
hetu—1lakṣaṇam, 2sahārthaḥ, hīnatā3, 4ādhikyam, 5varjanam, 6maryādāvacanam, lakṣaṇam7, itthambhūtākhyānam8, bhāgaḥ9, vīpsā10, pratinidhiḥ11, pratidānam12, ānarthakyam13, pūjā14, atikramaṇam15, padārthaḥ16, saṃbhāvanā17, anvavasargaḥ18, garhā19, samuccayaḥ20, svāmyam21, adhikāraḥ22, iti dvāviṃśatirarthāḥ |
tatrā 'nuḥ saptārthaḥ, pratiparī ṣaḍarthau, apiḥ pañcārthaḥ, adhyabhī ñyarthau, upātī dvayartho, āṅapasava ekārthāḥ' iti | teṣu—
(1. anuḥ)
anuḥ hetu1—lakṣaṇa2—sahārtha3—hīnatā4—5lakṣaṇetthaṃbhūtākhyāna—bhāga6—vīpsāsu7 karmapravacanīyaḥ | tad‌yoge dvitīyā yathā— 'śākalyasya saṃhitāmanuprāvarṣat' parvatamanvavasitā senā, anuśākaṭāyanaṃ vaiyākaraṇāḥ, vṛkṣamanu vidyotate vidyut, sādha/?/ /?/rdevadatto mātaramanu, yadatra māmanusyāt, vṛkṣaṃ vṛkṣamanutiṣṭhati' iti |
kriyāyā dyotako nāyaṃ sambandhasya na vācakaḥ |
nāpi kriyāpadākṣepī sambandhasya tu bhedakaḥ |
tathāhi śākalyasya saṃhitāmanu prāvarṣaditi saṃhitāpravarṣaṇayorhetuphalabhūtayo— rlakṣyalakṣaṇabhāvo niśamayatikriyopajanita ityanunā prakāśyate 'śākalyasya saṃhitāmanu niśamya prāvarṣat' iti | evamanyatrā 'pyavagantavyam | ityanuḥ saptārthaḥ |
(2. pratiḥ)
lakṣaṇetthambhūtākhyāna—bhāga—vīpsā—pratinidhi—pratidāneṣu pratiḥ | sa caturṣu dvitīyāṃ, dvayoḥ pañcamīmutpādayati | yathā— 'vṛkṣaṃ prati vidyotate, sādhurdevadatto mātaraṃ prati, yadatra māṃ prati syāt, vṛkṣaṃ vṛkṣaṃ prati sekaḥ, abhimanyurarjunataḥ prati, māṣānasmai tilebhyaḥ prati prayacchati |
(3. pariḥ)
lakṣaṇetthaṃbhūtākhyānabhāgavīpsāvarjanānarthakyeṣu pariḥ | so 'pi caturṣṣu dvitīyāṃ dvayoḥ pañcamīmutpādayati | yathā—'vṛkṣaṃ pari vidyotate, sādhurdevadatto mātaraṃ pari, yadatra māṃ pari syāt, vṛkṣaṃ vṛkṣaṃ pari sekaḥ, pari pari trigarttebhyo vṛṣṭo devaḥ, viś‍vapsniyā viś‍vataspari iti pratiparī ṣaḍarthau |
(4. apiḥ)
1padārtha—saṃbhāvanā2 'nvavasarga3—4garhā—5samuccayeṣvapiḥ | tasyaiteṣūpasargasaṃjñā bādhyate |
(1. padārthaḥ)
padāntarasyāprayujyamānasyārthaḥ padārthaḥ | sarpiṣo 'pi syāt, madhuno 'pi syāt | mātrā binduḥ stokamityasyārthe apiśabdo varttate |
(2. saṃbhāvanā)
adhikārthavacanena śakterapratighātāviṣkaraṇaṃ saṃbhāvanā |
'api siñcenmūlakasahastram', 'api stuyād rājānam' iti |
(3. anvavasargaḥ)
kāmacārānujñānamanvavasargaḥ | 'api siñca', 'api stuhi' iti |
(4. nindā)
nindā garhā | api siñcet palāṇḍum', 'api stuyād vṛṣalam' iti |
(5. samuccayaḥ)
anekakriyopanipātaḥ samuccayaḥ | 'api siñca', 'api stuhi', siñca ca stuhi cetyarthaḥ | upasargabādhanāt ṣatvaṃ na bhavati | ityapiḥ pañcārthaḥ |
(5. adhiḥ)
adhirānarthakyā 'dhikārasvāmyeṣu karmapravacanīyaḥ |
sa ādyayoḥ 'gatirgatau' (8.1.70), 'tiṅi nodāttavati (8.1.71) iti gatyupasargasaṃjñā— bādhanān nighātādikaṃ nānubhavatī'—ti | yathā— 'kuto 'dhyāgacchati, yadatra māmadhikariṣyati' iti
svāmye tu dvidhā 1. adhiyoge saptamī bhavati kadācit svāminaḥ
2. kadācit svāt | yathā —
adhi brahmadatte pañcālāḥ, adhi pañcāleṣu brahmadattaḥ' (iti) |
(6. abhiḥ)
abhirlakṣaṇetthaṃbhūtākhyānavīpsāsu dvitīyāmutpādayati |
yathā— vṛkṣamabhi vidyotate, sādhurdevadatto mātaramabhi, vṛkṣaṃ vṛkṣamabhi siñcati | ityadhyabhī ñyarthau |
(7. upaḥ)
hīnā 'dhikārthayoḥ upaḥ | tatra yathāsaṃkhyaṃ dvitīyāsaptamyau |
yathā— upārjunaṃ yod‌dhāraḥ, upa khāryāṃ droṇaḥ' iti
(8. atiḥ)
atiḥ pūjāyāmatikramaṇe ca | tatra pūjā stutiḥ | niṣpanne 'pi phale kriyāpravṛttiratikramaṇam | yathā— 'śobhanaṃ stutam', ati stutaṃ bhavatā, ati sik‍tametad bhavatā' iti |
upasargasaṃjñābādhanāt ṣatvaṃ na bhavati | ityupātī dvayarthau |
(9. āṅ)
āṅ maryādāvacane pañcamīmutpādayati—'ā pāṭaliputrād vṛṣṭo devaḥ|'
vacanagrahaṇādabhi— vidhirapi gṛhyate | tatrāpīdamevodāharaṇam |
(10. apaḥ)
apo varjane pañcamīmutpādayati | 'apa trigarttebhyo vṛṣṭo devaḥ' |
(11. suḥ)
suḥ pūjāyāmupasargasaṃjñāṃbādhate | 'sustutaṃ bhavatā', 'susik‍taṃ bhavatā' iti ṣatvaṃ na bhavatī' ti | ityāṅapasava ekārthā iti ||
(6. avyayapratipadikeṣu vibhak‍tipratirūpāṇi)
avyayāni dvidhā —
subantatiṅantānukārīṇi vibhaktipratirūpāṇi ceti |
tāni pratyekaṃ ṣọdhā | yathā— 1. prakṛtyarthāni, 2. pratyayārthāni, 3. ubhayārthāni, 4. anubhayārthāni, 5. prakṛtyantarārthāni, 6. pratyayāntarārthāni ceti | teṣu —
(1) subantānukārīṇi vibhaktipratirūpāṇi ceti —
prakṛtyarthāni yathā— uccaiḥ, nīcaiḥ, cirāya, vihāyaseti |
pratyayārthāni yathā— ārāt, akasmāt, ekapade, prage iti |
ubhayārthāni yathā— ahaṃ śubhaṃ pāre madhye iti |
anubhayārthāni yathā— ṛte diṣṭ‍yā sākṣāt ahnāya iti |
prakṛtyantarārthāni yathā— kṛtaṃ divā doṣā antareṇeti |
pratyayāntarārthāni yathā— sāyaṃ svayaṃ cirasya parasparasyeti |
(2) tiṅantānukārīṇi (vibhaktipratirūpāṇi) —
prakṛtyarthāni yathā— 'manye śaṅke aye āma' iti |
pratyayārthāni yathā— ehi apehi paśya paśyata' iti |
ubhayārthāni yathā— 'asti, asi, asmi, brūhi' iti |
anubhayārthāni yathā— yāti, nayāti, varttate navarttata iti |
prakṛtyantarārthāni yathā— astu, bhavatu, pūryate, āsa iti |
pratyayāntarārthāni yathā— āha, syāt, brūyāt, bhūyāt iti |
(avyayabhedāḥ)
svarādinipātamavyayam (1.1.37) ityavyayaprakaraṇe
1. kṛnmejantaḥ (1.1.39) ktvātosunkasunaḥ (1.1.40)
2. taddhitaś‍cāsarvavibhak‍tiḥ (1.1.38)
3. avyayībhāvaś‍ca (1.1.41) iti paṭh‍yate | tatra —
(1)'ām, ktvā, lyap, tumun, ṇamul, khamuñ' iti kṛtaḥ ṣaḍ bhāṣāyām |
te tu kṛtaḥ 'kriyārūpāḥ, kriyāphalarūpāḥ, kriyāviśeṣaṇarūpāḥ, kriyāvadhirūpāḥ, kriyākarmarūpāḥ, kriyāvayavarūpāś‍ca' bhavanti | teṣu—
1. kriyārūpā yathā— cakāsāñcakāra, kārayāmāsa, bibharāmbabhūva, vidāṅkurvantu, alaṃkṛtvā, khalu kṛtvā, alamālapya, khalvālapya, alaṃ bhok‍tum, 'kālo bhok‍tum, śrotuṃ śrotram, draṣṭuṃ cakṣuḥ' iti |
2. kriyāphalarūpā yathā— bhoktuṃ vrajati, pak‍tumapatiṣṭhate, bhok‍tuṃ bhuṅkte pak‍tuṃ pacati, bhok‍tuṃ glāyati, bhok‍tuṃ ghaṭate, bhok‍tuṃ kṣamate, bhok‍tuṃ sahate, bhok‍tumasti, bhok‍tuṃ vidyate, bhok‍tumīṣṭe, bhok‍tuṃ prabhavati' iti |
3. kriyāviśeṣaṇarūpā yathā— itthaṅkāram, anyathākāram, yathākāramṛ, tathākāram,
uccaiḥkāram, nīcaiḥkāram, tiryakkāram, mukhataḥkāram, nānābhāvam, dvidhābhāvam, tūṣṇīṃbhāvam, anvagbhāvam' iti |
4. kriyāvadhirūpā yathā—
bhuktyā vrajati, apamitya yācate, agrebhojaṃ vrajati, dvyahātyāsaṃ gāḥ pāyayati, dvyaṅgulotkarṣaṃ khaṇḍikāśchinatti, śayyotthāyaṃ rājadvārameti, kanyādarśaṃ varayati, brāhmaṇavedaṃ bhojayati, yāvajjīvamadhīte, carmapūraṃ stṛṇāti, goṣpadapūraṃ vṛṣṭo devaḥ, celaknopaṃ vṛṣṭo deva' iti |
5. kriyākarmarūpā yathā—
śaknoti bhok‍tum, dhṛṣṇoti bhok‍tum, jānāti bhok‍tum, ārabhate bhok‍tum, pārayati bhok‍tum, prakramate bhok‍tum, labhate bhok‍tum, arhīta bhok‍tum, icchati bhok‍tum, kāmayatebhok‍tum, eṣitumicchati, kamituṃ kāmayate' iti |
6. kriyāvayavarūpā yathā—
mūlakopadaṃśaṃ bhuṅkte, daṇḍopaghātaṃ gāḥ kālayati, pārś‍vopapīḍaṃ śete, vrajoparodhaṃ gāḥ sādayati, pāṇyupakarṣamutthāpayati, keśagrāhaṃ yudhyante, bhrūvikṣepaṃ jalpati, gehānupraveśamāste, nāmagrāhamākārayati, coraṅkāramākrośati, svāduṅkāraṃ bhuṅkte, svādvakṛtya bhuṅkte' iti |
kriyākarmāvayavarūpāḥ khalvapi saṃbhavanti, yathā— svapoṣaṃ puṣyati, ātmapoṣaṃ puṣṇāti, gopoṣaṃ puṣyati, raipoṣaṃ puṣṇāti, nimūlakāṣaṃ kaṣati, samūlakāṣaṃ kaṣati, samūlaghātaṃ hanti, pāṇighātaṃ vedimāhanti, śuṣkapeṣaṃ pinaṣṭi, cūrṇapeṣaṃ pinaṣṭi, rūkṣapeśaṃ pinaṣṭi, udapeṣaṃ pinaṣṭi, akṛtakāraṃ karoti, jīvagrāhaṃ gṛh‍ṇāti, hastagrāhaṃ gṛh‍ṇāti, hastavarttaṃ varttayati, cūḍakanāśaṃ naṣṭaḥ, suvarṇanidhāyaṃ nihitaḥ, odanapākaṃ pakvaḥ, krauñcabandhaṃ bad‌dhaḥ, jīvanāśaṃ naśyati, puruṣavāhaṃ vahati, ūrdhvaśoṣaṃ śuṣkaḥ, ūdha rvapūraṃ pūrṇa' iti |
śeṣāśchandasi caturviṃśatirbhavanti | tad yathā—
'eś, ken, tavai, ke, se, sen, ase, asen, ksa, kasen, adhyai, aghyain, kadhyai, kadhyain, śadhyai, śadhyain, taveṅ, taven, kai, iṣyai, ṇamul, tosun, kasun' iti |
(1—2) eśa‌kenau teṣu kṛtyārthe eśakenau | eś avacakṣe, ken nāvagāhe |
(3) tavai kṛtyārthe tumarthe ca |
kṛtyārthe paridhātavai, paristaritavai |
tumarthe somamindrapātavai, anvetavai |
(4—20) (ke — iṣyai) kayā(ke ā)dayaḥ saptadaśa tumarthe | teṣu—
(1) ke dṛśe viś‍vāya sūryam, vikhye tvā harāmi, (2) se vakṣe rāyaḥ, (3) sen tā vāmeṣe rathānām, (4) ase kratve dakṣāya jīvase | (5) asen iha kṣayāya jīvase, (6) ksepreṣe bhagāya, śriyase, (7) kasenapyevaṃrūpaḥ, svare viśeṣaḥ, (8) adhyaikāmamupācaradhyai, (9) adhyainapyevaṃrūpaḥ, svare viśeṣaḥ, (10) kadhyai indrāgnī āhuvadhyai, (11) kadhyain—śriyadhyai, (12) śadhyai pibadhyai, (13)śadhyain saha mādayadha yai, (14) taveṅ daśame māsi sūtave, (15) taven somamindrāya pātave suvardeveṇu gantave, karttave, harttave, (16) kai prayai devebhyaḥ, (17) iṣyai apāmoṣadhīnāṃ rohiṣyai, avyathiṣyai rohaṇāya cā 'vyathanāya cetyarthaḥ |
(21) tumartha eva 'śaki ṇamulkamulau' (3.4.12) agniṃ devā vibhājaṃ nāśaknuvan apalupaṃ nāśaknuvan |
(22—23) īś‍vare tosunkasunau (3.4.13)— īś‍varo 'bhicaritoḥ, īś‍varo vilikhaḥ, īś‍varo vitṛdaḥ | tosunkasunau bhāvalakṣaṇe ca |
tatra 'stheṇkṛñvadicarihutamijanibhyastosun (3.4.16), sṛpitṛdoḥ kasun' (4.3.17)| yathā— āsaṃsthātorvedyāṃ sīdanti, purā sūryasyodetorādheyaḥ, purā vatsānāmapākartto, purā pravaditoragnau hotavyam, purā pracaritorāgnīdhre hotavyam, āhotorapramattastiṣṭhati, ātamitorupatiṣṭhante, āvijanitoḥ saṃbhavāma, purā krūrasya visṛpaḥ, purā jatrubhya ātṛdaḥ |
(2) taddhiteṣvasarvavibhaktiṣu (pā. 1.1.38 mabhā., 5.3.146, 7.2.104, 105, 5. 4.42, 43, 44, 1.3.38) tasilādayaḥ prāk pāśapaḥ, śasprabhṛtayaḥ prāk samāsāntebhyaḥ, māntaḥ, kṛtvo 'rthāḥ, tasivatī, nānāñau iti |
yathā — yataḥ, tatra, iha, kva, ekadā, etarhi, adhunā, idānīm, sadyaḥ, parut, parāri, aiṣamaḥ, adya, paredyavi, pūrvedyuḥ, ubhayedyuḥ, sarvathā, ittham, purastāt, prāk, adhaḥ, upari, upariṣṭāt, puraḥ, paś‍cāt, dakṣiṇāt, dakṣiṇā, dakṣiṇāhi, dakṣiṇena, dakṣiṇataḥ, dvidhā, dvedhā, dvaidham, ekadhyam, bahuśo dehi, vāsudevataḥ prati, śuklībhavati, agnisāt saṃpadyate, devatrāgacchati paṭapaṭākaroti, pacatitarām, bahukṛtvo bhuṅkte, dvirbhuṅkte, sakṛd bhuṅkte, bahudhā bhuṅkte, ādito bhavati, brāhmaṇavad bravīti, vinā devadattam, nānā devadattāt | (49)
(3) avyayībhāvo dvidhā (1) sattvabhūtārthaḥ,
(2) asattvabhūtārthaś‍ce—ti | tayoḥ —
sattvabhūtārtho yathā— upakumbham, sumadram, duryavanam, nirmakṣikam, niḥśītam, sabrahma, bahirgrāmam, sūpaprati, madhyesamudram, dvimuni, pañcanadam, lohitagaṅgam' iti |
asattvabhūtārtho yathā— adhistri, pratyurasam, anuratham, pratyartham, yathāśakti, sacakram, yāvadamatram, paritrigarttam, āpāṭaliputram, abhyagni, dvipari, 'anugaṅgaṃ vāraṇasī' ti |
(3. anukaraṇaprātipādikam —6)
śabdasya tād‌rūpyeṇābhidhānamanukaraṇam |
yadāha—vyaktā 'vyakta—varṇa—pada—vākya— sādṛśyok‍tayo 'nukaraṇāni | tatra —
1. vyaktavarṇasādṛśyoktiryathā— (saka. 2)
chinnena patatā vahnau yanmukhena haṭhātkṛte |
sveti heti hareṇok‍teḥ svāhāsīt saiva rāvaṇaḥ || 39 ||
2. vyaktapadasādṛśyoktiryathā— (kāda. 2.147)
gaccheti vak‍tumicchāmi matpriya! tvatpriyaiṣiṇī |
nirgacchati mukhād vāṇī mā gā iti karomi kim || 40 ||
3. vyaktavākyasādṛśyoktiryathā— (urāca. 1)
tvaṃ jīvitaṃ tvamasi me hṛdayaṃ dvitīyaṃ tvaṃ kaumudī nayanayoramṛtaṃ tvamaṅge |
ityādibhiḥ priyaśatairanurudhya mugdhāṃ tāmeva śāntamathavā kimataḥ pareṇa || 41 ||
4. avyaktavarṇasādṛśyoktiryathā
gate 'rdharātre parimandamandaṃ garjanti yat prāvṛṣi kālameghāḥ |
apaś‍yatī vatsamivendubimbaṃ taccharvarī gauriva huṅkaroti || 42 ||
5. avyaktapadasādṛśyoktiryathā—
caṭaccaṭiti carmaṇi ccimiti coccalacchoṇite dhagad‌dhagitimedasi sphuṭaravo 'sthiṣu ṣṭhāgiti |
punātu bhavato hareramaravairirājorasi kvaṇatkarajapañjarakrakacakāṣajanmānalaḥ || 43 ||
6. avyaktavākyasādṛśyoktiryathā—
pipipriya sasasvayaṃ mumumukhāsavaṃ dehi me tatatyaja dududrutaṃ bhabhabhājanaṃ kāñcanam |
iti skhalitajalpitaṃ madavaśāt kuraṅgīdṛśaḥ prage hasitahetave sahacarībhiradhyaiyata || 44 ||
etena yāni sādhūnyarthavanti padāni, yāni ca vākyāni, yaccāśaktijam asādhu śabdarūpam, ye cāpabhraṃśāḥ, ye cānarthakā varṇāḥ, yāś‍cāvyaktavarṇa— padavākyok‍tayaḥ, tadanukaraṇānāṃ sādhutvamupapatraṃ bhavati, na pratiṣiddhasya, yo hyevamasau brāhmaṇaṃ hantīti tasyānukurvan brāhmaṇaṃ hanyāt so 'pi manye patitaḥ syāt |
naivam,
yaś‍ca brāhmaṇaṃ hanti, yaś‍cānuhanti, ubhau tau hataḥ, yastu khalvevamasau brāhmaṇaṃ hantīti tasyā 'nukurvan kadalīstambhaṃ chindyānna sa manye patitaḥ syāditi | na cānukaraṇamapaśabdaḥ | anyo hyasāvapaśabdapadārthakaḥ sādhuśabdaḥ, na cāpaśabdapadārthakaḥ śabdo 'paśabdo bhavati, apaśabda ityetasyāpyapaśabdatvaprasaṅgāt | yaḥ punarevamasāvapaśabdaṃ prayuṅkte iti tasyānukurvannapaśabdamabhidheyeṣu prayuṅkte so 'paśabdakāryeva bhavatīti |
(4. kṛtprātipadikam —6)
bhāvakārakābhidhāyino dhātupratyayāḥ kṛtaḥ |
te ṣọdhā— 1. liṅginaḥ 2. anyaliṅginaḥ 3. svaliṅginaḥ 4. aliṅginaḥ 5. śaktyādyapekṣiṇaḥ 6. anuprayogādyapekṣiṇaś‍ca | teṣu —
1. dravyavacanā aṇādayo liṅginaḥ | yathā— kumbhakāraḥ, paṅkajam, dhātrī, dātram, kāruḥ, kṛkavākuḥ iti |
2. guṇavacanā ṇvulādayo 'nyaliṅginaḥ | yathā— kārakaḥ, kārikā, kārakam, darśanīyaḥ darśanīyā, darśanīyam iti |
3. utpattāvapekṣitaniyataliṅgāḥ 'striyāṃ k‍tin (3.3.94) ityevamādayaḥ svaliṅginaḥ | yathā— paktiḥ pacanam, pākaḥ, vrajaḥ, śayyā, suptam, iti |
4. asattvabhūtārthatvenānupagṛhīta—liṅga—saṃkhyā—śaktaya—stumunādayo 'liṅginaḥ | yathā— kālo bhok‍tum, alaṃ kṛtvā, khalu prahṛtya, nāvagāhe, īś‍varo 'bhicaritoḥ, īś‍varo vilikhaḥ iti |
5. śaktihetumallakṣyakriyādyapekṣāḥ śatrādayaḥ śaktyāpekṣiṇaḥ | yathā— vrajatā kṛtam, kriyamāṇaṃ paśya, āvarjayan vasati, caṅkramyamāṇo 'dhīte, pakṣyan vrajati, bhojako vrajati iti |
6. apekṣitānuprayogataddhitādyanuṣaṅgā ṇamulādayo 'nuprayogādyapekṣiṇaḥ| yathā— raipoṣaṃ puṣyati, coraṅkāramākrośati, kārayāñcakāra, kṛttrimam, vyāvakrośī, sāṃrāviṇam iti |
(5. taddhitaprātipadikam —6)
bhāvakārakasaṃbandhisvārthābhidhāyino 'dhātupratyayāstaddhitāḥ | te ṣọdhā— 1. alopinaḥ, 2. lopinaḥ, 3. sarvalopinaḥ, 4. ādeśinaḥ, 5. pradeśinaḥ, 6. apradeśinaś‍ceti |
teṣu —
1. niranubandhā alopinaḥ | yathā 'aś‍vatvam, aś‍vakaḥ, aś‍vatthāmā, sabhyaḥ, sakhyam, devadattarūpya iti |
2. sānubandhā lopinaḥ | yathā brāhmaṇyam, mṛttikā, dākṣiḥ, vaiyākaraṇaḥ, steyam, kaidāryam iti |
3. (sarvalopinaḥ) yeṣāṃ luglupādibhiḥ kimapi nāvatiṣṭhate te sarvalopinaḥ | yathā—gargāḥ, carakāḥ, pañcālāḥ, cañcā, gārgī, sāmagrī iti |
4. (ādeśinaḥ) yeṣāmāyannādaya ādiśyante te ādeśinaḥ | yathā— aitikāyanaḥ, kāpeyam, ātmanīnam, aś‍vīyam, kṣatriyaḥ śāś‍vatikam iti |
5. (pradeśinaḥ) prakṛterādimadhyaviṣayāḥ pradeśinaḥ | yathā— bahutṛṇam, bahurājā, sarvakaḥ, uccakaiḥ, tvayakā, pacataki iti |
6. (apradeśinaḥ) tasyā evāntyāvayavabhūtā apradeśinaḥ | yathā— vāktvacam, pratyurasam, keśākeśi, yuvajāniḥ, sarajasam, niṣpravāṇiḥ iti |
(6. samāsaprātipadikam —6)
pṛthagarthānāmekārthībhāvaḥ samāsaḥ |
sa ṣọdhā— 1. subantābhyām, 2. tiṅantābhyām, 3. suptiṅantābhyām, 4. subdhātubhyām, 5. subantanāmabhyām, 6. nāmabhyāñceti | teṣu—
1. subantābhyāṃ yathā— upakumbham, rājapuruṣaḥ, nīlotpalam, aṣṭākapālaḥ, citraguḥ, dhavakhadirau iti |
atra 'samarthaḥ padavidhiḥ' (2.1.1) iti sāmarthye sati samāsaḥ | sāmarthyaṃ ca sambandhaḥ | sa ca dvayorupasarjanapradhānabhāve bhavati | na hi pradhānayorupasarjanayoreva vā mitho 'napekṣayoḥ saṃbandho ghaṭate |
pradhānopasarjanabhāvaś‍ca dvidhā (1) abhidhīyamānaḥ (2) pratīyamānaś‍ca |
abhidhīyamāno vyatirekavibhaktiḥ, yadā vaiyadhikaraṇyam 'kumbhasya samīpam, rājñaḥ puruṣa' iti |
tatropakumbhamiti pūrvapadapradhāno 'vyayībhāvaḥ |
rājapuruṣa ityuttarapadapradhānastatpuruṣaḥ |
pradhānamavicalitasvārthaṃ prathamayaivābhidhīyate,
upasarjanaṃ punaḥ pradhānā 'nugrahāyāśritavyatirekaṃ ṣaṣṭhyādibhiḥ | idaṃ ca subantatvaṃ eva bhavati |
pratīyamānastulय़vibhaktiḥ, yadā sāmānādhikaraṇyam— 'nīlaṃ ca tadutpalaṃ ca nīlotpalam, aṣṭasu kapāleṣu saṃskṛto 'ṣṭākapāla iti |
ayaṃ ca 'viśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyeṇe—(2.1.57)—ti karmadhārayaḥ |
'saṃkhyāpūrvaḥ (2.1.52), 'taddhitārthottarapadasamāhāre—ca' (2.1.51) iti ca dvigutvaṃ viśeṣaṇa—viśeṣyabhāvena pratīyamānopasarjanapradhānabhāvayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇye smaryate | sa ca tulyavibhaktitve syāditi subanta eva bhavati | ataś‍ca sarvatra subantena saba subantaṃ samasyate iti smaryate |
2. tiṅantābhyāṃ yathā—aś‍nītapibatā, khādatamodatā, pacatabhṛjjatā, unmṛjāvamṛjā, āvapanivapā 'ehi—re—āhi re(rā) iti |
atra 'ākhyātamākhyātena kriyāsātatye' (2.1.72 gasū.) iti 'mayūravyaṃsakā' dipāṭhāt (2.1.72) tiṅantānāṃ samāsaḥ smaryyate | 'aś‍nīta' 'pibate'tyādi yāsu kriyāsu sātatyena vidyate tā evamucyante | tanmadhyapatitastadgrahaṇena gṛhyata' iti 'udādīnāṃ re' ityetasya cākhyātatvaṃ bhavati ||
3. suptiṅantābhyāṃ yathā— apacasi, prāvarṣat, anuvyacalat, astikṣīrā, ehivāṇijā, jahistambaḥ iti | atra 'saha supā (2.1.4) ityatra tṛtīyayaiva sahārthasyākṣepe sahagrahaṇādatirik‍tād yogavibhāgāśraṇena subantatiṅantābhyāṃ | samāsaḥ kriyate | sa ca naño nalopastiṅyavakṣepe (pā. 6.3.73 vā.), iti udāttavatā tiṅā gatimatā ca' (2.2.18 bhāṣye) iti, 'subadhikāre 'stikṣīrā' divacanam (2.2.24vā.) 'ehīḍādayo 'nyapadārthe' (2.1.72 gasū. 18.1), jahikarmaṇā bahulamābhīkṣṇaye samasyate karttāraṃ cābhidadhātītyupapanno (2.1.72 gasū. 18.1) bhavati | tenāyamarthaḥ saṃgacchate 'avakṣipto 'si na pacasi tvamabhihito 'pi vṛṣala iti, prakarṣeṇāvarṣaditi, paś‍cād viśiṣṭaṃ calanamakaroditi, asti kṣīramasyā' iti, ehi vāṇijetyāmantryamāṇa— vāṇijaviśiṣṭā kriyeti, jahi jahi stambamiti karttā yo 'bhidhīyate sa evamucyata iti |
4. subdhātubhyāṃ yathā— saṃgrāmayate, anurudhyate, śraddhā, antardhiḥ, paramaniyau, pratibhuvau iti | atra 'saṃgrāma yuddhe anurudha kāme iti samastayoreva pāṭhaḥ | ātaś‍copasarge (3.3.106), upasarge ghoḥ kiḥ (3.3.92) iti aṅ—kividhāne 'prādiṣu śradantarorupasaṃkhyānam' 'aci ś‍nudhātubhruvāṃ yvoriyaṅuvaṅau' (6.4.77) ityādikāryasiddhaye kvibantasya pratyayanāmadhātutvād dhātutvamiti subdhātubhyāṃ samāso bhavati ||
5. subantanāmabhyāṃ yathā— dadhisek, carmakāraḥ, carmakrītī, dhanakrītā, brāhmaṇācchaṃsī, sarasijam' iti | atra 'kugatiprādayaḥ (2.2.18), 'upapadamatiṅ' (2.2.19) ityatra atiṅgrahaṇenobhayasūtraśeṣatayā vyākhyāyamānena subityetasya nivṛttiḥ kriyate; 'karttṛkaraṇe kṛtā bahulam (2.1.32), ityatra ca karttṛkaraṇayoḥ samāsavidha /?/nāduttarapadasya kṛdantatāyāṃ labdhāyāṃ kṛdgrahaṇādatirik‍tāt tadantāvasthāyāmeva samāsābhyanujñāne supetyetadapi nivarttate | tataś‍ca 'gatikārakopapadānāṃ kṛd‌bhiḥ saha samāsavacanam subutpatteḥ prāgeva' bhavatītyākhyātam; bahulagrahaṇasya ceṣṭasid‌dha yarthatvāt |
sa kvacinnāmabhyāṃ, kvacit subantābhyām, kvacinnāmasubantābhyāṃ niś‍cīyate | tatra 'dadhisek' ityatra uttarapadasya, 'sātpadādyoḥ (8.3.111) iti padādinibandhana— ṣatva—pratiṣedha—siddhaye 'carmakāra' ityatra tu pūrvapadasya padāntalakṣaṇanalopārthaṃ subantatā kriyate | carmakrītītyatra pūrvapadaṃ nalopārthameva subantam, uttarapadaṃ tu prātipadikaṃ kriyate; tena 'krītāt karaṇapūrvāt (4.1.50) akārāntāt iti īkāraḥ siddho bhavati | subutpattau tu prāk subutpatterantaraṅgaliṅgasaṃskaranimittaḥ ṭābutpadyamānaḥ krītasya ākārāntaraṅgaṃtvāt ṅīṣaṃ pratibadhnīyāt, dhanakrītetyatra tu 'sā hi tasya dhanakrītā prāṇebhyo 'pi garīyasī' iti śiṣṭaprayogadarśanāduttarapadasya subutpattau ṭābutpatterākārāntatvānna ṅīṣa utpatti |
brāhmaṇācchaṃsī sarasijamityatra pūrvapadayoḥ sākṣāt supaḥ śravaṇam; uttarapadayostu prayojanābhāvād vibhakteranutpattiriti |
6. nāmabhyāṃ yathā— aś‍vakrītī, dhanakrītī, pravāpiṇī, māṣavāpiṇī, asūryaṃpaśyā, rājadārāḥ, kṛtapūrvī kaṭam iti | atra aś‍vakrītī dhanakrītī ityetayoḥ prāgvadeva ṅīṣutpattau vibhaktyutpattimantareṇāpi pañcakaprātipadikārthapakṣe karaṇatvā 'virodhaḥ | pravāpiṇī māṣavāpiṇī ityatra tu prāk subutpatteḥ samāse prātipādikasyānto nakāra iti 'prātipadikāntanumvibhaktiṣu ca' (8.4.11) iti ṇatvaṃ bhavati, subantābhyāṃ tu samāse 'ntaraṅgatvāt ṅībutpattau ṅībatra prātipadikāntaḥ, na nakāra iti ṇatvaṃ na syāt yathā gargabhaginīti |
'asūryaṃpaśyā' ityatra nañsūryayordṛśikriyayā saṃbandhāt parasparamasambandhe sāmarthyābhāvād vibhaktyabhāvaḥ, atra hi sūryamapi na paśyantīti nañ sūryakarmikāṃ
dṛśikriyāmapekṣate, na sūryasattām, 'asūryaṃlalāṭayordṛśitapoḥ' (3.2.36) iti vacanādasāmarthye 'pi nāmnoreva samāso bhavati | etena kṛtapūrvītyapi vyākhyātam | atrāpi hi kṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ kaṭo 'neneti kṛtaśabdasya kaṭāpekṣāyāṃ pūrvaśabdenā— sambandhādasāmarthye 'pi 'pūrvādiniḥ' (5.2.86) 'sapūrvvācca' (5.2.87) iti vacanāt kṛtapūrvayossubantayoreva samāso bhavatīti sthitam |
(samāsavicāraḥ) upalakṣaṇaṃ ceha subantābhyāmityādiṣu dvivacanam | tena yathā dvābhyāṃ tathā tribhirbahubhiś‍ca samāso bhavati | tatra—
avyayībhāvaḥ karmmadhārayaś‍ca dvābhyām |
yathā —adhistri, śākaprati, pañcāmrāḥ, puruṣavyāghra iti |
ṣaṣṭhīlakṣaṇaḥ kālaparimāṇalakṣaṇaś‍ca tatpuruṣo dvābhyāṃ tribhiś‍ca |
yathā— rājagavīkṣīram, rājagokṣīram, dvyahajātaḥ, dvyahnajātaḥ iti | atra yadā rājño gauḥ rājagavī tasyāḥ kṣīramiti tadā dvābhyām, yadā tu rājño goḥ kṣīraṃ rājagokṣīramiti tadā tribhiḥ | taduktaṃ— 'rājagavīkṣīre dvisamāsaprasaṅgaḥ, dviṣaṣṭhībhāvāt; (2.1.1 vā. 14,15), siddhaṃ tu rājaviśiṣṭāyā goḥ kṣīreṇābhisambandhād rājagavīkṣīram rājagokṣīramiti ca |
nanu ca 'goḥ kṣīraṃ gokṣīram, rājño gokṣīraṃ rājagokṣīramiti dvitīyapakṣe bhaviṣyati | naivam | arthabhedāt | yathaivāyaṃ gavi yatate, na mahiṣyādeḥ kṣīramātreṇa tuṣyati, evaṃ rājanyapi yatate 'rājño yā gauḥ, tasyā yat kṣīramiti taccaivaṃ na sidhyati | evaṃ hi yataḥ kutaś‍cidāgataṃ gokṣīramātraṃ rājñaḥ sambandhi pratīyate |
kathaṃ punargoḥ kṣīramapyapekṣamāṇāyāś‍ca rājñā rājānamapyapekṣamāṇāyāś‍ca kṣīreṇa samāsaḥ (mabhā. 2.1.1 vā.)?
ucyate— na gauḥ pradhānatvāt tathā rājanamapekṣate yathā upasarjanatvena gāṃ rājā, kṣīramapyavicalitasvārthatvādanautsukyena na tathā gāmapekṣate yathod‌bhūtasambandhavyatire— katvādautsukyena gauḥ kṣīram |
evaṃ cānukūlye gamakatvāt pradhānasāpekṣatve sati samāso bhavatyeva | yathā devadattagurukulam, rājapuruṣabhāryyā iti | taduktam—'bhavati vai pradhānasya sāpekṣasyāpi samāsa' iti (mabhā. 2.1.1) |
evaṃ dve ahanī samāhṛte dvyahaḥ | dvyaho jātasyeti yadā samāsastadā dvābhyām, yadā
tu dve ahanī jātasya dva‍yahajāta iti tadā tribhiḥ | 'sup supā (2.1.4) iti vacanād dvayoreva samāsa iti cet, na, 'kālāḥ parimāṇinā (2.2.5) iti bahuvacananirddeśāt 'sup supā' ityetasmin guṇapade 'pi saṃkhyā na vivakṣyate; tena triṣvapi padeṣu samāsābhyanujñāne, dviśabdasyāpi kālasaṃkhyāyakatvena kālābhidhāyitve dve ahanī jātasyeti vigṛhya jātena parimāṇinā dviśabdāhaḥśabdau kālābhidhāyinau samasyete | pūrvasya padasyottarapada— nimittāyāstatpuruṣasaṃjñāyāḥ pravarttanāt 'na saṃkhyādeḥ samāhāre' (5.4.89) iti pratiṣedhābhāvāt 'ahlo 'hna etebhyaḥ' (5.4.88) iti samāsāntasiddhau dva‍yahnajāta iti vivakṣitarūpasiddhiḥ |
atha rājagokṣīramityatrāpi kathaṃ na samāsāntaḥ ?
gośabdasya yugapat pūrvottarapadāpekṣāyāmasāmarthyāt |
dva‍yahnajāta ityatrāpi tulyamiti cet‌ba |
tanna 'uttarapadayoga eva dvigorāmnānāt |
api ca 'dve ahanī' iti dve api prathamānte, rājño goriti dve api ṣaṣṭhyante | asti ca prathamāntaṣaṣṭhyantayorviśeṣaḥ | prathamāntaṃ hyanupajātavyatirekatvānnirautsukyaṃ nānyadapekṣate; ṣaṣṭhyantaṃ punarudbhūtavyatirekatvāt paropakārāyautsukyena pravarttamānaṃ nānavāpyokāryaṃ viramati |
evaṃ ca sāpekṣatvādasāmarthye samāsaḥ kathamiti cet ? gamakatvāt | yathā— sūryamapi va paśyantītyasūryampaśyā rājadārāḥ, na punargīyante apunargeyāḥ ś‍lokāḥ, śrāddhaṃ na bhuṅkte aśrāddhabhojī brāhmaṇaḥ, aśūdrānnabhojī, evam alavaṇabhojī, ekānnaviṃśatiḥ; yathā avatapte nakulasyeva sthitamavataptenakulasthitaṃ tavaitaditi |
bahuvrīhidvandvau dvābhyāṃ tribhirbahubhiś‍ca | yathā— citraguḥ, kaṇṭhekālaḥ, plakṣanyagrodhau, pāṇipādam, pañcagavadhanaḥ, mattabahumātaṅgam, śaṅkhadundubhivīṇāḥ, dhavakhadirapalāśam iti | atra 'anekamanyapadārthe' (2.2.24) bahubrīhiḥ, 'cārthe dvandvaḥ' (2.2.29) iti ca smṛtiḥ | uktaṃ ca (mabhā. 2.1.1)—
susūkṣmajaṭakeśena sunatājinavāsasā |
samantaśitirandhreṇa dvayorvṛttau na sidhyati || 45 ||
dvandvo yāvadibharārabdhaḥ prādhānyaṃ tatra tāvatām |
itaretarayoge syāt samāhāre tu saṃhateḥ || 46 ||
nanu ca śobhanāḥ sūkṣmā jaṭāḥ keśā asya, śobhanaṃ natamajinaṃ vāso 'sya, saṃjātānyanteṣu śitirandhrāṇyasyeti karmadhārayādigarbhā ete bahuvrīhayaḥ | tatra susūkṣmajaṭakeśena sunatājinavāsasā' ityetayoḥ madhyapadasyottarapadena pūrvapadena vā karmadhārayam, antyasya tūttarapadenaiva saptamītatpuruṣaṃ vidhāya dvayorapi vṛttau bahuvrīhiḥ kasmānna kriyate ?
ucyate
pūrvayoḥ pūrvapadena karmadhārayasyānupapattiḥ asamānādhikaraṇyāt; nahi dvayorapi viśeṣaṇayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ bhavati | uttareṇa tu 'viśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyeṇe (2.1.57)ti sāmānādhikaraṇye bhavati karmadhārayaḥ; kintu na taduttarakālamanyapadārthe vivakṣitārthasiddhiḥ | tathā hi sati sūkṣmajaṭāsambandhanibandhanameva keśānāṃ śobhanatvamupalabhyate na tu svābhāvikam, natinimittameva cājinavāsasaś‍cārutvaṃ gamyate, na tu naisargikam | antye punaranteṣu ityetasya sāpekṣatvādasāmarthye sati nottarapadena saptamītatpuruṣaḥ; anteṣu śitirandha /?/ṇīti hyuk‍te, kasyānteṣvityapekṣyaṃ syāt, tacca śityartha utpadyamāne bahuvrīhāvevopannaṃ bhavati 'saṃjātānyanteṣu sūkṣmacchidrāṇyasyeti, na punastatpuruṣe |
nanu ca 'dṛśyate dvayorapi viśeṣaṇatve sāpekṣatve ca samāsaḥ | tad yathā 'khañjaś‍cāsau kubjaś‍ca khañjakubjaḥ, bhrāturbhāryā bhrātṛbhāryā devadattasye—ti |
uktamatrā ' 'cāryaiḥ |
kimuktam ?
kasyacit khañjo nirjñātaḥ, kasyacit kubja iti pradhānopasarjanabhāvād bhavatyeva viśeṣya—viśeṣaṇabhāvaḥ | api ca— (vākyapadīye 3.14.47)
sambandhiśabdaḥ sāpekṣo nitya sarvaḥ pravarttate |
svārthavat sā vyapekṣā 'sya vṛttāvapi na hīyate || 47 || (iti)
yathā— pituḥ pitā pitāmaho devadattasyeti | iha tu sūkṣmajaṭa ityetadanyapadārtha evāmnāyate | natamityetadapi kriyābhidhāyitvena guṇavacanatvādāśritameva bhavati | su ityetat punaravyaṃ śobhanārthe varttamānaṃ samasyate | tasya cāstāṃ dravyavacanatvam, guṇavacanatve 'pi vipratipattiḥ, avyayānāṃ sattvārthavācitvāt |
kecit punastatrāpi vivandante— dyotakā hi kilaite, na vācakā iti | samāsaś‍ca 'sup supā' iti dyotakānāmapi bhavati | mā bhūt pūrvayoḥ karmadhārayaḥ, antye punarantaśabdasya sambandhiśabdatvena bhrātṛbhāryādivat kathaṃ na tatpuruṣa ?
ucyate,
yadyapi saṃbandhiśabdāḥ sāpekṣatve 'pi samasyante tathāpi sandehaviparyyāsādayo na jāyante tatraiva tadutpattiḥ | atra tu antaśiti randhrāṇītyukte sandehaḥ— 'kimanteṣu śitirandhrāṇyasya, uta 'antaśitīni randhrāṇī' ti | atha yadā 'suṣṭhu sūkṣmajaṭāḥ keśā asye'—ti vigrahaḥ, tadā bhavitavyaṃ pūrvapadayoḥ karmadhārayeṇa |
na bhavitavyam |
kiṃ kāraṇam ?
svare doṣaḥ syāt | bahuvrīhau pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaraṃ badhitvā samāsasyānta udātta ityantaraṅgatvādavayavasamāsasvaraḥ prāpnoti |
tadāha—(vāpa. 3.14.57)
susūkṣmajaṭakeśādau samāso 'vayave yadi |
syāt syāt tatrā 'ntaraṅgatvād bādhako 'vayavasvaraḥ || 48 ||
ataś‍ca yatra dve api viśeṣasaṃjñe tatrottarapade nityameva dvigurdvandvaś‍ca samāso bhavati | tad yathā— 'pañcagavapriya' iti 'chatropānahapriya' iti | yatra kiñcit sāmānyaṃ kaś‍cicca viśeṣaḥ tatra vikalpena | yathā— rājagavīkṣīram, rājagokṣīram iti | yatraikataḥ sāmānyam, anyato viśeṣaḥ tatra na bhavatyeva | yathā— 'susūkṣmajaṭakeśena sunatājinavāsasā' iti | atra bahuvrīhiriti viśeṣasaṃjñāyāmavayavayoḥ 'viśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyeṇa bahulam (2.1.57) iti yā samāsasaṃjñā sā 'sup‌supā' iti tatpuruṣādibhedā 'parāmarśena bhavantī sāmānyasaṃjñetyucyeta |
nanu 'dvandvatatpuruṣayoruttarapade nityasamāsavacanam iti mahāvārttikakāraḥ, ayamapi ca tatpuruṣa eveti kasmādihāpi samāso na bhavati ?
uttarapadopādānāt | ya uttarapada evāmnāyate so 'tra tatpuruṣo grahītavyaḥ, yathā 'dva‍yahnajātaḥ', 'pañcagavadhana' iti | dvandvaḥ punaranuttarapada eveti bahuvrīhiviṣayeṇottarapadena sarva eva gṛhyate | kimarthaṃ punarevamucyate yāvatā bahulagrahaṇenaiva siddham, samudāyavṛttyāvavayavānāṃ mā kadācid vṛttirbhūditi |
tathāpi na vak‍tavyam | iha dvau pakṣau (1) vṛttipakṣaś‍ca (2) avṛttipakṣaś‍ca | yadā vṛttiḥ tadā sarveṣāṃ vṛttiḥ, yadā tu na vṛttistadā sarveṣāmavṛttiriti |
naivam | astyatra viśeṣaḥ | tathāhi pañcagavapriya ityādau nāsya pañcasaṃkhyāmātraṃ priyaṃ,
nāpi gomātram, kiṃ tarhi pañcasaṃkhyopalakṣitāḥ kāś‍cideva gāvaḥ, yathā pañcāmrāḥ saptarṣaya iti | tacca dvigau pūrvamasati durupapādameva bhavati | etena chatropānahapriya ityetadapi vyākhyātam, tatrāpi yugapadadhikaraṇavacanadvandvamantareṇa nābhivāñchitasiddhiḥ | na hyasyopananmātrameva priyam apituchatramapi, upānacchabdādeva ca paraḥ priyaśabdo niśamyamānaḥ na dvandvaṃ vinā chatramupagrahītuṃ śaknoti | tasmādanākṣepa iti |
'susūkṣmajaṭakeśādinā ca mattabahumāttaṅgaṃ vanam' ityādāvapyanekameva padamityuktaṃ bhavati | atrāpi mattā bahava eva mātaṅgā ityāpi na bhavati |
kiṃ kāraṇam ?
'bahugaṇavatuḍati' saṃkhyā (1.1.23) iti bahuśabdasya saṃkhyāvācitvāt, saṃkhyāpūrvasya ca karmadhārayasya, dvigutvāt, dvigoḥ punaḥ 'taddhitārthottarapadasamāhāre'— (2. 1.51) ṣveva bhāvāt, yathā'pañcakapālaḥ, trilokaharmyam, pañcapūlī' iti |
kathaṃ tarhi 'saptarṣayaḥ pañcāmrā' iti ?
'diksaṃkhye saṃjñāyām' (2.1.50) iti saṃjñāyāmeva tad bhavati |
nanu ca mā bhūt taddhitārtha upapadaṃ vā, tathāpi 'bahumātaṅgami'—ti samāhāre bhaviṣyati—bahavo mātaṅgāḥ samāhṛtāḥ bahumātaṅgam, tataś‍ca 'mattaṃ bahumātaṅgamasmin vane tanmattabahumātaṅgaṃ vanamiti bahuvrīhirbhaviṣyati |
ucyate |
atha samāhāra iti kaḥ śabdārthaḥ ?
nanu samāṅpūrvād‍dharateḥ karmaṇi ghañ 'samāhriyata iti samāhāra' iti |
yadyevaṃ pañca kumāryaḥ samāhṛtāḥ pañcakumāri, daśakumāri iti
'gostriyorupasarjanasya' (2.1.48) iti hrasvatvaṃ na prāpnoti |
samāhārasyaikatvāt dvigurekavacanam (2.4.9) ityetadapi vak‍tavyaṃ bhavati |
evaṃ tarhi bhāvasādhano bhaviṣyati samāharaṇaṃ samāhāra iti |
atha bhāvasādhanena kimabhidhīyate ?
yat tadauttarārdhyam |
kaḥ punaḥ pañcagavaṃ, pañcapūlītyādau gavādīnāṃ samāhāraḥ ?
yat tad ārjanaṃ, krayaṇaṃ, bhikṣaṇam, apaharaṇam vā |
yadyevaṃ vikṣipteṣu pūleṣu carantīṣu goṣu na sidhyati |
tarhi samabhyāśīkaraṇaṃ samāhāraḥ |
evamapi pañcagrāmī, ṣaṇṇagarī ityāderanupapattiḥ |
kiṃ kāraṇam?
abhyāśīkaraṇārthe samāhāraśabde samiti samantādityabhividhau varttate, āṅābhimukhye, haratirdeśāntaraprāpaṇe iti |
nāvaśyaṃ haratirdeśāntaraprāpaṇe eva varttate | kiṃ tarhi ? sādṛśye 'pi, māturanuharati pituranuharatīti |
athavā— 'pañcagrāmī, ṣaṇṇagarīti nedamityevāvatiṣṭhate, avaśye hyasau tataḥ kiñcidākāṅkṣati, kriyāṃ guṇaṃ vā | yadākāṅkṣati tadekaṃ, sa samāhāra iti |
ayaṃ tarhi bhāvasādhane sati doṣaḥ, pañcapūlī ānīyatāmiti dravyasyānayanaṃ na prāpnoti |
naiṣa doṣaḥ | tad yathā 'gauranubandhyaḥ' 'ajo 'gnīṣomīya' iti jātau coditāyāṃ tatrā 'saṃbhavādālambhanaprokṣaṇaviśasanādīni dravye bhavanti ihāpi bhāvānayanasyāsaṃbhavād dravyasthānayanaṃ bhaviṣyati |
avyatirekād vā | na hi samūhibhyaḥ samāhāralakṣaṇaḥ samūho vyatirik‍to bhavati | evaṃ tarhi bahumātaṅgamiti samāhāre eṣa doṣo bhavati— 'akārāntottarapado dviguḥ striyāṃ bhāṣyata' iti pañcapūlītivad īkārāntatvaṃ prāpnoti | na vā 'yaṃ pātrādiṣu paṭhyate, yena 'catuṣpātra—tribhuvanādivat tanniṣedho bhaviṣyati; nāpyābanto yena 'pañcakhaṭvī pañcakhaṭvam' ityādivad vikalpo 'vakalpeta |
nanu dvigāvapīkāro na dṛśyate yathā ekaputraḥ ekabhikṣeti |
nāyaṃ dviguḥ |
kintarhi? 'pūrvakālaikasarvajaratpurāṇe—(2.1.49) tyādinā karmmadhārayaḥ | kiṃ ca bhoḥ | saṃkhyāpūrvo 'pi dvigurna bhavati ?
vāḍham, tasya taddhitārthottarapadasamāhāreṣveva bhāvāt | na ceha taddhitārtha uttarapadaṃ vā vidyate, na caikasya samāhāraḥ saṃbhavati |
yadā tu sāmarthyātiśayādekasminnapi samūhāropaṇam, tadā, bhavatyeva, yathā— 'ekāpūpī ekaśāṭīti | kiṃ punardvigusaṃjñā pratyayottarapadayorbhavati ? evaṃ tāvat | etarhītaretarāśrayatvādaprasiddhiḥ |
kathamitaretarāśrayatvam?
dvigunimitte pratyayottarapade, pratyayottarapadanimittā ca dvigusaṃjñeti |
evaṃ tarhi 'artha' iti vakṣyāmi
arthe cet taddhitānutpattirbahuvrīhivat | tatra yathā 'citraguḥ śabalaguḥ' iti bahuvrīhiṇok‍ta— tvānmatvarthasya matvarthīyo na bhavati, evaṃ dvaimāturaḥ pāñcanāpitiḥ' ityādau taddhitārthasya dvigunok‍tatvāt taddhitotpattirna prāpnoti |
yathecchasi tathā 'stu | astu tāvat pratyayottarapadayoriti |
nanūktamitaretarāśrayatvādaprasiddhiriti, naiṣa doṣaḥ, nedaṃ tulyamanyairitaretarāśrayaiḥ, śabdanityatvāt |
nanu ca na saṃjñā nityā |
kiṃ tarhi? śabdaḥ |
yadyevaṃ bhāvinī saṃjñā vidhāsyate | tad‌yathā— 'kaś‍cit tantuvāyamāha asya sūtrasya śāṭakaṃ vayeti |
sa paśyati yadi śāṭako na vātavyaḥ, atha vātavyo na śāṭakaḥ | śāṭako vātavyaś‍ceti vipratiṣiddham | bhāvinī tu khalvasya saṃjñābhipretā; sa manyate — 'vātavyam, yasminnute śāṭaka ityetad‌bhavatī'—ti | evamihāpi— 'tasmin dvigurbhavati yasyābhinirvṛttasya pratyaya uttarapadamityete saṃjñe bhaviṣyataḥ iti |
athavā punastvartha iti |
nanu cok‍tam 'arthe cet taddhitā 'nutpattirbahuvrīhivadi'—ti | naiṣa doṣaḥ | nāvaśyamarthaśabdo 'bhidheya eva varttate, kiṃ tarhi, syādarthe 'pi | tad yathā— 'dārārthaṃ bhikṣāmahe, janārthaṃ bhikṣāmahe; dārā naḥ syuḥ janā naḥ syuriti | evamihāpi taddhitārthe dvigurbhavati taddhitaḥ syāditi | dvigorvā lugvacanaṃ jñāpakam (vā.5); yadayaṃ 'dvigorluganapatye' (4.1.88) iti dvigostaddhitasya lukaṃ śāsti, tajjñāpayati— 'utpadyate dvigostaddhita' iti |
yadyevam samāhārasamūhayoraviśeṣāt samāhāragrahaṇamanarthakam, 'tasya samūha' (4.2.37) iti taddhitārthe/naiva kṛtatvāt | tathāhi 'samāhāraḥ samūha' ityaviśiṣṭāvetāvarthau | tatra samūha iva samāhāre 'pi taddhitārthe dvigurityeva bhaviṣyati | yadi taddhitārthe dvigurbhavatītyucyate, taddhitotpattiḥ prāpnoti | utpadyatām lugbhaviṣyati | lukkṛtāni prāpnuvanti | kāni punastāni? 'pañcapūlī' 'daśapūlī' iti |
aparimāṇabistācitakambalyebhyo na taddhitaluki (4.1.22) ṅīppratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti; 'pañcagavaṃ daśagavamiti 'gorataddhitaluki (5.4.92) iti ṭac na prāpnoti |
naiṣa doṣaḥ, aviśeṣeṇa dvigo ṅībbhavatītyuktvā 'aparimāṇabistācitakambalyebhyaḥ samāhāre iti vakṣyāmi; aviśeṣeṇa ca goṣṭac bhavatītyuktvā dvigoḥ samāhāre iti vakṣyāmi; tadubhayamapi niyamārthaṃ bhaviṣyati 'samāhāra eva nānyatre'—ti |
evaṃ tarhi abhidhānārthaṃ samāhāragrahaṇam; samāhāreṇābhidhānaṃ yathā syānna taddhitārthena |
yadi syāt ko doṣaḥ syāt ?
taddhitotpattiḥ prasajyeta |
prasajyatām, lugbhaviṣyati | lukkṛtāni prāpnuvanti |
sarvāṇi parihṛtāni |
na sarvāṇi parihṛtāni | 'pañcakumāri, daśakumārī'—ti luk taddhitaluki (1.2.49) iti ṅīpo luk prasajyata iti |
nanu ca yadi taddhitārthe dvigurityucyate 'pañcakhaṭvaḥ, daśakhaṭvaḥ' iti matvarthe 'pi dvigusaṃjñāyāṃ 'dvigoḥ' (4.1.21) itikāraḥ prāpnoti | bahuvrīhisaṃjñayā dvigusaṃjñāyā bādhitatvānna bhaviṣyati; samānādhikaraṇānāṃ matvarthe bahuvrīhirbhavati |
yadyuttarapade dvigurityucyate, uttarapadoktirvak‍tavyā | iyamucyate — 'uttarapadena parimāṇinā dvigoḥ samāsavacanam (vā09); 'dvau māsau jātasya dvimāsajāta:', dve ahanī jātasya dva‌‍yahnajāta' iti |
kimucyate parimāṇinaiveti, na punaranyatrāpi; tad yathā 'pañcagavapriyaḥ pañcagavadhana' iti | anyatra samudāyasya bahuvrīhitvāduttarapadaṃ prasiddhameva (vā.10); tathāhi— 'anekamanyapadārthe (2.2.24) samasyate, bahuvrīhiś‍ca samāse | bhavati |
atha dvandvasya kā vārttā ? dvandvo 'grato viśeṣeṇa vyākariṣyata iti |
atha bahubhirbahuvrīhiḥ — (vesaṃ. 1.21)
cañcadbhujabhramitacaṇḍagadābhighātasañcūrṇitoruyugalasta suyodhanasya' iti | tatra cañcad‍bhyāṃ bhujābhyāṃ bhramitāyāś‍caṇḍāyā gadāyā abhighātena sañcūrṇitamūruyugalamasyeti vigrahaḥ | na caitad vācyam, samānādhikaraṇānāmeva bahuvrīhi, 'saptamīviśeṣaṇe bahuvrīhau (2.2.35) iti jñāpakena vaiyadhikaraṇye 'pi bahuvrīheḥ smaraṇāt |
etena sarvapadapradhāno dvandvo 'pi vyākhyātaḥ, yathā 'sūryā 'nalā 'nilahimāṃśu— dhaneśaśakrapretādhināthavaruṇāḥ karuṇāspadaṃ naḥ' (māyurājasyodāttarāghave 2.29) iti |
nanu cānyapadārthe bahuvrīhiḥ smaryate | tatra 'citragurdevadatta' iti devadattāderanuprayogo na prāpnoti; nahi caitrādiśabdaprayogādavadhṛteṣu caitrādiṣu punaś‍caitrādiśrutayaḥ prayujyante | naivam; citraguśabdaḥ citragavīnāṃ svāmisāmānyamabhidhatte | tatrā 'vaśyaṃ viśeṣārthinā viśeṣo 'nuprayoktavyaḥ |
citraguḥ kaḥ?
devadatta iti |
yatra tvasādhāraṇaviśeṣaṇādibhirviśeṣa eva samāsastatrānuprayogo na bhavatyeva; yathā trilocanaḥ śūlapāṇiriti | evaṃ tarhi, sāmānyavacanānāmanuprayogasyā 'prāptiḥ | yathā— 'citragu sarvam', 'citragu viś‍vam' iti | sāmānyamapi yathā viśeṣaḥ, tathāhi yathā citraguśabdādiprayoge viśeṣāntarāṇāṃ nivṛttiḥ tathā sarvādiśabdaprayoge viśeṣāṇāṃ nivṛttiḥ pratīyate |
yadi vā, 'citrā gāvo 'sya devadattasyoti ṣaṣṭhyarthasya samāsenā 'bhidhānāt ṣaṣṭhī nā 'nuprayujyate, sambandhī tu na samāsopādāna ityanuprayujyate |
evaṃ tarhi vibhaktyarthābhidhāyino bahuvrīhipadasya devadattādibhirdravyavacanaiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ na prāpnoti |
mublopād bhaviṣyati |
maivam; matupo 'pi saṃbandhārthatvāt dravyavacanairasāmānādhikaraṇyameva |
na ca bahuvrīhervibhaktyarthābhidhāyino matuppratyayo vidhātuṃ śakyate; sa hi prathamāsamarthādastyupādhirvidhīyate; na ca vibhaktyarthavṛtterbahuvrīhipadasyāstyādikriyābhiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyena sambandho bhavati |
atha abhihitaḥ so 'rtho 'ntarbhūtaḥ prātipadikārthaḥ saṃpanna iti sāmānādhi /?/karaṇyamupapatsyate |
tanna; abhihito 'pyasau yato yatretyādivanna svarūpaṃ hāsyati |
evaṃ tarhi, yathā— 'jātau padārthe jāteḥ kāryamucyamānamasaṃbhavāt tatsahacaritāsu vyaktiṣu niviśet tathā bahuvrīhyarthe saṃbandhe sāmānādhikaraṇyakriyāyogādikāryaṃ prayujyamānaṃ tadāśraye bhaviṣyati; evaṃ ca so 'yamityupacaritasaṃbandheṣu saṃbandhiṣu
bahuvrīhipadairabhidhīyamāneṣu, śuklādiviśeṣaṇānāmivāśrayato liṅgavacanānyapi na virotsyante |
yadivā 'anyapadārtha' ityarthagrahaṇasāmarthyāt sadravyasya saliṅgasya sasaṃkhyasya copādānaṃ bhaviṣyati, na vibhaktyarthamātrasya |
kathaṃ punararthaśabdopādānādayamartho labhyate ?
