śrūyatām— 'anyapada itīyatyucyamāne pade vṛttyasaṃbhāvāt padasahacaritāṃ yāṃ kāñcidarthamātrāṃ padaśabdo lakṣayet padatvasya vā nimittatvena pratyāsannopakāriṇaṃ vibhaktyarthaṃ pratyāyayet; so 'yamevaṃ siddhe samīhite yadarthagrahaṇaṃ karoti tenaitat jñāpayati 'yāvānarthaśruteḥ padaviṣayo 'rthaḥ pratīyate, tāvān sarvo 'pi tyāganimittā 'bhāvādupādīyata iti |
api ca, padamarthasya paricchedāyopādīyate; arthā hi prakṛtyādīnāṃ sāmānyena prasak‍tāḥ padenāvacchidyante padāvadhiko 'rtha upādeya iti; tatra yathā vākyārthasyānāśrayaṇa— mādhikyāt tathā padārthaikadeśasyāpi, nyūnatvāt | tadevamarthagrahaṇasāmarthyāt saliṅgaḥ sasaṃkhyaḥ sadravyaś‍ca samarthaḥ padārtha upādīyate |
nanu ca bahuvrīhiṇā samastapadārthābhidhāne tathā sambandhābhidhāyikā ṣaṣṭhī na prayujyate tathā saṃkhyābhidhāyinaḥ svādayaḥ, liṅgābhidhāyinaṣṭāvādayo vā na prayujyeran ?
ucyate— ekādipadairiva vṛttipadairabhihitā 'pi na saṃkhyā saṃkhyākāryaṃ vighnayiṣyati; na hi ṣaṣṭhyādividhāna iva vacanavidhāvanabhihitādhikāro vidyate, karmādayaś‍ca kārakaviśeṣāḥ pratyāyayitavyā ityavaśyavidheyā dvitīyādayaḥ; prathamā tu vacanagrahaṇa— sāmarthyāt 'na kevalā prakṛtiḥ prayok‍tavyā' iti samayād vā prāthamikakalpikī bhaviṣyati |
syādetat,
yathā abhihitā ekatvādayo vacanavyavasthānimittaṃ tathā 'bhihitaḥ sambandho 'pi ṣaṣṭhīnimittaṃ bhavati | tadayuktamanabhihitādhikārāt | api ca, sambandhopasarjanaṃ prātipadikārtho vṛttiśabde— nābhidhīyate; na cāyaṃ ṣaṣṭhīviṣayaḥ, tasyāḥ prātipādikārthopasarjane saṃbandhe vidhānāt | ṭābādayastu svārthikatvādabhihite 'pi liṅgobhavanti, taduktam— 'siddhaṃ tu striyāḥ prātipadikaviśeṣaṇatvāt svārthe ṭābādaya, iti (mabhā. 4.1.1 vārtti. 21) |
yadi vā 'nya eva vākyārtho vṛttyarthāt | tathāhi— 'citrā gāvo 'syeti
anyapadārthopasarjanāś‍citragavyo vākyenābhidhīyante, citraguriti punarvṛttau gavārthopasarjanaḥ svāmī pratīyate; tatra yadā nirjñātaparādhīnatānāṃ citragavīnāṃ svāmiviśeṣā— 'vacchedāyā 'nyapadārtha upādīyata 'asyaitā gāva' iti tadā bahuvrīhirna bhavati | yadā tu tāś‍citrā gāvaḥ svāmino viśeṣābhidhānāya pratyavamṛśyante gavīnāmāsāmayaṃ svāmī'—ti tadā bahuvrīhirbhavati citraguḥ, śabalaguriti | tāmeva ca svāmiviśeṣaṇatāṃ sphuṭamupadarśayanto nidarśayanti—'yasya citrā gāvaḥ sa citraguḥ, yasya śabalāḥ sa śabalaguriti |
upalakṣaṇaṃ cā 'tra ṣaṣṭhī | tena karmakarttṛpravacanenā 'prathamāyā api bahuvrīhirvak‍tavyaḥ—'ụ̄dho ratho 'nena ūḍharatho 'naḍvān uddhṛta odanaḥ asyā uddhṛtaudanā़ sthālī, upahṛtaḥ paśurasmai upahṛtapaśū rudraḥ, ārụ̄dho vānaro 'mum ārūḍhavānaro vṛkṣaḥ, prāptā atithayo 'smin prāptātithirgrāmaḥ, siddhaḥ sādhako 'nayā siddhasādhakā vidye—'ti |
atha aprathamāyā iti kimardham ?
iha mā bhūd— 'vṛṣṭe deve gata' iti |
atha iha kasmānna bhavati— 'vṛṣṭe deve gataṃ paśye'—ti ?
bahiraṅgā 'tra prathamā |
yadyevaṃ ṣaṣṭhyādyantaraṅgatve 'citragordevadattasye'—tyādau punaḥ ṣaṣṭhyādayo na syuḥ | bāhyaṃ sambandhinamapekṣya bhaviṣyanti |
atha yathā citraguprabhṛtibhyaḥ ṣaṣṭhyādayaḥ tathā 'yato yatre'—tyādibhyaḥ pañcamīsaptamyādayo 'pi kasmānna bhavanti?
ucyate— 'tasilū—tralādibhiḥ pañcamīsaptamyādīnāmabhihito 'rthonantarbhūtaḥ | citraguprabhṛtiṣu tu bahuvrīhiṇā 'bhihitaḥ so 'rtho 'ntarbhūtaḥ prātipadikārthaḥ saṃpannaḥ iti |
atheha bahuvrīhiḥ kasmānna bhavati 'pañcabhirbhuktamasya' ?
bahuvrīhiḥ samānādhikaraṇānāmeveti smaraṇāt |
yadyevam— 'astikṣīrā, uccairmukhaḥ, abhāryaḥ, praparṇaḥ, uṣṭramukhaḥ, candravadanā, keśacūḍaḥ, suvarṇā 'laṅkāraḥ, candraśekharaḥ, śūlapāṇiḥ, kaṇṭhekālaḥ, urasilometi bahuvrahisaṃjñā na prāpnoti | tathāhi— ādyeṣu caturṣu pūrvapadamavyayam, tasyā 'sattvavācitvāt sattvabhūtaiḥ kṣīrādibhiḥ saha sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ nāsti; madhyameṣvapi viśeṣaṇaviśeṣya— bhāvānupapatterna sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ ghaṭato; antyeṣu tu saptamyanta—prathamāntayo— rasāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ vyaktameneti |
naivam |
eteṣvapi sāmānādhikaraṇyopapatteḥ | tatra
astīti nipāto vibhaktipratirūpa iti kālaṃ puruṣaṃ saṃkhyāṃ sādhanaṃ ca na vyabhicarati | uccaiḥśabdasyāpi sattvavacanatvaṃ dṛśyate 'kiṃ punaryastathoccaiḥ (megha. 17) iti | ataeva etābhyāmastitoccastvamiti bhāvapratyayā api | abhārya ityādiṣu dadhyo danādivanmadhyamapadalopo vyavasthitavibhāṣayā vṛttiviṣaye draṣṭavyaḥ | tenāyamarthaḥ sampadyate—
asti kṣīramasyāḥ astikṣīrā gauḥ,
uccairmukhamasya uccairmukho maitreyaḥ,
avidyamānā bhāryā asya abhāryaḥ, avidyamānabhāryo vā,
prapatitāni parṇāni asya praparṇaḥ, prapatitaparṇo vā |
'uṣṭramukhaḥ candravadane—'tyetayostu uṣṭracandraśabdau bhūyo 'vayavasāmānyayogātiśayā— dabhedopacāreṇa mukhaviśeṣaṇaṃ bhavantau gauṇī vṛttimanubhavataḥ |
nanu kimuṣṭramukhayormithaḥ sādṛśyam?
uṣṭraśabdeneha uṣṭramukhamabhidhīyate, avayave 'pyavayavivad upacāro draṣṭavya iti | keśacūḍaḥ, suvarṇālaṅkāraḥ, ityetayostu keśasaṃghāte keśaśabdo varttate, suvarṇavikāre tu suvarṇaśabda, kāraṇe kāryopacārāt |
'candraśekharaḥ, śūlapāṇiḥ' ityatra candraśūlopalakṣitau śekharapāṇī candraśūla— śabdābhidheyau | yathā 'kuntān praveśaya yaṣṭīḥ praveśaye' ti |
'kaṇṭhekāla urasilomā' ityetayostu kaṇṭhe sthitaḥ kāla asya, urasi jātāni lomānyasye—ti padāntaram adhyāhriyate; yathā dvāraṃ dvāramityukte apāvriyatāṃ saṃvriyatāṃ veti | etena subadhikāre 'stikṣīretyupasaṃkhyānam (2.2.24 vā., mabhā.)

naivam, kriyamāṇe 'pi hi parigaṇane yatrābha़idhānaṃ nāsti na tatra samānādhikaraṇānāmapi bahuvrīhiḥ, tad‌yathā pañca bhuktavanto 'syeti | (mabhā. 2.2.24 vā. 10, 16)
evaṃ tarhi matvarthagrahaṇaṃ kariṣyate—' samānādhikaraṇānāṃ matvartha bahuvrīhirbhavatīti; tathā 'pi ụ̄dho ratho 'nena ūḍharatho 'naḍvān, dakṣiṇasyāś‍ca pūrvasyāś‍ca diśo yadantarālaṃ sā dakṣiṇapūrvā, putreṇa saha saputraḥ, keśeṣu keśeṣu ca gṛhītvā pravṛttaṃ yuddhaṃ keśākeśi, daṇḍaiś‍ca daṇḍaiś‍ca prahṛtya daṇḍādaṇḍi, trirdaśaite tridaśāḥ, ityevamādibhiravyāptireva |
tasmāt sudūramapi gatvā 'bhidhānamevāśrayitavyam | abhidhānalakṣaṇā hi kṛttaddhitasamāsā iti kṛtaṃ parigaṇanena |
atha tridaśā iti ko 'sya vigrahaḥ ?
trirdaśaite tridaśā iti | saṃkhyāsamāse sujantasya saṃkhyetyaprasiddhiḥ' iti (2.2.25 vārttika—1) na hi atkārāntā saṃkhyā 'sti |
astu tarhi ayameva vigrahaḥ— 'trirdaśaite tridaśā' iti | nanu cok‍taṃ saṃkhyāsamāse sujantasya saṃkhyetyaprasiddhiriti, naiṣa doṣaḥ, sujantasya saṃkhyetyaprasiddhiḥ, na cā 'tra samāse sujantaṃ paśyāmaḥ |
kiṃ tarhi ?

(2. pratyayaḥ)
tatra pratīyate 'nenārtha iti pratyayaḥ |
sa tridhā 1. dhātupratyayaḥ 2. pratyayapratyayaḥ 3. prātipadikapratyaya iti | teṣu— (1. dhātupratyayāḥ—)
sanādayaḥ, tibādayaḥ, tumunādayaḥ, tavyādayaḥ, ṇvulādayaḥ, uṇādayaś‍ceti dhātupratyayabhedāḥ | tatra—
(sanādayaḥ)
icchāprayojakavyāpārādikriyāsu kriyāsamabhihārādiṣu ca ye vidhīyamānāḥ kriyāvacanatvād bhūvādivadeva pratyayāntaramapekṣante te sanādayaḥ | yathā— cikīrṣati, adhyāpayati, pāpacyate, gopāyati, ṛtīyate, kāmayate iti |
(tibādayaḥ)
kriyāpradhānāḥ kartṛkarmaṇoḥ kriyāyāṃ ca ye vihitāḥ sādhyarūpāpannakriyābhidhāyitvena pratyayāntaraṃ nāpekṣante te tibādayaḥ | yathā 'vrajati devadattaḥ, pacyate odanaḥ, rajyati vastram, lūyate kedāraḥ, corasya rujati, āsyate yuṣmābhiḥ' iti |
(tumunādayaḥ)
anupātikriyā— kriyābhidhāyino 'sattvabhūtārthāḥ sādhyabhāve ye vidhīyante te tumunādayaḥ | yathā—'pak‍tumicchati, bhuktvā vrajati, adhītya snāti, pāyaṃpāyamāste, coraṅkāramākrośati, cakāsāñcakāra iti |
(tavyādayaḥ)
prāyeṇa bhāvakarmmaṇoḥ kartrādiṣu ca ye vidhīyante te tavyādayaḥ | yathā— gantavyaṃ bhavatā, karaṇīyaḥ kaṭaḥ, kṛtaṃ bhavatā, lūyamānaḥ kedāraḥ, durgamo mārgaḥ, vāstavyo loka' iti |
(ṇvulādayaḥ)
prāyeṇa karttari karmādiṣu ca ye vidhīyante te ṇvulādayaḥ | yathā— pācakaḥ pumān somaṃ pavamānam, pacanyavāgūm, kanyāmalaṅkariṣṇuḥ, pādahārakaḥ paṅkaḥ, priyaṅkaraṇaṃ śīlam iti |
(uṇādayaḥ)
sarvakārakeṣu siddhabhāve ca ye vidhīyamānāḥ prāyeṇa dravyavacanatvaṃ labhante te uṇādayaḥ | yathā— śīto vāyuḥ, vatsalā dhātrī, tīkṣṇaṃ dātram, vṛddha upādhyāyaḥ, ramyaḥ prāsādaḥ, pāko varttata iti |
(2. pratyayapratyayāḥ —6)
yadādayaḥ, ghādayaḥ, mabādayaḥ, phagādayaḥ, yujādayaḥ, ḍhagādayaś‍ca pratyayapratyayabhedāḥ |
(yadādayaḥ)
teṣu bhavāpatyasvārthamatvarthādiṣu subantebhyo ya utpadyante te yadādayaḥ | yathā— apsavyaḥ, pūrvāha‍ṇenam, cirantanam, āmuṣyāyaṇaḥ, tvayakā, śubhaṃyuḥ iti |
(ghādayaḥ)
prakarṣā 'pakarṣa—kutsā—praśaṃsādiṣu tiṅantebhyo ya utpadyante te ghādayaḥ | yathā— pacatitarām, gacchatitamām, jalpatikalpam, spṛśatideśyam, pacataki, pacatirūpam iti |
(mabādayaḥ)
nirvṛttasvārthamatvarthādiṣu kṛdbh‍yo utpadyante te mabādayaḥ yathā— kṛtrimam, pākimam, sāṃrāviṇam, vyāvakrośī, jitvarī, śyainaṃpātā iti |
(phagādayaḥ)
jīvad‍vaṃśya—praśastakutsitasvārthādiṣu apatyāditaddhitāntebhyo ya utpadyante te phagādayaḥ | yathā— gārgyāyaṇaḥ, dākṣāyaṇaḥ vārṣyāyaṇikaḥ ābhijityaḥ kauñjāyanya iti |
(yujādayaḥ)
siddhabhāva—tācchīlyopādhikartrādiṣu ṇijādidhātupratyayāntebhyo ya utpadyante te yujādayaḥ | yathā— kāraṇā, aṭāṭyā, yāyajūkaḥ, sāsahiḥ, yāyāvaraḥ, cikīrṣuḥ iti |
(ḍhagādayaḥ)
apatyādyartha—svārtha—śakti—saṃkhyādiṣu strīpratyayāntebhyo ya utpadyante te ḍhagādayaḥ | yathā— gāṅge‍yaḥ, yauvateyaḥ, vārāṇaseyaḥ, suvadhūkaḥ, nadyām, khaṭavāyāṃ, yuvatayaḥ iti |
(3. prātipadikapratyayāḥ —6)
ṭābādayaḥ, svādayaḥ, tasilādayaḥ, kādayaḥ, aṇādayaḥ, kyajādayaś‍ceti prātipadikapratyayabhedāḥ | teṣu —
(ṭābādayaḥ)
prakṛtiliṅgābhidhāyinaḥ prātipadikād‍ya utpadyante te ṭābādayaḥ | yathā— khaṭvā, sudāmā, kārīṣagandhyā, brahmabandhūḥ, kumārī yuvatiḥ iti |
(svādayaḥ)
prakṛtyarthasaṃkhyābhidhāyinaḥ prātipadikādeva ya utpadyante te svādayaḥ | yathā— kuṇḍam, kuṇḍe, kuṇḍābhyām, kuṇḍebhyaḥ, kuṇḍayoḥ, kuṇḍeṣu iti |
(tasilādayaḥ)
śaktimātrābhidhāyinaḥ sopādhiśaktyabhidhāyino vā subantaprātipadikāt svārthādiṣu ya utpadyante te tasilādayaḥ | yathā— yataḥ, yatra, kadā, purastāt, bahuśaḥ, purutrāvasati iti |
(kādayaḥ)
kutsā—praśaṃsā 'tiśayā 'natiśayādyupādheranupādheś‍ca subantādeva prātipadikāt svārthādiṣu ya utpadyante te kādayaḥ | yathā— aśvakaḥ, yuṣmakābhiḥ, vaiyākaraṇarūpaḥ, paṭutaraḥ kuṭīraḥ, tārtīyīkam iti |
(aṇādayaḥ)
samarthaprātipadikāt sambandhikārakabhāveṣu ya utpadyante te aṇādayaḥ | yathā— aupagavaḥ, tāvakīnaḥ, ākṣikaḥ, vāmadevyam, brāhmaṇatvam, paurāhityam iti |
(kyajādayaḥ)
karmādikārakopahita—kriyecchācāra—cvyarthādiṣu samarthādeva prātipaṃdikād ya utpadyante te kyajādayaḥ | yathā— citrīyate, putrakāmyati, śyenāyate, lohitāyati, kaṇḍūyate, muṇḍayati' iti |
(3. upaskāraḥ)
prakṛtipratyayānāmupasargopagrahāgamalopavarṇavikāravikaraṇādirūpaḥ saṃskāraṃ upaskāraḥ |
sa ca tridhā (1) prakṛtyupaskāraḥ, (2) pratyayopaskāraḥ, (3)ubhayopaskāraś‍ceti |
te punarbhūṣaṇa—samavāyā '—dhyāhāra—vaikṛta—yat‍na—pratiyat‍nabhedāt pratyekaṃ ṣaṭprakārā bhavanti | tatra—
(1. prakṛtyupaskārāḥ —6)
1. prakṛterbhūṣaṇarūpa nirarthakopasargasvārthaka—vaikalpikādayaḥ | yathā— adhyāgacchati, paryāgacchati, pralambate, nikhañjati iti; yāvakaḥ, ṣāṅguṇyam, aupayikam, mānasam iti; ālī, mṛdavī, kamaṇḍalūḥ, cañcūḥ iti |
2. samavāyarūpāḥ sārthakopasargasankyaṅādayaḥ | yathā—āśāste, pratiṣṭhate, sumanāyate, durmanāyate, iti| jugupsate, gopāyate, ṛtīyate, kāmayate iti | putrīyati, putrakāmyati, śyenāyate, muṇḍayati iti |
3. adhyāhārarūpāḥ sahābhidhāyakopasargadvirvacanasuḍāgamādayaḥ | yathā—adhīte, adhyeti, anurudhyate, saṃgrāmayate iti; jañjapyate, saṃpanīpadyate, arāryate, undidiṣati iti | upaskurute, apaptat, āsthat, madhvasyati iti |
4. vaikṛtarūpā varṇavyatyaya—viparyayāpāyādayaḥ | yathā—niṣiñcati, praṇayati, yanti, uśanti iti; taruḥ, siṃhaḥ, sikatā, sak‍‌tava iti; santi, gh‍nanti, dyanti, samagata iti |
5. yat‍narūpā upacaya—prasava—saṃvṛtyādayaḥ | yathā—yauti, medyati,dīvyati, nigūhati iti; kīryate, pūryate, saudhātakiḥ, svāyambhuvam iti; āsta, āste, avocat, ghaṭayati iti |
6. pratiyat‍narūpāḥ viśeṣādeśavidhiniṣedhādayaḥ | yathā—āha, aghasat, vadhyāt, adhyagīṣmahi iti; japyaḥ, pitryam, sanam, gavyam, nāvyam iti; titaüḥ, praügam, kokūyate, kathayati iti |
(2. pratyayopaskārāḥ —6)
1. pratyayasya bhūṣaṇarūpā iḍasugīkagādayaḥ | yathā sahitā, vāritā bhruvai, bhrūṇām iti; devāsaḥ, pārayāmasi, tāriṣat, bhavāti iti; tārtīyīkam, pītvāya, tvayakā, pacataki iti |
2. samavāyarūpāḥ syasicsīyuḍādayaḥ | yathā kariṣyati, akariṣyat, vak‍tā, bravītiṃ iti, apākṣīt apīpacat, aśiṣat, alikṣat iti; kṛṣīṣṭa, kuryāt, kurvīta, karavāmahai iti |
3. adhyāhārarūpāḥ pratyayārthaviśeṣakopasargamap‍tarabādayaḥ | yathā— sumanāyate, durmanāyate, abhimanāyate, abhiṣeṇayati iti | kṛtrimaṃ sāṃrāviṇam, vyāvahāsī, kauñjāyanyaḥ iti; pacatitarāṃ, pacamānaḥ, sarveṣām, vṛkṣāṇāmiti |
4. vaikṛtarūpāḥ ādeśa—sarvādeśapratyayādeśādayaḥ | yathā—gārgyāyaṇaḥ, cāndramasāyaniḥ, kauberakaḥ, gaudheraḥ, kauleyaka iti, pavanaḥ, pāvakaḥ, vṛkṣasyaḥ, vṛkṣaiḥ iti; veda, viveda, vidvān, viddhi iti |
5. yatnarūpā luglumpanavilumpanādayaḥ | yathā—pacat, juhoti, pañcālāḥ, dadhi iti | dadṛśe, adrākṣīt, kārakaḥ, kāmaṇḍaleya iti | ag‍nicit, śubhaṃyāḥ, mūlakhāḥ, aś‍vati' iti |
6. pratiyat‍narūpāḥ viśeṣādeśavidhiniṣedhādayaḥ | yathā—tasthau, veda, praśādhi, jīvatāt, iti; udapādi, rāṣṭriyaḥ, āg‍neyaḥ, s‍traiṇam iti; subhrūḥ, supreyasī, vyatihasanti, vyatigacchanti iti |
(3. ubhayopaskārāḥ —6)
1. ubhayorbhūṣaṇarūpā yuṣmatprabhṛtiprayogādayaḥ | yathā— tvaṃ pacasi, yuvāṃ pacathaḥ, yūyaṃ pacatha, ahaṃ pacāmi, āvāṃ pacāvaḥ, vayaṃ pacāmaḥ, vāyurvāti, devo varṣati, bhajyate śākhā svayameva, avakirate hastī svayameva, bhūṣayate kanyā svayameva, brūte kathā svayameveti |
2. samavāyarūpā vikaraṇādayaḥ | yathā— bhavati, corayati, dīvyati, sunoti, tudati, tanoti, ruṇaddhi, krīṇāti, svayaṃ namate, dugdhe, tapyate tapaḥ lūyate kedāraḥ, iti |
3. adhyāhārarūpā dviruktyādayaḥ| yathā— pāyaṃpāyam pacatipacati, grāmo grāmo ramaṇīyaḥ, mūle mūle sthūlāḥ, agre agre sūkṣmāḥ, pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ puṣyati, prathamaṃ prathamaṃ pacyate, jyeṣṭhaṃ jyeṣṭhamupaveśaya, māṣaṃ māṣaṃ dehi, uparyuparyāste, ahirahiḥ, budha yasva budhyasveti |
4. vaikṛtarūpā vānāvādayaḥ | yathā— grāmo vām, grāmo nau, grāmo vaḥ, grāmo naḥ, grāmaste, grāmo me, grāmastvā rakṣat, grāmo mā rakṣat, haiyaṅgavīnam, mātulaḥ, kṣatriyaḥ, śrotriyaḥ iti |
5. yat‍narūpā anuprayogādayaḥ | yathā— agnisāt saṃpadyate bhasmasād bhavati, brāhmaṇasāt syāt, devatrākaroti, martyatrāgacchati, manuṣyatrāvasati, śuklībhavati, paṭapaṭākaroti, cakāsāṃcakāra kārayāmāsa, bibharāmbabhūva, vidāṃkurvantu iti |
6. pratipayat‍narūpā vidhyanuprayogādayaḥ | yathā— raipoṣaṃ puṣṇāti, samūlakāṣaṃ kaṣati, jīvagrāhaṃ gṛh‍ṇāti, puruṣavāhaṃ vahati, ūrdhvaśoṣaṃ śuṣkaḥ, cūḍakanāśaṃ naṣṭaḥ,
odanapākaṃ pakvaḥ, suvarṇanidhāyaṃ nihitaḥ, lunīhi lunīhityevāyaṃ lunāti, adhīṣvādhīṣve— tyevāyamadhīte, bhrāṣṭamaṭa maṭhamaṭa, khadūramaṭetyevāyamaṭati, 'saktūn piba, dhānāḥ khāda odanaṃ bhuṅkṣvetyevāyamabhyavaharati iti |
(4. upapadam)
upaskāraviśeṣa eva prakṛtisamīpoccāritaṃ padamupapadam |
tat tridhā 1. tiṅupapadam, 2. kṛdupapadam, 3. subupapadaṃ ca |
(1. tiṅupapadam —6)
teṣu prathamaṃ kriyārūpam, kārakarūpam, nāmarūpam, avyayarūpam, nipātarūpam upasargarūpaṃ ca | teṣu—
kriyārūpaṃ yathā— ehi manye rathena yāsyati na marṣayāmi yat tatrabhavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayet |
kārakarūpaṃ yathā— aś‍vena saṃcarate, dāsyā saṃprayacchate |
nāmarūpaṃ yathā— kālo yad bhuñjīta bhavān |
avyayarūpaṃ yathā— kathaṃ nāma tatrabhavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayet, namate daṇḍaḥ svayameva |
nipātarūpaṃ yathā— yāvad bhuṅkte, purā vrajati
upasargarūpaṃ yathā— parākramate parājayate iti |
(2. kṛdupapadam —6)
dvitīyamapi kriyārūpam, kārakarūpam, nāmarūpam, avyayarūpam, nipātarūpam upasargarūpaṃ ca | teṣu —
kriyārūpaṃ yathā— bhok‍tuṃ vrajati, bhojako vrajati, godāyo vrajati, karttumicchati iti |
kārakarūpaṃ yathā— kumbhakāraḥ, uttānaśayaḥ, śayyotthāyam, mūlakopadaṃśam iti |
nāmarūpaṃ yathā— kālo bhok‍tum, samayo bhok‍tum, brahmabhūyam, brahmodyam iti |
avyayarūpaṃ yathā— divākaraḥ, doṣākaraḥ, mṛṣodyam, īṣatpānaḥ iti |
nipātarūpaṃ yathā— alaṃkṛtvā, khalu kṛtvā, yāvad‍vedam anyathākāramiti |
upasargarūpaṃ yathā— prajayī, prasavī, vikatthī, nirākariṣṇuḥ iti |
(3. subupapadam —6)
tṛtīyaṃ kriyārūpam kārakarūpaṃ nāmarūpam avyayarūpam, nipātarūpam karmapravacanīyarūpaṃ ceti | teṣu —
kriyārūpaṃ yathā— na tvāṃ tṛṇāya manye, saṃtāpāya prabhavati, goṣu duhyamānāsu gataḥ, krośataḥ prāvrājīditi |
kārakarūpaṃ yathā— carmaṇi dvīpinaṃ hanti dantayorhanti kuñjaram, keśeṣu prasitaḥ, brāhmaṇeṣu bhuñjāneṣu vṛṣalā āsate, vṛṣaleṣvāsīneṣu brāhmaṇā bhuñjate iti |
nāmarūpaṃ yathā— gavāṃ svāmī, annasya hetorvasati, pitrā sadṛśaḥ, śivaṃ prajābhya iti |
avyayarūpaṃ yathā— samayā grāmam, sahacchātreṇa, namo devebhyaḥ, dakṣiṇāhi grāmāt iti |
nipātarūpaṃ yathā— he devadatta? hā devadattam, vinā viṣṇumitreṇa, ṛte yajñadattāditi |
karmapravacanīyarūpaṃ yathā— vṛkṣamanu vidyotate, upārjunaṃ yoddhāraḥ, adhi brahmadatte pañcālāḥ, adhi pañcāleṣu brahmadatta iti ||
prakṛtipratyayāvevamupaskāraś‍ca darśitaḥ |
kramādupapadasyāpi svarūpamupavarṇitam || 50 ||
avyayāni nipātāś‍ca gatayaś‍ca nirūpitāḥ |
karmapravacanīyāś‍ca sopasargāḥ prakāśitāḥ || 51||
na kevaleha prakṛtiḥ prayujyate na kevalāḥ suptiṅajaṇkyajādayaḥ |
bhavatyupaskāra ihā 'pṛthagdvayordvayārthamevopapadaṃ prayujyate || 42 ||
iti mahārājādhirājaśrībhojadevaviracite śṛṅgāraprakāśe prakṛtyādiprakāśo nāma || prathamaḥ prakāśaḥ || 1 ||*
prakāśa eṣo 'dya sanātanena vyadhāyi nūnaṃ vitataprakāśaḥ |
praś‍leṣabandhādupamucya tat‍tatpraghaṭṭarājatpravibhak‍tagātraḥ ||
evamatra prathamaprakāśe dvādaśasu śabdabhedeṣu prathame catvāro bhedā nirūpitāḥ | madhyavarttinaś‍catvāro dvitīye draṣṭavyāḥ | antimāś‍catvāro punastṛtīye | evaṃ śabdabhedāya prakāśatrayamadhikriyate |
atha
śṛṅgāraprakāśe dvitīyaḥ prakāśaḥ
prātipadikaprakāśaḥ
(5. prātipadikam)
prātipadikaṃ tridhā—
1. vibhak‍tāvayavam,
2. avibhak‍tāvayavam1
3. anukaraṇaṃ ca | tatra2
1. vibhak‍tāvayaṃ tridhā— 1. kṛd‍rūpam, 2. taddhitarūpam, 3. samāsarūpaṃ ca | teṣu —
(1. kṛd‍rūpam vibhak‍tāvayam)
bhāva—kārakā 'bhidhāyino dhātupratyayāḥ kṛtaḥ | tatra—
(bhāvaḥ —6)
dhātvartha evā 'pūrvāparībhūto bhāvaḥ | yadāha— (vāpa. 3.8.12)
kālānupāti yad rūpaṃ dhātvarthasya kriyeti tat |
parito yat paricchinnaṃ tad‍bhāva iti kathyate || 1 ||
sa (bhāva) iha ṣọdhā saṃbhavati— 1. siddhaḥ, 2. sādhyaḥ, 3. siddhāsamāptaḥ, 4. sādhyā 'samāptaḥ, 5. siddhasādhyaḥ, 6. sādhyasiddhaś‍ceti | teṣu—
(1. siddhaḥ)
udbhūtapratyayāṃśatvena kriyā 'nudrekāt sattvabhūtatve liṅgasaṃkhyādyupagrāhī 'kartṛkarmaṇoḥ kṛti' (2.3.65) iti sambandhavibhak‍ternimittaṃ siddhaḥ | yathā— 'āś‍caryamidamodanasya ca pāko brāhmaṇānāṃ ca prādurbhāvaḥ, bhedikā kāṣṭhānāṃ devadattasya, cikīrṣā yajñadattasya kaṭasya' iti | atra 'ubhayaprāptau karmaṇi (2.3.66) eveti niyame ubhayoḥ prāptiryasmin kṛti' iti vyākhyānāt (mabhā. 2.3.66) akākārayoś‍ca niyamapratiṣedhāt karttaryapi ṣaṣṭhyeva bhavantī bhāvasya siddhatāṃ dyotayati |
1. dra. pṛ0 119 | 2. dra. pṛ0 120 |
(2. sādhyaḥ)
udbhūtaprakṛtyaṃśatvena kriyodrekādasattvabhūtatve liṅgasaṃkhyādyanupagrāhī kartṛkarmaṇoḥ kārakavibhaktereva nimittaṃ sādhyaḥ | yathā— odanaṃ bhok‍tuṃ yāti, svādhyāyamadhītya snāti, payaḥ pāyaṃpāyamāste iti | ataeva 'na lokāvyayakhalarthatṝnām' (2.3.69) ityādinā ṣaṣṭhī niṣidhyate |
(3. siddhāsamāptaḥ)
siddha eva taddhitānubandhī siddhāsamāptaḥ | yathā — vyāvakrośī, sāṃkūṭinam, kṛtrimam iti | atra
yathā 'ābhijityaḥ, kauñjāyanyaḥ' ityādāvaṇādyabhihito 'pyapatyārthaḥ, taittirīyāḥ chāgaleyinaḥ ityādau chaṇādyabhihito 'pi proktārthaḥ, svārthikādhyetṛveditṛviṣaya— taddhitotpattimantareṇa na samāpyate, tathā vyatihārābhividhyupādhiko ṇajinuṇuktaḥ śuddhaś‍ca ktryabhihita siddho 'pi bhāvaḥ svārthikanirvṛttāthīyitaddhitotpattimantareṇa na samāpyata iti siddhāsamāpto bhavati |
(4. sādhyāsamāptaḥ)
sādhya evānuprayogānubandhī sādhyāsamāptaḥ | yathā cakāsāñcakāra vidāṅkurvantu, raipoṣaṃ puṣyati iti | atra
yathā śuklībhavati, paṭapaṭākaroti ityādāvabhūtatad‍bhāvādiṣu cvyādyantam, lunīhi lunīhi ityevāyaṃ lunāti, bhrāṣṭramaṭa maṭhamaṭa khadūramaṭetyevāyamaṭati ityādiṣu kriyāsamabhihārādiṣu loḍantam anabhivyakta padārthakatvādasamāptaṃ svārthābhivyaktaye kṛbhvādyanuprayogaṃ yathāvidhyanuprayogaṃ cāpekṣate tathā āmantaṃ ṇamulantaṃ cā 'nabhivyakta— padārthakatvādasamāptaṃ sādhyarūpameva svārthābhivyaktaye kṛbhvādyanuprayogaṃ yathāvidhyanuprayogaṃ cāpekṣate ityetaduk‍to bhāvaḥ sādhyā 'samāpte | bhavati | tadāha — āma iva ṇamulo 'pyasamāptārthatvāccādivadanuprayogaḥ siddha evaṃ | yathāvidhyarthaṃ tu vacanaṃ 'kaṣādiṣu yathāvidhyanuprayogaḥ' (3.4.46) iti | tena cakāsāñcakāra itayādinā 'yamartho bhavati cakāsti sma, vidantu, rāyaḥ puṣyannamuṃ puṣyati iti | ataeva kriyāviśeṣaṇenaiva siddhamiti na kecit ṇamulprakaraṇamārabhante |
nanu ca,
kriyāviśeṣaṇānāṃ karmatā napusakatā ca; kathaṃ ca puṣereva puṣiḥ karma bhavati| na hyātmanaivātmā vyāpyate, na hi suśikṣito 'pi vaṭuḥ svaṃ skandhamārọdhuṃ śaknoti|
naivam|
'nāgarakavṛttaṃ vartteta, viś‍vajitā yajete'—tyādau sāmānyaviśeṣayoranaikātmayena vyāptyavacchedayorūpalambhāt samānyapuṣerevā 'vayavapuṣiḥ karma bhavati| na ca kriyāviśeṣaṇānāṃ karmataiveti niyamaḥ; kriyā hi yathā sādhyāyamānatvāt karma, tathotpadyamānatvāt kartryapi bhavati| tataś‍cobhayathā 'pi kriyāviśeṣaṇāniyojyanteraipoṣaṃ kṛtvā puṣyati, raipoṣaṃ yathā bhavatyevaṃ puṣyatīti|
(5. siddhasādhyaḥ)
siddha eva sādhyadharmayogī siddhasādhyaḥ| yathā— āś‍carye gavāṃ doho 'śikṣitenā 'gepālena, sadhu khalu payasaḥ pānaṃ yajñadattena, vicitrā hi sūtrasya kṛtiḥ pāṇininā iti| atra ubhayaprāptau karmaṇyeva ṣaṣṭhīti (3.2.8) karttari tṛtīyāmnānāt siddho 'pyayaṃ vivakṣātaḥ sadhyo 'pi bhavatīti jñāyate|
anye tvanyathā siddhasādhyaṃ varṇayanti—uṣṭrāsikāmāste, pañca vārān bhuṅkte pañca prayogan pacati iti| tatroṣṭrāsikāvāraprayogāṇāṃ kriyāviśeṣāvṛttyanuṣṭhāna— rupatvenāpṛthagbhāvāt kriyābhikhyāpय़ānāṃ dvitīyādarśanādabhedavivakṣātaḥ siddhānāmapi kriyāvadeva sādhyatvamavagamyate| tadāha—
tatsvabhāvaviśeṣatvād vyāpyā noṣṭrāsikā 'nayā| sādhyatve tvāsanaikātmyāt phalataḥ karma kathyate ||2||
so 'yamityabhisaṃbandhādabhede dharmadharmiṇoḥ| kriyāyā iva sādhyatvaṃ vārādīnāṃ na duṣyati ||3||
tena uṣṭrāsikāmāsta ityādīnāmayamarye bhavati— 'uṣṭravadāste, pañcāvṛttiṃ bhujikriyāṃ karoti, pañca pākānnirvartayati' iti|
(6. sādhyasiddhaḥ)
sadhya eva siddhadharmayogī sadhyasiddhaḥ| yathā— karttavyaṃ bhavataḥ, kāryaṃ bhavataḥ, kṛtaṃ bhavata iti| atra 'na lokāvyayaniṣṭhākhalarthatṛnām' (2.3.69) iti lādīnāṃ
sādhyārthābhidhāyitvāt kartṛkarmaṇoḥ ṣaṣṭhīniṣedhe, 'kṛtyānāṃ karttari vā' (2.3.71), 'ktasya ca varttamāne' (2.367), 'napusake bhāve kta upasaṃkhyānam' (2.367 vārttika), ityādibhiḥ punaḥ ṣaṣṭhīvidhānāt pakṣe vivaśkṣātaḥ siddhārthābhidhāyitvamavagamyata ityetaduktto bhāvaḥ sadhyasiddho bhavati| na cā 'tra kṛtyānāṃ niṣedho na śrūyate, yataḥ— 'khalarthatṛnām' ityatra khalarthetyanena kṛtya—kta—khalarthāḥ śatṛ—śanaccānaśaś‍ca saṃgṛhyante; tṛnnityanena punastṛnneveti| ata eva niṣṭhādibhāvasyeva kṛtyabhāvasya karmaṇyapi ṣaṣṭhī na bhavati| yathā—
gatamastaṃ yathā 'rkeṇa yathā 'bhyuditamindunā| tathā mānena śaithilyamāgantavyaṃ mṛgīdṛśaḥ ||4||
kathaṃ punaḥ sakarmakād bhāvapratyayaḥ?
tena hyakarmakād bhavitavyam; yadāha 'laḥ karmaṇi ca bhāve cā 'karmakebhyaḥ' (3.4. 69), 'tayoreva kṛtya—kta—khalarthāḥ' (3.4.70); na hi bhavati kṛtaṃ kaṭaṃ devadatteneti|
ucyate— naitadantaraṅgaṃ dravyakarma, apitu 'kālādhvabhāvagantavyāḥ karmasaṃjñā hyakarmaṇām' (mabhā. 14.51) iti bahiraṅgeṣu kālādikarmasu gantavyalakṣaṇaṃ gatyarthakarma; bahiraṅgatā ca 'kālādhvanoratyantasaṃyoge' (2.3.5) ityanena dvitīyāvidhānena, bhāvasya ca kālādabhedena, gantavyasya tu 'gatyarthakarmaṇi dvitīyācaturthyai—(2.3.12) iti punardvitīyāgrahaṇena jñāyate; anyathā hi karmaṇi dvitīyāyāḥ siddhatvāt gatyarthakarmaṇi caturthī cetyeva brūyāt|
yasyaiva ca dravyakarmaṇorantaraṅgasyābhāvenākarmakaḥ tasyaiva bhāvena sakarmako bhavati ato vidyamānamapi kālādikarma nākarmakavyapadeśaṃ vighnayati|
anye tvanyathā sādhyasiddhaṃ varṇayanti— 'uṣṭrāsikā āsyante' hataśāyikāḥ śayyante, yavāgvāḥ pākāya vrajati iti| atra āsikāśāyikayogakhyātābhihita— kriyātmakatvāt pākasya vrajñikriyāsādhyatvāt, satyapi sādhyatve liṅga saṃkhyāsambandhi vibhaktiyogād vivakṣātaḥ siddhatvamapi gamyata ityayaṃ sādhyasiddho bhavati| tathāpi 'uṣṭrāsikā āsyante, hataśadikāḥ śayyanta' ityamūbhyāṃ sāmānyaviśeṣopacarita rūpo bhāvātmaiva pratyāyyate| sa ākhyātābhyāṃ sāmānyarūpeṇa, ṇvulantābhyāṃ viśoṣarūpeṇa| bahuvacanaṃ tu kutsātiśayārtham; yā hi nāma uṣṭrasya kuysāvatyo bahuprakārajuṣo bahvya
āsikā; yāś‍ca hatānāmatiśayavatyastathābhūtā eva bhūyasyaḥ śāyikāḥ pratītāḥ, tābhirviśeṣarūpābhiriyamāsikā śāyikā copamānopameyasambandhajanitabhedā 'bheda— parigrahāllakāreṇāpi sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvena kutsātiśayārthaṃ bahutvenaiva pratyāyyate, bahutvena vinā sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvānupapatteḥ, tenoṣṭrāsikā ivāsanāni, hataśāvikā iva śayanāni kriyante bhavantīti vā vākyārtho bhavati |
nanvevamuṣṭrāsikādīnāṃ vāraprayogādānāñca karmateva napuṃsakatāpi prāpnoti; yathā— 'mṛdu pacati, praśastaṃ pacatīti | ucyate—
tridhā khala kriyāviśeṣaṇaṃ bhavati —
1. bāhyam, 2. ābhyantaram 3. bāhyābhyantaraṃ ca | tatra— bāhyaṃ dharmarūpaṃ vārādi; ābhyantaraṃ viśeṣarūpamuṣṭrāsikādi, bāhyābhyantaraṃ guṇarūpaṃ mṛd‌vādi | teṣu—
bāhyam 'so 'yamityabhisambandhād', abhedopacāreṇāvicalitasvarūpameva pradhānaṃ viśiṃṣat kathamiva svaliṅgaṃ jahyāt?
ābhyantaraṃ tu viśeṣāṃśaparigrahādāviṣṭaliṅgasaṃkhyaṃ kathamivānyaliṅgaṃ gṛh‍ṇīyāt?
bāhyābhyantaraṃ tu guṇatvāt svaliṅgavirahe 'guṇavacanānāmāśrayato liṅgavacanānī'—ti viśeṣyaliṅgagrāhyeva bhavati; tatra sādhyaikasvabhāvatvādaliṅgasaṃkhyāyāḥ kriyāyā viśeṣaṇatve mṛd‌vādīnāṃ napuṃsakatvameva nyāyyam | uṣṭrāsikā—vārādīnāṃ tu nityamāviṣṭaliṅgatvād viśeṣāṃka śaparigrahāt kriyāviśeṣaṇatve 'pi na napuṃsakaliṅgatā |
atha 'pākāya vrajati, edhebhyo vrajati' iti kriyāyā randhanāya sthālītivat tādarthyacaturthyantaḥ siddha eva kasmānna vijñāyate ? naivam, 'bhāvavacanāś‍ca' (3.3.11) iti tādarthya eva pratyayotpatteḥ, 'tumarthācca bhāvavacanāt' (2.3.15) iti svārtha eva caturthīvidhānāt | kimarthaṃ punaridam?
bhāvehi ghañādayaḥ siddhā eva, tādarthye caturthī | kriyārthopapadena tumunā 'smin viṣaye ghañādayo mā bādhiṣataḥ; vāsarūpavidhiś‍cā 'tra 'tumun‌ṇvulau' (3.3.10) iti ṇvulgrahaṇānnāvatarati |
atha yathaidhānāharttuṃ vrajati edhebhyo vrajatīti kriyārthopapadasya ca karmaṇi sthāninaḥ (2.3.14) iti caturthī, tathā pākaṃ karttuṃ vrajati pākāya vrajatīti yadi bhavet ko doṣaḥ
syāt? na kaś‍cit | kiṃ tvetat pṛcchāmi — sa pākaḥ siddhaḥ sādhyo vā ? yadi siddhaḥ kiṃ karttuṃ vrajati ? atha sādhyaḥ kriyārthopapadeṣu tumunā ghañādayo bādhyante |
atha tumarthatvena sādhyābhidhāyinaś‍caturthyantatvena cāsattvabhūtārthāḥ pākāyetyādiṣu ghañādayaḥ, kathaṃ yavāgvā ityādeḥ saṃbandhavibhak‍ternimittaṃ bhavati ?
śabdaśaktireṣā yat kasyacideva kenacit kenacideva kasyacit sambandhaḥ | tad‌yathā abhinne 'pyarthe 'prajāgaritā 'pararātrāni'—ti tṛno bāhya karmopasargakarmayogāj jñāyate 'na jāgarūka iti' uktasya; 'ūrīkaroti pākādikami'—tyūryādīnā mekāneka viśeṣasthayā karotikriyayā bhavati saṃbandhaḥ, na tadarthaviṣayaiḥ pacādibhiḥ, sūryamapi na paśyantyasūryaṃpaśyā rājadārā iti vyavahitāmapi sūryakarmikāṃ dṛśikriyāṃ nañ niṣedhati, na sūryasattām; evaṃ na punargīyante apunargeyāḥ ś‍lokāḥ, śrāddhaṃ na bhuṅkte aśrāddhabhojī brāhmaṇa iti, tathā lavaṇaṃ na bhuṅkte alavaṇabhojī bhikṣuḥ ityasūryaṃpaśyādivadasāmarthye 'pi nañsamāso dṛśyate;na tvakiñcitkurvāṇa iti, evam 'amāṣaṃ haramāṇaḥ, agādhādutsṛpta' iti |
api ca 'payaḥ pāyaṃ pāyaṃ', payaḥ pītvā pītvā, grahamanu praveśamanu praveśam, gehamanupraviśyānupraviśya ityābhīkṣṇyavīpsayoḥ padadvirvacanaṃ prayojayanti ṇamulādayaḥ, na pācyate dviśo dehīti yaṅśasādayaḥ lolūyata iti dvirvacanamantareṇāpi kriyāsamabhihāramavagamayati yaṅantam na lunīhi lunīhīti loḍantam; kṛtapūrvī kaṭam, adhītī vyākaraṇam iti vṛttivaśenojjhitakarmābhidhānaśak‍tayaḥ karmavibhaktiṃ na vighnayanti niṣṭhādayaḥ; grāmaṃ gantumanāḥ, kaṭaṃ karttukāma iti nivṛtticchinnā api karmaṇi dvitīyā meva prayojayanti tumunādayaḥ ubhayaprāptau karmaṇyeveti niyame 'pi vicitrā sūtrasya kṛtiḥ pāṇineḥ iti śabdānāmanuśāsanamācāryasya iti samāsasya karttari sambandhavibhaktimapyu pādadate ktinādayaḥ, sādhyārthābhidhāyino 'sattvabhūtārthā api yavāgvāḥ pākāyeti karmaṇi sambandhavibhaktyeva saṃbadhyante ghañādayaḥ iti taduktabhāvaḥ sādhyasiddho bhavati | (iti bhāvavimarśaḥ | atha kārakavimarśaḥ |
(kha. kārakābhidhāyino dhātupratyayāḥ)
kriyānimittaṃ kārakam | tadapi ṣọdhā —
1. karttā, 2. karma, 3. karaṇam, 4. saṃpradānam, 5. apādānam, 6. adhikaraṇaṃ ceti | tatra—
(1) karttā — svatantraḥ, hetuḥ, karmakarttā ca | teṣu — (svatantraḥ) kriyāyāḥ svecchayā karaṇādīni yaḥ prayuṅkte, na tu taiḥ prayujyate, sa svatantraḥ | yathā— putraṇetrasya darśakaḥ, purāṃ bhetteti |
(hetuḥ) tameva kriyāprayuktaṃ yaḥ prayuṅkte sa hetuḥ | yathā— rājānaṃ yodhitavān rājayudhvā dhanuṣmān, nakhāni mocayanti nakhamucāni dhanūṣīti |
(karmakarttā) karmaiva svātantryeṇa vivakṣitaṃ karmakarttā | yathā— svayameva pacyante pacelimā māṣāḥ, svayameva bhajyante bhaṅgurāṇi kāṣṭhāni iti |
(2) karma — nirvartyaṃ, vikāryaṃ, prāpyaṃ ca | teṣu — (nirvartyam) yadasajjanyate sad‌vā prakāśyate tannirvartyam | yathā— karttavyaḥ kaṭaḥ, uccāryaḥ śabdaḥ iti |
(vikāryam) yasya prakṛtyucchedo guṇāntaraṃ votpadyate tad vikāryam | yathā—bhuk‍ta odanaḥ, lūyamānaḥ kedāraḥ iti |
(prāpyam) kriyākṛtaviśeṣā 'navagatau karttuḥ kriyayā 'nāsthitamāsthitaṃ vā yadāpyate tat prāpyam | yathā— 'durdarśaḥ prabhuḥ, suyāno mārga iti |
(3) karaṇaṃ— bāhyam, ābhyantaraṃ, bāhyābhyantaraṃ ca | teṣu— (bāhyam) karttuḥ śarīrād bahirupalabhyamānaṃ bāhyam | yathā— āśitaṃ bhavaṃ bhak‍tam, dhṛtodakaḥ karakaḥ iti |
(ābhyantaram) tadivaparītamābhyantaram | yathā— priyaṃkaraṇaṃ śīlam, vaśīkaraṇaṃ prema, iti |
(bāhyābhyantaram) ubhayaguṇayogi bāhyābhyantaram | yathā— darśanaṃ cakṣuḥ, saṃvananaṃ sāma iti |
(4) saṃpradānaṃ— dadātikarmāpyam, karmamātrāpyaṃ, kriyāpyaṃ, ca | teṣu
(dadātikarmāpyam) samyak pradīyate 'smai ityanvarthasaṃjñāyā viṣayo dadātikarmāpyam | yathā— dīyate 'smai dānīyo brāhmaṇaḥ, devā deyāsurasmai devadāyo ḍimbha iti |
(karmamātrāpyam) 'karmaṇā yamabhipraiti saṃpradānam' (1.4.32) iti pāribhāṣika— saṃjñāmātraviṣayaḥ karmamātrāpyam | yathā—dāśyate 'smai deyamiti dāśaḥ kaivarttaḥ, gāṃ hanti tasmai āgatāyeti goghno 'tithiḥ iti |
(kriyāpyam) karmaśabdena kriyāyā apyupādānāt kriyayā yadāpyate tat kriyāpyam |
yathā— ś‍lāghante 'smai janā iti ś‍lāghyo rājā, spṛhayantyasmai lokāḥ spṛhaṇīyo vibhava iti |
(5) apādānam — nirdiṣṭaviṣayam, upāttaviṣayam apekṣitakriyaṃ ca | tatra—
(nirdiṣṭaviṣayam) 'dhruvamapāye 'pādānam' (1.4.24) iti nirdiṣṭaviṣayam | yathā— prapatano giriḥ, prasravaṇaḥ śailaḥ iti |
(upāttaviṣayam) bhītrārthā(1.4.25)diyogoktamupāttaviṣayam | yathā— 'bhayānako dviṣām, prabhavaḥ saṃpadām' iti |
(apekṣitakriyam) avadhimātrārthamapekṣitakriyam | yathā— avadhiḥ parvataḥ, maryādā samudraḥ, iti |
(6) adhikaraṇaṃ — vaiṣayikam, aupaś‍leṣikam, naimittikaṃ ca | teṣu —
(vaiṣayikam) vividhamanekaprakāraṃ jātiguṇakriyādravyādibhiḥ sinotīti | viṣayo deśakālādiḥ, viṣaya eva vaiṣayikam | yathā— nipibantyasmin gavādaya iti nipānaṃ jalāśayaḥ, rājāno dhīyante 'syāṃ rājadhānīnagaram iti |
(aupaś‍leṣikam) upaś‍leṣo 'vaṣṭambhaḥ, tasmai prabhavatyaupaś‍leṣikam | yathā— iṣavo dhīyante 'smin iṣudhiḥ upāsaṅgam, śerate 'syāṃ śayyā paryaṅkaḥ |
(naimittikam) nimittameva naimittikam | yathā— rajyante 'smin sāmājikamanāṃsīti raṅgaḥ prekṣā, prasīdantyasmin nayanamanāṃsīti prāsādaḥ saudham iti |
tadatedubhayamapi1 — 1. śuddham, 2. saṃkīrṇam, 3. upādhimat, 4. rụ̄dhimat, 5. saṃbandhi, 6. anubandhi ceti ṣọdhā viprathate | tatra—
(1. śuddham) arthāntarairasaṃsparśaḥ śuddhiḥ |
sā bhāvānāṃ yathā— odanasya pākaḥ, alaṃ kṛtvā, khalu sthitvā iti |
kārakāṇāṃ yathā— apāṃ straṣṭā, varṣaśatasya pūrakaḥ, some pavamāna iti |
(2. saṃkīrṇam) saṃparkaḥ saṃkaraḥ |
sa bhāvānāṃ yathā— kālo bhok‍tum, alaṃ bhok‍tum, bhojaṃ bhojaṃ vrajatīti |
kārakāṇāṃ yathā— gamanamarhati gamyā yoṣit, jetuṃ śakyate jayyaḥ śatruḥ, pak‍tuṃ vrajati, pācako vrajati iti |
1. 'bhāva—kārakā 'bhidhāyino dhātupratyayāḥ' dra. pṛ. 67
(3. upādhimat) bāhyam, ābhyantaram, ubhayaṃ vā śāstropāttaṃ viśeṣaṇamupādhiḥ | sa bhāvānāṃ yathā— bhavataḥ śāyikā, upasaro gavām, samajaḥ paśūnāmiti | kārakāṇāṃ yathā— tundaparimṛjo 'lasaḥ, stamberamo hastī, dṛtihariḥ paśuḥ iti |
(4. rụ̄dhiḥ) guṇavacanatve dravyavacanatvaṃ rụ̄dhiḥ | sā bhāvānāṃ yathā— mṛgayā, vāsanā, parivrajyeti | kārakāṇāṃ yātha— kumbhakāraḥ, paṅkajam, amāvāsyeti |
(5. saṃbandhaḥ) niyogataḥ pratiyogyapekṣaḥ saṃbandhaḥ | sa bhāvānāṃ yathā— bhuktvā vrajati, bhok‍tumicchati, aprāpya nadīṃ parvata iti | kārakāṇāṃ yathā— caṅkramyamāṇo 'dhīte, adhīyāno vasati, godāyo vrajati |
(6. anubandhaḥ) anuṣaṅgo 'nubandhaḥ | sa bhāvānāṃ yathā— sārāviṇaṃ varttate, raipoṣaṃ puṣyati, cakāsāñcakāra iti | kārakāṇāṃ yathā— agniṣṭomayājī, uṣṭrakośī, śatadāyī—ti |
(kṛtaḥ) athaitadabhidhāne triprakārāḥ kṛto bhavanti — 1. bhāvavacanāḥ, 2. kārakavacanāḥ, 3. bhāvakārakavacanāśca | teṣu —
(1) athujādayaḥ, ṇvulādayaḥ, ṇajādayaḥ, tumunādayaḥ, sayādayaḥ, ṇamulādayaś‍ca bhāvavacanāḥ,
(2) ṇvulādayaḥ, aṇādayaḥ, uṇādayaḥ, kvinādayaḥ, śatrādayaḥ, tṛnādayaśca kārakavacanāḥ
(3) tavyādayaḥ, tavāyādayaḥ, ktādayaḥ, khalādayaḥ, lyuḍādayaḥ, ghañādayaś‍ca bhāvakārakavacanāḥ | tatra—
(1. bhāvavacanāḥ —6)
bhāvavacaneṣvanupādhau siddhabhāve athujādayaḥ | yathā— nandathuḥ, yajñaḥ, svapnaḥ, kriyā, kaṇḍūyā, vrajyā iti |
atraiva rogādyupādhimati ṇvulādayaḥ | yathā— arocako bādhate, pravāhikātaḥ karoti, bhavata āsikā, ikṣubhakṣikāṃ me dhārayasi, kāṃ tvaṃ kārimakārṣīḥ, akaraṇiste vṛṣalaḥ iti |
siddhāsamāpte ṇajādayaḥ | yathā— vyāvakrośī varttate, vyāvahāsīṃ kurvanti, sāṅkūṭinaṃ varttate, sāṃrāviṇaṃ kurvanti, karaṇena nirvṛttaṃ kṛttrimam, pākena nirvṛttaṃ paktrimam iti |
sādhyarūpe tumunādayaḥ | yathā— bhok‍tuṃ vrajati, bhok‍tuṃ jānāti, bhuktvā vrajati,
apamitya yācate, svāduṅkāraṃ bhuṅkte, coraṅkāramākrośati |
tumartha eva chandoviṣaye sayādayaḥ | yathā— vakṣe rāyastvā, dṛśe viś‍vāya sūryam, agniṃ devā vibhājaṃ nāśaknuvan, vilupaṃ nāśaknuvan, īś‍varo 'bhicaratoḥ, īś‍varo vilikhaḥ iti |
sādhyā 'samāpte ṇamulādayaḥ | yathā— samūlakāṣaṃ kaṣati, raipoṣaṃ puṣyati, cakāsāñcakāra, bibharāmbabhūva, cakāsāmās, vidāṅkurvantu iti |
(2. kārakavacanāḥ —6)
kārakavacaneṣvanudrik‍takriyāṃśāḥ karttaryeva ṇvulādayaḥ | yathā— kārakaḥ, sraṣṭā, nandanaḥ, priyaḥ, yajvā jaranniti |
sopapadāḥ kartrādiṣvaṇādayaḥ | yathā— kāṇḍalāvaḥ, pādahārakaḥ, subhaṅkaraṇam, goghnaḥ, śambhuḥ, goṣṭhaḥ iti |
nirupapadā rụ̄dhimanta uṇādayaḥ | yathā— kāruḥ, dātram dhātrī, dāsaḥ, bhīṣma iti |
ubhaye 'pi lopavantaḥ kvinādayaḥ | yathā— dhṛtaspṛk, sadṛk, arthabhāk, śubhaṃyuḥ, prāṅ, yuṅ iti |
karttaryevodriktakriyāṃśāḥ śatrādayaḥ | yathā— yavāgūṃ pacan, somaṃ pavamānaḥ, āśiṣaṃ dāś‍vān, vedamanūcānaḥ, bhuk‍tavānodanam, grāmaṃ gamī' iti | ta eva tācchīlyādyupādhimantastṛnādayaḥ | yathā— jāgaritānapararātrān, muṇḍayitāraḥ śrāviṣṭhāyanāḥ vadhūmụ̄dhām, alaṅkariṣṇuḥ, katīha kavacamud‍vahamānāḥ, śataṃ dāyī, edhānāhārako vrajati iti |
(3. bhāvakārakavacanāḥ —6)
bhāvakārakavacaneṣūdrik‍tānudrik‍tākriyāṃśāḥ tavyādayaḥ | yathā— karttavyaṃ bhavatā, karaṇīyaṃ bhavatā, kāryaḥ kaṭobhavataḥ, kṛtyaḥkaṭo bhavataḥ, vāstavyo bhavān, brahmabhūyaṃ bhavata iti |
ta evacchandoviṣayāstavāyādayaḥ | yathā—paridhātavai, paristaritavai, avacakṣe, avagāhe, didṛkṣeṇyaḥ, kartvaṃ haviḥ iti |
udrik‍takriyāṃśāḥ k‍tādayaḥ | yathā— bhuk‍taṃ bhavatā, bhujyamānaṃ bhavatā, bhokṣyamāṇaṃ bhavatā, bhuṅkta odanaṃ bhavān, bhuk‍ta odano bhavatā, evaṃ bhokṣyamāṇa iti | ta eva vyaktakālāḥ khalādayaḥ | yathā— svạ̄dhyaṃbhavaṃ bhavatā, sūtthānaṃ bhavatā, prāśitaṃbhavaṃ bhavatā, durạ̄dhyayaṃbhavaṃ bhavatā, īṣatpānaḥ somo bhavataḥ, āśitambhavaṃ bhak‍tam iti | anudrik‍tākriyāṃśāḥ prāyo guṇavacanā lyuḍādayaḥ | yathā— vyāsasya vacanam,
pāṇineruktiḥ, chātrasya hasitam, idhmānāṃ vraś‍canaṃ janānāṃ bhaktiḥ, rājñāṃ mata iti | ta eva prāyodravyavacanā ghañādayaḥ | yathā— paryāyaḥ kriyāṇām, viparyāyaḥ kālasya, saṃgrahaḥ śāstrāṇām, adhītaḥ svādhyāyaḥ, adhigata upāyaḥ, śreyānupādhyāya iti ||
(2. taddhitarūpaṃ vibhak‍tāvayam)
bhāva—kāraka—sambandhi—svārthābhidhāyino 'dhātupratyayāstaddhitāḥ |
(1. bhāvastaddhitāḥ) tatra bhāvo dvidhā— antaraṅgo bahiraṅgaś‍ceti | tayoḥ — (antaraṅgaḥ) śabdasyārthe pravṛttinimittamantaraṅgaḥ | yadāha 'yasya guṇasya hi bhāvād dravye śabdaniveśaḥ sa tasya bhāvaḥ, tadabhidhāne tvatalau' |
tasyopasaṃgrahāya saṃgrahakāraḥ paṭhati—
śabde tāṃ jātiṃ śabdamevā 'rthajātau jātiḥ śuklādau dravyaśabde guṇaṃ tam |
kṛt‍tatsaṃyogaṃ yogi cābhinnarūpaṃ vācyaṃ vācyeṣu tvādayo bodhayanti || 5 || (vāpa. 5, 5.1.119)
tataḥ sa ṣọdhā 'bhivyajyate 1. jātiḥ, 2. guṇaḥ, 3. svarūpam, 4. saṃbandhaḥ, 5. saṃhatiḥ, 6. abhinnarūpamiti | teṣu—
jātiryathā— gotvam, śuklatvam, mānuṣyakam, straiṇam, pauṃsnam, brāhmaṇyam iti |
guṇo yathā— śuklatvam, śīghratā, mradimā, mādhuryam, ārjavam, vaidagdhyamiti |
svarūpaṃ yathā— ḍitthatvam, ākāśatvam, candratvam, sūryatvam, diktvam, tadātvamiti |
saṃbandho yathā— pācakatvam, kāṇḍalāvatvam, daṇḍitvam, aupagavatvam, rājapuruṣatvam, puruṣavyāghratvam iti |
saṃhatiryathā— dhavaravadiratvam, narasiṃhatvam, śuklakṛṣṇatvam, kṛṣṇaśāratvam, nīlotpalatvam, gaurakhadiratvam iti |
abhinnarūpaṃ yathā— sattvam, vidyamānatvam, gargatvam, pañcālatvam, padārthatvam, paṅkajatvam iti |
nanu ca
jātiguṇājjātiguṇe dhavakhadirādau svajātisaṃghāte |
ḍitthādau ca sva (sve) rūpe kṛt‍tatsaṃyoge tu saṃbandhe || 6 ||
(dau ca sva = dau sve'—iti tūtprekṣyeta)
tvādaya iti smṛtiḥ |
kathamabhinnarūpādāvapi bhavati ?
ucyate— kṛttaddhitasamāseṣu sambandhābhidhānam, anyatra rụ̄dhyabhinnarūpā 'vyabhicarita— saṃbandhebhyaḥ | ata evoktam 'kṛt tatsaṃyogaṃ yogi cābhinnarūpam' iti ||
avadherapi vācyatvaṃ tvādīnāmiṣyate budhaiḥ |
gotvāddhi gauritijñānamabhidhānaṃ ca jāyate || 7 ||
te hyevamāhuḥ 'tasya bhāvastvatalau' (5.1.119), bhavato 'smādabhidhānapratyayāviti bhāvaḥ |
tadasat, na hi gotvaṃ gauriti jñānasyotpattāvapādānatāṃ janayat 'janikarttuḥ prakṛtiḥ' (1.4.30), 'bhuvaḥ prabhavo' (1.4.31) vā bhavati; yathā— śṛṅgāccharo jāyate, himavato gaṅgā prabhavatīti | jñānaṃ tvātmana eva jāyate, manasaivod‍bhavati | tadāha— 'vyāpakatvādapyātmano yugapajjñānānutpattirmanaso ( 'ṇutvasya) liṅgam, nāhamadrākṣam, nāhamaśrauṣam, nāhamajñāsiṣam, anyatra me mano 'bhūditi | nimittatvaṃ tu gauriti jñānotpattau śabdasyeva gotvāderapīṣyata eva | tatra yathā samavāyinaḥ ś‍vaityāt ś‍vaityabuddheḥ ś‍vete ś‍vaityabuddhiḥ, tathā samavāyino gotvād gobuddhergavi gotvabuddhiḥ, te parasparaṃ kāraṇabhūtā iti |
abhidhānaṃ tu śabdaḥ | sa ca yenoccāritenārthaḥ pratīyate | tasyāpi na gotvamavadhirbhavati | śabdo hi ākāśādeva jāyate, mukhādeva prabhavati, na gotvādeḥ | tadāhuḥ 'mukhe hi śabdamupalabhāmahe bhūmāvartham' (śābarabhāṣyam 1.1.5) iti | yadāpi nityaḥ śabda iti mataṃ tadāpi śabdasya gotvādayo vācyā viśeṣyāḥ pratyāyyā eva bhavanti | tatra ca śabdasya gotvādīnāṃ vācyatve viśeṣyatve vā karmataiva, nāvadhitvam | pratyāyyatve tu vipariṇāmaviparivarttapakṣayorvakṣyamāṇanyāyena pratyuta śabdasyaivā 'vadhitvam | adhyāsastu sādṛśyādupādherupādhisādṛśyābhyāṃ vā saṃbhavati; yathā— śuktikādau rajatādeḥ, sphaṭikādau raktādeḥ, pratibimbādau mukhāderiti | tatra yo yadadhyāsyate, yo yadadhyāste vā, sa tasyādhikaraṇaṃ karma vā syānna tvavadhiḥ; gotvaṃ nimittamupādāya gośabdo gāmadhyāste gavi vā 'dhyāsyate | tadiṣyata eva 'yasya guṇasya hi bhāvād dravye śabdaniveśaḥ tadabhidhāne tvatalau' iti ||
(bahiraṅgaḥ) dhātvartharūpaḥ kṛdabhidheyo bahiraṅgaḥ | so 'pi ṣọdhā— 1. bhāvarūpaḥ, 2. kārakarūpaḥ, 3. saṃbandhirūpaḥ, 4. bhāvaviśiṣṭaḥ, 5. kārakaviśiṣṭaḥ, 6. saṃbandhiviśiṣṭaś‍ceti | tatra —
(1. bhāvarūpaḥ)
pravṛttinimittatulyo bhāvarūpaḥ — brāhmaṇasya karma brāhmaṇyam, purohitasya paurohityam, stenasya steyam, sakhyuḥ sakhyam, dūtasya dūtyam, vaṇijo vāṇijyamiti |
(2. kārakarūpaḥ)
kārakaistulyakakṣyaḥ kārakarūpaḥ | yathā— rājānamarhati rājavad vṛttam | āprayojanakālaṃ bhavati ākālikī pravṛttiḥ, śyenasyeva pāto 'syāṃ varttate śyainaṃpātā kriyāṃ, daṇḍaḥ praharaṇamasyāṃ krīḍāyāṃ dāṇḍā, (4.2.57) mahimāstyasyāṃ mahiminī samasyā, vaṭakaṃ prakṛtamasyāṃ vaṭakamayī yātreti (mabhā. 5.2.82) |
(3. sambandhirūpaḥ)
rụ̄dhe dravyabhūtaḥ sambandhirūpaḥ | yathā— cāṣāṇāṃ samūhaḥ cāṣam, nāṭyānāmāmnāyo nāṭyam, bhṛgvaṅgirasāṃ vivāho bhṛgvaṅgirasikā, kākolūkasya vairaṃ kākolūkikā, avīnāṃ saṃghāto 'vikaṭaḥ, teṣāmeva vistāro 'vipaṭaḥ iti |
(4. bhāvaviśiṣṭaḥ)
atarkitopanatacitrīkaraṇādisadṛśo bhāvaviśiṣṭaḥ | yathā— kākasya cāgamanaṃ yādṛcchikam, tālasya ca pātaḥ | tena tālena patatā kākasya vadhaḥ | evameva devadattasya cāgamanaṃ dasyūnāṃ copanipātaḥ, taiś‍ca tasya vadhaḥ | tatra yo devadattasya dasyūnāṃ ca samāgamaḥ sa kākatālasamāgama ivetyeka upamārthaḥ, yaś‍ca devadattavadhaḥ sa kākavadha iveti dvitīya upamārthaḥ |
tatra prathamaḥ samāsārthaḥ kākatālamiti, dvitīyaḥ pratyayārthaḥ kākatālīyamiti | samāsaś‍cāyamasmādeva jñāpakād yadāha 'samāsācca tad‍‌viṣayād (5.3.106) ākasmika ivārthe cho bhavati | tad‍‌viṣayādityatra hi tadityanena 'ive pratikṛtau' (5. 3.96) iti ivārthaḥ | evam
ajākṛpāṇīyam (kāśikā 5.3.106), andhakavarttakīyam (kāśikā 5.3.106), ghuṇākṣarīyam, ardhajaratīyam, gomayapā/vā—yasīyam (gaṇaratna. 3.3.196) iti |
(5. kārakaviśiṣṭaḥ)
kārakāvacchinnaḥ kārakaviśiṣṭaḥ | yathā— matasya karaṇaṃ matyam, pīlūnāṃ pākaḥ pīlukuṇaḥ, janasya jalpo janyaḥ, śivasya bhavanaṃ śivatātiḥ, nāsāyā avanatiḥ avaṭīṭaḥ (5.2.31), dhane kāmaḥ dhanaka iti |
(6. saṃbandhiviśiṣṭaḥ)
sambandhinā 'vacchinnaḥ saṃbandhiviśiṣṭaḥ | yathā— halyaḥ, karṣaḥ, saudhaḥ saṃkocaḥ, pauruṣeyo vadhaḥ, ātharvaṇa āmnāyaḥ, vaido ghoṣaḥ, chāndogyo dharmaḥ iti | upādhirapi saṃbandhyeva bhavati | yathā— gārgikayā vikatthate, kāṭhikayā adhikṣipati, gārgikāmanvavetaḥ, gārgikāmavagatavān, kāṭhikāmavagatavān iti | dhātvartho 'pibhāva eva |
kriyāpi hyupamānena parītā paricchinnā sādhyasiddhabhāvo bhavati | sa tridhā— 1. bhāvaviśiṣṭaḥ, 2.kārakaviśiṣṭaḥ, 3.saṃbandhiviśiṣṭaś‍ceti | teṣu—
1. bhāvaviśiṣṭo yathā— brāhmaṇena tulyamadhīte brāhmaṇavat, rājñā sadṛśaṃ varttate rājavat, jaḍasya tulyaṃ brūte jaḍavat, sūrya iva prakāte sūryavat, pitā yathā pālayati pitṛvat, gururivānuśāsti guruvaditi |
atra brāhmaṇādisthāsu adhyayanakriyāsu sāhacaryād vṛttiḥ, jātidravyayoranyatareṇa kriyāyāḥ sādṛśyānupapatteḥ | yadāha— 'tena tulyaṃ kriyā ced vatiḥ' (5.1.115); teneti tṛtīyāsamarthāt tulyamityetasminnarthe vatipratyayo bhavati tat‍tulyaṃ kriyā cet sā bhavati | arthaparaṃ caitat; tena sadṛśetyādiprayogeṣvatṛtīyāntādapi bhavati |
2. kārakaviśiṣṭo yathā— rājñeva vyavahṛtamanena rājavat, devamiva bhavantaṃ paśyāmi devavat, asineva dātreṇa cchinatti asivat, brāhmaṇāyeva yadā devadattāya dadāti brāhmaṇavat, parvatādivāsanādavarohati parvatavat, pitarīva gurāvācarate pitṛvat |
atra punaridameva sūtramanyathā vyākhyāyate— 'tena kārakaviśeṣeṇa tulyaṃ yathā bhavati | evaṃ cet kriyā bhavati bhāvotpanne 'pi hi pratyaye kadācit pratyayamukhena kriyāviśeṣaṇaṃ bhavati, kadācit prakṛtimukhena | yathā— tīvraḥ pākaḥ, tīvraṃ pākam iti |
3. sambandhiviśiṣṭo yathā— brāhmaṇasyevā 'dhyayanamasya brāhmaṇavat, rājavad raudraṃ vṛttamasya rājavat, jaḍasya sadṛśaṃ vacanamasya jaḍavat, sūryasyeva prakāśo 'sya
sūryavat, pituryathā pālanamasya pitṛvat, gurostulyamanuśāsanamasya guruvat iti | atra tu 'tatra tasyeva' (5.1.116) ityanena vatiḥ | nanu ca 'tena tulyami'— (5.1.115) tyanenaiva siddhe kimarthaṃ 'tatra tasyeva' iti sūtrasyārambhaḥ? dravyaguṇayotulyayoḥ pratyayo na labhya iti | yathā— mathurāyāmiva pāṭaliputre prāsādā madhurāvat, brāhmaṇasyeva kṣatriyasya śuklā dantā brāhmaṇavat iti | yadyevaṃ pūrvasūtre kriyāgrahaṇaṃ na kariṣyate | sāhacaryācca kriyāyāmiva dravyaguṇayoḥ prātipadikaṃ varttiṣyate | tataś‍ca maitreyatulyā gāvaś‍caitrasya, brāhmaṇena tulyā dantāḥ kṣatriyasya iti vigṛhya pūrvasūtreṇaiva vatiḥ setsyatīti | tadasat |
evaṃ hi gavayena tulyo 'naḍvān ityatrāpi pratyayaḥ prasajet, ivārthe tu pratyaye saptamīṣaṣṭhyantābhyāmeva vidhīyamāne gavaya ivā 'naḍvānityatra pratyayaprasaṅgo na syāt; saptamyantaṣaṣṭhyantayorhi bāhyaṃ sambandhinamapekṣya ivaśabdaprayogo bhavati, na punarivārthāpekṣayeva; ivaśabdo hyupamānopameyalakṣaṇasaṃbandhadyotakaḥ, na tu sambandhi— rūpābhidhāyī | tasmād gavayena tulyo 'naṅvānityatrāpi mā bhūt pratyayaprasaṅga iti pūrvasūtre kriyāgrahaṇam | tasmiṃś‍ca kṛte dravyaguṇayostulyayoḥ pratyayo na syāditi saptamīṣaṣṭhyantābhyāmivārthe 'tatra tasyeva' iti vatirvidhīyate |
atha 'tadarham' (5.1.117) iti kimartham ?
arhato yā kriyā karttustatrāpi vatiriṣyate |
upamānāvivakṣāyāṃ tad‌vidhānaṃ na labhyate || 8 ||
upamānopameyatvamanyasyānyena vā saha |
avasthābhedabhinnatvādekasyāpyātmanaiva vā || 9 || (vāpa. 3 vṛttiḥ |)
tatrānyasyānyena yathā— avaiyākaraṇo 'pyayaṃ vaiyākaraṇavad brūte; yoṣidapyeṣā puṃvad‌vak‍tīti; avasthābhedabhinnatvādekasyāpyātmano yathā— vaiyākaraṇaḥ kenaciducyate vaiyākaraṇavad brūhīti; yoṣidapyucय़te strīvad vadeti | vaiyākaraṇo 'pyavajñayā kadācid — vaiyākaraṇavad brūte | śrūyate hi— yarvāṇastarvāṇo nāma sākṣātkṛtadha /?/rmmāṇa ṛṣayo babhūvuḥ | te hi 'antarvedyāmeva na mlecchitavyam, ato 'nyatrāvajñayā' iti 'yad‌vā nastad‌vā na' iti vak‍tavye yarvāṇastarvāṇa ityūcuḥ {mabhā.1.1.1 (9)} | yoṣidapi kadācidāśritaprāgalbhyāt puṃvad‌vakti yathocyate—
sarasvatīva karṇāṭī vijayāṅkā jayatyasau | yā vaidarbhagirāṃ bhūmiḥ kālidāsādanantaram || 10 ||
asyaupamyadvayasyāpi vivakṣāto 'parigrahe |
vatiḥ kathamivārthīya iti matvāyamucyate || 11 || (vāpa. 3 vṛttiḥ)
tatra 'rājavad vṛttamityatra yadā evaṃvidhā arthavivakṣā— 'pṛthvādinā rājñā tulyaṃ vṛttam anena rājñā rājavad vṛttaṃ rājñe'—ti tadā ' 'dyenaiva sūtreṇa siddhaḥ pratyayaḥ; yadā tvetādṛśī vivakṣā—'rājña iva pṛthorasya vṛttaṃ rājavad‌vṛttaṃ rājña iti tadā dvitīyasūtreṇa | yadā tvidaṃ vṛttaṃ rājānamevā 'rhati nānyamityupamānopameyabhāvābhāve rājavad vṛttamiti prayogastadā 'tadarham' ityanena vatirvidhīyata iti nānarthakaḥ sūtrārambhaḥ ||
anye tu 'tena tulyaṃ kriyā ced vatiḥ' ityatra dvitīyavyākhyānapakṣe kriyāyāḥ kriyā viśeṣaṇaṃ na saṃbhavatīti kārakaviśiṣṭabhāvapakṣaṃ 'tadarham' ityanena saṃvāhayati, rājānamarhati yad vyavaharaṇam, devamarhati yad darśanam, asimarhati yacchedanam, brāhmaṇamarhati yad‌dānam, parvatamarhati yadavarohaṇam, pitaramarhati yat pāratantryam taducyate rājavat, devavat, asivat, brāhmaṇavat, parvatavat, pitṛvaditi | rājñeva vyavahṛtamityādibhistu tasyārthaḥ pradarśita' iti ||
(2. kārakastaddhitāḥ)
kārakamapi bhāvavadevā 'ntaraṅgaṃ bahiraṅgaṃ ca |
tayorākhyātābhidheyamantaraṅgam, anākhyātābhidheyaṃ bahiraṅgam |
(antaraṅgabhedeṣu) karttā, hetukarttā, karmakarttā, karma ceti;
(bahiraṅgabhedeṣu) karaṇaṃ saṃpradānamapādānamadhikaraṇaṃ ceti | (dra. pṛ॰ 84)
(karttā) tatrā 'ntaraṅgabhedeṣu karttā 1. śuddhaḥ 2. miśraḥ 3. saṃkīrṇaś‍ca | teṣu —
1. kriyākārakāntarāsaṃpṛk‍taḥ śuddhaḥ| yathā iṣṭamanena iṣṭī yajñe, kṛtaḥ pūrvaṃ kaṭo 'nena kṛtapūrvī kaṭamiti |
2. kriyāntarasaṃpṛk‍to miśraḥ| yathā— vyākaraṇaṃ vetti adhīte vā vaiyākaraṇaḥ, śaś‍vad bhavaḥ śāś‍vatikaḥ iti |
3. kriyākārakāntarasaṃpṛktaḥ saṃkīrṇaḥ| yathā— śālayāṃ praveśamarhati śālīnaḥ adhṛṣṭaḥ, kūpe prakṣepaṇamarhati iti kaupīnamakāryam |
(hetukarttā) hetuḥ 1. ātmasthakriyaḥ, 2. parasthakriyaḥ, 3. parātmasthakriyaś‍ceti | teṣu —
1. ātmasthakriyo yathā— pārāyaṇaṃ varttayati pārāyaṇikaḥ, cāndrāyaṇaṃ varttayati cāndrāyaṇikaḥ iti |
2. parasthakriyo yathā— vātaṃ śamayati vātikaṃ tailam, pittaṃ kopayati paittikamiti |
3. parātmasthakriyo yathā— yathāmukhaṃ darśayate yathāmukhīna ādarśaḥ, saṃmukhaṃ darśayate saṃmukhīnaḥ preyāniti |
karmakarttā 1. anudrik‍takarmāṃśaḥ 2. udrik‍takarmāṃśaḥ, 3. anudrik‍todrik‍takarmāṃśaś‍ca |
1. anudrik‍takarmāṃśo yathā— akṣadyūtena nirvṛttamākṣadyūtikaṃ dhanam, pākena nirvṛttaṃ pākimam,
māṇikam (5.4.29) iti | (māṇika iti rāghavaḥ)
2. udrik‍takarmāṃśo yathā— vasante puṣpyanti vāsantyaḥ kundalatāḥ, ṣaṣṭirātreṇa pacyante
ṣaṣṭikāḥ śālaya iti |
3. anudrik‍todrik‍takarmāṃśo yathā— vaśaṃ gato vaśyaḥ, śīrṣacchedamarhati śīrṣacchedya iti |
karma 1. nirvarttyam 2. vikāryam 3. prāpyaṃ ca | tatra —
1. (nirvarttyam) yad asajjanyate, sad vā prakāśyate tannirvarttyam | yathā— urasā nirmita aurasaḥ putraḥ, pāṇininā prok‍taṃ pāṇinīyaṃ vyākaraṇam iti |
2. (vikāryam) yasya prakṛtyucchedo guṇāntaraṃ vā vidhīyate tad vikāryam | yathā viṣeṇa vadhyo viṣyaḥ śatruḥ, kusumbhena raktaṃ kausumbhaṃ vastramiti |
3. (prāpyam) āsthitamanāsthitaṃ vā kriyayā yadāptumiṣyate tat prāpyam | yathā nāvā tāryo nāvyo hradaḥ, ayānayaṃ neyaḥ ayānayīnaḥ śāra (5.2.1 nyāsa.) iti |
nanu śāro 'pyāsthitaḥ kasmānna bhavati ?
tyāgarūpaṃ prahātavye prāpye saṃsargadarśanam |
āsthitaṃ karma yat tatra dvairūpyaṃ bhajati kriyā || 12 || (vāpa. 3.135)
yathā panthānaṃ gacchati garttamuttaratīti |
śārastu prāpya eva | yathā ajāṃ nayati grāmam, vahati bhāramiti |
nanvevaṃ grāmasya prāpyatā prāpnoti, nājādeḥ |
kaḥ punarāha na prāpnotītiḥ kintu akathitatvena tatra kriyāvyāpyatvād dvitīyaiva, na pratyayāntaram 'gāṃ dogdhi payaḥ, pauravaṃ gāṃ yācata' iti |
(bahiraṅgam) bahiraṅgabhedeṣu karaṇam bāhyamābhyantaraṃ, bāhyābhyantaraṃ ca | teṣu—
1. bāhyam yathā— supāṃ vyākhyānaḥ saupaḥ, lalāṭasya bhūṣaṇaṃ lalāṭikā |
2. ābhyantaraṃ yathā— matasya karaṇaṃ matyam, caturṇāṃ pūraṇaś‍caturthaḥ iti |
3. bāhyābhyantaraṃ yathā— samidha ādhīyante 'nena sāmidhenyo mantraḥ, sa eva hṛdayasya bandhano hṛdya prati |
saṃpradānam — dadātikarmāpyaṃ, karmamātrāpyaṃ kriyāpyaṃ ca |
(dadātikarmāpyam)
saṃpradīyate bhojanādikamasmai ityanvarthasaṃjñakaṃ dadātikarmāpyam | yathā— agrabhojanaṃ niyuktamasmai dīyate āgrabhojanikaḥ, pañcāsmai vṛddhirvā, āyo vā, lābho vā, śulkaṃ vā, upadā vā dīyante pañcakaḥ puruṣa iti |
(karmamātrāpyam)
karmaṇā yamabhipraiti sa saṃpradānam (1.4.33) iti pāribhāṣikasaṃjñakaṃ karmamātrāpyam | yathā—'rāṣṭramasmai nirdiśyate rāṣṭriyo rājanyaḥ, kaliṃ kurvantyasmai kāleyaṃ gandhadravyam iti |
(kriyāpyam)
karmaśabdena kriyāyā apyabhidhānāt kriyayāpi yamabhipraiti sa saṃpradānamiti kriyā ' 'pyam | yathā—'alaṃ karmāsmai nirdiśyate alaṅkarmīṇaḥ anyūnaḥ, na ṣaḍakṣāṇi asmai bhavanti aṣaḍakṣīṇo mantra' iti |
apādānam— nirdiṣṭaviṣayam, upāttaviṣayam, apekṣitakriyaṃ ca | teṣu
(nirdiṣṭaviṣayam)
dhruvamapāye 'pādānam (1.4.24) iti nirdiṣṭaviṣayam | yathā—agniḥ patatyasmād āgneyo grāvā, nadyaḥ syandante asmānnādeyaḥ śaila iti |
(upāttaviṣayam)
bhītrārthādiyogoktamupāttaviṣayam | yathā—kukṣiṃ rakṣanti asmāt kaukṣeyakaḥ kṛpāṇaḥ,
mud‌gā bhavantyasmānmaud‌gīnaṃ kṣetram iti | yathā—
avadhimātrārthamapekṣitakriyam | yathā karṇasya mūlaṃ karṇajāham, pakṣasya mūlaṃ pakṣati'—riti
adhikaraṇam—vaiṣayikam, aupaś‍leṣikam, naimittikaṃ ca | teṣu
(vaiṣayikam)
vividhamanekaprakāraṃ jāti—kriyā guṇa dravyādibhiḥ sinotīti viṣayo deśakālādiḥ | viṣaya eva vaiṣayikaḥ, yathā—gāvaḥ santyasmin gomān deśaḥ, pauṣī paurṇamāsyasmin pauṣo māsa iti |
(aupaś‍leṣikam)
upaś‍leṣo 'vaṣṭambhaḥ, tasmai prabhavati aupaś‍leṣikam | yathā— daṇḍino 'syāṃ santi daṇḍimatī śālā, viṃśatirihādhikā viṃśaṃ śatam iti |
(naimittikam)
nimittameva naimittikam | yathā—pūrṇo māso 'syāṃ paurṇamāsī rātriḥ, parikhā 'tra syāt parikheyo deśaḥ iti |
(kārakastaddhitāḥ)
kārakaṃ cāntaraṅgabahiraṅgabhedād dvirūpamapi prakṛtyupādheḥ
1. kārakaviśiṣṭam, 2. akārakaviśiṣṭam, 3. saṃbandhaviśiṣṭam, 4. nipātaviśiṣṭañceti caturdhā nirdhāryate | teṣu —
karma karmaviśiṣṭaṃ yathā— ayānayaṃ neyaḥ ayānayīnaḥ śāraḥ,
karaṇaviśiṣṭaṃ yathā— cakṣuṣā gṛhyate cākṣuṣaṃ rūpam,
adhikaraṇaviśiṣṭaṃ yathā— strughne kṛto vā labdho vā krīto vā straughnaḥ,
apādānaviśiṣṭaṃ yathā— tantrādacirāpahṛtastantrakaḥ paṭaḥ iti |
kartṛviśiṣṭaṃ yathā— aś‍vairuhyata āś‍vo rathaḥ | kartṛviśeṣaṇamapi karttaiva caturbhiruhyate cāturaṃ śakaṭam | api ca— (kāśikā 4.2.13)
kaumārī sā bhaved bhāryā yāṃ kumāraḥ prapatsyate |
prapadyate kumārī yaṃ sa kaumāro mataḥ patiḥ || 13 ||
saṃpradānaviśiṣṭaṃ tu kārakaṃ nāsti |
karttā karmaviśiṣṭo yathā— śrāddhamanenā 'dya bhuk‍taṃ śrāddhikaḥ | kriyāviśeṣaṇamiti— śabdopasaṃhāraṃ ca karmaiva | tadviśiṣṭo yathā— pratikūlaṃ varttate prātikūlikam, māśabda, ityāha māśabdika iti;
karaṇaviśiṣṭo yathā—akṣairdīvyati ākṣikaḥ |
adhikaraṇaviśiṣṭo yathā—prāvṛṣikaḥ prāvṛṣi bhavaḥ prāvṛṣeṇyaḥ |
apādānaviśiṣṭo yathā—piturāgataṃ pitryaṃ dhanam iti |
karttṛviśiṣṭaḥ karttā nāsti |
karaṇaṃ karmaviśiṣṭaṃ yathā— grīvāyāṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ graiveyaṃ rukmadāma | evaṃ
sampradānamapi yathā— māṃsamebhyo niyuktaṃ dīyate māṃsikāḥ pitaraḥ |
apādānaṃ karttṛviśiṣṭaṃ yathā— brīh‌yo bhavantyasmād braiheyaṃ kṣetram | evam
adhikaraṇamapi yathā— śarkarāḥ santyasmin śarkarilo deśaḥ | tadeva
karmaviśiṣṭaṃ yathā— padamasmin dṛśyaṃ padyaḥ kardamaḥ |
karaṇaviśiṣṭamapi yathā— daṇḍaḥ praharaṇamasyāṃ daṇḍā krīḍā iti |
karaṇādayo 'sya viśiṣṭā na vidyante ||
karmakartroreva akārakasaṃbandhinipātairviśeṣaṇayogaḥ | sa
karmaṇo 'kārakeṇa yathā— māsāya bhūto māsikaḥ, saṃvatsaramadhīṣṭaḥ sāṃvatsarika iti | kartturyathā— saṃtāpāya prabhavati sāṃtāpikaḥ, varṣaṃ bhūto bhāvī vā vārṣika iti |
karmaṇaḥ sambandhino yathā— vākyapade adhikṛtya kṛto grantho vākyapadīyaḥ, kalāpiṣu udibhadyamānakalāpeṣu deyamṛṇaṃ kālāpakam iti |
karturyathā tittiriṇā prok‍taṃ vidanti adhīyate vā taittirīyāḥ, pūrvaṃ kṛtaṃ bhuktaṃ pītaṃ vā ebhiḥ pūrviṇaḥ iti |
karmaṇo nipātena yathā— yathākathācaṃ kriyate yāthākathyamidam (kāśikā 5.1.98), bahirdṛśyate bāhyam iti |
kartturyathā ārād bhava ārātīyaḥ, sākṣād draṣṭā sākṣī iti |
nanu, kriyayā 'pi karmaṇaḥ kartturvā viśeṣaṇayogaḥ saṃbhavati | tad yathā— pākena nirvṛttaṃ pākimam; apamityā (nirvṛttam) āpamityakam, yācitena (nirvṛttaṃ) yācitakam
iti; yathā ca sus‍nātaṃ pṛcchati (4.4.1. vāpa.3) saus‍nātikaḥ prabhūtamāha prābhūtikaḥ, kṛtaṃ(taḥ) pūrvamanena kaṭaḥ kṛtapūrvī kaṭam iti (5.2.87 kāśikā) |
ucyate kriyā 'pi prākṛtaṃ karmaiva | atastadviśiṣṭayorapi karmakartroḥ karmaviśiṣṭatvameva bhavati |
nanu ca 'nirvṛttami' tyetasya kathaṃ karmatā?
idaṃ hyanudrikte karmāṃśe karttari vā prayujyamānaṃ dṛśyate |
naivam
antarbhūta—ṇyarthatvenāsya sakarmakatvamapi manyante | tathā ca kātyāyanaḥ —
(vararuciḥ)
uttāraṇāya jagataḥ prapitāmahena
tasmāt padāt tvamapi rajjuriva pravṛttā || 14 ||
mallanāgo '(kāmasūtrakṛd vātsyāyano ') pyāha 'nāgarakavṛttyā varttete —ti (kāmasū. 1.4.1) |
atha 'kṛtapūrvī kaṭam' iti katham? na hyanenā 'pi prayogeṇa bhavitavyam |
kiṃ kāraṇam?
dvitīyayā tāvannotpattavyam |
tat kutaḥ?
ktenā 'bhihitam |
pratyayenāpi notpattavyam |
kiṃ kāraṇam ?
asāmarthyāt | kathamasāmarthyam? sāpekṣamasamarthaṃ bhavatīti |
ucyate— nāyaṃ karmaṇi ktaḥ, apitu bhāve | bhāvasādhanena ca kṛtaśabdena yocyate kriyā tayepsitaṃ kaṭādi karma anabhihitameveti |
tatra yathā 'grāmaṃ gato devadatta' iti dhātu—niṣṭhābhyāmabhidhīyamānayoḥ kriyākartrorgrāmādikarmabhirabhisambandho bhavati, evaṃ kṛtapūrvīti kṛtaśabdena taddhitena vā 'bhidhīyamānayoḥ kriyākartro kaṭādikarmabhirabhisambandho bhavatiḥ tathāhi— kṛtaṃ pūrvamanenetyasminnarthe kṛtapūrvīśabdastaddhitānto vartate; tena ca pūrva kṛtavānityayamarthaḥ saṃpadyate | evaṃ ca sāpekṣatvābhāvānnāstyasāmarthyam | asti ca karotivācyakriyāpekṣaṃ kaṭasya karmatvamiti taddhitadvitīyotpattyornānupapattiḥ | taduktam— (vāpa.vṛtti—67) iti |
avigrahā gatādisthā yathā grāmādikarmabhiḥ |
saṃbadhyate kriyā tada‍‍vat kṛtapūrvyādiṣu sthitā || 15 ||
yadā tu kṛtaḥ pūrvaṃ kaṭo 'neneti vigrahaḥ, tadāpi na doṣaḥ, yato yadyapi kṛtādiśabdāḥ karmaṇi vyutpadyamānāḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyāt kaṭādikarmaviśeṣaṃ nirbhuñjate, tathāpi netthambhūtā eva pratyayamutpādayanti, vṛttīnāṃ viśeṣapratyāyanāsāmarthyāt; ato vṛttiviṣaye 'napekṣitaviśeṣa— karmāntarbhūtakarmasāmānyo 'nya eva kṛtaśabdo bhavati |
avivakṣitakarmāṇo 'ntarbhūtakarmāṇaś‍cā 'karmakā eva jāyante, yathā— tasmād dīkṣito na dadāti na pacati na juhoti iti | evamakarmakatve 'ntarbhāvābhidhāyyeva, taccānapekṣatvāt sāmarthye sati pratyayamutpādayati | pratyayārthaś‍ca karttā kriyayā prakṛtyarthena yadīpsati tat karma anabhihitaṃ pratyayena, tato dvitīyā bhavati | taduktaṃ bhāṣye (2.3.65)— 'yo 'sau kṛtakaṭayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ sa utpanne pratyaye nivarttate; asti ca karoteḥ kaṭena sāmarthyamiti dvitīyā bhaviṣyati kṛtapūrvī kaṭamiṭi' | harirapyāha—
viśeṣakarmasambandhe vinirbhukte kaṭādibhiḥ |
viśeṣanirapekṣo 'nyaḥ kṛtaśabdo 'vakalpate || 16 ||
akarmakatve satyevaṃ ktāntaṃ bhāvābhidhāyi yat |
tena kriyāvatā kartrā yogo bhavati karmaṇām || 17 ||
(vāpa. 3.65—66 vṛttiḥ) iti |
yadi vā śās‍traprakriyābhyāsabādhitamatīnāmevāyamabhimānaḥ vākyārthe vṛttayo bhavantī—ti | paramārthatastu vṛttivākyayoranyatvameva manyante, arthaviprakarṣāt | yathāhi— vākye yaḥ kaṭādisambandhaḥ sa vṛttau nāsti, tasyāntarbhūtakarmaṇaḥ kṛtaśabdasya bhāvābhidhāyitvāt | taduktam— (vāpa.3.64 vṛttiḥ)
viśeṣaḥ śrūyamāṇo 'pi pradhāneṣu guṇeṣu vā |
śabdāntaratvād vākyeṣu vṛttau nityaṃ na vidyate || 18 ||
bhāṣyakāro 'pyāha (2.3.65)— 'nedamubhayaṃ yugapad bhavati vākyaṃ ca pratyayaś‍ca; yadā vākyaṃ na tadā pratyayaḥ, yadā pratyayaḥ sāmānyena tadā vṛttiḥ | tatrā 'vaśyaṃ viśiṣārthinā viśeṣo 'nuprayok‍tavyaḥ 'kṛtapūrvī kaṭami'—ti | evamadhītamanena, adhītaṃ vyākaraṇamanena' iti vā adhītī vyākaraṇe ityapi vyākhyātam |
(3. sambandhitaddhitāḥ (ṣaṣṭhī))
sambandhī dvidhā— pradhānaṃ guṇabhūtaś‍ca |
tayoḥ prathamāntābhidheya pradhānam |
sa tridhā— 1. dravyarūpaḥ, 2. guṇarūpaḥ 3. abhinnarūpaś‍ca | teṣu —
(1. dravyarūpaḥ) 'tasyā 'patyam' (4.1.92) ityādirāśrayavacano dravyarūpaḥ |
sa dvidhā nirapekṣaḥ sāpekṣaś‍ca | tayoḥ —
nirapekṣo yathā— vasiṣṭhasyāpatyaṃ vāsiṣṭhaḥ, pāṇineḥ śiṣyaḥ pāṇinīyaḥ, pañcālānāṃ rājā pāñcālaḥ, pṛthivyā īś‍varaḥ pārthivaḥ, pāṭalāyāḥ puṣpaṃ pāṭalam, jambyāḥ phalaṃ jāmbavam iti |
sāpekṣo yathā— pituḥ pitā pitāmahaḥ piturbhrātā pitṛvyaḥ, māturmātulaḥ, bhrāturapatyaṃ bhrātṛvyaḥ, svasuḥ svastrīyaḥ iti |
(2. guṇarūpaḥ) 'tasyedam' (4.3.120) ityādirāśritavacano guṇavacano guṇarūpaḥ |
sa dvidhā ṣaṣṭhīviśeṣyaḥ aṣaṣṭhīviśeṣyaś‍ca | tayoḥ —
ṣaṣṭhīviśeṣyo yathā— yuṣmākamiyaṃ gauḥ yauṣmākī gauḥ, devadattasya bhūtapūrvo devadattarūpyo rājā, putrasya nimittaṃ putrīyaḥ saṃyogaḥ, vidiśāyā adūrabhavaṃ vaidiśaṃ nagaram, mūrvāyāḥ vikāro maurvaṃ bhasma (4.3.135), dūrvāyā avayavo daurvaḥ kāṇḍaḥ iti |
aṣaṣṭhīviśeṣyo yathā— vatsebhyo hito vatsīyo godhuk (5.1.5), aṅgārebhya imāni aṅgārīyāṇi kāṣṭhāni (5.1.12), śaraṇe sādhu śaraṇyo rājā (4.4.98, 5.3.103), ākarṣe kuśala ākarṣako dhūrttaḥ (5.2.64), puṣpairvittaḥ puṣpacaṇaś‍campakaḥ, (5.2.26), sūryeṇaikadṛk saurī balākā (4.3.112, taisaṃ 5.5.16)
(3. abhinnarūpaś‍ca) prakṛtyaikacchāyo 'bhinnarūpaḥ |
sa dvidhā— liṅgasaṃkhyānugrāhī liṅgasaṃkhyopagrāhī ca | tayoḥ— lugabhidheyo liṅgasaṃkhyānupagrāhī | yathā— gargasyāpatyāni gargāḥ (2.4.64), pañcālasya rājānaḥ pañcālāḥ (4.1.180), atrerapatyāni atrayaḥ (2.4.65), kusumbhyāḥ puṣpaṃ kusumbham, badaryāḥ phalaṃ badaram (3.4.163), lavaṇena saṃsṛṣṭo lavaṇaḥ sūpa iti |
lubabhidheyo liṅgasaṃkhyopagrāhī | yathā— pañcālānāṃ nivāsaḥ pañcālā janapadaḥ (1.2.52, 4.2.8) varaṇāḥ santyasmin varaṇā nagarī (4.2.82), śirīṣāṇāmadūrabhavaḥ śirīṣoḥ1 grāmaḥ (1.2.51),kiñca godaunāma, hradau, tayoradūrabhavo grāmo godau (1.2.52) | harītakyādiṣu punarvyaktimevopagṛh‍ṇāti, na vacanam, harītakyā phalāni harītakyaḥ |
khalatikādiṣu vacanameva na vyaktim— khalatiko nāmādriḥ tasyādūrabhavāni khalatikaṃ vanāni (1.2.51) iti |
nanu ca vasiṣṭhasyāpatyamityādau bhinnādhikaraṇatvād dvayamevāśrayate pitaraṃ putraṃ ca | tathāhi ubhayamapi saṃbandhādabhyadhikaṃ pratīyāte— pituś‍cāmī putrāḥ svamiti, tat kasmāt ekasmādeva ṣaṣṭhī taddhito vā?
ucyate— yadyapyayamubhayādhikaraṇaḥ, tathāpyeka eva, bhede hi nobhayādhikaraṇa ekaḥ syāt, sambandhadvayaprasaṅgāt |
so 'yameko 'nekāśrayaḥ, ekaś‍caiva vibhaktyocyate, ekasmādeva ca taddhitotpattirbhavati |
evamapi pitureva ṣaṣṭhīti niyamo na syāt |
kaḥ punarāha niyama iti, yāvatā mātuḥ pitā mātāmaha ityapi bhavati |
kutaḥ punaridaṃ yadekadā tu svāminaḥ, anyadā tu svasmād vibhaktiḥ taddhito veti?
saṃbandhasya padanyāsātirekāt | niyogato hi pitāputrayorekasya prādhānyamanyasyo— pasarjanatvam, tulyatve sambandhā 'bhāvāt | tatra na pradhānaṃ putrādi guṇānurodhena pravarttitumarhati; upasarjanaṃ tu pitrādi yathā pradhānā 'nugrahastathā ' 'tmanaṃ nirvarttayati, svarūpāvasthitau pradhānārthā 'siddheḥ |
ato 'pradhāne saṃbandhasyādhikaḥ padanyāsaḥ | tatra ṣaṣṭhī taddhitotpattirvā bhavati | sā caikatvāt saṃbandhasya putragatamapyenamabhidhatte | yadā tu mātuḥ pitā mātāmaha iti vivakṣātaḥ prādhānyaviparyayaḥ tadā apatyādyutpannayā ṣaṣṭhyā dviṣṭho 'pyasāvabhihita iti na sā, taddhito vā pitṛśabdāt | taduktam— (vāpa. 3.7.157)
dviṣṭho 'pyasau parārthatvād guṇeṣu vyatiricyate |
tatrābhidhīyamānaśca pradhāne 'pyupayujyate || 19 || iti
1. 'śirīṣā' ityeva bahuvacanāntaḥ pāṭhaḥ sarvatra |
evaṃ 'tenaikadik' (4.3.112), 'tadarthaṃ vikṛteḥ prakṛtau (5.1.12),
'tasya nimittam' (5.1.38), tena vittaś‍cuñcupcaṇapau (5.2.26),
'tsmai hitam' (5.1.5), vapupprakaraṇe 'yuṣmadasmadbhyāṃ chandasi sādṛśya upasaṃkhyānam' (5.2.39 vārtti. kāśikā), ityādiṣu ṣaṣṭhyantā api dviṣṭhatvādekavibhaktivācyatvenāvagantavyāḥ |
nanu ca tṛtīyādīnāṃ vyatirekavibhaktitvāt ṣaṣṭhīvadeva bhavatu sambandhābhidhāna— sāmarthyāt, prathamāyāḥ punaravyatirik‍taprātipadikārthābhidhāyinyāḥ kathamivaitadupapadyate— 'tvamiva tvāvān' ahamiva māvān' iti | atraike varṇayanti—'tvāvataḥ purūravasaḥ', 'yajñaṃ viprasya māvataḥ', 'na tvāvāṁ anyo divyo na pārthivaḥ' (ṛve. 8.46.1, 1.142.2, 7.32.23) iti prathamāntāyāḥ prakṛteḥ pradhānabhūte 'pi saṃbandhini prayogadarśanāt pratyayo 'vagamyate |
anye tvāhuḥ (vāpa. 3, vṛttiḥ, kaiyaṭo helārājādayaḥ)—tvamiva tvāvān, ahamiva māvān ityupamānamatra prathamāntaṃ prakṛtyarthaḥ, upameyaṃ pratyayārthaḥ | na tatra tāvadavacchedakatvādupamānaṃ pradhānam | avacchedakādapyupamānāt ṣaṣṭhī notpadyate, vyatirekahetorasaṃbhavāt; ivaśabdo hyasattvabhūtābhidhāyitvānna vyatirekādhāyakaḥ, sādṛśyadyotako hyasau | anyaś‍ca na kaś‍cidiha vyatirekahetuḥ śrūyate | ataś‍ca gauriva gavaya ityādāvivā 'tra ṣaṣṭhyā abhāvaḥ, vyatirekahetau tu sati ivaśabdaprayoge upamānāt ṣaṣṭhyutpadyate— 'devadattasyeva yajñadattasya dantā' iti | taduktam—
ivaśabdaprayoge tu bāhyāt saṃbandhino vinā |
nādhikyamupamāne 'sti dyotakaḥ sa prayujyate || 20 ||
(vāpa. 3.14.545vṛttiḥ)
mā bhūt ṣaṣṭhī, prathamayā 'pi na bhavitavyameva, upamānasyāvacchedakatvenā— pyādhikyāt/?/kaḥ punarāha—'anadhika eva prātipadikārthe prathame'—ti; pāṭaliputrād rājakaṃ sapta yojanāni, saptasu vā yojaneṣu iti adhvanaḥ prathamā saptamī ca smaryate, saṃbodhane ca prathamaiva vidhīyate; dhik devadattam, hā devadattam iti ca dvitīyāviṣaye prathamāprayogo dṛśyate | yathā— 'hā dhik kaṣṭamaniṣṭamastakarūṇaḥ ko 'yaṃ vidheḥ prakramaḥ' (māmā. 5.24) 'kanyāntaḥpurameva hā praviśati kruddho munirbhārgavaḥ' (mavīca. 2.20) iti |
ṣaṣṭhyantābhidheyo guṇabhūtaḥ|
sa tridhā 1. bhāvaviśiṣṭaḥ, 2. kārakaviśiṣṭaḥ, 3. sambandhiviśiṣṭaś‍ca | teṣu— (1) bhāvenāvacchinno bhāvaviśiṣṭaḥ| sa dvidhā mukhyena upādhinā ca| tayoḥ— mukhyena yathā—kṛṣirasyāstīti kṛṣīvalaḥ (5.2.112), māyāvī (5.2.121) āmayāvī (5.2.122), dayāluḥ (5.2.122), śraddhāluḥ (3.2.158) iti| upādhinā yathā— mṛdaṅgo vādyate iti śilpamasya mārdaṅgikaḥ (4.4.55), apūpāḥ kriyanta iti śilpamasya āpūpikaḥ, māsaṃ brahmacaryamasya bhikṣoḥ māsikaḥ, asti paraloka iti matirasya sādhorāstikaḥ, nāsti narakādikamiti matirasyāsādhoḥ sa nāstikaḥ, diṣṭameva prabhavatīti matirasya jigīṣoḥ daiṣṭika iti|
(2) kārakeṇāvacchinnaḥ kārakaviśiṣṭaḥ|
sa dvidhā— svatantreṇa asvatantreṇa ca| tayoḥ— svatantreṇa yathā— dhanamasyāstīti dhanavān vadānyaḥ (5.2.130), pañcamo 'sya māso jātasya varttate pañcamī bālakaḥ (5.1.16), tārakāḥ sañcātā asya tārakitaṃ nabhaḥ (5.2.36), samayaḥ prāpto 'sya sāmayikaṃ karma (5.1.104), 'ekamanyat karmādhyayane vṛttamasya aikānyikaḥ (4.4.64) iti|
asvatantreṇa yathā— lavaṇaṃ paṇyamasya lāvaṇikaḥ (4.4.52), vāsudeve bhaktirasya vāsudevakaḥ (4.3.98), dhanuḥ praharaṇamasya dhānuṣkaḥ (4.4.57), prasthaḥ parimāṇamasya prāsithakaḥ (5.1.57), salāturo 'syābhijanaḥ sālāturīyaḥ (4.3. 94), grāmo nivāso 'sya gramīṇa (4.2.94) iti|
(3) sambandhinā 'vacchinnaḥ sambandhiviśi|ṣṭaḥ|
sa dvidhā viśeṣyeṇa viśeṣaṇena ca| tayoḥ—
viśeṣyeṇa yathā—apūpā hitā eṣā āpūpikā avantayaḥ (4.4.65), mūlamābarhi eṣāṃ mūlyā māṣāḥ (4.4.88), bṛhatī ādirasya bārhataḥ pragāthaḥ (4.2.55), kālaḥ prakṛṣṭo 'sya kālikamṛṇam (5.1.108), kiñca niśāsambandhādayayanapi niśā| tadasya soḍhaṃ (4.3.52) naiśaḥ, evaṃ prādoṣika (4.3.51) iti|
viśeṣaṇena yathā— indro devatā 'sya aindraṃ haviḥ (4.2.24), saṃśaptakā yoddhāro 'sya sāṃśaptakaḥ saṃgrāmaḥ (4.2.56), vinayaḥ prayojanamasyāṃ vaināyikī vidyā (5.1.171?), devadatto gramaṇīrasya devadattakaḥ saṅghaḥ (5.2.78), pañcāvayavā asyāṃ pañcatayī gatiḥ (5.2.42), pañcasya bhṛtirvasno vā pañcakaḥ padārtha (5.1.56) iti|
nanu ca 'tasyāpatyam' (4.1.92) ityādau upagorapatyam aupagavaḥ iti 'samarthānāṃ prathamād vā' (4.1.82) ityadhikārāt ṣaṣṭhyantā prakṛtirapatyavato guṇabhūtasya vācikā, prathamānta tu pradhānabhūtamapatyaṃ pratyayārtha eva| 'tastedam' (4.3.120) ityādāvapi pradhānaṃ saṃbandhi taddhitavācyamityupapadyate| 'sā 'sya devatā' (4.2.24) ityādau tu indro devatā asya aindraṃ haviriti pūrvoktādevādhikārāt seti prathamāntā prakṛtirindrādidevatāvācikā pradhanam| guṇabhūtastu saṃbandhī puroḍāśādirasyetyanenāpradhanībhūtasaṃbandhi vācakatvena nirdiṣṭaḥ pratyayārthaḥ| tatkathamivāyaṃ viparyastaḥ pradhānaguṇabhāva upapanno bhavati?
ucyate— guṇabhūto 'pi saṃbandhī buddhyantareṇa 'pradhānabhāvāt pracyāvya āsādita— pradhānabhāvaḥ pratyayārthatvena pradarśyate| ata evendro devatā 'syetyetāvāneva vigraho na kāryaḥ; vṛttisamānārthena hi tena bhavitavyam| na caitāvato vṛttisamānārthatā| vṛttau hi indrādidevatāvacchinnaṃ puroḍāśādi avagamyate, vākye tu puroḍāśādyavacchannendrādidevateti|
ayaṃ tu vigraho vṛttyā samānārthaḥ— 'indro devatā asya tadidamindrasvāmya— vacchinnamaindraṃ havi' riti| tadidamuk‍tam—
anantarok‍taḥ saṃbandhī pratipadya pradhānatām| buddhayantaraparāmarśād vācyatāṃ pratipadyate ||21||
prakṛtyarthaviśiṣṭo hi pratyayārtho 'bhidhānabhāk| nyāyaḥ sa, na ma taḥ sāsyetyadhikārasamāśrayāt ||22||
evaṃ 'so 'syādiriticchandasaḥ pragatheṣu' (4.2.55) ityādāvapi guṇabhūtaḥ sambandhī taddhitābhidheyo boddhavyaḥ| yatra tu guṇabhūtaḥ sambandhī pratyayārthaḥ tatra na pradhānam, yatra pradhānaṃ tatra na guṇabhūtaḥ|
kutaḥ punaridaṃ jñāyate?
ācāryapravṛttirjñāpayati—yadayaṃ nivāsa—nivāsavat—saṃbandhe ubhayamāha— 'tasya nivāsaḥ' (4.2.69) 'so 'sya nivāsaḥ' (4.3.89) iti|
nanu ca apatyāpatyavatsaṃbandhe 'pyubhayaṃ saṃbhāvyate— 'mātā apatyamasya mātāmahaḥ, pitā 'patyamasya pitāmaha' iti|
naivam, pituḥ pitā pitāmahaḥ, mātuḥ pitā mātāmaha iti kariṣyate|
tathāpi hṛdayasya bandhanaṃ śrṛṅkhalamasya bandhanaṃ karabhe' (5.2.79) iti katham?
nānyo 'tra bandhanaśabdaḥ saṃbandhavacanaḥ, yathā hi bandhanamityanena dāmocyate|
naivam, bandhanamityanena saṃjñāśabdopāśrayaḥ śrṛṅkhalakaḥ karabhaḥ iti|
evaṃ ca nivāsatadavatorapi śeṣaṣaṣṭhyabhyupagamatve kartṛviśiṣṭamadhikaraṇaṃ vācyam—śibīnāṃ nivāsaḥ śaiba iti (4.2.69), aparatrādhikaraṇaviśiṣṭaḥ karttā— grāme nivāso 'sya so 'yaṃ gra 'yaṃ grāmya iti|
nanu ca grāmaśabdo 'yaṃ samuhavacanaḥ, tad yathā 'aś‍va/stragrāmāvidhau kṛtī sa samareṣvasyāsti tulyaḥ pumān' 'na ruṇatsīndriyagramam' iti|
kiñcātaḥ?
samūhaś‍ca samūhyapekṣaḥ iti sāpekṣatvādasāmarthye taddhitotpattirna bhavati|
nāpi sāmānyena samūhād bhaviṣyatīti vacyam, tāvatyevārthe tasyāparisamāpye— rduradhigamābhidhāne ca sāmarthyābhāvāt|
na ca yathā devadattasya mātuḥ pitā mātāmaho devadattasya, viṣṇumitrasya guroḥ kulaṃ gurukulaṃ viṣṇumitrasyeti sāpekṣasyāpi taddhitaḥ samāso vā bhavati, evamasyāpi bhaviṣyatīti vācyam, na hyayaṃ saṃbandhiśabdaḥ| sambandhiśabdānāmeva ca sāpekṣaṇāṃ vṛttayo bhavanti| yadāha— (vāpa. 3.14.47 vṛttiḥ)
saṃbandhiśabdaḥ sāpekṣo nityaṃ sarvaḥ pravarttate| svārthavat sā vyapekṣā 'sya vṛttāvapi na hīyate ||23||
anyeṣāṃ tu viśeṣaṇānāṃ na vṛtti, vṛttanāṃ vā na viśeṣaṇamityeva| na hi bhavati ṛddhasya rājñaḥ purūṣa ṛddharājapurūṣa iti, nāpi brāhmaṇānāṃ gramo nivāso 'sya brahyaṇānāṃ gramāyo 'yamiti| (mabhā. 2.1.1)|
kathaṃ tarhi (mabhā. 2.1.1) rājñaḥ purūṣaḥ śobhano rājapurūṣa iti?
bhavati vai pradhānasya sāpekṣasyāpi vṛttiḥ|
kathaṃ tarhi grāmo nivāso 'syoti gramasya viśeṣyatvāt prādhānye sāpekṣasyāpi vṛttirna bhavati?
anantaroktanyāyenātra ṣaṣṭhayarthasya prādhānyāt|
nanvayamapi saṃbandhiśabdaḥ kasmānna bhavati?
samūhārthamātra eva vṛttyaparisamāpteḥ|
tarhi na bhavitavyameva grāmaśabdānnivāsa—nivāsavatsambandhe taddhitena? na bhavitavyam, yathā avyutpannajanasamūhārthako 'yamupacāravṛttyā bhavati|
dṛśyate ca tātsthāt tadavadupacāraḥ, yathā mañcāḥ krośantīti|
yadi vā gramaśabdo 'yaṃ bahvarthaḥ(mabhā. 1.1.7), yathā— asti śalāsamudāye grāmo dagdha iti; janapada(jana)samudāye grāma āgata iti| asti vāṭaparikṣepe gramaṃ praviṣṭa iti, asti sāraṇyake sasīmake saṃsthiṇḍilake ca bhūpradeśe gramo labdha iti, asti avyutpannajanasamūhāspade 'śūdrakarṣakaprāye janapadaṃ niveśayet, tatra aṣṭaśatagramamadhye pradhānaṃ sthāpanīyam, sa nāgarāṇāṃ nivāso nagaramiti| tatrā 'vyutpannajanasamūhāspade yo gramaśabdo varttate tato bhāvitavyaṃ taddhitena— gramo nivāso 'syeti so 'yaṃ grāmyo grāmīṇa iti||
(4. svārthābhidhāyino 'dhātupratyayāḥ)
atha svārthikāḥ| te 'pi dvidhā— 1. asattvabhūtārthāḥ, 2. sattvabhūtārthāś‍ca| ubhaye 'pi pratyekaṃ ṣọdhā— 1. vācakāḥ, 2. dyotakāḥ, 3. viśeṣakāḥ, 4. sahābhidhāyakāḥ, 5. sārthakāḥ, 6. nirarthakāś‍ceti| tatra—
(1. asattvabhūtārtheḥ svārthikāḥ)
1. asattvabhūtārtheṣu śaktimātrābhidhāyino vācakāḥ| yathā— tata āgataḥ, tatra vasati, purastādākataḥ, purastād vasati, devatrā gacchati, manuṣyatrā tiṣṭhati iti|
2. padārthagata—kutsā—praśaṃsādyabhivyañjakā dyotakāḥ| yathā— kutsitaṃ pacati pacataki, praśastaṃ pacati pacatirūpam īṣadasamāptaṃ pacati pacatikalpam, prakṛṣṭaṃ pacati pacātitarām evaṃ nitarām, atīvatarām iti|
3. vācakatve dyotakatve vā maṅgalavīpsādyadhikārthābhidhāyino viśeṣakāḥ| yathā— bahubhyo dehi bahuśo dehīti, alpaṃ dehi alpaśo dehīti, dvābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ dehi dviśo dehi, māṣaṃ māṣaṃ dehi māṣaśo dāhi | evaṃ kasmin kāle kadā kena prakāreṇa kathamiti|
4. anuprayogādyapekṣiṇaḥ sahābhidhāyakāḥ | yathā— anagniragniḥ saṃpadyate agnisātsaṃpadyate, devāya deyaṃ karoti devatrākaroti | evaṃ taṃ bhavantaṃ tato bhavantam, etena dīrghāyuṣā, atra dīrghāyuṣā, asmai āyuṣmate ihāyuṣmate, kasya devānāṃ priyasya, kva devānāṃ priyasya iti |
5. gatisaṃjñādikāryanimittabhūtāḥ sārthakāḥ | yathā— śuklīkṛtya, paṭapaṭāyate, dvedhākāram, abhito grāmam, vinā devadattena, dakṣiṇāhi grāmādi(2.3.29)ti |
6. śabdopacayādimātrahetavo nirarthakāḥ | yathā— urasi pratyeva pratyurasam, ātmanyadhyeva adhyātmam, girimanveva anugiram, uccaireva uccakaiḥ, tvayaiva tvayakā, asmābhirevāsmākābhiḥ iti | evamanye 'pi— devāḥ arjunato 'bhavan, pūrvato grāmasya, grāmaṃ pūrveṇa, purastād ramaṇīyam, aikadhyaṃ karoti, pañcakṛtvaḥ pacati, ityādayaḥ asattvabhūtārthāḥ svārthikeṣu yathāyogamavagantavyāḥ |
anye tu vatimapi śaktyabhidhāyiṣu viśeṣakasvārthikeṣu varṇayanti | yathā—rājñeva vyavahṛtamanena rājavat, devamiva bhavantaṃ paśyāmi devavadityudāhṛtaṃ purastāt | evaṃ ca sūtraṃ vyācakṣate— 'tena tulyam' ityetasminnarthe vatirthavati, yat tattulyaṃ kriyā cet sā bhavati | kriyetyenena kriyānimittabhūtāḥ śaktaya ucyante |
na caitad vācyam— 'evaṃ sati kriyā na saṃgṛhītā bhavati' yataḥ kriyāpi kārakameva | yathocyate— (vākyapadīye kriyāsamuddeśe 8.37—39)—
kriyāmanye tu manyanta kvacidapyanapāśritām |
sādhanaikārthabhāvitve pravṛttimanapāyinīm || 24 ||
sāmānyabhūtā sā pūrvaṃ dhātvarthaiḥ pravibhajyate |
tato vyāpārarūpeṇa sādhye ca vyavatiṣṭhate || 25 ||
prakṛtiḥ sādhanānāṃ sā prathamaṃ tacca kārakam |
śaktirekādhikaraṇe srotovadupakarṣati || 26 ||
apūrvaṃ, kālaśaktiṃ vā, kriyāṃ vā, kālameva vā |
tamevaṃlakṣaṇaṃ bhāvaṃ kecidāhuḥ kathaṃcana || 27 || iti |
'tatra tasyeve'—tyasya ca prayojanamupanyastaṃ purastād dravyaguṇayostulyayoḥ pratyayo na labhyate iti |
nanvevaṃ sati 'devadatta iva sthūlaḥ, yajñadatta iva gomān' ityatra pratyayo na prāpnoti saptamīṣaṣṭh‍yantatvayorabhāvāt |
atrāpi kriyāgrahaṇād bhaviṣyati |
kathaṃ punaḥ kriyāśabdena guṇa ucyate?
kriyāpūrvakatvāt | sthūlaguṇayogāddhi sthūlo bhavati, gosaṃbandhācca gomāniti |
nanvevaṃ sati kriyāgrahaṇamapi na karttavyam | pravarttatāmaviśeṣeṇaiva tena ityetasminnarthe vatiḥ 'tatra tasyeva' ityanena ca nārthaḥ sūtrā ' 'rambheṇa | tadarhamityetadapi upamānānna vyatiricyate, yaddhi rājānamarhati tad rājasadṛśameva bhavati | evaṃ ca 'tena tulyami'tyevāvatiṣṭhate | tathā cāha candragomī (cāndravyā. 4.1.135)— 'ive vatiḥ' iti | nanvevaṃ sati gauriva gavaya ityatrāpi vatiḥ prāpnoti |
naivam, upamāyāṃ vatiḥ, nopamāne |
yadyapi vatiśabdenobhayamapi dyotyate tathāpyadanyadevaupamyam, anyedavopamānam | bhūyo 'vayavasādṛśyasya yogo hyupamā; yathā candra iva mukham | sadṛśāt sadṛśapratipattirupamānam, yathā gauriva gavaya iti ||
(2. sattvabhūtārthāḥ svārthikāḥ)
1. sattvabhūtārthabhedeṣu liṅgaviśeṣādyabhidhāyino vācakāḥ | yathā— deva eva devatā (5.4.27), devataiva daivatam (5.4.38), upādhireva aupadheyam (5.1.13), bhāga eva bhāgadheyam (5.4.25 vā), 'upāya evaupayikam' (5.4.34 vā), catvāra eva varṇāś‍cāturvarṇyam (7.3.31)|
2. kutsāpraśaṃsādyabhivyañjakā dyotakāḥ | yathā— kutsito vaiyākaraṇo vaiyākaraṇapāśaḥ (5.3.47), praśastā mṛt mṛtsnā (5.4.40), tanuḥ ukṣā ukṣataraḥ (5.3.91), laghuḥ kuṭī kuṭīraḥ (5.3.88), īṣadasamāpta ạ̄dh‍ya ạ̄dh‍yakalpaḥ (5.3.67), bhūtapūrvo rājā rājacaraḥ (5.3.53) iti |
3. vācakatve dyotakatve vā vyāhṛtatvādyarthaviśeṣavyaktihetavo viśeṣakāḥ | yathā— vyāhṛtārthā vāgeva vācikam' (5.4.35), upadeśarūpaṃ karmaiva kārmaṇam (5.4.36), asahāya eka evaikākī (5.3.52), aś‍va ivāyamaś‍vakaḥ (5.3.96), kuśāgramiva kuśāgrīyā buddhiḥ (5.3.105), śileva śaileyaṃ dadhi (5.3.102) iti |
4. prakṛtiviśeṣebhyo nityamupajāyamānāḥ sahābhidhāyikāḥ | yathā— karīṣagandherapatyaṃ kārīṣagandhyā (4.1.74), abhijito 'patyamābhijityaḥ (5.3.118),
kuñjasyā 'patyaṃ kauñjāyanyaḥ (5.3.113), parasparaṃ vividha ākrośo vyāvakrośī (vyākrośī), samantād rāvaḥ sāṃrāviṇam, rājñāmāyattaṃ rājādhīnam (5.4.7) iti |
5. 'lupi yuktavad vyaktivacane' (1.2.51), iti kāryārthāḥ sārthakāḥ | yathā— cañcā ramaṇī iyam, vardhikā darśanīyaḥ, vāsudevaḥ pratimā, baladevaś‍citram, devapatha ākāśarekhā, haṃsapathaḥ krauñcam (1.2.52), vardhikā darśanīyaḥ (5.3.98), vāsudevaḥ pratimā (5.3.99), baladevaś‍citram (5.3.100), haṃsapathaḥ kauñcam (5.3.100) iti |
6. śabdopacayādihetavo nirarthakāḥ | yathā—prajña eva prājñaḥ (5.4.38), vinaya eva vainayikaḥ (5.4.34), mṛdeva mṛttikā (5.4.39) sūra eva sūryaḥ (5.4.25), nāmaiva nāmadheyam (5.4.54/55), devānāṃ rājaiva devarājaḥ (5.4.38) iti | evaṃ kataraḥ (5.3.92), katamaḥ (5.3.93), paṭutaraḥ paṭutamaḥ (5.3.58), paṭiṣṭhaḥ (5.3.55), paṭīyān (5.3.57) ityādayo 'pi sattvabhūtāḥ svārthāḥ svārthikeṣu yathāyogamavagantavyāḥ |
kiṃ punaramī padaprakṛtayaḥ prātipadikaprakṛtayo vā?
kutaste saṃśayaḥ?
ubhayathopalambhāt | tathā hyeṣāṃ 'yuṣmakābhiḥ, kadā, tarhītyādau prātipadikaprakṛtitvam; bhindhaki, tvayaki, mayakītyādau padaprakṛtitvamupalabhyate | tataś‍ca yāvakaḥ aś‍vakaḥ, uccakairityādau saṃdehaḥ |
na sandehaḥ, svārthadravyaliṅgasaṃkhyāśaktimātrābhidhānena prātipadikāt svārthādi— nimittakutsāpraśaṃsā 'nukampātiśayāparisamāptiyādyadhikārthadyotanena padādeva svārthiko— tpattirbhavatīti | svārthādyabhidhānena hi parisamāptārthaṃ padaṃ svārthāṃdinimittakaiḥ kutsādibhiḥ sambandhamutsahate | tadāha— (vāpa. 3. 14. 1)
kutsāpraśaṃsātiśayaiḥ samāptārthaṃ tu yujyate |
padaṃ svārthādayaḥ sarve yasmāt kutsādihetavaḥ || 28 ||
yadyapi svārthādyanyatamanibandhanāḥ kvacit kutsādayo bhaveyuḥ, tathāpi tatsākalyārthaṃ padādeva kādaya utpādyāḥ tatra—
anyatamanibandhanāḥ kutsādayo yathā—
kiṃ dvāri daivahatike ! sahakārakeṇa saṃvardhitena viṣavṛkṣaka eṣa pāpaḥ |
yasmin manāgapi vikāsavikārabhāji bhīmā bhavanti madanajvarasannipātāḥ || 29 ||
atra hi daivahataśabdena labdhāyāṃ nītyupādhau (5.3.77) sarvathaivānukampyamānatāyām, sahakārasaṃvardhananibandhanatvamevāsyāḥ kapā dyotyate— evaṃ nāma tvaṃ daivopahatāsi, yatsahakāracchadmānaṃ viṣapādapaṃ dvāri saṃvardhayasi iti | viṣapādapaśabdena labdhāyāṃ sahakārasya sarvathaiva kutsāyāṃ pādapavikāsakāle kāmināmasahyasmarajvarasannipātahetukatvamevāsyāḥ kapratyayena pratyāyyate | taduktam—(vāpa. 3.14.4—5)
kutsitatvena kutsyo vā na samyag vā vikutsitaḥ |
svaśabdābhihite kena viśiṣṭo 'rthaḥ pratīyate || 30 ||
na ca sāmpratikī kutsā śabdā 'bhede pratīyate || 31 || (śabdabheda)
pūjyate kutsitatve 'pi praśastatve 'pi kutsyate || 32 ||
iyamekaiva kārikā tadyathā—
eka iha jīvaloke jīvatirūpaṃ nṛrūpapaśurūpaḥ |
yaḥ premapāśapāśe mṛga iva na mṛgīdṛśāṃ patati || 33 ||
svārthādisākalyanibandhanāḥ kutsānukampātiśayapraśaṃsādayo yathā— kutsikutsitakaḥ, anukampitakaḥ, prakṛṣṭataraḥ, praśasyarūpa iti | atra hi— (vāpa. 3.14.2—3)
devadattādikutsāyāṃ varttate kutsitaśrutiḥ |
kutsitasthā tu yā kutsā tadarthe 'ko' vidhīyate || 34 ||
prakṛṣṭa iti śuklādiprakarṣasyābhidhāyakaḥ |
prakṛṣṭasya prakarṣe tu tarabādirvidhīyate || 35 ||
evamanukampāpraśaṃsayorapi vācyamiti |
'anuka—abhika—abhīkaḥ kamitā' (5.2.74) ityatrā 'nukāmayate 'sāvityanukaḥ, abhikāmayate 'sāvityabhikaḥ, abhīko veti vṛttisamānārthavākyakalpanāyāṃ dhātoḥ pūrvamupasargeṇa sambandhaḥ, sādhanena vā?
kiṃcātaḥ?
yadyupasargeṇa, prakṛtyartho vak‍tavyaḥ anukāmayate, abhikāmayata ityarthe
pratyayasyaivotpādāt | atha sādhanena, paś‍cādupasargayogo na ghaṭate | na hyasattvavacanā anvādayaḥ (pama. 3.1.12) sattvabhūtārthavacanaiḥ sambandhamutsahante |
yathecchasi tathā 'stu |
astu tāvat kameḥ prathamamupasargeṇaiva sambṛndhaḥ |
nanu cokttaṃ prakṛtyartho vak‍tavya iti |
sa nāsti pṛthak, pratyayārthaviśeṣaṇabhūtasyaivānvādeḥ prakṛtibhāvāt | yathā 'bhṛśādibhyo bhuvyacveḥ' (3.1.12) ityatra manasvī suṣṭhu bhavati sumanāyate, durmanāyate, abhimanāyate iti sudurabhīnāṃ pratyayārthasya bhavane viśeṣaṇatve 'pi prakṛtibhāvaḥ |
nanu asumanāḥ sumanā bhavatīti prakṛtyarthaviśeṣaṇatvamapi sudurabhīnāṃ kasmānna bhavati?
tathā sati svamanāyata, duramanāyata ityaḍāgamaḥ svādīnāṃ pūrvataḥ prāpnoti; yathā asaṅgrāmayateti | tatra saṅgrāmayateḥ sopasargasyaiva curādiṣu pāṭha iti cet, ihāpi ca tat samānam; bhṛśādiṣu hi sumanas, durmanas, abhimanas iti prakṛtayaḥ paṭhyante |
yadyevam anvarudhyatetivat sa bhaviṣyati | naivam—
naivam, yadyapi 'ano rudha kāme' iti divādiṣu paṭhyate, tathāpi yathā arudhyateti dṛśyate | naivam amanāyateti | tarhipratyayārtha viśeṣaṇapakṣe, yathā śyena ivācarati śyenāyate ityatra āṅaḥ prayoga uktārthatvānna bhavati, evaṃ sumanāyata ityādau svādīnāmapi na bhavet | naivam tatra hi āṅartha eva pratyayārthaviśeṣaṇam, iha tu tatra svādīnāmarthāḥ | tataś‍ca manāyata ityuk‍te na jñāyate suṣṭhu, duṣṭhu abhi vā manasvī bhavatīti svādayaḥ prayujyante; yathā— 'pucchabhāṇḍacīvarāṇṇiṅ' (3.1.20) ityatra 'pucchādudasane vyasane paryasane ca' iti pucchamudasyatyutpucchayate paryasyati paripucchayate iti, evamanukāmayate anukaḥ, abhikāmayate 'bhikaḥ, abhīko veti |
astu vā kameḥ pūrvaṃ sādhanena saṃbandhaḥ |
nanu coktam paś‍cādupasargayogo na ghaṭate iti | nipātā anvādayo bhaviṣyanti—anurūpaḥ kamitā anukaḥ, abhirūpaḥ abhikaḥ, abhīko veti | tathāpi
anuko 'nukamitā, abhiko 'bhikamitā iti vak‍tavyaṃ syāt yathā 'utka unmanā' iti |
naivam, sāmānyenāpi viśeṣābhidhānaṃ dṛśyate; tad‌yathā— 'gamlṛ sṛplṛ gatau' ityatra hi gacchatīti gauḥ, sarpatīti sarpa iti gamanasarpaṇayoryadyapi mahān viśeṣaḥ, tathāpi gatāvityaviśeṣeṇa nirdiśyate | etena 'nate nāsikāyāḥ saṃjñāyāṃ ṭīṭañnāṭajbhraṭaca'
(5.2.31) ityādyapi vyākhyātam; atra hi nāsikāyā avaṭīṭanam, avanamanam, avabhraṃśa iti nativiśeṃṣā nate ityanena sāmānyaśabdenaivābhidhīyante iti |
upasargato vā na doṣaḥ | anurūpaṃ kāmayate, abhirūpaṃ kāmayate iti kriyābhāgamātreṇaiva sambandhādanvādayaḥ pratyayārthaṃ viśiṃṣantaḥ prakṛtibhāvaṃ lapsyante; yathā sumanāyate, vipucchayate iti | viṣama upanyāsaḥ | tatra hi manaḥpucchādikāyāḥ prakṛteḥ śravaṇaṃ vidyate; iha tu tad‍gandho 'pi nāsti, yataḥ paraḥ pratyaya utpadyate |
naivam, iyān, iyat, adhunā, ityādāvapi prakṛteraśravaṇāt tatra pratyayanimittā prakṛternirvṛttiḥ iti cet, ihāpi nipātananimittā bhaviṣyati |
kaś‍caivamāha prakṛteḥ para eva pratyayo bhavatīti ? avyayasarvanāmāmakac prākṭeḥ' (5.3.71) 'vibhāṣā supo bahuc purastāt tu' (5.3.68) pūrvasya samāsāntāś‍ca sarve ṭajādayo bhavanti | ati ca, prakṛtiḥ pratyaya iti rūpasiddhimātrametat | idaṃ tvarthavattvam ayaṃ śabdo 'sminnarthe sādhurbhavatīti | sa ca
k‍vacidevamucyate 'anukābhikābhīkakamitā' iti;
k‍vacid vā 'nate nāsikāyāḥ saṃjñāyāṃ ṭīṭañnāṭajbhraṭac' (5.2.31) iti;
k‍vacidutkarṣaḥ anupadyanveṣṭā (5.2.90) iti;
k‍vacit 'śrotriyaṃśchando 'dhīte' (5.2.84) 'kṣetriyac parakṣetre cikitsya (5.2.9) iti;
k‍vacid 'upādhibhyāṃ tyakannāsannārūḍhayoḥ' (5.2.34) 'akābūtilomābhaṅgābhyo rajāsi kaṭac' (5.2.29 vā);
k‍vacid 'aveḥ saṃghāte kaṭac (5.2.29 vā), dugdhe soḍhadūsamarīsaca (4.2.36vā) iti;
k‍vacit paśunābhyaḥ sthāne goṣṭhac (5.2.29 vā), dvitve goyugac (5.2.29 vā), 'ṣaṭtve ṣaḍgac' (5.2.29 vā), iti;
k‍vacid 'bhavane kṣetre śākaṭaśākinau' (5.2.29 vā.), s‍nehe tailac' (5.2.29 vā.);
k‍vacid 'niṣphalatilāt piñjapejau' (4.2.36 vā. 4.2.89), 'vāco vyāhṛtārthāyāṃ ṭhak' (5.4.35), iti;
k‍vacid rụ̄dhito 'rthamanirdiśyaiva 'veḥ śālacchaṅkaṭacau (5.2.28), 'saṃprodaś‍ca kaṭac' (5.2.29), 'avān kuṭāracca' (5.2.30), 'nerbiḍaj—birīsacau' (5.2.32), 'inacpiṭāccikaci ca' (5.2.33), kacikādeśaś‍ca iti |
nanu ca dhātuḥ prathamaṃ sādhanena sambadhyate, paś‍cādupasargeṇa |
tatkathamucyate ?
yathecchasi tathāstu | viśeṣyaṃ hi pūrvasiddhaṃ viśeṣaṇasambandhamanubhavati | viśeṣyaś‍ca dhātvarthaḥ, kriyārūpa upasargāṇām | uktaṃ ca 'kriyāvacano dhātuḥ' (mabhā 1.3.1) iti | kriyā ca sādhyamucyate, sādhyaṃ ca sādhanasambandhamantareṇa na syāt | taduktam —
prayogarheṣu siddhaḥ san bhettavyo 'rthe viśiṣyate |
prāk tu sādhanasambandhāt kriyā naivopajāyate || 36 || (vāpa. 2.183) iti |
tanna, bhāvisambandhatogyatā samāśrayaṇāt | idaṃcāvaśyamupagantavyam, anyathā hi kriyāvacano dhāturarityapi na syāt | na ca 'dhātoḥ karmaṇaḥ samānakartṛkādicchāyāṃ vā' (3.1.7) iti sana utpattiḥ | tadāha—
