dhātoḥ sādhanayogasya bhāvinaḥ prakramād yathā |
dhātutvaṃ karmabhāvaś‍ca tathānyadapi dṛśyatām || 37 || (vāpa. 2.184)
yadi ca dhātoḥ pūrvamupasargeṇa sambandho na syāt kathāmucyate 'viparābhyāṃ jeḥ' (1.3.19), adhiśīṅsthāsāṃ karma (1.4.46) iti ?
nanu pūrvamupasargasaṃbandhaḥ k‍vopayujyate ? sādhanamantareṇa tadviśeṣānabhivyakteḥ | naivam | phalakāle bījasaṃskārasyeva tasyopayogāt | taduktam
bījakāleṣu saṃbaddhā yathā lākṣārasādayaḥ |
varṇādipariṇāmena phalānāmupakurvate || 38 || (vāpa. 2.185)
buddhisthādabhisambandhāt tathā dhātūpasargayoḥ |
abhyantarīkṛto bhedaḥ padakāle prakāśate || 39 || (vāpa. 2.186)
aḍādīnāṃ vyavasthārtha pṛthaktvena prakalpanam |
dhātūpasargayoḥ śāstre, dhātureva hi tādṛśaḥ || 40 || (vāpa. 2.180)
kriyāviśeṣāḥ saṃghātaiḥ prakramyante k‍vacit tayoḥ |
tathāhi saṃgrāmayateḥ sopasargādaṭo vidhicha || 42 || (vāpa. 2.181)
ataḥ anukāmayata ityādau dhātoḥ prathamamupasargeṇa sādhanena vā sambandhe na doṣaḥ iti |
upasargaṇāṃ kriyāviśeṣaṇatve tratī gatiḥ—
(1) vācakatvaṃ, (2) dyotakatvam (3) sahābhidhāyakatvañca | yathocyate—
sa vācako viśeṣāṇāṃ saṃbhavād dyotako 'pi vā |
śaktyādhānāya dhātorvā sahakārī prayujayate || 42 || vāpa. 2.189 tatra—
yadā vācakatvaṃ tadā dhātoḥ prathamamupasargeṇa saṃbandhaḥ| yathā— pratiṣṭhate,
nirākaroti iti | yadā dyotakatvaṃ tadā sādhanena | yathā— prapacati, nikarṣati iti | yadā sahābhidhāyakatvaṃ tadā dhātūpasargayostulyakālaṃ sādhanena saṃbandhaḥ | yathā— 'adhīte', 'adhyeti' iti | taduk‍tam—
sthādibhiḥ kevalairyatra gamanādi na gamyate |
tatrānumānād dvividhāt tad‍dharmā prādirūcyate || 43 || (vāpa. 2.187)
k‍vacit saṃbhavino bhedāḥ kevalairabhidarśitāḥ |
upasargeṇa sambandhe vyajyante praparādinā || 44 || (vāpa. 2.189)
yadābhidhānasāmarthyaṃ dhātornaikākinastadā |
dhātūpasargau saṃbhūya samarthāvarthamāhatuḥ || 45 || (vāpa. 2.190 vṛttiḥ)
nanu ca prathamataḥ sādhanasambandhe prapacatītyatra prakṛṣṭaḥ pacatīti syāt, na tu prakṛṣṭaṃ pacatīti ?
tanna, sādhu pacatītyādāvapi samānadoṣatvāt | kriyāmātreṇaiva sambandha iti ced ihāpi sa evārthaḥ |
kathañca prādayaś‍cādivadasattvavacanāḥ kriyāviśeṣakāḥ karttṛviśeṣaṇaṃ bhaveyuḥ?
upasargāḥ kriyāyoga (1.4.59) iti vacanāt |
kathaṃ punarasattvavacanāś‍cādayo bhavanti ?
ucyate—
teṣāmuccāvacārthatvāt sarvasaṃbandhadarśanāt |
anyatantratayod‍bhūterasattvārthatvamucyate || 46 ||
atha kimamī vācakā uta dyotakā iti ?
tatraike varṇayanti—
tatprayogā 'vaseyatvād vācyasteṣāṃ sa gamyate |
samuccayādirarthātmā yathā 'nyeṣāṃ gavādikaḥ || 47 ||
anye tvāhuḥ—
ṣaṣṭhyabhāvādasattvok‍terekānuk‍teḥ parasthiteḥ |
guṇabhāvāt smṛteś‍caiṣāṃ dyotakatvaṃ suniś‍citam || 48 ||
tadetadagrataḥ prātipadikārthanirṇaye niś‍ceṣyata iti neha pratanyate |
(3. samāsarūpaṃ vibhak‍tāvayavam)
atha pṛthagarthānāmekārthībhāvaḥ samāsaḥ |
sa tridhā— 1. prākṛtaḥ, 2 vaikṛtaḥ 3. śeṣaś‍ca | teṣu—
(1. prākṛtaḥ)
samastapadānāmavyayībhāvādisaṃjñānimittaṃ pūrvapadapradhānādikā prakṛtiḥ; tatra bhavaḥ prākṛtaḥ | sa caturdhā— (1) avyayībhāvaḥ, (2) tatpurūṣaḥ, (3) bahuvrīhiḥ, (4) dvandva iti | teṣu—
(1. avyayībhāvaḥ)
pūrvapadā(rtha)pradhāno 'vyayībhāvaḥ |
sa tridhā— avyayānām, anavyayānām, karmapravacanīyānāṃ ca | tatra—
avyayanāṃ yathā— 'adhis‍tri' (2.1.6), upakumbham (2.1.6), 1atitaisṛkam (2.1.6), 2sakikhi (2.1.6), yāvadamatram (2.1.8), bahirgrāmam (2.1.12) iti |
anavyayānāṃ yathā— agrevaṇam (8.4.4), madhyandinam, caturddaśa, dvimuni (2.1.19), pāregaṅa‍gam (2.1.18), madhyesamudram (2.1.18) iti |
karmapravacanīyānāṃ yathā— apa—trigarttam (2.1.12), āprapadam, āpaṭaliputram (2.1.13), anuvanam (2.1.15), anugaṅgam (2.1.16) iti |
(2. tatpurūṣaḥ)
uttarapadārthapradhānastatpuruṣaḥ |
so 'pi tridhā— vyadhikaraṇaḥ, samānādhikaraṇaḥ, dviguś‍ceti | tatra —
vyadhikaraṇo yathā— rājapurūṣaḥ kaṣṭaśritaḥ, śaṅkulākhaṇḍaḥ, dhānyārthaḥ, yūpadāru, vṛkabhayam, kumbhīpākaḥ (2.1.41), iti,
samānādhikaraṇo yathā— nīlotpalam, ekapurūṣaḥ, kevalānnam (2.1.49), pālakulālaḥ (2.1.54), abrāhmaṇaḥ, īṣatkaḍāra iti |
dviguḥ dviguryathā— dvaimāturaḥ, pāñcanāpitiḥ, pañcagavadhanaḥ, trilokaharmyam, pañcapūlī (2.4.17), catuḥpātram iti |
1. tisṛkā, grāmaviśeṣaḥ, taisṛkaṃ tatra bhavam ācchādanam, tac‍ca kālaviśeṣa eva bhogyaṃ bhavati śaitye vā grīṣme vā | yac‍ca sārvakālaṃ tadatikrāntamityatitaisṛkam (kāśikā 2.1.6) | 2. sakikhi, kikhī apacitaparimāṇaḥ śrṛgālaḥ — padamañjarī | sadṛśaḥ kikhyeti sakikhiḥ |
(3. bahuvrīhiḥ)
anyapadārthapradhāno bahuvrīhiḥ |
sa tridhā— pradhānasambandhyarthaḥ, apradhānasambandhyarthaḥ, kārakārthaś‍ceti | teṣu —
pradhānasambandhyartho yathā— dakṣiṇasyāś‍ca pūrvasyāś‍ca diśoryadantarālaṃ sā dakṣiṇapūrvā (2.2.26) | evaṃ dakṣiṇāparā, sahāg‍ninā varttate sāg‍niḥ, savaṃśaputraḥ, keśeṣu keśeṣu guhītvedaṃ yuddhaṃ pravarttate keśākeśi (3.3.19), daṇḍaiś‍ca daṇḍaiś‍ca prahṛtya daṇḍādaṇḍi | prathamāntamiha pradhānamanyapadārthaḥ |
apradhānasambandhyartho yathā— citrā gāvo 'sya citraguḥ, ardhaṃ tṛtīyameṣāmardhatṛtīyāḥ, avidyamānā bhāryā asya abhāryaḥ (2.2.24), uṣṭrasyeva mukhamasya uṣṭramukhaḥ (2.2.24) kaṇṭhe sthitāḥ kālā asya kaṇṭhekālaḥ (2.2.24), keśasaṃhāraḥ cuḍā asya keśacuḍaḥ (2.2.24) iti | ṣaṣṭhyantamihāpradhānamanyapadārthaḥ |
kārakārtho yathā— ārụ̄dho vānaro yaṃ sa ārūḍhavānaro vṛkṣaḥ (2.1.6), ụ̄dho ratho yena sa ūḍharatho 'naḍvān (2.2.24) | evaṃ kṣuṇṇabrīhi musalam, upahṛtapaśū rudraḥ (2.2.24), ud‍dhṛtaudanā sthālī (2.2.24), mattabahumātaṅga vanam iti | atra dvitīyādivācyaṃ karmādikārakaṃ samāsārthaḥ |
(4. dvindvaḥ)
ubhayapadārthapradhāno dvandva |
sa tridhā— itaretaraviṣayaḥ. samāhāraviṣayaḥ, ubhayaviṣayaś‍ca | tatra —
bhedavivakṣāyām itaretarayogaḥ | yathā— dhavakhadirau, mātāpitarau, dadhipayasī, śivavaiśravaṇau (2.4.14), go 'ś‍vau (2.4.11), daśeme mārdaṅgikapāṇavikāḥ (2.4.15) iti |
abhedavivakṣāyāṃ samāhāraḥ | yathā— pāṇipādam (2.4.2), rathikāś‍vāroham (2.4.2), takṣā 'yaskāram (2.4.10), gavāś‍vam (2.4.11), pratyaṣṭhāt kaṭhakauthumam (ma.bhā. 2.4.3), udagāt kaṭhakālāpam (mabhā. 2.4.3) iti |
vibhāṣitaikavad‍bhāva ubhayaviṣayaḥ | yathā— aś‍vabaḍabau, aś‍vabaḍabam (2.4.12), haṃsacakravākāḥ, haṃsacakravākam (mabhā. 2.4.12)| dhavakhadirapalāśā dhavakhadirapalāśam (2.2.29) iti ||
(2. vaikṛtaḥ)
prakṛteranyathātvaṃ vikṛtiḥ, tatra bhavo vaikṛtaḥ |
so 'pi caturdhā— (1) prādhānyaviparītaḥ, (2) sāmarthyaviparītaḥ, (3) vākyādhikārārthaḥ, (4) arthāntaragāmī ca | teṣu —
(1. prādhānyaviparītaḥ)
pradhānyaviparyayas‍tridhā— pūrvapadārthaprādhānyaviparyayaḥ, uttarapadārthaprādhānyaviparyayaḥ, anyapadārthaprādhānyaviparyayaś‍ceti | tatra—
pūrvapadārthaprādhānyaviparyayo 'vyayībhāvo yathā— śākaprati (2.1.9), akṣapari (2.1.10), tiṣṭhadgu (2.1.17), unmattagaṅgam (2.1.21), pañcanadam (2.1.20pā.), saptagodāvaram (2.1.20 pā.) iti |
uttarapadārthaprādhānyaviparyayastatpuruṣo yathā— rājadantaḥ (2.2.31), pūrvakāyaḥ (2.2.1), prāptajīvikaḥ (2.2.4), gogarbhiṇī (2.1.71), aśvamatallikā (2.1. 66), govṛndāraka (2.1.62) iti |
anyapadārthaprādhānyaviparyayo bahuvrīhiryathā— 'dvau vā trayo vā' dvitrāḥ (5.4.73), evaṃ pañcaṣāḥ (5.4.73), āsanno daśānāmāsannadaśaḥ (2.1.1 vā 3), evam adūradaśaḥ (2.1.1), evaṃ dvirdaśa dvidaśāḥ, evaṃ tridaśāḥ (2.1.1) iti |
(2. sāmarthyaviparītaḥ)
sāmarthyaviparyayas‍tridhā padā 'sāmarthyāt, vākyāsāmarthyāt, vṛttyasāmarthyāt | tatra—
padā 'sāmarthyaṃ sāpekṣatve yathā— devadattasya gurukulam (2.1.1 vāpa.), grāmaṃ gantukāmaḥ, jñātacittaḥ kāntayā, niveditātmā gurubhyaḥ, kṛtaprasthāno nagarāt, niṣpannabuddhiḥ śās‍treṣu iti |
vākyā 'sāmarthyamasvapadavigrahe yathā— brāhmaṇebhyo 'yaṃ brāhmaṇārthaḥ sūpaḥ (2.1.36 mabhā.), brāhmaṇārthā yavāgūḥ (2.1.36 mabhā.), māso jātasya māsajātaḥ (2.2.5) | evaṃ saṃvatsarajātaḥ (2.2.5), dve ahanī jātasya dva‍yahajātaḥ, evaṃ dva‍yahnajāta iti |
vṛttyasāmarthyaṃ sambandhe yathā— sūryamapi na paśyanti asūryaṃpaśyā rājadārāḥ, punarna gīyante apunargeyāḥ ślokāḥ, śrāddhaṃ na bhuṅkte aśrāddhabhojī brāhmaṇaḥ |
evam alavaṇabhojī bhikṣuriti, tīrthe dhvāṅkṣa iva tiṣṭhatīti tīrthadhvāṅkṣaḥ (2.1.42) | evaṃ tīrthakāka (2.1.42) iti |
(3. vākyādhikārārthaḥ)
arthādhikyaṃ tridhā— viśeṣaṇasya, viśeṣyasya, samudāyasya ca |
viśeṣaṇasya yathā— varṣaśatamāyurasya śatāyuḥ (tai.saṃ. 2.3.11.5), janasahasraṃ bibhartti sahasraṃbharaḥ (taisaṃ. 3.4.11.2), aśreṇayaḥ śreṇayaḥ kṛtāḥ śreṇīkṛtāḥ (2.1. 59), apaṇḍitaḥ paṇḍita uktaḥ paṇḍitok‍taḥ, śas‍trīva śyāmā śastrīśyāmā (2.1. 55), puruṣo 'yaṃ vyāghra iva puruṣavyāghra iti |
viśeṣyasya yathā—ghṛtena pūrṇo ghaṭaḥ ghṛtaghaṭaḥ (mabhā. 2.1.1), aś‍vairyukto ratho 'ś‍varathaḥ (mabhā. 2.1.1), dagh‍nopasik‍ta odano dadhyodanaḥ (ma.bhā. 2.1.1), guḍena miśrā dhānā guḍadhānāḥ (mabhā. 2.1.1), akṣeṣu prasakto dhūrttaḥ akṣadhūrttaḥ (mabhā. 2.1.40), śākapradhānaḥ pārthivaḥ śākapārthiva iti |
samudāyasya yathā— ś‍vabhirlehyaḥ kūpaḥ ś‍valehyaḥ kūpaḥ (2.1.33 kāśikā), kākaiḥ peyā nadī kākapeyā nadī (2.1.33 kāśikā), khaṭvāyāmārūḍhaḥ khaṭvā ' 'rụ̄dho jālmaḥ, pātra eva samitāḥ pātresamitāḥ, evaṃ kiṃrājā yo na rakṣati (2.1.64 kāśikā), kiṃgauḥ yo na vahati (2.1.64 kāśikā) iti | atra pūrvayoratiśayaḥ, śeṣeṣu kṣepaḥ samudāyasya pratīyate |
(4. arthāntaragamanam)
arthāntaragamanaṃ tridhā— pūrvārthatyāgāt, atyāgāt, tyāgātyāgābhyāṃ ca | tatra—
pūrvārthasya tyāgo yathā— tailapāyikā, śakragopaḥ, aś‍vakarṇaḥ, pañcāṅgulaḥ, karavīraḥ, puṃnāga iti |
atyāgo yathā— kṛṣṇasarpaḥ, lohitaśālī, kālaśākaḥ, gaurakharaḥ, narasiṃhaḥ, dantalekha(ka) (2.2.17) iti |
tyāgātyāgau yathā— sapta parṇānyasya parvaṇi parvaṇi iti saptaparṇaḥ (vāpa. vṛttiḥ 55), aṣṭa padānyasya paṅktau paṅktau ityaṣṭāpadam, śataṃ patrāṇāmasyāḥ puṣpe puṣpe iti śatapatrikā, darśane darśane navaiva mālikā asyā navamālikā, nak‍tamiva mālāyāmasya naktamālaḥ, kṛtā mālā asya puṣpairiti kṛtamāla iti ||
(3. śeṣaḥ)
udāhṛtaprakārābhyāmanyaḥ śeṣaḥ |
sa caturdhā 1. sūtraśeṣaḥ, 2. asūtraśeṣaḥ, 3. jñāpakaśeṣaḥ, 4. ekaśeṣaś‍ceti | teṣu
(1) sūtraśeṣas‍tridhā— gaṇok‍taḥ, vārttikok‍taḥ sāmānyok‍taś‍ca | tatra —
(gaṇok‍taḥ) tiṣṭhadguprabhṛtīni (2.1.17), pātre samitādayaḥ (2.1.48) mayūravyaṃsakādayaḥ (2.1.72) iti gaṇok‍taḥ | yathā— 'āyatīgavam, samabhūmi, udumbaramaśakam, piṇḍīśūraḥ, ahaṃpūrvikā, āhopuruṣikā iti |
(vārttikok‍taḥ) nirādayaḥ krāntādyarthe pañcamyā (2.2.18 vāpa. 6), gamigāmyādi kṛtāpakṛtānāmupasaṃkhyānam (2.1.24, 60) avyayānāṃ bahuvrīrhivak‍tavyaḥ {2.2.24 (2)}, iti vārttikok‍taḥ | yathā niṣkauśāmbiḥ, odanabubhukṣuḥ, krayākrayikā, puṭāpuṭikā, uc‍cairmukhaḥ, astikṣīrā iti |
(sāmānyoktaḥ) supsupā (2.1.4), pūrvādiniḥ, sapūrvāc‍ca (5.2.86, 87), kuśāgrācchaḥ, samāsāc‍ca tadviṣayāt (5.3.105,106), iti sāmānyok‍taḥ| yathā paraḥśatā rājānaḥ, paraḥsahas‍trā śaradaḥ, punarutsūtaṃ vāsaḥ, punarnavaṃ payaḥ, kṛtapūrvī kaṭam, kākatālīyo nyāyo 'yam |
2. asūtraśeṣas‍tridhā— nāmaviṣayaḥ, kṛd‌viṣayaḥ, taddhitaviṣayaś‍ca | tatra—
(nāmaśeṣaḥ) aparasparāḥ kriyāsātatye (6.1.144), 'pāraskaraprabhṛtīni ca saṃjñāyām (6.1.157), pṛṣodarādīni yathopadiṣṭam (6.3.109) ityādirnāmaviṣayaḥ | yathā— aparasparāḥ sārthāḥ gacchanti, āś‍caryaṃ varttate, pāraskaro muniḥ, kāstīraṃ nagaram, pṛṣodaraḥ kaś‍cinmayūraḥ pakṣī—ti |
(kṛd‍‌viṣayaḥ) upapadamatiṅ (2.2.19), kugatiprādayaḥ (2.2.18), karttṛkaraṇe kṛtā bahulam (2.1.32) ityādiḥ kṛd‍‌viṣayaḥ | yathā— kumbhakāraḥ, paṅkajam, ūrīkṛtya, prajavī, aś‍vakrītī |
(taddhitaviṣayaḥ) dvigorluganapatye (1.4.88), 'tika—kitavādibhyo dvandve' (2.4.68), samāsāntāḥ (5.4.68), ityādistaddhitaviṣayaḥ | yathā pañcasu kapāleṣu saṃskṛtaḥ pañcakapālaḥ, taikāyanaś‍ca kaitavānayaś‍ca tikakatavāḥ, upaśaradam, devarājaḥ, mahokṣaḥ, mṛganetrā rātrayaḥ iti |
3. jñāpakaśeṣastridhā— vidhijñāpitaḥ, niṣedhajñāpitaḥ prayogajñāpitaś‍ca | tatra — (vidhijñāpitaḥ) koḥ kat tatpuruṣe (6.3.101), īṣadarthe 'pi (6.3.105), naño nalopaḥ (6.3.73), tiṅyavakṣepe ca (vā. 1), kārake 'nyasya duk (6.3.99), vyatihāre sarvādīnāṃ subbahulam (8.1.12), saṃkhyāvisāyapūrvasyā— hnasyāhannanyatarasyāṃ ṅau' (6.3.110), dāyādyaṃ dāyāda (6.2.5), ityādiko vidhijñāpitaḥ | yathā kaduṣṇam, apacasi, anyatkārakaḥ, anyonyam sāyāhnaḥ, vidyādāyādaḥ iti |
(alugjñāpitaḥ) aluguttarapade (6.3.1), pañcamyāḥ stokādibhyaḥ (6.3.2), ātmanaḥ pūraṇe tṛtīyāyā (6.3.6), vaiyākaraṇākhyāyāṃ parāccaturthyāḥ (6.3.7), 'vāg—digpaśyad‍bhyo yuktidaṇḍahareṣu yathāsaṃkhyamalug vak‍tavyaḥ (6.3.21 vā. 1), ṣaṣṭhyā adasaḥ phakvuñoḥ (6.3.21, vā.2), apo yoniyanmantuṣu saptamyāḥ (6.3.21 vā) ityādirniṣedhajñāpitaḥ | — brāhmaṇācchaṃsī (6.3.2), ātmanātṛtīyaḥ (6.3.6), parasmaipadam (6.3.7), paśyatoharaḥ (6.3.21 vā. 1), āmuṣyakulikā (6.3.21 vā. 2), apsuyoniḥ (6.3.21) iti |
(prayogajñāpitaḥ) janikarttuḥ prakṛtiḥ (1.4.30), tatprayojako hetuḥ (1.4.45), aponaptrapānnaptṛbhyāṃ ghaḥ (4.2.27), yathā—tathācā 'ntaḥ (ṇṇaḥ) (7.3.31 mabhā.), varttamānasāmīpye varttamānavad vā (3.3.131), aparasparāḥ kriyāsātatye (6.1.144), ityādiḥ prayogajñāpitaḥ | yathā— bhūtaharttā, daṇḍanāyakaḥ, tanūnapāt, yāthātathyam, yat‍nagauravam, kriyāsāphalyam (sātatyam) iti |
4. ekaśeṣastridhā — sarūpāṇām, asarūpāṇām sarūpāsarūpāṇāṃ | tatra —
sarūpāṇāṃ bhinnārthānāmabhinnārthānāṃ bhinnābhinnārthānāṃ ca |1
bhinnārthānāṃ yathā— akṣau, māṣau, pakṣau, pādau, gāvau iti |
abhinnārthānāṃ yathā— vṛkṣau, plakṣau iti |
1. sarūpatvamabhinnaprayat‍noccāryatvam | yathā 'rāmaḥ, rāmau, rāmāḥ' iti | atra rāmāviti, rāmā iti ca 'rāmaḥ rāmaḥ' ityevaṃ 'rāmaḥ, rāmaḥ, rāmaś‍ce'—tyevam | evaṃ ca pratītāvekatvaṃ, kintu garbhe bahutvam | uccāraṇe tvabhinnaprayat‍natvamiti svābhāvika eṣa ekaśeṣaḥ |
bhinnā 'bhinnārthānāṃ yathā— 'aś‍vinau, puṣpavantau, gāvau, sārasvatau yuvām, yūyam iti | asarūpāṇāṃ sarvanāmnāṃ, sambandhināṃ sahacāriṇāṃ ca |
sarvanāmnāṃ yathā— sa ca devadattaś‍ca tau, etau ca yajñadattaś‍ca ete, ayaṃ ca tvaṃ ca yuvām, amū ca tvaṃ ca yūyam, tvaṃ cāhaṃ ca āvām, sa ca āvāṃ ca vayam iti |
sambandhināṃ yathā— mātā ca pitā ca pitarau, svasā ca bhrātā ca bhrātarau, putraś‍ca duhitā ca putrau, pitā ca mātāmahādayaś‍ca pitaraḥ, bhrātarau ca svasāraś‍ca bhrātaraḥ, putrāś‍ca duhitarau ca putrāḥ iti |
sahacāriṇāṃ yathā— dastraś‍ca nāsatyaś‍ca dastrau, devadattaś‍ca viṣṇumitraś‍ca viṣṇumitrau, śauṇḍaś‍ca dhūrttādayaś‍ca śauṇḍāḥ, ardharcaś‍ca gomādayaś‍ca ardharcāḥ, puroḍāśaś‍ca dhānādayaś‍ca puroḍāśāḥ, chatriṇaḥ |
sarūpāsarūpāṇāṃ bhinnaśabdānāṃ, bhinnavacanānāṃ, bhinnaliṅgānāṃ ca |
bhinnaśabdānāṃ yathā— gārgyaś‍ca gārgyāyaṇī ca gārgyau, vātsyaś‍ca vātsyāyanaś‍ca vātsyau, prathamaś‍ca prathamānantaraś‍ca prathamau, bhīmaś‍ca bhīmasenaś‍ca bhīmau, vakradaṇḍaś‍ca kuṭiladaṇḍaś‍ca vakradaṇḍau, śrīmāṃś‍ca lakṣmīvāṃ(māṃ)ś‍ca śrīmantau iti |
bhinnavacanānāṃ yathā— devaś‍ca dattaś‍ca devadattau, tau ca devadattaś‍ca devadattāḥ | evaṃ viṣṇumitrāḥ | kṛṣṇaś‍ca sā(śā)raś‍ca kṛṣṇasā(śā)rau, tau ca sāraś‍ca kṛṣṇasā(śā)rāḥ/evaṃ nīlalohitāḥ | apāraś‍ca pāraś‍ca apārapārau, tau ca pārapāraś‍ca pārapārāḥ | evamapārapārā iti |
bhinnaliṅgānāṃ yathā kukkuṭaś‍ca kukkuṭī ca kukkuṭau, ś‍vaśuraś‍ca śvaśrūś‍ca ś‍vaśurau, gāvaś‍ca gāvaś‍ca gāva imāḥ, vatsakāś‍ca vatsikāś‍ca vatsikāś‍ca vatsakā ime, aś‍vāś‍ca aś‍vāś‍ca aś‍vā ete, śuklaś‍ca śuklā ca śuklaṃ ca tadidaṃ śuklam, tānīmāni śuklānīti | (1.2.69 kāśikā)
kathaṃ punarekaśeṣaḥ samāsaviśeṣo bhavati?
saṃkṣepābhidhāne sati dvandvasamānārthatvāt | tathāhi— asarūpāṇāṃ dvandvaḥ, sarūpāsarūpāṇām ekaśeṣaḥ iti |
ko 'nayoḥ samāno 'rthaḥ?
yeyaṃ yugapadadhikaraṇavacanatā padārthānāṃ sahavivakṣetyarthaḥ | tadāha— (vāpa. 3.14.28)
anusyūteva bhedābhyāmekā prakhyopajāyate |
yasyāṃ sahavivakṣāṃ tāmāhurdvandvaikaśeṣayoḥ || 49 || iti |
tatra yadā prayogaikatayā buddhyā 'nekamarthamavagatya yathāvagatamevā 'bhidhātumadhyavasyate tadaikajñānāvacchedānirūpitabhedasyāsya bhāgaśo 'bhidhānāsaṃbhavādavayavaśabdāḥ saṃghātaviṣayā vijñāyante | tada‌yathā— 'dhavakhadirau vṛkṣau iti |
yadyevaṃ, yathā dhavakhadirapalāśamiti dvandvasya samūhārthatvādekavacanam, ekaśeṣasyāpi prāpnoti | naivam, dvandvaḥ samāhāretaretarayogayoḥ, ekaśeṣaḥ punaritaretarayoga eva; tasya hi samāhārapakṣe bhinnārthapratipādakānekaśabdanivṛttau vacanamapi yadyanekārthaṃ na bhavet kenā 'nekārthaḥ pratīyeta? na hi vṛkṣa ityuk‍te vṛkṣaś‍ca vṛkṣaś‍ca vṛkṣaś‍ceti kaś‍cidapyavaiti ? tasmādāmnāto 'pi dvandvasamānārthatayā samāhāra ekaśeṣo 'nabhidhānādaprayogārha eveti vijñāyate | dvandve tu yadyapi ekavacanānnānekārthāvagatiḥ, tathāhi anekaśrutinibandhanāsau bhaviṣyatīti samāhāre 'pi na doṣaḥ | ekaśeṣe 'pi ca yatrā 'nekārthābhidhānasāmarthyaṃ kathaṃcid bhavati, bhavatyeva tatra samāhāraikavacanam, yathā śuklaṃ vastraṃ, śuklā śāṭī, śuklaḥ paṭa iti tadidaṃ śuklamiti |
yathā tarhyekasyaiva śabdasyānekārthābhidhānasāmarthyādekaśeṣe śabdāntarāṇāṃ nivṛttiḥ evaṃ dvandve 'pi kasmānna bhavati ?
yadi bhavedekaśeṣādaviśeṣaḥ prasajyeta |
samāhāra ekavacanaṃ viśeṣa iti cet, anekārtho na gamyeta | na hi palāśamityuk‍ta dhavaś‍ca khadiraś‍ca palāśaś‍ceti kaś‍cidapyavaiti |
atha yathā pitarau bhrātarāvityādiṣu śabdāntaranivṛttāvapi tadartho 'vagamyate tathā plakṣanyagrodhau dhavakhadirāvityādiṣu dvandveṣvapi kasmānna bhavati ?
ucyate śabdaśaktireṣā | bhavati hi kaś‍cideko 'pi śabdo dvayorapyabhidhāyakaḥ | yathā rodasīśabdo dyāvāpṛthivyoḥ | kaucit punardvāvevaikamarthamabhidadhāte, yathā adhīte adhyeti iti | ata eva śabdaśaktidarśī muniḥ keṣucidevaṃ virūpeṣvekaśeṣamārabhate bhrātṛputrau 'svasṛduhitṛbhyām' (1.2.68), 'pitā mātrā' (1.2.70) iti | anyeṣu tu dvandvamevā 'bhyanujānāti ||
nanu ca 'cārthe dvandvaḥ' (2.2.29) smaryate; sa yathā —
samāhāretaretarayogayoḥ tathā samuccayānvācayayorapi prāpnoti |
naivam, samuccayānvācayayoḥ padānāmasāmarthyāt |
kathamasāmarthyam ?
sāpekṣamasamarthaṃ bhavatīti | tathāhi— gauś‍cāś‍vaś‍ca gacchatītyādirekakriyāpekṣaḥ samuccayaḥ; bhikṣāmaṭa gāṃ cā ' 'nayetyādiranekakriyāpekṣaḥ anvācayaḥ | evaṃ ca bāhyārthāpekṣayā padānāṃ parasparasāmarthyam | samarthaś‍ca padavidhirbhavati | samāhāretaretarayogayostu samūhatvāt, samūhasya ca samūhirūpatvādavayavānāṃ sati sāmarthye samāso bhavatyaiva | yathā dhavakhadirapalāśam, dhavakhadirapalāśā iti |
evaṃ tarhi samūhasyaikatvāt samāhāravaditaretarayoge 'pyekavacanameva prāpnoti |
naivam | samāhāra eva parasparānupraveśādiva samadhigatābhedānāmupasarjanīkṛtāvayavaḥ samudāyo 'bhyanujñāyate, yasyānabhivyaktāvayavatvādekavacanamiva napuṃsakatvamapi prāpnoti; itaretarayogaḥ punaravayavabhedānugataḥ saṅghātaḥ, tasya 1pratyekavarttipadairabhidhīyamānatvāt samudāyasaṃkhyānibandhanaikavacanamavayebhyaḥ prastūyate | tatra
yathā pacatītyādau adhiśrayaṇādikriyākalāpaḥ pratyavayavaṃ parisamāpyate tathā samudāyo 'pi pratipadaṃ sākalyena parisamāpyate | tata ekaikasya padasya samudāyanibandhanaḥ saṃskāro bhavati |
kathaṃ punardhavādayo nirdhāritārthabhedāḥ padāntarasyārthamabhidhātuṃ kṣamante ?
pravṛttinivṛttisamāropāt | yathok‍tam — 'yadi prakṣaratīti plakṣaḥ, nyagrodho 'pyevam | yadi nyag rohatīti nyagrodhaḥ plakṣo 'pyevam' iti |
sāhacaryādivaśena vā paraspararūpāpattiḥ | yathā 'saptamī śauṇḍaiḥ (2.1.40), 'ardharcāḥ puṃsi (2.4.31), te viṣṇumitrāḥ chatriṇo gacchantīti |
tatra yathā śauṇḍārdhārcādayaḥ bahuvacanānyathānupapattisamabhigamyān sahacāriṇo bhinnarūpān dhūrttagomayādīnupādadate tathā dhavādiśabdāḥ pratītārthabhedāḥ sāhacarcādi— nimittānurodhena khadirādīnupādadate | tathāhi ekavṛttipadāvarodhapratītasāhacaryau dhavakhadirau; ata eva tayoreva pratyavayavaniveśād bahuvacanaṃ na bhavati |
1. adhikaraṇaṃ varttipadārthaḥ, sa hi samāsasyārthasyādhāraḥ (kāśikā 2.2.29)| padamañjarī vṛttirvarttaḥ samāsaḥ, nyāsaś‍ca varttanaṃ varttaḥ samāsaḥ, bhāve ghañ | varto 'syāstīti vartti |
kathaṃ punardhavādīnāmarthāntarābhidhānaṃ śakyamadhyavasātum ?
yāvatā lokaḥ padasamudāyādarthasamudāyamavaiti, nāvayavāt |
yadapyuk‍taṃ pravṛttinivṛttisamāropāditi, tadapyasāram, na hi prakṣaratīti vyutpattyā nyagrodhaḥ plakṣaḥ, nāpi nyaṅ‌rohatīti vyutpattyā plakṣo nyagrodho bhavati; rụ̄dhānāṃ hi dharmaniyamāya yathākathañcid vyutpattiḥ kriyate, na tu vyutpattivaśena rūḍhayo 'vatiṣṭhante |
nāpi prakṛtipratyayavadanvayavyatirekasamadhigamyā dhavādīnāṃ samudāyārthatā |
yadapyucyate śauṇḍārdhārcādivat dhavaśabdaḥ sāhacaryādilakṣaṇayā khadiramupādatta iti tadapi na samyak, sati śrutyarthasaṃbhave lakṣaṇāyā ayogāt | na ca khadirārtho dhūrttagomayāvallakṣayitavyaḥ, tasya khadiraśabdenaiva sākṣādabhidhānāt |
evaṃ tarhi, yadā dhavakhadirādayaḥ samudāyāḥ pravibhāgenānvācikhyāsitāḥ, tadā tameva samudāyaṃ pratyāyyatayā 'bhisaṃdhāyāvayavā upādīyante, na tvavayavārthapratipādanābhiprāyeṇa | atastasyāṃ yugapadadhikaraṇavacanatāyāṃ samīhitāyāṃ samudāyaparatvādavayavaprayogasya, teṣāmavayavānāṃ pratyekamanekārthatvamucyate |
kiṃ punaḥ prayok‍turabhiprāyamanurudhyante śabdāḥ? yena tadabhisandhānāt samudāyamabhidadhyuḥ |
netyāha | anyatrāpyavayavābhidhāyināṃ śabdānāmavayavamukhena samudāyābhidhānasāmarthyaṃ dṛśyate; yathā surabhi kuklayam, yanmadhuraṃ rājādanam iti | yadi hi surabhimadhuraśabdau gandharasamātrābhidhāyināvapi gandharasādisamudāyān kusumaphalaviśeṣādīn avayavamukhena nācakṣāte, kuvalayādibhiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ virudhyate |
satyametat | asti samudāyābhidhānasāmarthyamavayavaśabdānām, surabhi kuvalayamityādau sāmānādhikaraṇyena tadavadhāryate; dvandve tu nibandhanamaśakya— mavadhārayitumiti tasyānupapattiḥ|
naivam | samudāyābhidhānasya prakrāntatvāt |
yadyevaṃ padvīmṛd‌vā(dvyā)viti samānādhikaraṇalakṣaṇaḥ puṃvad‌bhāvaḥ prāpnoti |
ucyate | atheha kasmānna bhavati darśanīyāyā(:) mātā darśanīyāmātā ?
atha matametat prāk samāsād yatra sāmānādhikaraṇyam, ihāpi na doṣo bhavati; na hi prāk samāsāt sāmānādhikaraṇyamatra vidyate |
nanu ca vākye 'pi samudāyaprakrameṇaivāvayavapadānāṃ prayogāt kathamucyate prāk samāsāt sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ nāstīti ?
samudāyaprakramasya nirnibandhanatvenāpratīyamānatvāt | kuvalayādiśabdasāmānā— dhikaraṇyaṃ hi surabhiprabhṛtīnāmasamāse 'pi samudāyatānibandhanam; iha tvekārthībhāvaḥ samudāyābhidhāne nimittamiti vākye sāmānādhikaraṇyaprasiddhiḥ |
evamapi, vipratiṣiddheṣu yugapadadhikaraṇavacanatāyā anupapattiḥ, yathā sukhaduḥkhe jananamaraṇe, śītoṣṇe iti | sukhādipratighātena hi duḥkhādayaḥ, duḥkhādipratighātena ca sukhādaya iti |
naivam | sarva eva śabdā vipratiṣiddhāḥ, plakṣanyagrodhāvityatrāpi, hi plakṣaśabdaḥ prayujyamānaḥ plakṣārthaṃ saṃpratyāyayati, nyagrodhārthaṃ nivarttayati; nyagrodhaśabdaḥ prayujyamāno nyagrodhārthaṃ pratyāyayati plakṣārthaṃ nivarttayati | tatra ced yuktā yugapadadhikaraṇavacanatā dṛś‍yate, ihāpi yuktaṃ dṛś‍yatām |
evamapi śabdapaurvāparyaprayogādarthapaurvāparyābhidhānaṃ prāpnoti |
tataḥ kim? yugapadadhikaraṇavacanatāyā anupapattiḥ— plakṣanyagrodhau plakṣanyagrodhā' iti; yathaiva hi śabdānāṃ paurvāparyaṃ tad‌vadarthānāma/?/pi syāt |
naivam | evaṃ sati dvivacanabahuvacanayorapyanupapattiḥ; plakṣaśabdo hi sārthako nivṛttaḥ; nyagrodhaśabda upasthitaḥ; sa caika ekārtha iti tasmādekavacanameva prāpnoti | vigrahe khalvapi yugapadadhikaraṇavacanatā dṛś‍yate, kiṃ punaḥ samāse | tad‌yathā 'dyāvā ha kṣāmā' 'dyāvā cidasmai pṛthivī sannamete' iti (ṛve. 10.11.1, 2.12.13)
samudāyāt siddhamiti cet, tanna, samudāyasyaikārthatvāt; ekārthā hi samudāyā bhavanti | tad‌yathā śatam, yūtham, vanamiti | nāyamekārthaḥ | kiṃtarhi | dv‍yartho bahvarthaś‍ca | plakṣo 'pi dvyarthaḥ;, nyagrodho 'pi dvyarthaḥ |
yadyevam anekārthatvād 'bahuṣu bahuvacanami' (1.4.21)—ti bahuvacanaṃ prāpnoti? tanna, bahutvā 'bhāvāt (mabhā. 2.2.29 ); yābhyāmevātraiko dvyarthastābhyāmevā 'paro 'pi | yadyevamanyavācakena śabdenānyasya vacanaṃ nopapadyate |
evaṃ tarhi plakṣasya nyagrodhatvānnyagrodhasya ca plakṣatvāt svaśabdenaivābhidhānaṃ bhaviṣyatīti (mabhā. 2.2.29) |
kathaṃ punaḥ plakṣo 'pi nyagrodho nyagrodho 'pi plakṣaḥ syāt ? yāvatā kāraṇād dravye śabdasanniveśo bhavati |
kāraṇāddravye śabdasanniveśa iti cet kāraṇamuktaṃ purastāt yadi prakṣaratīti plakṣaḥ
nyagrodhe 'pyetad bhavati, yadi nyaṅ rohatīti nyagrodhaḥ, plakṣe 'pyetad bhaviṣyatīti |
darśanaṃ vai hetuḥ | na ca nyagrodhe plakṣaśabdo dṛśyate | darśanaṃ heturiti cet tulyametad bhavati plakṣe 'pi nyagrodhaśabdo dṛśyate |
nanvetad bravīmi— 'naiṣaṃ loke saṃpratyayo 'sti, na hi plakṣa ānīyatāmityuk‍te nyagrodha ānīyate |'
dvandvaviṣayamevaitad draṣṭavyam |
yuktaṃ punaryanniyataviṣayā nāma śabdāḥ syuḥ?
vāḍhaṃ yuktam, anyatrāpi darśanāt; tad yathā samāne 'pi rak‍te varṇe gaurlohita iti bhavati, aś‍vaḥ śoṇita iti | samāne śukle varṇe gauḥ ś‍veta iti bhavati aś‍vaḥ karka iti |
yadi tarhi plakṣo 'pi nyagrodhaḥ, nyagrodho 'pi plakṣaḥ, ekenaivoktatvādaparasya prayogo 'nupapannaḥ | anuktaḥ plakṣeṇa nyagrodha iti kṛtvā nyagrodhaśabdaḥ prayujyate |
kathamanuktaḥ? yadidānīmevoktaṃ plakṣo 'pi nyagrodhaḥ, nyagrodho 'pi plakṣa iti | sahabhūtāvanyonyasyārthamāhatuḥ, na pṛthag bhūtau |
kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇam ?
śabdaśak‍teḥ svabhāvaḥ | pratiniyatā hi vṛttivākyayoḥ śabdānāmabhidhānaśaktiḥ, tad‌yathā śastrīś‍yāmā devadattā' iti | 'upamānāni sāmānyavacanaiḥ' (2.1.55) iti samāse śastrīśabdenāvacchidyamānaviśeṣāvaruddhaḥ ś‍yāmāśabdo yadyapi na sāmānyavacanaḥ tathāpyasau devadattāyāmupamīyamānāyāṃ varttate śastrīva śyāmā devadatteti, tadidamuktaṃ 'prāgabhisambandhād yaḥ sāmānyavacana' (mabhā. 2.1.55 vā—2) iti | samāsamabhisambandhavacanena darśayati; yatastatra vinivṛttaviśeṣāntarākāṅkṣāṇi yathāsamīhitaviśeṣā 'varuddhāni padāni | so 'yaṃ vṛttivākyayorviśeṣaḥ |
kiñca, niṣkauśāmbiḥ, nirvārāṇasiriti bhede sati nirādīnāṃ na krāntādyarthasaṃbhavaḥ (mabhā. 2.4.26)| api ca 'gaura—khara—vadaraṇyam' (mabhā. 2.1.69), 'lohitaśālimān grāmaḥ' iti |
prāgvṛtterjātivācitvaṃ na ca gaura—kharādiṣu || 50 || (vāpa. 3 vṛttiḥ 39)
yathā snigdhakisalayamaraṇyaṃ mattamātaṅgaṃ vanamiti |
vṛttiranyapadārthe yā tasyā vākyeṣvasaṃbhavaḥ || 51 || (vāpa. 3 vṛttiḥ 38)
evaṃ ca plakṣanyagrodhau prāthamakalpikau kaucit, kriyayā guṇena vā plakṣa ivāyaṃ plakṣaḥ, nyagrodha ivāyaṃ nyagrodha iti | tatra plakṣāvityukte saṃdehaḥ syāt— 'kimimau plakṣāveva āhosvit nyagrodhāveva, athavā plakṣanyagrodhāviti | tatrā 'sandehārtho nyagrodhaśabdaḥ prayujyate | seyaṃ yugapadadhikaraṇavacanatā duḥkhā durupapādā ca (mabhā. 2.2.29)|
yadapi cāsyā jñāpakaṃ 'dyāvā ca kṣāmā' iti, tadapi chāndasam | idaṃ tarhi jñāpakamastu 'paravalliṅgaṃ dvandvatatpuruṣayoḥ' (2.4.26), pūrvavadaś‍vabaḍavau (2.4.27)| yadi hyatra 'kukkuṭamayūryā'—(2.4.26 vā. 2. mabhā. kāśike)— vityādiṣu sahavivakṣā na syāt anarthakaḥ sūtrārambhaḥ syāt |
nanu ca tatpuruṣasyottarapadārthapradhānatvāt tatra paravalliṅgatātideśo 'narthakaḥ |
nānarthakaḥ, tatpuruṣasya kvacit pūrvapadārthapradhānatvāt, yathā 'ardhaṃ' pippalyā ardhapippalī (2.4.26 mabhā.), pūrvaṃ kāyasya pūrvakāyaḥ, uttaraṃ śarīrasyottaraśarīram iti | yadyevaṃ 'prāpto jīvikāṃ prāptajīvikaḥ, niṣkrāntaḥ kauśāmbyā niṣkauśāmbiḥ, alaṃkumāryai alaṃkumāriḥ' ityatrāpi paravalliṅgatā prāpnoti |
evaṃ tarhi, dvandvena saha nirdeśāccārthāviṣayo 'tra tatpuruṣo gṛhyate; yathā 1'krayākrayikā, puṭāpuṭikā, phalāphaliketi, 2aś‍vamatallikā kumārītallajakaḥ, goprakāṇḍam' iti | atra hi, yathā dhavaś‍ca khadiraś‍ceti yugapadadhikaraṇavacanatāyāṃ tathā samānādhikaraṇatāyāmapi viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvena saṃmūrcchantāvivānyonyamarthau bhavataḥ | tathāhi prayojanavattayā mahattvāśrayaś‍cāsāvalpamūlyatvena laghutvāt krayikā cetyupapadyate nīlotpalādivad viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaḥ | evaṃ phalāphalikā, puṭāpuṭiketi | aś‍vamatalliketyatrāś‍vaśabdaḥ pravarttamānaḥ sarvāś‍vāvagraharūpeṇa pravarttate; matallikāśabdaḥ praśaṃsāvacana pravarttamāno viśiṣṭāvagraharūpeṇāvacchinatti | yādi vā— matalliketyetat praśaṃsāvacanaṃ nyūnādhikabhāvamanapekṣya pravarttamānamanenaiva dharmmeṇa sarvayogyaṃ sat aś‍va ityanena viśiṣṭāyāṃ yogyatāyāṃ niyamyate | tato yathā śuklaḥ kṛṣṇaś‍cāyaṃ mṛgaḥ sāraṅgaḥ śabala iti vā tathā 'ś‍vamatalliketyetadubhayarūpo 'rtha ityubhayamubhayena sanniveś‍yate | evaṃ kumārītallajakaḥ goprakāṇḍamiti |
1. 'mahān krayaḥ krayaḥ, alpīyāṁstu krayikā' iti nyāsaḥ | mabhā. 2.1.60 vā. 5 | 2. kāśikā 2.1.66 |
yadyevam ardhapippalītyādiṣu ṣaṣṭhīsamāsāpavādeṣu paravalliṅgatā na prāpnoti |
naivam | tatrāpi ardhaṃ ca tat pippalīti cārdhapippalīti, pūrvaś‍cāsau kāryaś‍ca pūrvakāya iti sāmānādhikāraṇyameva paramārthaḥ | ata eva yatra sāmānādhikaraṇyasyāsambhavaḥ tatra ṣaṣṭhīsamāsa eva bhavati, yathā— vedyardhaṃ dākṣiṇaṃ meroḥ (?), svarārdham, cūḍikārdham, paṇārdham iti | na cārdhādīnāmevaiṣa niyamaḥ, yato 'nyatrāpi sāmānādhikaraṇyasya vivakṣā 'vivakṣābhyāmubhayathā tatpuruṣo bhavati, tadyathā 'agrahastaḥ, hastāgram, 1talapādaḥ, pādatalam' iti (mabhā. 2.2.69, nyāsaś‍ca) ||
nanu ca 'cārthe dvandvaḥ' (2.2.29) ityucyate 2caś‍cāvyayaṃ tena samāsasyāvyayasaṃjñā prāpnoti |
naiṣa doṣaḥ | 3pāṭhenāvyayasaṃjñā kriyate | na ca samāsastatra paṭhyate |
mā bhūdapāṭhe saṃjñā tathāpyabhidheyavalliṅgavacanāni bhavanti, yaś‍cehārtho 'bhidhīyate, na tasya liṅgasaṃkhyābhyāṃ yogo 'sti | nedaṃ vācanikam aliṅgatā asaṃkhyatā ca | kiṃ tarhi ? svābhāvikametat | tadyathā samānamīhamānānāmadhīyānānāṃ kecidarthena yujyante, apare na; cedānīṃ kaś‍cidarthavānityataḥ sarvairarthavadbhiḥ śakyaṃ bhavitum, kaś‍cid vā 'narthaka iti sarvairanarthakaiḥ | tatra kimasmābhiḥ śak‍yaṃ vak‍tum, yat prāk samāsāt liṅgasaṃkhyābhyāṃ yogo nāsti, samāse ca bhavati |
athavā āśrayato liṅgavacanāni bhaviṣyanti | guṇavacanānāṃ hi śabdānāmāśrayatā liṅgavacanāni bhavanti | tad‍yathā śuk‍laṃ vastram, śuk‍lā śāṭī, śuk‍laḥ kambalaḥ, śuk‍lau kambalau, śuk‍lāḥ kambalā iti | yadasau dravyāśrito bhavati guṇastasya yalliṅgaṃ vacanaṃ ca
1. 2.2.3—aṣṭādhyāyyāṃ 'talāgrādayaś‍ce'ti bhojasya yogaḥ | sa ca vāmanasyānukāraḥ | tathāhi kāvyālaṅkārasūtravṛttiḥ— 5.2.20— hastāgrāgrahastādayo guṇaguṇinorbhedābhedāt | hastāgramagrahastaḥ puṣpāgramagrapuṣpam ityādayaḥ prayogāḥ katham 'āhitāgnyādiṣu apāṭhāt, pāṭhe vā tadaniyamaḥ syāt |' āha guṇaguṇinorbhedā 'bhedāt | tatra bhedāt hastāgrādayaḥ, abhedād agrahastādaya' iti | 2. mabhā. 2.2.29 | 3. pāṭhena— 'sūtragatene'ti bhāvaḥ vastutastu vyāhāramātragata eṣa bhedo, na tu vyavahāre 'pi | ata eva patnīti vak‍tavye 'dārā' ityucyamānaṃ na doṣāya | vyāhāra eva hi parāyaṇaṃ śiṣṭānāṃ vyavahāraniyamane | rāghaveṇā 'tra nāṅgīkṛtaḥ pāṇḍulekhanigaḍaḥ, arthasaṅgatiṃ paś‍yatā | dhanya eṣa |
tad guṇasyāpi; yadasau dravyaṃ śrito bhavati samāsaḥ, liṅgaṃ vacanaṃ ca tat samāsasyāpi bhaviṣyati |
atheha kasmānna bhavati— yājñikaś‍cāyaṃ vaiyākaraṇaś‍ca, kaṭhaś‍cāyaṃ bahvacaś‍ca, auk‍thikaś‍cāyaṃ mīmāṃsakaś‍ceti? śeṣa iti varttate—
upāsnātaṃ sthūlasiktaṃ tūṣṇīṃgaṅgaṃ mahāhradam |
droṇaṃ cedaśako gantuṃ mā tvā tāptāṃ kṛtākṛte || 52 ||
ityetanna siddhyati |
naiṣa doṣaḥ | anyaddhi kṛtamanyadakṛtam | cārthe dvandvavacane asamāse 'pi cārthasaṃpratyayādaniṣṭaṃ prāpnoti |
aharaharnayamāno gāmaś‍vaṃ puruṣaṃ paśum |
vaivasvato na tṛpyati surāyā iva durmadī || 53|| (mabhā. 2.2.29)
indrastvaṣṭā varuṇo vāyurāditya (taiā. 6.5.3; mabhā. 2.2.29) iti |
naiṣa doṣaḥ | iha 'ce dvandva' itīyatā siddham |
kathaṃ punaś‍ce nāmavṛttiḥ syāt ?
śabdo hyeṣa śabde 'sambhavādarthe kāryaṃ vijñāsyate | so 'yamevaṃ siddhe siddhe sati yadarthagrahaṇaṃ karoti tasyaitat prayojanam | yathaivaṃ vijñāyeta 'cakṛte 'rthe cārtha' iti |
(na cakṛte 'rthe cārthaḥ)
kaḥ punaś‍cakṛto 'rthaḥ ?
samuccayaḥ, anvācayaḥ, itaretarayogaḥ, samāhāra iti |
tatra dvayoḥ sāpekṣatvāt samāso na bhavati (samāso bhavati) |
dvayostu bhavatīti pratipāditaṃ purastāt |
nanu caivaṃ 'cakṛto 'rthaś‍cārtha' iti pakṣe plakṣanyagrodhāvityatra plakṣaś‍ca nyogrodhaś‍ceti vigrahaḥ prāpnoti; yāvatā plakṣaś‍ca nyagrodhaś‍cetyapyuk‍te gamyata etat plakṣo 'pi nyagrodhasahāyaḥ, nyagrodhopi plakṣasahāya iti |
tatra ko doṣaḥ syāt ?
plakṣau ca nyagrodhau ceti yaduktaṃ tanna ghaṭate | yugapadadhikaraṇavacanatā— pradarśanamātraparametat, na tvayameva paramārthaḥ |
evaṃ hi kriyamāṇe ekaś‍ca viṃśatiś‍ca ekaviṃśatiḥ, dvau ca daśa ca dvādaśeti
dvivacanaṃ bahuvacanaṃ ca prāpnoti |
kiṃ punarekaviṃśatirityādayo dvandvāḥ ?
bāḍham | ekādhikā viṃśatiriti pakṣe hi saṃkhyāsvaro na prāpnoti | sa hi śatasahastramiti ṣaṣṭhīsamāse mā bhūditi dvandva evābhyanujñāyate |
yadyevamitaretarayogapakṣe dvivacanam, samāhārapakṣe ca napuṃsakatvaṃ prāpnoti |
naivam, 'liṅgamaśiṣyaṃ lokāśrayatvā' —diti samāhāre 'pi napuṃsakatvaṃ na bhaviṣyati | atha dvādaśetyatrāpi samāhāraḥ kasmānna bhavati ā daśabhyaḥ saṃkhyāḥ saṃkhyeya eva varttate; ata ud‌bhūtā 'vayavasamudāyatāyāmitaretarayoga eva prāpnoti; yathā 'adhikaraṇaitāvattve ca (2.4.15), daśeme mārddaṅgikapāṇavikā (kāśikā 2.4.15) iti ||
tadetat kṛttaddhitasamāsabhedād vibhak‍tāvayavaṃ tridhā prātipadikamabhihitam |
(2. avibhak‍tāvayavaṃ prātipadikam)
athāvibhak‍tāvayavamucyate | tadapi (avibhak‍tāvayavamapi) prātipadikaṃ tridhā —
1. nāmarūpam, 2. avyayarūpam 3. nipātarūpaṃ ca | tatra —
(1. nāmarūpam)
anapekṣitaśabdavyutpattīni sattvabhūtārthābhidhāyīni ca nāmāni |
tāni tridhā— 1. ekārthāni, 2. anekārthāni 3. ekānekārthāni ceti | tatra— ekārthāni yathā— vṛkṣaḥ, kuṇḍam, kumārī, ḍitthaḥ, śuk‍laḥ, śīghraḥ, indraḥ, śakraḥ, purandaraḥ, koṣṭhaḥ, kusūla iti |
anekārthāni yathā— akṣāḥ, māṣāḥ, pādāḥ, avayaḥ, harayaḥ, gāvaḥ, bhūtayaḥ, puṇḍarīkam, puṣkaram, sāma, lalāma iti |
ekānekārthāni yathā— dastrau, nāsatyau, puṣpavantau, ubhau, rodasī, rodasyau, dārāḥ, varṣāḥ, āpaḥ, vanam, paṅktiḥ, senā iti |
(2. avyayarūpam)
prāyeṇāliṅgasaṃkhyāśaktīni avyayāni |
tānyapi tridhā 1. dravyavacanāni, 2. guṇavacanāni 3. saṃbandhavacanāni ceti | teṣu dravyavacanāni yathā— svaḥ, prātar, divā, doṣā, naktam, sāyam, vihāyasā, bhūḥ, kam, śam, śaṃyo, maya iti |
guṇavacanāni yathā—uccaiḥ, nīcaiḥ, suṣṭhu, apaṣṭhu, mudhā, ad‌dhā, mṛṣā, mithyā, alam, balavat, pṛthak, viṣvak iti |
saṃbandhavacanāni yathā— samayā, nikaṣā, bahiḥ, antaḥ, antareṇa, ṛte, ārāt, yugavat, sākam, sārdham, amā, saha iti |
(3. nipātarūpam)
asattvavacanāś‍cādayo nipātāḥ | te 'pi tridhaiva —
1. svatantrāḥ, 2. paratantrāḥ 3. viśeṣaparatantrāś‍ca | teṣu —
(svatantrāḥ) astyādayaḥ svatantrāḥ | yathā— asti, asi, asmi, ehi, brūhi, mṛdu (d‌nu) hi, manye, jāne, paś‍ya, paś‍yata, syāt iti |
(paratantrāḥ) karmapravacanīyāś‍cādayaḥ paratantrāḥ | vṛkṣamanu vidyotate, upārjunaṃ yoddhāraḥ, apa trigarttebhyo vṛṣṭo devaḥ, abhimanyurarjunataḥ prati, yadatra māṃ pratisyāt, adhibrahmadatte pañcālāḥ, ahaṃ ca tvaṃ ca vṛtrahan, vāyurvā tvā manurvā tvā, ahameva paśūnāmīśe, sarojamiva te mukham, na nūnamasti noś‍vaḥ, kaḥ svidekākī carati iti; (taisaṃ.7.4.18.1)|
(viśeṣaparatantrāḥ) gatiprādayo viśeṣaparatantrāḥ | yathā— prakaroti, parākaroti, ūrīkaroti, 1gulugudhākaroti (kāṭhakasaṃ. 25.1), kārikākaroti, khāṭkaroti, paṭapaṭākaroti, tiraskaroti, puraskaroti, śraddhā, antardhiḥ iti ||
(3. anukaraṇapratipadikam)
athānukaraṇam | tadapi tridhaiva —
(1. sādhvanukaraṇam, 2. asādhvanukaraṇam 3. avyaktānukaraṇaṃ ca |
(1. sādhvanukaraṇam)
(tatra2 sādhvanukaraṇaṃ dvedhā sārthakaṃ nirarthakaṃ ca) | tayoḥ—
sārthakaṃ yathā— 'dviḥpacatvityāha' agnī ityāha, pacatītyāha | atra sārthakatvāt 'tiṅṅatiṅaḥ (8.1.28) iti nighātaḥ,'īdūded‌dvivacanaṃ pragṛhyam (1.1.11) iti pragṛhyatvam, tiṅntatvādaprātipādikakāryatve subutpattiś‍ca na bhavatīti |
1. 'gulugudhā pīḍārthe' 1.4.61 kāśikā | 2. koṣṭhakagatā paṅktirasmābhirupakalpitā yāthāpūrvyaṃ pramāṇīkṛtya | rāghavaḥ punare vaṃ (tatra prathamaṃ sārthakaṃ, nirarthakaṃ ca)| atra yāthāpūrvyaṃ nānvāpālītiṃ vimṛś‍yam |
nirarthakaṃ yathā— 'suḥ pūjāyām' (1.4.94) 'apiḥ padārthasaṃbhāvanānvavasarga— garhāsamuccayeṣu' (1.4.96) 'caḥ samuccaye' (?)3 | atrārthasyānukaraṇāt svasvarūpatvācca prātipadikatve supaḥ śravaṇaṃ bhavatīti |
(asādhvanukaraṇam) dvitīyam aśaktijam apabhraṃśaś‍ca |
tatrāśaktijaṃ yathā— aho ṛtaka iti vak‍tavye śaktivaikalyād 'aho lṛtaka' ityāha |
apabhraṃśo yathā— 'herayo heraya' iti vak‍tavye asurā 'helayo helaya' iti vadantaḥ parābabhūvuḥ |
(avyaktānukaraṇaṃ) tṛtīyam nirullekhaṃ sollekhaṃ ca | tayoḥ —
nirullekhaṃ yathā— paṭatpaṭaditi karoti paṭapaṭāyate |
sollekhaṃ yathā— tadetadevaiṣā daivī vāganuvadati stanayit‍nurdadada iti | dāmyata, datta, dayadhvamiti tadetattrayaṃ śikṣed damaṃ dānaṃ dayāmi'—ti ||
(6. vibhaktiḥ)
pratyayaviśeṣa eva śakti—saṃkhyā—vibhāgakṛd vibhaktiḥ | sā tridhā —
1. tiṅ‍‌vibhaktiḥ, 2. subvibhaktiḥ, 3. avyayavibhaktiś‍ca | tāsu —
(1) tiṅ‍‌vibhaktiḥ ṣọdhā —
1. parasmaipadavibhaktiḥ, 2. ātmanepadavibhaktiḥ, 3. sārvadhātukavibhaktiḥ, 4. ārdhadhātukavibhaktiḥ, 5. vyaktakālavibhaktiḥ, 6. avyaktakālavibhaktiś‍ca |
tāsu—
parasmaipadavibhaktiryathā pacati, pacataḥ, pacanti; ātmanepadavibhaktiryathā pacyate, pacyete, pacyante; sārvadhātukavibhaktiryathā vyapacyata, vyapacyetāṃ, vyapacyanta; ārdhadhātukavibhaktiryathā papāca, pak‍tā, pakṣīṣṭa; vyaktakālavibhaktiryathā apākṣīt, apacat, pakṣyate; avyaktakālavibhaktiryathā pacatu, pacet, apakṣyata iti |
(2) subvi bhaktirapi ṣọdhā —
1. kārakavibhaktiḥ, 2. sambandhavibhaktiḥ, 3. śeṣavibhaktiḥ, 4. upapadavibhaktiḥ, 5. pradhānavibhaktiḥ, 6. saṃbodhanavibhaktiś‍ca | tāsu —
3. nedaṃ sūtramiti rāghavaḥ |
kārakavibhaktiryathā kaṭaṃ karoti, dātreṇa lunāti, brāhmaṇāya dadāti,
sambandhavibhaktiryathā vidyayā yaśaḥ, yūyāya dāru gavāṃ kṛṣṇā saṃpannakṣīratamā iti
śeṣavibhaktiryathā mātuḥ smarati, vṛkṣasya parṇa patati, māṇavakasya pitaraṃ panthānaṃ pṛcchati,
upapadavibhaktiryathā vṛkṣaṃ prati vidyotate vidyut, namo devebhyaḥ, ṛte devadattāt |
pradhānavibhaktiryathā devadattaḥ pacati, caitreṇa pacyate, vīraḥ puruṣa iti |
saṃbodhanavibhaktiryathā he devadatta, āgaccha devadatta iti |
(3) taddhitapratyayaviśeṣo 'vyayavibhaktiḥ |
sā dvidhā— 1. vibhaktikāryavatī, 2. avibhaktikāryavatī ca | (tatra) —
1. vibhaktikāryavatī— 'prāgdiśo vibhaktiḥ' (5.3.1), iti | sā tridhā—
1. vibhak‍tyādeśarūpā, 2. pratyayādeśarūpā 3. pratyayarūpā ca | tāsu— (vibhak‍tyādeśarūpā) yathā— pañcamyāstasil (5.3.7), saptamyāstal (5.3.10), idamo saḥ (5.3.11), kimot (5.3.12), bhavān, dīrghāyuḥ, āyuṣmān, devānāṃ priyaḥ, (5.3.14 mabhā.), te 'nyāsāṃ ceti | yathā— sarvasmāt sarvataḥ, yasmin yatra, taṃ bhavantaṃ tato bhavantaṃ, etena dīrghāyuṣā atra dīrghāyuṣā, ihāyuṣmate, kasya devānāṃ priyasya k‍va de‍vānāṃ priyasya iti |
(pratyayādeśarūpā)—'taseś‍ca' (5.3.8) tasi | sa ca pratiyoge pañcamyāstasiḥ (5.4.44), 'apādāne cāhiyaruhoḥ' (5.4.45), 'atigrahā vyathanakṣepeṣvakarttari tṛtīyāyāḥ' (5.4.46), ṣaṣṭhyā vyāśraye (5.4.48), 'ādyādibhyaś‍ca sarvavibhaktiḥ', iti | yathā— 'abhimanyurarjunataḥ prati', śailato 'vatarati, śīlato 'vigṛhyate, devā arjunato 'bhavam, ādau āditaḥ, pramāṇena pramāṇataḥ iti |
(pratyayarūpā)— sarvaikānyakiṃyattadaḥ kāle dā' (5.3.15), idamorhil (5.3.16), prakāravacane thāl (5.3.23), thā he tau ca cchandasi (5.3.26), 'idamasthamuḥ' (5.3.24), 'kimaś‍ca' (5.3.25) iti | yathā— sarvadā, etarhi, sarvathā prakathā, itthaṃ, katham iti |
2. avibhaktikāryapi trithā —
1. śabdektā 2. arthok‍tā 3. prayogok‍tā ca | tāsu —
śabdoktā yathā— saptamīpañcamīprathamābhyo 'stātiḥ (5.3.27), devamanuṣyapuruṣa—
puru—martyebhyo dvitīyāsaptamyorbahulam (5.4. 56), iti | yathā— purastād vasati (5.3.27, 5.4.56 kāśikā), purastādāgataḥ, purastād ramaṇīyam, devatrā gacchati, manuṣyatrā vasati, puruṣatrā 'bhiniviśate iti |
arthoktā 'bahvalpārthācchas‌kārakādanyatarasyām' (5.4.42), saṃkhyāyāḥ kriyābhyāvṛttigaṇane kṛtvasuc (5.4.17) iti | yathā— bahu dehi bahuśo dehi, dvau dvau dehi dviśo dehi, dvābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ dehi dviśo dehi, māṣaṃ māṣaṃ dehi māṣaśo dehi, pañca vārān dehi pañcakṛtvo dehi iti |
prayogoktā—'tena tulyaṃ kriyā ced vatiḥ' (5.1.115), 'tatra tasyeva' (5.1.116) iti | yathā— ag‍ninā tulyamayaṃ varttate ag‍nivat, daivamiva bhavantaṃ paś‍yāmi devavat, brāhmaṇena tulyamasmai dīyate brāhmaṇavat, vyāghreṇa tulyamasmād bibheti vyāghravat, mathurāyāmiva pāṭaliputre prāsādāḥ madhurāvat, śrotriyasyevāsya śuk‍lā dantāḥ śrotriyavat | taddhitavibhaktiriti vak‍tavye avyayagrahaṇam | adhistri, pratyurasam, pāregaṅgam, purā, svayaṃ, sākṣāt, ityevamādīnāmupa— saṃgrahaṇārthamiti ||
(7. upasarjanam)
prathamānirdiṣṭaṃ samāsa upasarjanam (1.2.43), 'ekavibhakti cāpūrvanipāte' (1.2.44) |
tat tridhā — 1. viśeṣyarūpam, 2. viśeṣaṇarūpam, 3. tulyarūpaṃ ca |
(1. viśeṣyarūpam)
tatra viśeṣyarūpaṃ yathā— puruṣo 'yaṃ vyāghra iva puruṣavyāghraḥ, pūjito 'ś‍vaḥ aś‍vakuñjaraḥ, garbhiṇī gaurgogarbhiṇī, stoko 'g‍nirag‍nistokaḥ, kāyasya pūrvaṃ pūrvakāyaḥ, ardhaṃ pippalyā ardhapippalī iti |
(2. viśeṣaṇarūpam)
viśeṣaṇarūpaṃ yathā— rājñaḥ puruṣo rājapuruṣaḥ, dantānāṃ rājā rājadantaḥ, kaṣṭaṃ śritaḥ kaṣṭaśritaḥ, jīvikāmāpanna āpannajīvikaḥ, nīlamutpalaṃ nīlotpalam, uttamaḥ puruṣaḥ puruṣottama iti |
(3. tulyarūpam) tulyarūpaṃ yathā— śastrīva ś‍yāmā śastrīś‍yāmā, khañjaś‍cāsau kubjaś‍ceti khañjakubjaḥ, nirgataḥ kauśāmbyā niṣkauśāmbiḥ, citrā gāvo 'sya citraguḥ, ardhaṃ tṛtīyameṣām ardhatṛtīyāḥ (mabhā.2.2.24(vā.22)), ke sabrahmacāriṇo 'sya 'kiṃsabrahmacārī' (mabhā.2.2.24 (vā. 22)) iti |
nanu ca ardhaṃ tṛtīyameṣāmiti anyapadārtho nopapadyate, sa hi tatra syāt, yatra yeṣāṃ padānāṃ samāsaḥ tato 'nyasya padasyārtho bhavati |
naiṣa doṣaḥ | avayavena vigrahaḥ samudāyaḥ samāsārthaḥ |
nanvevaṃ sati, 'asi—dvitīyo 'nusasāra pāṇḍavam' (mabhā.), 'saṃkarṣaṇadvitīyasya balaṃ kṛṣṇasya vardhatāmi'—tyādiṣu dvayordvivacanamiti dvivacanaṃ prāp‍noti |
naivam | asirdvitīyo yasyetyanyapadārthenaika evocyate | yathā—'janārdanastvātmacaturtha eva' {6.3.5 (2) mabhā.} iti | yadi vā dvitīyaśabdo 'yamasti tṛtīyāntaḥ saṃkhyāpūraṇaḥ | asti cāvyutpannaḥ sahāyavācī, tasyeha grahaṇam asidvitīyo 'sisahāya ityarthaḥ |
ātmacaturtha iti ko 'yaṃ samāsaḥ ?
nanvanyapadārtha 'ātmā caturthaḥ asye'—ti | ātmanā caturtha iti tatpuruṣaḥ kasmānna bhavati ? 'ātmanaḥ pūraṇe' (6.3.6) iti tṛtīyāyā aluk‍prasaṅgāt |
yadyevam aluk na vak‍tavyaḥ—'ātmanā caturtha iti vākyaṃ bhaviṣyati, ātmacaturtha iti ca vṛttiḥ |
na cātmacaturtha ityuk‍te bahuvrīhau tatpuruṣe vā 'rthabhedo vidyate, ubhayathā 'pi catuḥsaṃkhyopalakṣita— samudāyaḥ pratīyate |
naivam | evaṃ sati, 'rājñaḥ sakhā' rājasakha ityapyuk‍te saṃbandhādetad gantavyam—nūnaṃ rājā asya sakhā; rājasakheti cokte gantavyametat 'rājñaḥ sakhā 'yam' iti | tataś‍ca bahuvrīhitatpuruṣayoranyataro na prāp‍noti |
maivam | astyatra viśeṣaḥ— tatpuruṣe samāsānto bhavati 'yathā svasti 1somasakhāya te' {taisaṃ. 1.2.4.2, mabhā. 2.1.24(5)}, bahuvrīhau na bhavati | yathā— 'vṛtraṃ jahi marutsakhe!'2 iti |
ihāpi tarhyasti viśeṣaḥ— tatpuruṣe 3ātmanācaturthasādhyametat, bahuvrīhau 'ātmacaturtha— sādhyametadi'ti | api ca
1. svayaṃ bhoja eva vedamantrānanyathayate | tathāhi atra saṃhitā—'svasti somasakhā punarehīti pāṭhaḥ, sa eva ca mahābhāṣye—rā | 2. kutratyamidaṃ vacanamiti praś‍ne rāghavo 'brūta ākaro naiva jñāyata iti | vayaṃ tu manyāmahe tadidaṃ bhojavacanameveti | 3. alugāpattiriyam |
anyathājātīyaḥ pratyakṣeṇārthasaṃpratyayaḥ,anyathājātīyaḥ khalvanumānena bhavati | tatrāyaṃ rājñaḥ sakhā, ātmanā caturtha iti pratyakṣeṇa, sambandhasya ubhayaniṣṭhatvānnūnaṃ rājā 'pyasya sakhā, ātmā 'pyasya caturtha ityanumānena | evaṃ bahuvrīhāvapi draṣṭavyam |
atha yathātmacaturtha iti samudāyasyaikārthatvādekavacanam evam ardhatṛtīyā ityatrāpi kasmānna bhavati ?
anye 'pyekārthāḥ samudāyā bhavanti | tad‍yathā— śatam, yūtham, vanamiti |
viṣama upanyāsaḥ | ātmacaturtha ityatra hi bahuvrīhiṇopasarjanīkṛtapratīyamānā— parasaṃkhyeyasamānādhikaraṇātmacaturthaśabdaśak‍tyabhidheyo janārdana eko 'syetyanyapadārthaḥ pratipādyate; iha tu ardhatṛtīyaśabdaśak‍tyabhidheyāstrayaḥ saṃkhyeyāḥ |
tatra yadyekavacanaṃ vākye vṛttau vā bhavati keṣāṃ tadardhaṃ tṛtīyaṃ bhavati ?
nanvevamapi ardhatṛtīyā droṇā iti droṇaśabdaḥ samudāye vṛtto nārdhe varttate |
naiṣa doṣaḥ | samudāyeṣu vṛttāḥ śabdā avayaveṣvapi varttante | tad‍yathā pūrve pañcālāḥ, uttarāḥ kuravaḥ {mabhā. 2.2.24(25)},
atha dvau droṇāvardhāḍhakaṃ ca karttavyamardhatṛtīyadroṇā iti |
na karttavyam |
samudāye śabdāḥ pravṛttāḥ teṣvavayaveṣu varttante, yo 'vayavastaṃ samudāyaṃ na vyabhicarati (mabhā. 2.2.24), yathā droṇārdhaṃ droṇam | āḍhakārdhamāḍhakamiti |
yadyardhaṃ tṛtīyamanayoriti vigrahaḥ kriyate to doṣaḥ syāt ? ṣaṣṭhyartho nopapadyate |
kiṃ hi dvayostṛtīyamardhaṃ bhavati ? bhavānapi pṛṣṭo vyācaṣṭām |
atheha devadattasya bhrāteti kaḥ sambandhārthaḥ ?
ekasmāt prādurbhāva iti cet, vārttaṃ tata, tad‍yathā ārthikānāmekapratiśrayadvijānāṃ prātarutthāya vipratiṣṭhamānānāṃ na kaś‍cit parasparamabhisambandho bhavati evaṃjātīyaṃ bhrātṛtvaṃ nāma, tatra ced yuk‍taḥ ṣaṣṭhyartho dṛśyate ihāpi yuk‍to dṛś‍yatām | dvayorhyanujanmā tṛtīyo bhavati | dṛś‍yate cānyatrāpi dvayostṛtīyena saṃbandhaḥ | tad‍yathā— (raghuvaṃśe 6.29)
nisargabhinnāspadamekasaṃsthamasmin dvayaṃ śrīś‍ca sarasvatī ca |
kāntyā girā sūnṛtayā ca yogyā tvameva kalyāṇi ! tayostṛtīyā || 54 || iti |
nanvevam ardhatṛtīyā ānīyantāmityardhānayanaṃ na prāp‍noti, bahuvacanaṃ ca nopapadyate |
naiṣa doṣaḥ | bhavati hi bahuvrīhau tadguṇasaṃvijñānamapi/?/ | tad‌yathā— 'śuklavāsasamānaya,' lohitoṣṇīṣā ṛtvijaḥ pracarantīti tadguṇa ānīyate, tadguṇāś‍ca pracaranti | bahuvacanaṃ tu dvitrādivadupapadyate iti | tatra yathā ānīyantāmiti trayāṇāmiva dvayorapyānayanapakṣe bahuvacanamupapannaṃ bhavati, tathehāpi bhaviṣyati |
viṣama upanyāsaḥ | tatra hi dvau vetyuk‍to trayo veti gamyate, trayo vetyuk‍te dvau veti gamyate; saiṣā samānādhikaraṇapadārthapañcakādhiṣṭhānā vāk | tatra yuktaṃ bahuvacanam, iha tvardhaṃ tṛtīyamanayorityuktaṃ, yadyapi gamyate trayāṇāṃ pūraṇastṛtīyo bhavatīti tathāpi samāse 'nyapadārthaparatayā dvayorevābhidhānād bahuvacanasya notpattiḥ | tadguṇasaṃvijñānamapi samāsābhidhānapakṣa evopapadyate, samāsaś‍ca sāmarthye sati bhavati, sāmarthyaṃ ca vṛttivākyayoraikārthyam, tacca tadopajāyate, yadi vṛttāviva vākye 'pi samāsārthasya bahuvacanaṃ bhavati ||
atha 'kiṃsabrahmacārī'—ti ko 'yaṃ samāsaḥ? ke sabrahmacāriṇo 'syeti |
kaḥ sabrahmacārīti karmadhārayaḥ kasmānna bhavati?
bhavati, yadi kṣepo gamyate, yathā kiṃrājā yo na rakṣati, kiṃgauḥ yo na vahati |
keṣāṃ sabrahmacārīti tatpuruṣastarhi bhavatu kaṭha iti prativacanaṃ nopapadyate | na hyanyat pṛṣṭenānyadākhyeyam, ataḥ kaṭhānāmiti prativak‍tavyaṃ bhavati |
bahuvrīhāvapyetat tulyameva, tatrā 'pi ke sabrahmacāriṇo 'syeti bahuvacanapraś‍ne kaṭha iti naikavacanenottaraṃ bhavati |
bahuvrīhāvapyetat tulyameva, tatrā 'pi ke sabrahmacāriṇo 'syeti bahuvacanapraś‍ne kaṭha iti naikavacanenottaraṃ bhavati |
naiṣa doṣaḥ | 'ag‍nau karavāṇī'— (mabhā. 2.2.24)—ti nyāyena bhaviṣyati | tad‍yathā kaś‍cidāha— 'ag‍no karavāṇīti, tatra kurviti tatkarttaryanujñāte karmāpyanujñātaṃ bhavati, apara āha 'ag‍nau kariṣye, tatra kriyatāmiti karmaṇyanujñāte karttāpyanujñāto bhavati | evaṃ yathaiva ke sabrahmacāriṇo 'syetyuk‍te kaṭhā iti pratyuk‍te sambandhādetad gamyate ayamapi kaṭhaḥ, tathā kaṭha ityapyukte saṃbandhādetadavagantavyaṃ te 'pi kaṭhāḥ | samāsena tu pratinirdeṣṭumaśakyam, upasarjanaṃ hi tatra te bhavantīti ||
(8. samāsaḥ)
aikapadyaṃ samāsaḥ |
sa tridhā— 1. upaś‍liṣṭakriyaḥ, 2. gamitakriyaḥ, 3. akriyaś‍ca | teṣu—
(1) upaś‍liṣṭakriyo dvidhā 1. ubhayasthakriyaḥ 2. anyatarasthakriyaś‍ca | tayoḥ
ubhayasthakriyo yathā— kṛtākṛtam, kliṣṭākliśitaḥ, s‍nātānuliptaḥ, bhraṣṭaluñcitaḥ (kāśikā 2.2.31) kṛṣṭā 'tikṛṣṭam, krayākrayikā iti |
anyatarasthakriyo yathā— bhojyoṣṇam, prāptajīvikaḥ, āhitāg‍niḥ, kaṣṭaśritaḥ, kākapeyā, idhmapravraś‍cana iti |
(2) gamitakriyo dvidhā 1. ubhayakārakaḥ, anyatarakārakaś‍ca | tayoḥ—
ubhayakārako yathā— dadh‍nopaś‍liṣṭa odano dadhyodanaḥ, guḍena miśrā dhānā guḍadhānāḥ, śaṅkulayā kṛtaḥ khaṇḍaḥ śaṅkulākhaṇḍaḥ, akṣeṣu prasak‍taḥ śauṇḍaḥ akṣaśauṇḍaḥ, kaṇṭhe sthitaḥ kālo yasya kaṇṭhekālaḥ, pañcasu kapāleṣu saṃskṛtaḥ pañcakapāla iti |
anyatarakārako yathā— 'pragata ācāryaḥ prācāryaḥ', 'atikrānto mālāmatimālaḥ, avakruṣṭaḥ kokilayā avakokilaḥ, pariglāno 'dhyayanāt paryadhyayanaḥ, niṣkrāntaḥ kauśāmbyāḥ niṣkauśāmbiḥ, prapatitāni palāśānyasya prapalāśa iti |
(3) akriyo dvidhā 1. vasturūpaḥ 2. avasturūpaś‍ca | tayoḥ
vasturūpo yathā— upakumbham, tribhuvanam, nīlotpalam, rājapuruṣaḥ, citraguḥ, dhavakhadirau iti |
avasturūpo yathā— adhistri, pratyurasam, yathāśakti, yāvadamatram, pāregaṅgam, madhyesamudram iti |
ayaṃ tūpaś‍liṣṭakriyo gamitakriyaś‍ca bhavati | yathā—
āyatīgavamāgacchatyātiṣṭhadgūpatiṣṭhate |
nikucyakarṇi śārdūlo 'pohyapucchi pradhāvati || 55 || (5.4.128 kāśikā),
yathā ca—
1śalākāparyabhidyūnaṃ catuṣparyakṣaparyapi |
viparyaste vidhau yaś‍ca nalāderapi jāyate || 56 || (2.1.10)
keśākeśi, bāhūvāhavi, daṇḍādaṇḍi, muṣṭīmuṣṭi, ityapi gamitakriyamasattvarūpaṃ kecit | yathā— (māgha. 18.12)
roṣāveśādābhimukhyena kaucinnāmagrāhaṃ raṃhasaivopajātau |
bhittvā hetī mallavanmuṣṭighātairgh‍nantau bāhūbāhavi vyāsajetām || 57 ||
kecit punarasya vasturūpatvaṃ bruvate | yathā—
daṇḍādaṇḍi na kurvanti na kacākaci kokilāḥ |
tathāpi jitamevābhirvāgbhireva jagattrayam || 58 || iti |
kutaḥ punaretad yadekadā daṇḍādaṇḍyādayaḥ sattvarūpāḥ, anyadā tvasattvarūpā iti ?
'tatra tenedamiti sarūpe' (2.2.27) sūtrasya vyākhyānabhedāt | tatrāsya sūtrasyāyamarthaḥ—dve samānākṛtī śabdarūpe anyapadārthe samasyete tatreti teneti ca |
kaḥ punarihānyapadārthaḥ ?
kecidāhuḥ — itiśabdasya prakāravācakatvāditthamiti, kecit punaḥ idamitthamiti | tatra pūrvasmin pakṣe 'sattvarūpatā, itiśabdasyāsattvavācitvāt | uttarasmin sattvarūpatā, idamiti sarvanām‍nā vasturūpaparāmarśāt |
kaḥ punarihetiśabdārthaḥ ?
yo 'sau tatretyadhikaraṇe teneti karaṇe vā idamarthānuyāyinī itikarttavyatārūpā kriyā, 'tatra gṛhītvā', 'tena prahṛtya' ityādikaḥ sarvanāmārtho yattaditi, taditi vyapadeśārthagrahaṇa— praharaṇādikāyāḥ kriyāyāḥ sādhyaṃ yuddhādi |
tadāha candragomī 'tatra gṛhītvā tena prahṛtya yuddhe sarūpam, supsupaikārthaṃ bhavati' (cāndravyā. 2.2.47, 2.2.1) iti |
1. atra 'śalakāpari, catuṣpari, akṣaparīti dyūtaparibhāṣāḥ | tataś‍cottarārdhe nalāderityeva yujyate paṭhitum na tu 'talāde' riti | tata eva uttarārdhamaspaṣṭamiti rāghavācāryaḥ | na ca 'pāṇḍulekho na parivarttanīya' iti maryādāyā nalapāṭhe nāsti rakṣeti rāghavāryairapi na rakṣitā sā 'sarvatra' pāṭhāntaraṃ paśyadbhirebhirārambhata eva svairaṃ paṭhitānyathāmūlapāṭhatvasya dṛṣṭacaratvāt | nasya tatvenāvabodho lipibhrama eva |
kimetad vak‍tavyam?
(na vak‍tavyam)1 |
kathamanucyamānaṃ gamyate?
'sarūpa' ityekaśeṣāpavādane dvayoradhikaraṇayoḥ karaṇayoś‍ca tulyakālanirdeśāt | tarhi dvayostulyabalayoḥ pratiyoginorvyāpāramantareṇa dvayoradhikaraṇayoḥ karaṇayorvā tulyakālanirdeśo bhavati, tathāpi yuddhādiniyamo (na) labhyate |
kaḥ punarāha niyama iti?
yuddhagrahaṇāderanyatrāpi prayogāt | haste haste ca gṛhītvā mitrāya putraṃ samarpayati hastāhasti, gālibhiś‍ca gālibhiś‍ca nirbhartsya pravṛttaḥ parihāso gālāgāli iti ||
nanu cānyapadārthe bahuvrīhirityucyamāne—
vispaṣṭapaṭurvaṭuḥ, (6.2.24), punarutsyūtaṃ vāsaḥ, paraśśatāḥ śarada' (saka. 3.2.55) iti sāmānyasamāsānāṃ;
svayaṃdhautau pādau (2.1.25), sāmibhuktamannam (saka. 3.2.55), śreṇīkṛtāḥ pattayaḥ (saka. 3.2.55) iti viśeṣasamāsānām;
vinikṛttaprarụ̄dho vṛkṣaḥ (2.1.49), kṛṣṇapiṅgalo grāvā, īṣatkaḍāro 'ś‍meti viśeṣaṇasamāsānām;
avakokilaṃ vanam {2.2.18(3)}, paryadhyayanaś‍chātra {2.2.18(4)}, niṣkauśāmbiḥ sārthaḥ {2.2.18(5)} iti prādisamāsānām;
śastrīśyāmā devadattā, avataptenakulasthitaṃ tavaitat, kūpamaṇḍūko māṇavaka iti upamānasamāsānām;
rājavallabhā valabhī, varapradeyā kanyā (sa.ka. 3.2.47), māse jāto 'syeti (2.2.5) ṣaṣṭhīsamāsānām;
kaṣṭaśrito ripuḥ (2.1.24), vṛkabhīto nyaṅkuḥ (2.1.37), śaṅkulākhaṇḍaḥ (2.1.30), pogaṇḍa iti kārakasamāsānām (śrṛ.pra. 8);
aśrāddhabhojī brāhmaṇaḥ, pumān (abhāryaḥ), anekaḥ padārthaḥ (śrṛpra. 8, saka. 3.2.128), iti n‌ñ‌samāsānāṃ ca bahuvrīhisaṃjñā prāp‍noti |
naivam, naiṣāmanyapadārthatvaṃ samāsena kriyate, apitu guṇavacanena | yadasau dravyaṃ śrito
1. idamatra rāghavācāryeṇāyoji 'sarvatra luptami'—ti ṭippaṇaṃ dadatā |
bhavati guṇastasya yalliṅgaṃ vacanamartho vā sa tasyāpi bhavati | tad‍yathā śuklaṃ vastram, śuklā śāṭī, śuklaḥ kambalaḥ, śuklau paṭau, śuklāḥ paṭā iti {mabhā. 1.2.64(54)} |
kathaṃ punaḥ vispaṣṭapaṭuprabhṛtīnāṃ sāmānyasamāsatā ?
vispaṣṭādīni guṇavacaneṣu (6.2.24) iti jñāpakaiḥ samāsāvagame viśeṣaṇasamāsa— saṃjñābhāve 'saha supā' (2.1.4) iti samāsābhyupagame na 'prāk‍kaḍārāt samāsaḥ' (2.1.3) iti samāsasya samāsasaṃjñāśravaṇāt |
kathaṃ svayaṃdhautādīnāṃ viśeṣaṇasamāsatā?
'svayaṃ ktena' (2.1.25), 'sāmi' (2.1.27), iti 'svayaṃsāmī'—ti śabdayorvṛttivākyāviśeṣe 'pi svaraikapadyārthameva (2.1.27 kāśikā) samāsārambhāt | śreṇyādayaḥ kṛtādibhiḥ (2.1.59), cavyarthe(2.1.59 vā) iti vṛttāvarthaviśeṣāt |
kathaṃ chinnaprarụ̄dhādīnāṃ viśeṣaṇasamāsatā?
chinnaś‍cāsau prarūḍhaś‍cetyādiprakāreṇa viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvāt |
nanu ca yadā chinno na tadā prārūḍhaḥ, yadā prarụ̄dho na tadā chinnaḥ | tat kathamarthayoḥ parasparamasaṃmūrcchanāyāṃ samānādhikaraṇalakṣaṇo viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvo bhavati?
ya eva chinnaḥ sa evāyaṃ prarūḍha ityanusandhānāt |
atheha kathaṃ kṛṣṇapiṅgala iti?
yo hyasya kṛṣṇo bhāgaḥ na sa piṅgalaḥ, yastu piṅgalaḥ sa na kṛṣṇa iti |
samudāyeṣu vṛttāḥ śabdā avayaveṣu varttante, yathā pūrve pāñcālāḥ, 'uttarā kurava' iti | yadi vā kṛṣṇāvayavayogāt sa eva kṛṣṇaḥ, piṅgalāvayavayogāt sa piṅgala ityupapadyate sāmānādhikaraṇyam |
atha īṣadityanena kiṃ viśeṣyam?
kaḍāraguṇayuktaḥ padārthaḥ |
kathaṃ punaravyayānāmasattvavacanatve sattvabhūtārthaviśeṣaṇatvaṃ bhavati?
kriyāviśeṣaṇatvāt |
kā punaratra kriyā?
kaḍāreṇa guṇena yogaḥ | yadi vā 'vyayānāṃ keṣāñcit sattvagandhitvena śaktiyogādiḥ sattvadharmo dṛśyate | tad‍yathā doṣāmanyam ahaḥ, divāmanyā rātriḥ (mabhā. 1.1.41) |
(granthapāto 'tra—rā.)
'divākarād rakṣati yo guhāsu līnaṃ divā bhītamivāndhakāram' (kusaṃ. 1.12) iti 'grahavati? mitrahāriṇi? na tvaṃ yoṣā 'si, doṣā 'si' iti| evamayamapi sattvagandhitvena guṇaṃ viśiṃṣan dravyaṃ viśeṣayiṣyati|
nanu kaḍāraṃ dravyameva kasmānna viśeṣayati? yathā īṣattantraṃ kātantramiti|
tathā sati guṇasyeṣad‍bhāvo na labhyate, taduktam 'īṣad‍guṇavacanena' (2.2.7) iti|
atha kathaṃ prādīnāṃ dravyavacanaiḥ samāsaḥ?
yatra hi kaś‍cit kriyāvācī śabdaḥ prayujyate tatraiva prādināṃ prayogo bhavati|
ucyate, prayogādevaitad gantavyam nūnamatra prayogārhaḥ śabdo na prayujyate, yena prādeḥ sāmarthyamiti| tad‍yathā dhūmaṃ dṛṣ‍ṭvā 'gniratreti gamyate, 1triviṣ‍ṭabdhakaṃ dṛṣ‍ṭvā 'parivrājaka' iti|
ke punaratra prayogārhāḥ śabdāḥ?
ye kṛdantāḥ karmakarttṛvācinaḥ, tad‍yathā avakruṣ‍ṭaṃ kokilayā avakokilam, pariglāno 'dhyayanāt paryadhyayanaḥ, niṣkrāntaḥ kauśāmbyāḥ niṣkauśāmbiḥ' iti|
atha kathaṃ śastrīśyāmādaya upamānasamāsā upapadyante?
upamānāni sāmānyavacanaiḥ (2.1.55) ityādibhiḥ|
yadyevam, 'ivena vibhaktyalopaḥ pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaratvaṃ ca' (2.1.4) iti na vak‍tavyam, 'vāsasī iva, kanye iva' ityādiprayogāṇām, upamānāni sāmānyavacanairityanenaiva siddheḥ, vibhaktyalopamātraṃ punaralukprakaraṇe vak‍tavyaṃ bhavati|
ucyate nāyāmivaśabdaḥ sāmānyavācī, api tu sāmānyadyotakaḥ| tad‍yathā—netre nīlotpale ityukte tadākāra—kāntyādayaḥ pratīyante| śastrīśayāmetyādiṣu sākṣāt sāmānyavacanaḥ śyāmāśabdaḥ prayujyate|
atha avatap‍tenakulasthitāmityatra katham?
na hyayamupamāyām, apitu kṣepe| upamānenā 'tra kṣepo gamyate—avatap‍te nakulasyeva sthitaṃ tavaitaccāpalamiti yathā 'vatap‍te nakulaś‍cirasthātā na bhavati tadvat kārthamārabhya yaṃśicaraṃ tatra nāvatiṣ‍ṭhate sa evamucyate 'avatap‍te—nakula—sthitaṃ tavaitaditi|
etena kūpamaṇḍūka ityapi vyākhyātam| yathā kūpamaṇḍūkaḥ kūpād bahiraniḥsaran na deśāntaravyavahāravedī, sa evamevamucyate kūpamaṇḍūko 'yamiti|
1. triviṣ‍ṭabdhakaṃ tridaṇḍamiti rāghavācāryaḥ |
atha rājavallabhetyādayaḥ kathaṃ ṣaṣ‍ṭhīsamāsāḥ? yato rājavallabhetyayaṃ bahuvrīhiḥ kasmānna bhavati rājā vallabho 'syā iti?
acetanatvena valabhyā vāllabhyāyogāt| rājñastu vallabheti bhavati| tatra rājā nirjñātasyārthaḥ, svabhāvataḥ sāmānyāt pracyutaḥ, sāmānye vyavasthitasyopakarttumaśak‍teḥ, sambandhisāmānyāpekṣaḥ saṃbandhiviśeṣāpekṣo vā, sambandhyantarasya vyavacchedārthaṃ pravṛtteḥ, ubhayādhiṣ‍ṭhānatve satyapi saṃbandhasya parārthamupādānādud‍bhūtasaṃndhapravṛtti, upajāta— pratipādikārthavyatirekaḥ, ātmani sambandhopabhogāt pradhāne 'pyupayujayamānasambandhaṣaṣ‍ṭhyanta upādīyate| pradhānāni cānirjñātārthāni prathamayaiva vibhaktyā yujyante| tad‍yathā— kva punaridaṃ paṭhitam, bhrājā nāma ś‍lokā (mabhā. pṛ. 3kīlhārna)| tataś‍ca vallabhā— śabdo 'nirjñātārthatvātmavyapadeśāya svārthaviśeṣe niyamyamāna uparatautsukya audāsīnyena pravarttate| tatra bhedādhiṣ‍ṭhānasya sambandhasya vācikā ṣaṣ‍ṭhī, padāntarābhidheye sambandhinyākāṅkṣāvātā guṇapadena viśeṣyamāṇā guṇapadasthā śrūyate, viśeṣaviṣayatvāt samāsasya| guṇāś‍ca svārthepasarjanapradhānārthepapādino bhede nivarttamāne bhedādhiṣ‍ṭhānaṃ sambandhamabhyantarīkṛtya pravarttante| tatra rājavallabheti sambandhe prātipadikārthatāmāpādyamāne tadviṣayā ṣaṣ‍ṭhī, svabhāvato nivṛttā kāryārthaṃ sāmānyena prasak‍tā 'supo dhātuprātipadikayoḥ' (2.4.71) iti śāstrād vinivarttamāne vānvākhyāyate|
atha 'varapradeyā kanye'—ti ko 'yaṃ samāsaḥ?
ṣaṣ‍ṭhītatpurūṣa eva yathā devadeyaṃ puṣpam, brāhmaṇadeyaṃ dhanam iti|
nanvevamete caturthīsamāsāḥ kasmānna bhavanti?
'caturthī tadarthārthabalihitasukharakṣitaiḥ' (2.1.36) iti tadarthādiṣveva tatsamāmnānāt|
tadarthya eva hi tarhi samāsā bhavantu, taddhi yasmai pradīyate tadarthameva tad bhavati|
naivam, na tādarthyamātre caturthī samasyate, yathā 'vahananāyolūkhalam, api tu prakṛti— vikāratādarthye, yathā yūparūpāyā vikṛteḥ prakṛtibhūtaṃ dārū yūpadārviti (2.1.36 kāśikā)|
nanū ca nā 'tra prakṛtivikāragrahaṇamasti, dṛśyate cāprakṛtivikārabhāve 'pi aś‍vaghāsaḥ, aś‍vasuram, 'athāto dharmajijñāsā' (pūrvamīmāṃsādarśanaṃ 1.1.1), iti caturthīsamāsaḥ| tatkathamucyate prakṛtivikāratādarthya eva caturthyāḥ sāmārthyamiti?
acāryapravṛttirjñāpayati yadayaṃ balirakṣitagrahaṇaṃ karoti| yathājātīyakānāṃ ca samāse balirakṣitagrahaṇamapunarūktaṃ bhavati, tathājatīyakānāṃ samāsaḥ| vikṛtīnāmeva caturthyantānāṃ prakṛtibhiḥ saha samāse balirakṣitagrahaṇamapunarūktaṃ bhavati, na tādarthyamātre| aś‍vaghāsādayastu ṣaṣ‍ṭhīsamāsā bhaviṣyanti| yaddhi yadarthaṃ bhavati ayamapi tatrābhisambandhaḥ, tasyedamiti tad‍yathā guroridaṃ yad‍gurvarthamiti| tādarthyaṃ hi sambandhaviśeṣaḥ| viśeṣe cāvaśyameva sāmānyaṃ saṃbhavati| na caitat karmādiṣvapi na dṛśyate, na māṣāṇāmaś‍nīyāt, kṣutaṃ te sarvamevaitaditi|
nanu ca varapradeyā kanyeti yadi dadātiprayoge 'pi na saṃpradānam, sampradāne 'pi na caturthe, ko 'nyastayorviśeṣo bhaviṣyati?
kaḥ punarāha nātra saṃpradānam? saṃpradāna evaiṣā caturthyarthe ṣaṣ‍ṭhī| dṛśyate hi saṃpradānādau ṣaṣ‍ṭhīcaturthyeraviśeṣeṇa prayogaḥ, tad‍yathā 'himavato hastī' 'purūṣamṛgaś‍candramase', 'na vā are jāyāyai kāmāya jāyā priyā bhavati ātmanastu kāmāya jāyā priyā bhavati, cirāya dṛṣ‍ṭaḥ cirarātrāya dṛṣ‍ṭaḥ', 'rocate mama ghṛtaṃ saha mud‍gaiḥ śālayo dadhiśaraṃ kramukāś‍ca', ghṛtameva mamāpi rocate śrṛtaśītaṃ ca saśarkaraṃ payaḥ iti|
atha māsajāto 'yamiti kiṃpradhāno 'yaṃ samāsaḥ?
uttarapadārthapradhānaḥ| sadharmaṇā 'nenānyairūttarapadārthapradhānairbhavitavyam| anyeṣu cottara— padārthapradhāneṣu yaivāsāvantarvarttinī vibhaktistasyāḥ samāse 'pi śravaṇaṃ bhavati| tad‍yathā— rājñaḥ purūṣo rājapuruṣaḥ iti| iha punarvākye ṣaṣ‍ṭhī, samāse prathamā| kenaitagadevaṃ bhavati? yo 'sau māsajātayoḥ abhisaṃbandhaḥ sa samāse nivarttate, abhihitaḥ so 'rtho 'ntarbhūtaḥ prātipadikārthaḥ saṃpanna iti, tatra 'prātipadikārthe prathamā' (2.3.46) iti prathamā bhavati|
na tarhīdānīmidaṃ bhavati māsajātasyeti|
bāhyaṃ sambandhinamapekṣya bhaviṣyati|
nanu ca 'kālāḥ parimāṇinā' (2.2.5) ityanenāyaṃ samāsaḥ| na ca jātasya māsaḥ parimāṇam, apitu triṃśadarātrasya, yathā droṇo badarāṇāṃ davadattasyeti na devadattasya droṇaḥ parimāṇam, apitu badarāṇām| tadāha 'kālasya yena samāsastasyāparimāṇitvādanirdeśa' (mabhā. 2.2.5 vā—1) iti|
(kālapadārthaḥ)
kiṃ punarbhavān kālaṃ manyate ?
yena mūrttīnāmupacayā apacayāś‍ca lakṣyante |
tasyaiva tarhi kayācit kriyayā yuktasyāhariti (nāma) bhavati, rātririti ca |
kayā kriyayā ?
ādityagatyā | tayaivāsakṛdāvṛttayā māsa iti ca bhavati, saṃvatsara iti ca bhavati | yadyevaṃ bhavati jātasya māsaḥ parimāṇam, kiṃ nu māsau jātasyetivat māso jātasya, māsā jātasyeti prāp‍noti |
naivam | māsajāta ityuk‍te dvitvādisaṃkhyāviśeṣasyānupalambhāt | yatra tūpalabdhe— rnimittamasti tatra bhavatyeva, yathā—dvau māsau jātasya dvimāsajātaḥ, evaṃ trimāsajāta iti |
kathaṃ punaḥ kārakāṇāṃ samāsa ityupapannaṃ bhavati ? teṣāṃ hi kriyayaivābhisaṃbandhaḥ | na ca kriyāvācinaḥ subantatvamasti; subantayorevāntarbhūtakriyāviśeṣayorbhaviṣyatīti cet, naivam, dravyāṇāṃ kriyopajanitaḥ sambandhaḥ śeṣaviṣayo bhavati, na kārakaviṣayaḥ | svabhāvasiddhaṃ hi dravyaṃ siddhavadabhidhīyamānaṃ dravyāntaraṃ prati ātmapratilambhe nirākāṅkṣaṃ, na karmādibhāvaṃ bhajate | na ca samāsaprakaraṇe kārakāṇi samasyanta iti vacanamasti |
ucyate— mā bhūd vacanam, arthaṃtastu gamyate, yadāha 'dvitīyā śritā'—dibhiḥ samasyate kaṣ‍ṭaṃ śritaḥ kaṣ‍ṭaśrita iti | tatra śrita ityupāttakriyāviśeṣaparicchinnaḥ karttā, abhyantarīkṛta—sādhyasādhana—saṃbandha—kriyāntarasambandhārhaḥ svāśrayaviṣayāsu bāhyāsu kriyāsu śak‍tyantarairapi virūddhaikārthasamavāyaḥ kaṣ‍ṭādīnyupasarjanībhūtayā śrayatikriyayā 'pekṣate | tataś‍ca śrayatikriyayā saṃbandhāt kaṣ‍ṭe karmatvamiti śrayaṇakriyāpūrvakaḥ kaṣ‍ṭaśritayorabhisaṃbandho bhavati | tasmin svavṛttyavayavārthaśaktya— nugṛhīte 'rthāntare prādurbhūte tadabhidhāyī śabdaḥ samāsasaṃjñāṃ labhate | evaṃ 'vṛkād bhīto vṛkabhīta' ityatrāpi 'pañcamī bhayena' (2.1.37) iti vṛkasya bhaye 'bhītrārthānāṃ bhayahetuḥ' (1.4.25) ityapādānatvāt sati sāmarthye, abhyantarīkṛtakriyākārakasaṃbandhaḥ samudāyaḥ samāsasaṃjñāṃ labhate |
nanu ca, na vṛkasya bhītaṃ prati apādānatvam, apitu bhayaṃ bhītiḥ ityetāni |
ucyate— yathā māso jātasyeti māsākhyaḥ kriyākalāpaḥ prathamakukṣigarbha— viyogākhyasya janmano 'vadhibhāvena paricchedako bhavati, janma pratilabdhāṃ vā sattāṃ
samāvṛttyā parimitena jātamapekṣate tathehāpi vṛkādityayamapādānaśabdo bhayamātrasyaivā— vacchedako bhaviṣyati, na bhītasya|
yadi vā yathā kaṣ‍ṭaśrita ityatropātta—śrayati—kriyāsaṃbandhāt kaṣ‍ṭe karmatvamiti śrayaṇakriyāpūrvakaṃ kaṣ‍ṭena saṃbadhyate, tathehāpyupāttabhayakriyāvacchinnaḥ karttā bhayakriyā— saṃbandhād vṛkasyāpādānatvamiti bhayakriyāpūrvakaṃ vṛkena saṃbhantsyata iti|
bhavatu yatropasarjanībhūtāyā api kriyāyāḥ śravaṇaṃ, yatra tu kriyā na śrūyate tatra kathaṃ śaṅkulākhaṇḍa iti?
pratīyamānā bhaviṣyati| tathāhi śṅkulākhaṇḍa ityukte kṛta iti pratīyate| tadetad dyotayatannāha 'tṛtīyā tatkṛtena1 guṇavacanena' (2.1.30) iti|
nyāsāsiddhatvād vacanānarthakyamiti cet, na, vacanasya niyamārthatvāt—'yatraiva kṛta ityādi gamyate tatraiva samāsaḥ, anyatra mā bhūdi'ti|
evaṃ ca gamyamāna—karotikriyopagṛhītakaraṇakartṛkaṃ tṛtīyāntena śaṅkulādinā khaṇḍādīnāṃ guṇamuktavatāṃ matublopādinā dravyavacanānāṃ tṛtīyāntārthakṛtatve sati sāmarthyamavasīyate, na tūktavaiparītye, yathā ākṣṇā kāṇaḥ, pādena khañjaḥ iti| tadevamākṣip‍ta karotikriyā 'vacchinnaḥ kriyāntarasambandhārhaḥ khaṇḍaśabdārtho gamyamānopasarjanībhūtayā karotikriyayā śaṅkulādīnapekṣamāṇaḥ karaṇabhūtaiḥ karttṛbhūtairvā śaṅkulādibhiḥ sambadhyate| tadvacanaś‍ca samudāyo 'bhyantarībhūtakriyākārakasaṃbandhaḥ samāsasaṃjño bhavati|
atheha kasmānna bhavati 'dadhnā paṭuḥ' 'ghṛtena paṭuḥ' iti?
asāmarthyāt|
kathamasāmarthyam?
sāpekṣamasamarthaṃ bhavati| na hi dadhnaḥ paṭunā sāmarthyam|
kiṃtarhi! bhujinā, dadhnā bhuṅkte paṭuriti|
ihāpi tarhi na prāpnoti śaṅkulayā khaṇḍa iti, atrāpi na śaṅkulāyāḥ khaṇḍena sāmarthyam kiṃ tarhi? karotinā, śaṅkulayā kṛtaḥ khaṇḍa iti|
tatkṛteneti vacanād bhaviṣyati|
vacanāditi ced, atheha guṇavacanetyucyamāne kathaṃ matublopād dravyavacanena khaṇḍādinā pratīyate?
1. mabhā. 2.1.30 tatkṛtārtheneti sūtrapāṭhaḥ|
iha tṛtīyā tatkṛtena guṇeneti siddhe yad‍vacanagrahaṇaṃ karoti tasyaitat prayojanam | evaṃ yathā vijñāyeta guṇamuktavān guṇavacanaḥ, khaṇḍaguṇavān khaṇḍaḥ, pāṇḍuguṇavān pāṇḍuḥ (mabhā, 2.1.30) iti |
yadyevam— nārthastatkṛtagrahaṇena bhavati, bhavati hi śaṅkulāyāḥ khaṇḍena sāmarthyam | asāmarthyādiha na bhaviṣyati dadh‍nā paṭuri— (mabhā. 2.1.30)—ti |
idaṃ tarhi tatkṛtasya prayojanam— dravyavacanaiḥ kārakasamāse tadanurūpā kriyā 'dhyāharttavyeti | tad‍yathā akṣeṣu prasak‍taḥ śauṇḍaḥ akṣaśauṇḍa iti |
atha dravyavacanaisyatkṛtasamāse guṇavacanenetyapi kimartham ?
iha mā bhūd—dhānyena dhanavān, gobhirvapāvāniti ||
atha aśrāddhabhojīti ko 'yaṃ samāsaḥ ?
asamarthanañ‌tatpurūṣaḥ | (mabhā. 2.1.1) |
kiṃ punarihā 'sāmarthyam ?
pūrvottarapadayormitho 'napekṣā | tathāhi aśrāddhabhojīti bhujikriyayā nañaḥ sambandhaḥ, na śrāddhena | na hi tasyāyaṃ niyamo na śrāddhaṃ bhok‍tavyamiti, apitu śrāddhaṃ na bhok‍tavyamiti | yatra hi varttipadārthasamavāyinī kriyā 'bhidhīyamānā pratīyamānā vā svabhāvato nivṛttā nañā dyotyate 'apācakaḥ, abrāhmaṇa' iti, tatraiva sāmarthyam | yatra tu bāhyakriyayā nañaḥ saṃbandhastatrā 'sāmarthyameva | yathā sūryamapi na paśyanti asūryaṃpaśyā rājadārāḥ, na punargīyante apunargeyāḥ ś‍lokāḥ, lavaṇaṃ na bhuṅkte avalaṇabhojī bhikṣuriti |
nanvevam— avayavārthavyatirik‍tasamudāyārthābhāve 'rthavattvābhāvāt kathaṃ prātipadikaṃsaṃjñā ?
samāsagrahaṇāditi ced anarthake kṛtārthatvānniyamā 'nupapattiḥ | tataś‍cārthavato vākyasyāpi prātipadikatvaprasaṅgaḥ |
nanu ca asūryalalāṭayodṛśitapoḥ (3.2.36), ityanenāsamarthanañsamāsānāṃ sādhutve jñāpite 'akiñcitkurvāṇa', 'amāṣaṃharamāṇaḥ', agādhādutsṛp‍ta/ṣ‍ṭam (mabhā. 2.1.1.) ityādīnāmapi mā bhūt samāsa ityasūryaṃpaśyādayaś‍catvāra evā 'samarthasamāsāḥ parigaṇyante, (mabhā.2.1.1.) parigaṇanasāmarthyādeva prātipadikasaṃjñāpi bhaviṣyati, tathāpyanarthakatvādā— śrayā 'bhāve, saṃkhyākarmādyabhāve teṣā vācikā dyotikā vāpi vibhak‍tayo notpadyeran ?
naivam, samudāyastāvadānarthakye 'pi 'na kevalā prakṛtiḥ prayok‍tavyā' iti niyamādavaśyamevāvyayādivad vibhaktimātramapekṣate, avayavastvarthavattvāt saṃkhyākarmā— derāśrayatvena tāṃ viśiṣ‍ṭāmevāṅgīkaroti | tataś‍ca yathā ' 'turānāturayorekabhojana— pratipattāvāturāṇāṃ bhojanamanāturo 'pi pratipadyate tathā 'vayavārthā 'nugrahārthako 'pi samudāyo vibhaktiviśeṣameva pratipatsyata iti na kaś‍cid doṣaḥ |
nanu 'asatyekārthībhāve vyapekṣādharmāḥ kathaṃ na nivarttante ?'
ke punaste ? 'viśeṣaṇayogaḥ, samuccayaḥ, saṃkhyāviśeṣa' iti (śrṛ.pra. 7) | tatra—
brāhmaṇasya śobhanaṃ 'śrāddhaṃ na bhuṅkta' iti viśeṣaṇayogaḥ,
śrāddhaṃ na bhuṅkte balimāmantraṇaṃ ceti samuccayaḥ,
śrāddhaṃ śrāddhāni vā bhuṅkte iti saṃkhyāviśeṣayogaḥ |
te ca vākya evopalabhyante, na tvaśrāddhabhojīti vṛttau, na hyaśrāddhabhojī(jo)brāhmaṇasya śobhanamityādi | tat kathamucyate nāstyatraikārthībhāva iti ?
naivam | aśrāddhaśabdo hyatrā 'samarthaḥ, na tvaśrāddhabhojiśabdaḥ | aśrāddhabhoji— viṣayāś‍caite viśeṣaṇayogadayaḥ pratīyante, nāśrāddhaviṣayā iti |
nanu ca yadyaśrāddhaśabdaḥ samudāyārthābhāvādanarthakaḥ, aśrāddhabhojiśabdo 'pyarthavada— narthakasaṃghātatvādanarthakaḥ prāp‍noti |
astvānarthakyam | vākyaviṣayāstu dharmā bhaviṣyanti tac‍cānarthakyamapi pariharttavyam idaṃ ca varihriyate, śabdaśaktireṣā yadabhinne 'pyarthe kenacicchabdenābhidhīyamāne viś‍oṣaṇādiyogo bhavati, kenacinna bhavati | tatra vākye 'samarthasamāsapadānāmavidyamānamāpi vṛttau śabdāntaratvā— dastyekārthābhidhāyitvamiti |
nanu ca, yadyasāmarthye 'pi vacanāt samāsaḥ 'kimadya me vas‍traṃ nīlamutpalamāli karṇe, neha kaś‍cit purūṣo vyāghraḥ sarati pallīm, paśya sakhi | kaṣ‍ṭaṃ śritaḥ priyo me gurūkulam; kiṃ te śaṅkulayā khaṇḍo devadatta utpalena; gaccha tvaṃ yūpāya dārū śobhanaṃ śaile, nivarttasva vṛkād bhayaṃ devadattasya yajñadattāt, bhāryā rājñaḥ purūṣo devadattasya; sak‍tastvamakṣeṣu śauṇḍaḥ pibati pānāgāre' ityādāvapi samāsaḥ prāp‍noti; sa tarhyatrāpi vacanād 'viśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyeṇa', 'dvitīyā śritādibhiḥ', 'tṛtīyā tatkṛtena', caturthī tadarthena', pañcamī bhayena', 'ṣaṣ‍ṭhī subantena', 'sap‍tamī śauṇḍādibhiḥ' samasyata iti |
viṣama upanyāsaḥ; parigaṇanādīnyasāmarthya eva samāsārthamārabhyante | yathā 'kṛtapūrvī kaṭami' tyādyarthaṃ 'pūrvādiniḥ' (5.2.86), sapūrvāc‍ca (5.2.87) iti | 'viśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyeṇa' ityevamādīni tu 'samarthaḥ padavidhiḥ' (2.1.1) iti sāmarthye satyupādīyante | sāmarthyaviṣayapradarśanārthameva ca 'viśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyeṇa' iti prathamāyāṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ dvitīyāyāṃ ca śritādiniyamaḥ, tṛtīyāyāṃ tatkṛtādivacanam, caturthyāṃ prakṛtivikārabhāvaḥ, pañcamyāṃ bhayādiparigaṇanam, ṣaṣ‍ṭhyāṃ pūraṇādiniṣedhaḥ, sap‍tamyāṃ śauṇḍādinirdeśa ityupapadyate | tena yatra viśeṣaṇādiṣu sāmānādhikaraṇyāderabhāvastatrāsāmarthyāt samāso na bhavati ||
abrāhmaṇo 'yamiti ko 'yaṃ samāsaḥ ? samarthanañtatpurūṣaḥ |
kiṃ pradhāno 'yam ?
uttarapadārthapradhānaḥ | abrāhmaṇamānatetyukte brāhmaṇamātrasyānayanaṃ prāp‍noti |
naiṣa doṣaḥ | idaṃ tāvadayaṃ praṣ‍ṭavyaḥ—atheha rājapurūṣamānayetyuk‍te purūṣamātrasyānayanaṃ kathaṃ na bhavati rājā 'tra viśeṣakaḥ prayujyate tena rājaviśiṣ‍ṭasyā ' 'nayanaṃ bhavaṣyiti |
ihāpi nañ—viśeṣakaḥ prayujyate, tena nañviśiṣ‍ṭasyānayanaṃ bhaviṣyati |
kaḥ punarasau ?
nivṛttapadārthakaḥ | yadā punarasya padārtho nivarttate tadā kiṃ svābhāvikī nivṛttiḥ ? āhosvid vācanikī ?
kiṃ cāp‍taḥ ? yadi svābhāvikī kiṃ nañ prayujyamānaḥ karoti ?
tarhi vācanikī bhaviṣyati; kiṃ ca pratikīlavat | tatra yathā kīla āhanyamānaḥ pratikīlaṃ nivarttayati, evaṃ nañ prayujyamānaḥ padārthaṃ nivarttayati |
yadyetannaño māhātmyaṃ syāt, na jātucid rājāno hastyaś‍vaṃ bibhṛyuḥ, netyeva brūyuḥ |
evaṃ tarhi svābhāvikī nivṛttiḥ, nañ‌nimittā tūpalabdhiḥ, tad‍yathā santamasāndhakāre dravyāṇāṃ pradīpanimittaṃ darśanam, na ca teṣāṃ pradīpo nivarttako bhavati | yadi punarayaṃ nivṛttipadārthako nañ, kimarthaṃ brāhmaṇaśabdaḥ prayujyate ?
evaṃ yathā vijñāyeta 'asya padasyārtho nivṛtta' iti,
neti hyuk‍te saṃdehaḥ syāt kasya padārtho nivarttata iti; tatrāsaṃdehārthaṃ brāhmaṇaśabdaḥ prayujyate | yadi vā sarva ete śabdāḥ avayaveṣvapi varttante brāhmaṇaḥ, kṣatriyaḥ, vaiśyaḥ, śūdra iti |
tapaḥ śrutaṃ ca yoniś‍ca tatra brāhmaṇakāraṇam |
tapaḥśrutābhyāṃ yo hīno jātibrāhmaṇa eva saḥ || 51 ||
tathā gauraḥ, kapilaḥ, piṅgalakeśaḥ ityetānapyantarān brāhmaṇye guṇān bruvanti | samudāyeṣu ca vṛttāḥ śabdā avayaveṣvapi varttante | tad‍yathā pūrve pañcālāḥ, uttarāḥ kurava iti | evamayaṃ samudāye brāhmaṇaśabdo vṛtto 'vayave 'pi varttate guṇe jātau ca | guṇe tāvad abrāhmaṇo 'yaṃ yastiṣ‍ṭhan mūtrayatīti, abrāhmaṇo 'yaṃ gacchan bhakṣayatīti |
api ca kālaṃ kalmāṣaṃ māṣarāśivarṇamāpaṇe āsīnaṃ dṛṣ‍ṭvā 'dhyavasyati nāyaṃ brāhmaṇaḥ, abrāhmaṇo 'yamiti nirjñātaṃ tasya bhavati, guṇakṛtā cārthasya nivṛttiḥ | atha jātau jātihīne saṃdehād durūpadeśād‍vā 'nyo brāhmaṇaśabdaḥ pravarttate | saṃdehāt tāvad gauramayaṃ śucyācāraṃ piṅgalaṃ kapilakeśaṃ dṛṣ‍ṭvā 'dhyavasyati brāhmaṇo 'yamiti | tataḥ paś‍cādulabhyate nāyaṃ brāhmaṇaḥ abrāhmaṇo 'yamiti | tatra durupadeśo brāhmaṇaśabdo varttate | jātikṛtā cārthasya nivṛttiḥ |
nanu ca —nañ‌vyavacchedāya brāhmaṇādiśabdaprayoge samāsasya pūrvapadapradhānatā prāp‍noti ?
naivam | avyayasaṃjñāprasaṅgāt avyayaṃ hyasya pūrvapadam |
naiṣa doṣaḥ | pāṭhenāvyayasaṃjñā kriyate, na ca naña‌samāsastatra paṭhyate | mā bhūdavyayeṣu pāṭhaḥ; tathāpyabhidheyavalliṅgavacanāni bhavanti; yaś‍cehārtho 'bhidhīyate na tasya liṅgasaṃkhyābhyāṃ yogo 'sti | nedaṃ vācanikam— aliṅgatā, asaṃkhyatā vā | kiṃ tarhi? svābhāvikametat | tatra kimasmābhiḥ śakyaṃ vak‍tum, yannañaḥ prāk samāsālliṅgasaṃkhyābhyāṃ yogo nāsti, samāse ca bhavati |
yadi vā guṇavacanānāmāśrayato liṅgavacanāni bhavanti | yadasau dravyaṃ śrito bhavati guṇaḥ samāso vā, tasya yalliṅgaṃ vacanaṃ ca tad guṇasyeva samāsasyāpi bhavati |
ucyate iha trayī gatiḥ 1. kadācinnañarthenottarapadārtho viśeṣyate,
2. kadācinnañartha uttarapadārthena,
3. kadācinnañarthottarapadārthābhyāmanyaḥ padārtha iti | tatra—
(1) yadā nañarthottarapadārthābhyāmanyapadārtho viśeṣyate tadā 'samānādhikaraṇānāṃ bahuvrīhiḥ', 'nañarthaś‍ca viśeṣyo bhavatī' ti ṣaṭ samāsārthabhedā jāyante — 1. atyantābhāvaḥ, 2. anatyantābhāvaḥ, 3. anyatarābhāvaḥ, 4. tādātmyābhāvaḥ, 5. saṃbandhā 'bhāvaḥ, 6. pradhvaṃsābhāva iti | yathā— arūpo vāyuḥ, anudārā kanyā, akiñcanaḥ pumān, apiśācaḥ kuḍyaḥ, aghaṭaṃ bhūtalam, anaṅga kāma iti |
(2) yadā tūttarapadārthena nañartho viśeṣyate tadā pūrvapadārthapradhānastatpuruṣaḥ | nañarthopādheś‍ca ṣaṭ samāsārthabhedā jāyante— 1. prāgabhāvaḥ, 2. sāmarthyābhāvaḥ, 3. āvaś‍yakatā 'bhāvaḥ, 4. itaretarābhāvaḥ, 5. sattā 'bhāvaḥ, 6. bhāvābhāva iti | yathā— anutpanno ghaṭaḥ, apradhṛṣyaḥ subhaṭaḥ, abhūṣitaḥ kāntaḥ, avarṣā (mabhā. 2.2.6) hemantaḥ, asacchaśaviṣāṇam, anudbhinnaḥ pravāla iti |
(3) yadā tu nañarthenottarapadārtho viśeṣyate tadottarapadārthapradhānastatpuruṣaḥ, padārthasya ca nañarthopādhe ṣaṭ samāsabhedā jāyante, yathā— 1. tadabhāvaḥ, 2. tadanyaḥ, 3. tatsadṛśaḥ, 4. tad‌viruddhaḥ, 5. tadapakṛṣṭaḥ, 6. tadutkṛṣṭa iti | yathā— ananyaḥ, anatriḥ, abrāhmaṇaḥ, asitaḥ, amanuṣyaḥ, amānuṣaḥ iti | nanu ca, anyapadārthatatpuruṣayoranyatrāpi nañ‌samāso dṛśyate | yathā makṣikāṇāmabhāvo 'makṣikamiti |
nāyaṃ nañ‌samāsaḥ, kintarhi 'avyayaṃ vibhakti' (2.1.6) ityādinā avyayamabhāvārthe samasyate, avyayībhāvaś‍ca samāso bhavati | yathā nivātaṃ niśītam iti |
kiṃ punaramī nañ‌samāsārthā anyapadārthādiṣu vyavatiṣṭhante uta saplavante? kecid vyavatiṣṭhante pradhvaṃsābhāvādayaḥ | tad‌yathā—
bhavedabhīṣmamadroṇaṃ dhṛtarāṣṭrabalaṃ katham |
yadi tattulyakakṣo 'tra bhavān dhuryo na yujyate || 60 || (vesaṃ. 3.25)
yathā ca anudarā kanyā, alomikā eḍaketi |
kecit tu saṃplavante prāgabhāvādayaḥ | tad‌yāthā—
ajanmā puruṣastāvadapumān paśureva vā |
yāvallīlāvatīvakraprekṣitārthaṃ na budhyate || 61 || (iti) |
yathā ca — aneke, aneka iti |
nanu ca — ekaśabdo bahvarthaḥ | tad‌yathā—
(1) ekaḥ ko 'pi sa kumbhasaṃbhavamuniḥ ityutkarṣārthaḥ | tatra—
(2) eke tāvadāhuriti pakṣāntarārthaḥ,
(3) eka evāyamāvayoḥ svabhāva iti tulyārthaḥ,
(4) naikaḥ śayītetyasahāyārthaḥ,
(5) ekamevedaṃ śabdabrahmetyabhedārthaḥ,
(6) ekaḥ dvau bahava iti saṃkhyārthaḥ |
tatkasyeha grahaṇam?
saṃkhyārthasya|
utkarṣādīnāṃ kasmānna bhavati ?
anabhidhānāt| tadayathā amitra ityuk‍te pūrvapadārthapradhānatatpuruṣe śatrukareva pratīyate, na tvasūryaḥ, evamaneka ityukte bahava eva pratīyante, na punaranutkarṣādimantaḥ| etena tatpuruṣasyottarapadaprādhānye satyaneka ityapi vyākhyātam|
kathaṃ punarekasya pratiṣedhe bahūnāṃ sampratyayaḥ syāt ?
prasajyāyaṃ kriyāguṇau tataḥ paś‍cānnivṛttaṃ karoti| tad yathā— āsaya, bhojaya, śāyaya anekamiti|
syādetat, yatra kriyāguṇau prasajyete, yatra tu khalu na prasajyete tatra tu kathamanekastiṣṭhati iti ?
bhavatyevaṃjātīyateṣvapi ekasya pratiṣedhe bahūnāṃ sampratyayaḥ| tad yathā— na na ekaṃ priyam, na na ekaṃ sukhamiti|
prakṛtipratyayau tredhā tridhopaskārabhak‍tayaḥ| tridhaivopapadaprātipadikānāṃ vibhak‍tayaḥ|| 62||
tridhopasarjanaṃ tredhā samāsa iti kīrttitaḥ| prātipādasaśabdo 'yamathānvākhyeya ucyate|| 63||
padamiha trividhaṃ pratipādyate trividhameva ca vāk‍yamatha tridhā| vyavahṛtiḥ khalu śabdanibandhanā yadanayorubhayoḥ prititiṣṭhati|| 64||
iti mahārājādhirājabhojadevaviracite śrṛṅgāraprakāśe
prātipadikādiprakāśo nāma
|| dvitīyaḥ prakāśaḥ|| 2||
revāprasādena sanātanena bhojādṛtenaiṣa prakāśa—lekhaḥ|
svayaṃ svahastād vihito 'tra mūlaṃ kṛpā mahākālamaheś‍varasya||
atha
śrṛṅgāraprakāśe tṛtīyaḥ prakāśaḥ
prakṛtyādiśabdaprakāśaḥ
(9. padam)
tatra padyate 'nenārtha iti padam|
tat tridhā 1. kriyārūpam, 2. kārakarūpam, 3. upaskārarūpañca| teṣu—
sādhyārthābhidhāyi kriyārūpam|
sādhanārthābhidhāyi kārakarūpam|
sādhyasādhanayorbhūṣaṇādibhūtamupaskāram|
teṣāṃ pratyekaṃ ṣaḍbhedatvāt padasyāṣṭādaśa bhedā bhavanti| teṣu—
(1. kriyārūpaṃ padam)
(1) bhāvapadam, (2) karmapadam, (3) karttṛpadam, (4) bhāvakarmapadam, (5) bhāvakarttṛpadam, (6) karmakarttṛpadaṃ ceti kriyārūpa—padabhedāḥ| teṣu—|
(1) bhāvapadaṃ yathā—
pacyate, apāci, pakṣyate devadattena; āsyate, āsi, āsiṣyate bhavatā; bhidyate, abhedi, bhitsyate kusūlena; śrāyate, aśrāyi śrāyiṣyate yavāgvā; evaṃ śrāyiṣīṣṭa, śaśre, aśrāyiṣyataudanena; ghāniṣīṣṭa, jaghne, aghāniṣyata hastinā; grāhīṣīṣṭa, jagṛhe, agrāhiṣyata grāheṇa; dārśiṣīṣṭa, dadṛśe, adarśiṣyata preyaseti|
(2) karmapadaṃ yathā—
pacyate odanaḥ sūdena, āsyate māso bhṛtakena, gamyate grāmaḥ pānthena, supyate krośaḥ śiśunā, akāri kaṭaḥ kuśalena, arodhi gaurgopālena, adohi dhenurvallavena, atāpi pṛthivī rājñā, anvatātapta kitavaḥ karmaṇā, anubabhūve kambalaḥ kareṇa, pakṣyate yavāgūrbhiṣajā, lapsīṣṭa bhikṣā tāpasena|
evaṃ kariṣyate kāritā kāriṣīṣṭa kaṭaḥ, ghāniṣyate ghānitā ghāniṣīṣṭa śatruḥ, grāhiṣyate grāhitā grāhīṣaṣṭa granthaḥ, darśiṣyate darśitā darśiṣīṣṭa preyāniti|
(3) karttṛpadaṃ yathā—
pacati caitraḥ, āste maitraḥ, tapati suvarṇaṃ suvarṇakāraḥ, tapyate tapasyāpasaḥ, sṛjati mālāṃ mālikaḥ, sṛjate dharmaṃ dhārmikaḥ, udasarji svaṃ vadānyaḥ, udapādi sasyaṃ bhūmiḥ parivārayante vṛkṣaṃ kaṇṭakāḥ, śoṣayate vrīhīnātapaḥ, saṃyujyate gṛhamedhī bhāryayā, pacyate salohitaṃ phalamudumbaraḥ, tathā adīpi, adīpiṣṭa vahniḥ, ajani ajaniṣṭa dhūmaḥ, abodhi abuddha prasuptaḥ, apūri apūriṣṭa kāmaḥ, atāyi atāyiṣṭa dharmaḥ, āpyāyi, āpyāyiṣṭa loka iti|
(4) bhāvakarmmapadaṃ yathā—
icchāmi bhuñjīta bhavān, icchāmi bhuṅktāṃ bhavanā, kāmaye yat sa bhuñjīta, prārthaye yadi sa bhañjīta, saṃbhāvayāmi bhuñjīta bhavān, samarthayāmi bhokṣyate bhavān, śraddadhe nābhuṅkta bhavān, avakalpayāmi nābhokṣyata bhavān, na śraddhadhe nanu bhavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayet, nāvakalpayāmi tatrabhavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayiṣyati, na marṣayāmi tatrabhavān vṛṣalamayāyajiṣyat, vigarhe api tatrabhavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayati, smarasi devadatta kaśmīreṣu vatsyāmaḥ, abhijānāsi kaliṅgeṣu yadavasāma, abhijānāsi kaliṅgeṣu śaś‍vadavasāma, smarasi kaśmīreṣu vatsyāma, tatraudanaṃ bhokṣyāmahe, abhijānāsi yat kaliṅgeṣvavasāma yat tatraudanamabhuñjmahi; ehi manye rathena yāsyasi, jāne supto vihāyasā gacchāmi, paś‍ya mṛgo dhāvati, iha paś‍yāmaḥ karmaṇi dvivacana— bahuvacanānyudāhniyante iti|
(5) bhāvakarttṛpadaṃ yathā—
corasya rujati, corasyāmayati, corasya bādhate, corasya pīḍayati, corasya dahati, corasyātaṅkayati, corasya spṛśati, corasya śoṣayati, corasya mardayati, corasya moṭayati, coraṃ jvarayati, coraṃ saṃtāpayati| tathā— bhavati pacati, bhavati pakṣyati, bhavatyapākṣīt, bhavedapi bhavet, syādapi syāt, nāsti rame, ayūyujastvamasi, asi tvamīśiṣe, asti gacchāmo vayam, astyatra kāñcid gāṃ paś‍yati, asi bhavatu gamyate, bhavatu sādhayāma iti|
(6) karmakarttṛpadam yathā—
rajyati vastraṃ svayameva, kuṣyati pādassvayameva, avakirate hastī, avākīrṣṭa vā
svayameva, grathnīte mālā, agrathiṣṭa vā svayameva, cīkīrṣate kaṭaḥ, acikīrṣata vā svayameva, namate daṇḍaḥ anaṃsta vā svayameva, ucchrayate daṇḍaḥ, udaśiśriyata vā svayameva, brūte kathā, avocata vā svayameva; prasnute gauḥ prāsnoṣṭa vā svayameva; āhate gauḥ (3.1. 89 kāśikā), āvadhiṣṭa vā svayameva| anurundhe gauḥ anvaruddha vā svayameva, akṛta kaṭaḥ svayameva (3.1. 62 kāśikā) iti|
anye punaramīṣāmapi karmakarttṛtvaṃ manyante—
bhidyate kusūlaḥ, svayameva, bhidyate rajjuḥ svayameva, lūyate kedāraḥ svayameva, pacyate phalaṃ svayameva, bhajyate kāṣṭhaṃ svayameva, kuṣyate pādaḥ svayameva, adohi gauḥ svayameva, arodhi gauḥ svayameva, ahāvi haviḥ svayameva, akāri kaṭaḥ svayameva, tathā bhūṣayate kanyā svayameva, maṇḍayate kanyā svayameva, dohayate gauḥ svayameva, ārohayate hastī svayameva, darśayate rājā svayameva, abhivādayate guruḥ svayameva, lāvayate kedāraḥ svayameva, pācayate odanaḥ svayameva, bhedayate kusūlaḥ svayameva, kārayate kaṭaḥ svayameva, gaṇayati gaṇaḥ svayameva, smarayati vanagulmaḥ svayameva'iti| āhuś‍ca—
karmavat karmmaṇā tulyakriyaḥ (3.1. 87), karmavadabhāve yagātmanepadaciṇ (vad)bhāvāḥ prayojanam (3.1. 87 kāśikā) acaḥ karmakarttari (3.1. 62), duhaśa‍ca (3.1. 63), na rudhaḥ (3.1. 64), na duh‍snunamāṃ yak‍ciṇau (3.1. 89), yak‍ciṇoḥ pratiṣedho hetumaṇṇiśribruñāmupasaṃkhyānam (3.1. 89 vā. 1), bhūṣākarmakirādi (3. 1. 87), ṇi—śrantha—grantha—bruñātmanepadā—karmakāṇāmupasaṃkhyānam (3.1. 89 vā)|
tat tu samyak| tathāhi 'bhidyate kusūlassvayameva, akāri kaṭaḥ svayamevetyādiṣu karmaṇyeva yak‍ciṇau, svayaṃśabdāttu karmakarttukatvapratītiḥ| arodhi gaussvayameveti rudherapi karmavivakṣāyāṃ ciṇ bhavatyeva arodhi gaurgopāleneti| yadā tu gorātmanepada eva karmakarttutvaṃ tadā arodhi gaurgopāleneti| yadā tu gorātmanepada eva karmakarttṛtvaṃ tadā 'rodhi gaurātmanaiveti bhavati| ya evārtha ātmanaiveti sa svayameveti| arodhīti cok‍te nāśrute karttṛvācini padāntare karmakarttutvaṃ gamyate| tasmādihāpi karmaṇyeva ṇic| bhūṣayate kanyā svayamevetyādiṣu tu 'ṇoraṇau yat karma ṇau cet sa karttā 'nādhyāye' (1.3. 67) iti phalavati karttaryevātmanepadam| kutastyā tarhyeteṣu karmakarttṛtāprasiddhiḥ ?
śrūyatām— karmapadeṣu tāvat—
kriyamāṇaṃ tu yat karma svayameva prasiddhyati| sukaraṃ svairguṇaiḥ karttuḥ karmakartteti taṃ viduḥ||1||
karttupadeṣu bhūtapūrvakatvāt tadavadupacāra iti| tathāhi kanyādayo lāvaṇyātiśayādibhi— rātmabhūṣāyai prasādhanādīn prayuñjate| prayuñjate ca māghādayo mahākavayaḥ—
ākuñcitaprohanirūpitakramaṃ kareṇurārohayate niṣādinam||2|| (māgha. 12.5)
sa santataṃ darśayate gatasmayaḥ kṛtādhipatyāmiva sādhu bandhutām|| 3|| (kirātā. 1. 10) iti
phalamanayoḥ sukhāsikā lokarañjanaṃ ca| anyathaiko hastipakaiḥ pīḍyeta, dvitīyo dudarśe iti nābhigamyate|
acetaneṣvapi kriyāphalavivakṣāyāṃ tu dṛś‍yate 'parivārayante vṛkṣaṃ kaṇṭakāḥ, śoṣayate vrīhinātapa' iti| etena karaṇena tulyakriyaḥ karttā karmavad bhavatītyapi va vaktavyaṃ bhavati| parivārayanti kaṇṭakairvṛkṣaṃ manuṣyāḥ, parivārayante kaṇṭakāḥ svayameveti| tathā 'duhipacyoḥ sakarmakayoḥ karttā bahulaṃ karmavad bhavatīti na vak‍tavyam| dugdhe gauḥ payaḥ svayameva, payo muñcatīti gamyate| tasmādudumbarassalohitaṃ phalaṃ pacyata iti karmataiva kriyāviśeṣaṇavivakṣitā| udumbaraśabdo 'tra phalavṛttiḥ, udumbaraṃ tat kālena pacyate salohitaguṇaṃ yathā bhavati lohitena pākena sambadhyata iti yāvat karttṛtvavivakṣāyāṃ ca pacatyātmānāmiti| tathā yujeḥ ś‍yan karttari vak‍tavyam, māsaṃ yujyate brahmacārīti| karttṛtvavivakṣāyāṃ tu daivādikatvaṃ na setsyati, karmatvavivakṣāyāṃ tu karmatvaṃ yathā; karttṛtvaṃ tu svayaṃ śabdena gamyata ityalamatiprasaṅgena||
kṛdantamapi khalu kriyārūpaṃ vidyate| tatra—
bhāvo yathā— iha tairyātam, iha tairāsitam, iha tairbhuktam, iha taiḥ pītam; kṛtaṃ bhavatā, prasuptaṃ bhavatā, sukṛtaṃ bhavatā, susik‍taṃ bhavatā, bhūtaṃ bhavatā, prabhūtaṃ bhavatā, bhaviṣyamāṇaṃ bhavatā, bhūyamānaṃ bhavatā, bhavitavyaṃ bhavatā, bhavanīyaṃ bhavatā, bhavय़ṃ bhavatā, avaś‍yaṃ bhāvyaṃ bhavatā, āśitabhavaṃ bhavatā, īṣadạ̄dhyambhavaṃ bhavatā, durạ̄dhyaṃbhavaṃ bhavatā, svāḍhayaṃbhavaṃ bhavatā, īṣadutthānaṃ bhavatā, sūtthānaṃ bhavatā iti|
