sevaṃtīṇa ṇa patto tiasa—vahūṇa sịdhilattaṇaṃ aṇurāo || 117 ||
(atha prekṣante — — — — anurāgaḥ ||)
ityāśvāsakaparisamāp‍tiryāvaditi |
nanu varṇasamūhaḥ padaṃ, padasamūho vākyaṃ, vākyasamūhaḥ prakaraṇamityācakṣate |
tatkathamucyate ekavākyaṃ prakaraṇamavāntaravākyaṃ prakaraṇamiti ?
ucyate, ta eva praṣṭavyāḥ uc‍caritapradhvaṃsināmanarthakānāṃ ca varṇānāṃ samūhasya padatvamarthavattayā varṇayantaḥ | vayaṃ tvekārthaparaḥ padasamūho vākyamityeva pratijānīmahe | tatra padairapi vākyamārabhyate, vākyairapi ca prakaraṇamārabhyate, vākyaiḥ padairapi ca prakaraṇaiḥ prabandha ārabhyate | tataś‍ca
vākyeṣvapi vākyāni bhavanti | yathā— (mavīca. 1.30)
kanyārat‍namayonijanma bhavatāmāste vayaṃ cārthino rat‍naṃ yatk‍vacidasti tatpariṇamatyasmāsu śakrādapi |
kanyāyāś‍ca parārthataiva hi matā tasyāḥ pradānādahaṃ bandhurvo bhavitā pulastyapulahapraṣṭhāś‍ca saṃbandhinaḥ || 118 ||
prakaraṇeṣvapi prakaraṇāni yathā— indumatīsvayaṃvare magadheśvarādirājavarṇanādīni |
prabandheṣvapi prabandhā yathā— uttaracaritādau garbhanāṭakādīni |
yadi vākyameva padasamūhaḥ, kathamāha mahāvākyo(kāvyo)paniṣadācāryo daṇḍī—
taiśśarīraṃ ca kāvyānāmalaṅkārāś‍ca darśitāḥ |
śarīraṃ tāvadiṣṭārthavyavacchinnā padāvalī || 119 || iti | (kāā. 1.10)
(12. prabandhaḥ)
vidhiniṣedhāvagatiheturmahāvākyaṃ prabandhaḥ |
tattridhā — 1. padyaṃ, 2. gadyaṃ (ca), 3. miśraṃ ca |
(1. padyam)
teṣu cchandogataṃ padyam | chandastu tridhā— akṣaracchando, mātrācchando, gaṇacchandaś‍ceti | tānyapi pratyekaṃ tridhā samārdhasamaviṣamabhedāt | tatra —
akṣaracchandassamaṃ yathā—(ṛve. 10.103.1)
āśuśśiśāno vṛṣabho na yudhmo ghanāghanaḥ kṣobhaṇaś‍carṣaṇīnām |
saṃkrandano 'nimiṣa ekavīraśśataṁ senā ajayatsākamindraḥ || 120 ||
ardhasamaṃ yathā—(ṛve. 10.85.19)
navo navo bhavati jāyamāno 'hnāṃ keturuṣasāmetyagre |
bhāgaṃ devebhyo vidadhātyāyan pra candramāstirati dīrghamāyuḥ || 121 ||
viṣamaṃ yathā—(ṛve. 1.170.1)
na nūnamasti no śvaḥ kastad‍veda yadadbhutam |
anyasya cittamabhi saṃcareṇyamutādhītaṃ vinaśyati || 122 ||
pūrvoktodāharaṇatrayamapi vaidikaviṣayameva |
mātrācchandassamaṃ yathā—
vāu na puvvu na pacchimu na vi dakkhiṇu vahaï |
vaṇe na kayaṃbu na aṃbu na pāḍala mahamahaï || 123a ||
(vāyuḥ na pūrvaḥ na paścimaḥ nāpi dakṣiṇaḥ vahati |
vane na kadambaḥ na āmraḥ na pāṭalā gandhaṃ prasārayati ||)
koila-mora-marālahaṃ koi na vāharaï |
māe na jāṇaü māhahe kevaṃ virahiṇi maraï || 123b ||
(kokilamoramarālānāṃ ko 'pi na vyāharati |
mātar na jāne māghe kathaṃ virahiṇi maraï ||)
ardhasamaṃ yathā—
diṇahadivaṭṭhaho iti sa uppijj‍iu surevio |
avaraṇeha mihaï gharumādālavca hi dūre || 124 ||
viṣamaṃ yathā—
jaïvivgavḍahījaï vivavḍuravhu pahuduggamutaru arahījaï vigahaṇesūru |
viṇadīsaï ito isu purisu vasadi jahīte dhuvaṭṭhaharahapa aṭṭhadi || 125 ||
gaṇacchandassamaṃ yathā—(kādambarīmaṅgalam)
rajojuṣe janmani sattvavṛttaye sthitau prajānāṃ pralaye tamaḥspṛśe |
ajāya sargasthitināśahetave trayīmayāya triguṇātmane namaḥ || 126 ||
ardhasamaṃ yathā— (kirātā. 13.1)
vapuṣā parameṇa bhūdharāṇāmatha saṃbhāvya parākramaṃ vibhede |
mṛgamāśu vilokayāñcakāra sthiradaṃṣṭrāṅkamukhaṃ narendrasūnuḥ || 127 ||
viṣamaṃ yathā—(kirātā. 12.1)
atha vāsavasya vacanena ruciravadanastrilocanam |
klāntirahitamabhirādhayituṃ vidhivattapāṃsi vidadhe dhamañjayaḥ || 128 ||
tadetat‍trividhamapi mahākāvyetihāsaśrutyādiṣu ca d‍ṛśyate |
(2. gadyam)
acchandaḥ padasaṃtāno gadyam | tat‍tridhā vṛttagandhi, cūrṇam, utkalikāprāyaṃ ca | teṣu
padyagandhavad vṛttagandhi | tat‍tridhā— samā(rdha)sama—viṣamabhedāt | teṣu
samagaṇacchandogandhi yathā—
'pātālatālutalavāsiṣu' || 129 || iti ||
ardhasamagaṇacchandogandhi yathā—
'kramamāracayya ca mahendraśāsanāt khamutpapāta' || 130 || iti ||
evaṃ mātrākṣaracchando 'pi draṣṭavyaḥ |
anāviddhalalitapadaṃ cūrṇam; tat‍tridhā— gurubahulaṃ, laghubahulaṃ, miśraṃ ceti | tatra
gurubahulaṃ yathā—
trailokyaikapradīpasya bhagavatassahastraraśmerarciśśikhāsahastra—
niṣṭhyūto 'ñjanarāśiriva śārvarastamastomaḥ styāyate || 131 ||
laghubahulaṃ yathā—
vyapagataghanapaṭalamacalajalanidhisadṛśavapurambaratalaṃ vilokyate || 132 ||
miśraṃ yathā—(māmā. 1.35/36)
'mahābhāga! suśliṣṭaguṇatayā ramaṇīya eṣa sanniveśaḥ | kutūhalinī ca no
bhartṛdārikā vartate, yatastasyāmabhinavo vicitraḥ kusumeṣuvyāpāra' || 133 || iti |
alalitāviddhapadavākyam utkalikāprāyam | tadapi tridhā— alalitāviddhapadavākyabhedāt |
tatra alalitaṃ yathā—(veṇīsaṃhāra prastāvanānte)
ayaṃ lalāṭataṭaghaṭitavikaṭakīnāśatoraṇatriśūlāyamānabhīṣaṇabhrukuṭiḥ kruddho
bhīmasena ita evābhivartate || 134 ||
āviddhapadaṃ yathā— (māmā. 3.15—16)
eso (ka)khu . . . vajjanigghādadāruṇacaveḍāmoḍi(a)pāḍidānea—ṇaraturaṃgama—
jaṃgaluggāra—bharidagalaguhāgaṃ bhīraghaggharolli/gallūraṇa—raṇa—saddasaṃdabbha— paḍiravābhoa—bhīsāvida—ṇaṭhṭhavidāsesa—jaṇaṇihao duṭṭhasad‍dūlo kaaṃta— līlāidaṃ karei || 135 ||
āviddhavākyaṃ yathā—(kāda. kathāmukham)
yasya ca madakalakarikumbhapīṭhapāṭanamācarato lag‍nasthūlamuktāphalena da‍ṛḍhamuṣṭi— nipīḍanānniṣṭhyūtadhārājalabindudantureṇeva kṛpāṇena kṛṣyamāṇā subhaṭoraḥkavāṭapuṭa— ghaṭitakavacasahasrāndhakāramadhyavarttinī karikaraṭataṭagalitamadajalāsāra— durdināsvabhisārikeva samaraniśāsu samīpamasakṛdājagāma rājalakṣmīḥ || 136 ||
tadetat‍trividhamapi ākhyāyikāsu kathāsu madhumallikādiṣu ca da‍ṛśyate |
(3. miśram)
gadyapadyavyāyogo miśram | tat‍tridhā padyapradhānaṃ, gadyapradhānaṃ, tulyarūpaṃ ceti | teṣu— padyapradhānaṃ tridhā sajātīyena vijātīyenobhābhyāṃ ca |
tatra sajātīyenetihāsa— subhāṣitakośādau,
vijātīyena prasthāna—setubandhana—vivaraṇādau,
ubhābhyāṃ bhāratīyadaśarūpakalakṣaṇādāvasya prayogo dṛśyate |
gadyapradhānamapi tad‍vadeva tridhā— tatra sajātīyena pañcatantra—cakeṭā(ceṭaka) . . . dau, vijātīyena kātyāyanīya—pāṇinīya—prākṛtalakṣaṇādau, ubhābhyāṃ mayūraśuka— mārjārikādāvasya prayogā da‍ṛśyante |
tulyarūpamapi tridhaiva sajātīyābhyāṃ, vijātīyābhyāṃ, sajātīyavijātīyābhyāṃ ceti |
tatra sajātīyābhyāṃ campū—samīkṣā—saṭṭakādau,
vijātīyābhyāmapi māra—sāmba—govindākhyānakādau;
sajātīyavijātīyābhyāṃ nāṭaka—nāṭikādi—vidagdhamukhamaṇḍanādāvasya prayogo da‍ṛśyate |
prakṛtyādivibhāgena saiṣa dvādaśadhā sthitaḥ |
arthāvasāyaprasavanimittaṃ śabda iṣyate || 137 || (sphoṭa. 3)
nanu ca varṇasamūhaśśabda iti vaktavye kimarthamucyate prakṛtyādayaśśabdā iti? yadāha ka: punaśśabda iti praś‍ne gakāraukāravisarjanīyā iti bhagavānupavarṣaḥ | naivam; arthāvasāyaprasavanimittaṃ śabda iṣyate | atha gauriti na prasavanimitteṣu jātikriyāguṇadravyādīnām |
kaḥ śabdaḥ, yenoc‍cāritena arthaḥ pratīyate, tarhi varṇā eva śabdaḥ | uc‍cāriteṣu hi gakāraukāravisarjanīyeṣu gauriti sās‍nādimānarthaḥ pratīyate, satyametat | kintu varṇāḥ pratyayanimittamekaśo vā syuḥ, samuditā vā | na tāvadekaśaḥ, dvitīyādivarṇoc‍cāraṇa— vaiyarthyaprasaṅgāt | nāpi samuditāḥ utpattipakṣe yaugapadyenānutpatteḥ, utpannasya ca kṣaṇādūrdhvamanavasthānāt | abhivyaktipakṣe krameṇaivābhivyakteḥ abhivyakt‍yantarameva ca vāyubhistirodhānāt kathaṃ samudāyaḥ ? ekasmṛtyupārụ̄dhānāṃ ca varṇānāṃ vācakatve kramasmaraṇe niyamanimittābhāvāt | uktakrameṇa ca smaraṇadarśanāt saro, rasa iti pratīteraviśeṣaḥ prāp‍noti | vaktṛbhede cārthapratyayaprasaṅgaḥ | uto na varṇāśśabdaḥ, kintu varṇasamūhabhivyaṅgya— sphoṭalakṣaṇoktārthātmā śabda iti | sa eva sphuṭatyasmādartha ityarthāvasāyaprasavanimittamiṣyate | kathaṃ tarhi śabdaṃ kuru, mā śabdaṃ kārṣīḥ, śabdakāryayaṃ māṇavaka iti dhvaniṃ kurvan‍nucyate? abhivyañjakābhivyaṅgyayorabhedopacārāt | nanvabhivyañjakatve 'pi na varṇānāmarthavattā bhavitumarhatīti? naivam, varṇasamūhātmano dhvanerevābhivyañjakatvāt | kiṃ punarvarṇāssarvathaiva nārthavantaḥ ? pṛthak‍tvena tāvannārthavantaḥ, na hi prativarṇamarthā upapadyante |
nanu ca dhātuprātipadikapratyayanipāteṣūpalabhyante— dhātuṣu iṇ—eti, ṛ—iyartīti; prātipadikeṣu aḥ śārṅgī, uḥ brahmeti, u upaskaroti | naite varṇāḥ, api tu śabdābhivyaktihetava ekavarṇā ekadhvanihetavaśśabdaśabdavācyāḥ | na tūpacārato 'pi varṇasamūhaśśabdaḥ | naivam, arthābhivyaktihetuśśabdaḥ, śabdābhivyaktiheturdhvaniḥ | sa tu kaś‍cidekavarṇaḥ; ekasminneva vā samūhāropaṇaṃ sāmarthyātiśayād, yathaikāpūpīti | yadi hyekasminnapūpe samūho nāropyate, samūhābhāvādekāpūpa ityeva syāt, na tvekāpūpīti | kathaṃ punarekasmin samūhāropaṇam ? vyapadeśivadbhāvāt | anyathā 'iyāya āra' ityādau prathamatvaikāc‍tvayorabhāvād dvirvacanābhāvaḥ | yadyevamanye 'pi varṇāssamūhāropaṇenaiva dhvanayo bhavitumarhanti | nārhanti | kutaḥ? śabdaśakti— svābhāvyāt | yathā samānamīhamānānāmadhīyānānāṃ ca kecidarthairyujyante kecinna yujyante; tathā dhātuprātipadikapratyayanipātā evaikavarṇāssamūhāropaṇenaivārthavattvāya dhvanivyapadeśaṃ labhante, na punaranye | svābhāvikaṃ caitat; na ca svabhāvāḥ paryanuyogamarhanti |
itastarhyarthavanto varṇāḥ | varṇavyatyaye varṇaviparyaye varṇāpāye varṇopajane varṇavikāre vā 'rthāntaraṃ gamyate | varṇavyatyaye kūpaḥ, sūpaḥ, yūpa iti | varṇaviparyaye kalamaḥ, lamakaḥ, malaka iti | varṇāpāye maśakaḥ, śakaka iti | varṇopajane akṣaḥ, plakṣaḥ, pakṣa iti | varṇavikāre nīraṃ, nīlaṃ nīḍamiti | tatra kūpa iti sakakāreṇa kaś‍cidartho gamyate, sūpa iti sakāravyatyaye 'rthāntaraṃ, yūpa iti tu sakārasya kakārasya vā yakārasya vyatyaye kūpāt
sūpāc‍cārthāntaramiti | tena manyāmahe yaḥ kūpe kūpārthassa kakārasya, yassūpe sūpārthassa sakārasya, yo yūpe yūpārthassa yakārasyeti | yadi tu samudāyasyāyamartho bhavet, kūpādisamudāyassa yūpādiṣu bhūyastvādbhūyiṣṭhaḥ kūpārthassūpe syāt; sūpārthaś‍ca kūpe, kūpārthaś‍ca yūpe, yūpārthaś‍ca sūpa iti; evaṃ varṇaviparyaye 'pi kramotkramayossamudāyāviśeṣāt, kamalaḥ. malakaḥ, lamaka iti pratyayāviśeṣaḥ prāp‍noti; na hi trastebhyo vaṭaparicchede palāśataḥ khadirato vā na avadhāraṇe samudāyasya bhedo bhavati | varṇāpāye 'pyekādyavayavavirahe samudāyasyānanyatvāt maśakaḥ, śakaka iti nārthāntaraṃ gamyeta | bhinnakarṇapuccho 'pi śvā śvaiva, nāśvatara iti | varṇopajane 'pyakṣaḥ, plakṣa iti pratyayaviśeṣo na syāt | na hi sūnodbhede keśodgame vā yuvativyakteranyatā yuktimatī | evaṃ varṇavikāro 'pi nīraṃ, nīlaṃ nīḍamiti nārthāntarapratītirjāyeta | na hyapalite palitavati rañjitakeśapāśe vā viṣṇumitrādeḥ svarūpānyatvaṃ bhavati | varṇavyatyayaviparyayāpāyopajanavikāreṣu cārthāntaradarśanānmanyāmahe arthavanto varṇā iti | varṇārthavatve varṇavyatyayaviparyayāpāyopajanavikārāḥ kāraṇamarthāntaropalabdherjānte |
atrāpi brumaḥ — ya ete tvayā varṇānāmarthavattāyāṃ hetava upanyastā varṇavyatyayādayaḥ, teṣu kūpassūpo yūpa iti saṅghātāntarāṇyevaite, arthāntare ca vartante | yadi hi varṇavyatyayādikṛtamarthāntaragamanaṃ syāt, bhūyiṣṭhaḥ, kūpārthassūpe syāt, kakāramātrasyaiva vyatyayāt | sūpārthaś‍ca kūpa iti samānaṃ pūrveṇa | yatastu na kiṃcit kūpādināṃ sūpādiṣvato 'nvayābhāvānmanyāmahe saṅghātāntarāṇyevaitānyarthāntareṣu vartanta iti | etena varṇaviparyayādayo 'pi vyākhyātāḥ | tānyapi hi arthāntaravartīni saṅghātāntarāṇyeveti | idaṃ khalvapi bhavatā varṇānāmarthavattāṃ bruvatā sādhīyo 'narthakatvaṃ dyotitam | yo hi manyate yaḥ kūpe kūpārthaḥ sa kakārasya, ūpaśabdastasyānarthakaḥ syāt |
nanu ca samudāyasyārthavattve samudāyaikadeśavināśe samudāyasya kāraṇabhāve kāryābhāva iti vināśo vābhyupeyate; chinnakarṇapucchaśvanyāyādapi vināśo vā | kiṃcātaḥ ? vināśapakṣe samudāyābhāvādarthābhāvaprasaṅgaḥ | pakṣāntare 'pi sa evārtho, na tvarthāntaram; tataś‍ca kathaṃ ślokaḥ, śokaḥ, lokaḥ, okaḥ, kaḥ, ityarthāntarapratītiḥ ? uktamatra— samudāyāntarāṇye— vaitānyarthāntareṣu vartante | bhavedetat, yatrārthāntaraṃ gamyate; yatra tu sa eva so 'rthastatra katham? yathā udakaṃ, dakaṃ, kam iti | imānyapi saṅghātāntarāṇyevaikārthavṛttīni; yathā kanduḥ koṣṭhaḥ, kusūla iti | kramāttasya cārthavattāṃ bruvatā tvayaiva dakārokārayorānarthakyamuktaṃ bhavati | kaś‍caivamāha ? varṇavyatyayaviparyayāpāyopajanavikāreṣvarthāntaradarśanameva; yataḥ ś‍yāmā, rāmā, vāmā iti varṇavyatyayo nārthavyatyayaḥ | tarkuḥ, sikatā, siṃha iti varṇaviparyayo nārthaviparyayaḥ |
santi, gh‍nantīti, syanti, varṇāpāyo nārthāpāyaḥ | āsthāt, avocat, sañcaskāreti varṇopajane nārthopajanaḥ | ghātayati, kṣiṇoti, ropayatīti varṇavikāro nārthavikāraḥ | tena manyāmahe varṇavyatyayādiṣvapyanarthāntaragamanādanarthakā eva varṇā iti |
itastarhyarthavanto varṇāḥ; yadeṣāṃ saṅghātā arthavantaḥ | yeṣāṃ hyavayavā arthavantasta eva samudāyādarthavantaḥ; tadyathā— ekaś‍cakṣuṣmān paś‍yati, tatsamudāyaśśatamapi paś‍yati | ekatilastailaṃ prasūte, tatsamudāyaḥ khārīśatamapi prasūte | yeṣāṃ punaravayavā nārthavantastatsamudāyā api nārthavantaḥ | tadyathā eko 'ndho na paś‍yati, śatamapyandhānāṃ na paś‍yati | ekā sikatā tailaṃ na prasūte, tatsamudāyaḥ khārīśatamapi na prasūta iti | naivam, atadarthenāpyavayavenāvaya— vino 'rthasadbhāvo dṛśyate | yathā eka ūrṇātantuḥ śītatrāṇāsamarthaḥ, tatsamudāyaś‍ca kambalaḥ samarthaḥ; ekastaṇḍulaḥ kṣutpratighāte 'samarthaḥ, tatsamudāyaś‍ca 1vardhitakaṃ samarthamiti | naivaṃ bhavati | tatra pratyekamapi kiyatyapyarthamātrā; ime punarvarṇā atyantāyaivānarthakāḥ | yathā tarhi rathāṅgāni vihitāni tāni pratyekaṃ na2 vrajikriyāsamarthāni, tatsamudāyaś‍ca rathassamartha iti | evameṣāṃ varṇānāṃ samudāyāśśabdābhivyaktihetavo 'rthavantaḥ, avayavāstvanarthakā iti |
ataḥ sthitametat prakṛtipratyayādivarṇajanitadhvanisamūho 'bhivyaṅgyasphoṭalakṣaṇo— 'rthātmā 'rthāvasāyaprasavanimittaṃ śabdaḥ | tad‌viśeṣāś‍ca prakṛtyādisphoṭaḥ padasphoṭo vāk‍yasphoṭa iti |
yo 'bhūdityādikaśśabdo bhavatītyādikaś‍ca yaḥ |
bhūrastītyādiko yaś‍ca sa sphoṭaṃ nātivartate || 138 ||
pratipādyo nivarttyaś‍ca pratipādaka eva ca |
tridhā sphoṭassphuṭatyasmādato 'ste ghaṭādayaḥ || 139 ||
uktaḥ kramād dvādaśabhedabhinnaśśabdaprapañco 'yamanādisiddhaḥ |
athārthamūrttyā 'sya vivartamādyaṃ tāvatprakāraṃ pratipādayāmaḥ || 140 ||
iti mahārājādhirājaśrībhojadevaviracite śrṛṅgāraprakāśe
prakṛtyādiśabdaprakāśo nāma
|| tṛtīyaḥ prakāśaḥ || 3 ||
tṛtīya eṣo 'sti mayā prakāśaḥ prasādhito hanta sanātanena |
bhojaprakāśaḥ prakiret prakāśaṃ sāhitya—sauhitya—samutsukeṣu ||

atha
śrṛṅgāraprakāśe caturthaḥ prakāśaḥ
kriyādyarthacatuṣṭayaprakāśo nāma
(1. kriyā)
tatra prakṛtyādiśabdapratyāyyāḥ kriyākālakārakapuruṣopādhipradhānopaskārārthe— prātipadikārthavibhaktyarthavṛttyarthapadārthavāk‍yārtharūpā dvādaśa bhedāḥ | teṣu kārakāṇāṃ pravṛttiviśeṣaḥ kriyā, tāṃ dhātvartha ityamananti (mabhā. 3. 1. 3) |
dhātavaś‍ca tredhā— astyarthāḥ, bhavatyarthāḥ, karotyarthāś‍ca | tatra
yeṣāṃ kartāra udāsate te astyarthāḥ; yathā— asti vidyate dhriyate tiṣṭhati āste vartate ityādi |
yeṣāṃ vikurvate te bhavatyarthāḥ; yathā— bhavati saṃjāyate vardhate vipariṇamate apakṣīyate vinaś‍yati ityādi |
yeṣāṃ prayuñjate te karotyarthāḥ; yathā— karoti vidhatte janayati nirvartayati sādhayati utpādayati | tatra
asti—karoti—bhavatīnāṃ sāmyāvasthānaṃ nirvikāramanādyantaṃ śabdabrahmetyācakṣate | tathaivaṃvidhānekārthavācinā bhavatinaivomiti vyapadiśanti | tasya yadā astitāheturavidyā— nibandhano 'rthavipariṇāmarūpaḥ prathamavikāro, astirudayate tadā | asternāstipratiyogitvādasti nāsti vetyekamevaitadubhayathāpi prathāmayate | yannāsti tad bhavāmīti cāpekṣāyāṃ, tadbhavato 'sya bhavati—nāmā dvitīyavikāraḥ pariplavate | tato yadbhavati tasya tasya cānyad—bhavato mithyābhiniveśānmithaḥ prayojyaprayojakatvaṃ (saṃ) bhāvayati—saṃjñakaḥ tṛtīyavikāraḥ karotirityākhyāyate (vāpa. 3.34–36 jāti) |
evaṃ cāsmitāpekṣābhiniveśairdūraviprasṛtāyāmavidyāyāṃ eṣāmapi viśeṣāviśeṣato dūrīkṛtā vidyāḥ vidyati—jani—pacādayaḥ prādurbhavanti | tadāha— 'kṛbhvastayaḥ kriyāsāmānya— vacanāḥ kriyāviśeṣavacanāḥ pacādaya' (mabhā. 3.3.98) iti | te 'mī sarve 'pi dhātvarthabhedāḥ saṃbhedato mithassaṅkhyānamativartante, na tu kṛbhvastirūpatām |
nanu ca dhātvarthaḥ kriyā; sa ca kārakāṇāṃ pravṛttiviśeṣaḥ | kārakeṣu ca svatantraḥ kartā, karturīpsitatamaṃ karma, sādhakatamaṃ karaṇam, ādhāro 'dhikaraṇaṃ, karmaṇā yamabhipraiti sa
saṃpradānaṃ, dhruvamapāye 'pādānaṃ, tebhyo 'nyastadavivakṣā vā śeṣaḥ | kartuḥ prayojako heturiti kartrādibhyo vyatiriktamarthāntaraṃ nopalabhyate, yat kriyeti pratīyate |
(kriyāsiddhiḥ)
ucyate— asti kriyā | kintu kartrādibhyaḥ pṛthagākhyātumaśak‍yam, anāpannasattva— bhāvāt, anirluṭhitagarbhavat (mabhā. 1.3.1); yathā garbho 'nāpannasattvabhāvaḥ kalalāvasthāyā— māśayataḥ pṛthagākhyātuṃ na śakyate, tathā kriyāpi sādhanebhyassādhyāvasthāyām | tadyathā— jyotiḥ prakāśate, śabdo dhvanati iti |
kathaṃ tarhi asti jñāyate kārakasannidhāne 'pi pacatīti?
prakhyopākhyayorbhāvābhāvābhyām |
1. iha khalu yatsannidhāne yasya bhāvābhāvau, tasya tato 'nyanimittāpekṣitvaṃ dṛṣṭam | yathā ag‍nighaṭayossannidhāne bhavatāmabhavatāṃ ca tatsaṃyogāpekṣitvaṃ pākajānām | kartrādisanni— dhāne ca kadācit pacatītyetad‌bhavati, kadācinna pacatīti dṛś‍yate | tena manyāmahe nūnamasti śaktiśaktimadbha‌yo 'nyaśśaktirdharmo yadbhāvādime prakhyopākhye pravartete, yadabhāvācca na pravartete iti siddhamastitvaṃ kriyāyāḥ |
2. ithaś‍cāsti kriyā, sādhyamantareṇa sādhanānupapatteḥ | iha khalu kartrādīnāṃ sādhanavyupadeśo dṛśyate, sa ca sādhyamantareṇānupapannaḥ; yac‍ca sādhyaṃ sā kriyā | tadāha— saṃhṛtya kārakairya eko 'rtho 'bhinirvartyate sā kriyā | kriyānimittaṃ kārakamiti | tathā ca kriyāsu svecchayā kārakādīni yaḥ prayuṅkte na tu taiḥ prayujyate, sa kartā, kartuḥ kriyayā 'nanyayā yadāpyate tatkarma, kriyāsiddhau sādhakatamatvena yadavyavahitaṃ vyāpriyate tat karaṇam, kartrā karmaṇā vā vyavahitaḥ kriyādhāro 'dhikaraṇam, kriyākāryatvenāvadhāritaṃ karmaṇā saṃyogaṃ yadanubhavati tatsaṃpradānam, kartrā karmaṇā vā kriyājanyameva dhrauvyeṇa yad‌vibhāgamavagāhate tadapādānam, śrūyamāṇāśrūyamāṇakriyāpadaḥ kriyākṛtaḥ kārakāṇāmakārakāṇāṃ ca saṃbandhaviśeṣaḥ sa śeṣaḥ (vāpa. 3.7.156) | kurvantamevājñā— pradānādinā yaḥ kriyāyāṃ niyuṅkte, saḥ tatprayojako hetuḥ kartā ca bhavati | evaṃ ca yathā kāṣṭhādayo lākṣādikamapekṣamāṇā evaṃ mithassaṃbandhayogyatāmanubhavanti tathā dravyāṇyapi kriyāpekṣīṇyeva parasparasaṃbandhāya prabhavantīti kriyāmantareṇa jagataś‍citrakarmaṇa iva mithassaṃyogo viyogaś‍ca na syāt | taduktaṃ — yayā devadatta iha bhūtvā pāṭaliputre bhavati sā nanaṃ kriyeti (mabhā. 1.3.1) |
(kriyā na kārakam)
astu nāma kriyā, kārakebhyastu tasyāḥ kathaṃ vyatirekaḥ ?
na ca bhavanto 'pi kriyākārakoyorvyatirekaṃ na manyante, tadyathā corasya rujati, corasyāmayati iti |
ucyate vyatiriktaiva kārakebhyaḥ kriyā,
1. anekasyaikavyapadeśanimittatvāt | iha yad yasyānekavyapadeśanimittaṃ tattato 'nyeti, anugamyatvāta; iha yairyadanugamyate tattebhyo 'nyat, yathā narebhyo rājā | abhigamyate 'nugamyate ca kriyā kārakaiḥ, atastato 'nyeyam |
2. janyatvenopalambhāt; yajjanyatayā yadupalabhyate tattato 'nyat, yathā pituḥ putraḥ | upalabhyate kriyā kārakajanyatvena, tasmāt tato 'nyā |
3. upalabdhāvanupalabdheḥ; iha yasyopalabdhau yasyānupalabdhiḥ tattato 'nyathā, (yathā) rūpād‌rasaḥ | sūryasya copalabdhau na gaterupalabdhiḥ, tasyāstato 'nyathā; asti cāsyāsau, deśāntaraprāpteḥ; sāpi dṛṣṭā; tathaivāpaś‍yataḥ parāvṛtya darśanāt |
4. pramāṇāntaragrāhyatvāt; iha yadyasmāt pramāṇāntareṇa gṛhyate tattato 'nyat; yathā śarīrādātmā | pramāṇāntaragrāhyā ca sadāgatau gatiḥ; tasmāttato 'nyā |
5. bahupraviviktatvenābhidhānāt; iha yad bahubhyaḥ praviviktamekatvenābhidhīyate, tat tato 'nyat; yathā tantubhyaḥ paṭaḥ | abhidhīyate bahvāśritāpi pravivekaikatvena kriyā; yathā brāhmaṇairāsyata iti tasmāt tato 'nyā |
6. anāvṛttāvāvṛtteḥ; iha yasminnanāvartamāne yadāvartate, tat tato 'nyat, yathā hastino maśakaḥ | āvartate cānāvartamāne kartari kriyā, pañcakṛtvaḥ pacatīti; tasmāt tato 'nyā |
7. ihobhayorapi saṃśayanirṇayanimittatvāt; ihobhayossaṃśaye yasya yo nirṇayaheturbhavati, tat tato 'nyat, yathā sthāṇau śryenaḥ, nirṇayahetuś‍ca, puruṣasya calanādikriyā, tasmāt tato 'nyā |
8. abhidhāyābhidhānāt; iha yadabhidhāyārthāntarāvivakṣāmantareṇa yadabhidhīyate tat tato 'nyat, yathā gauraśvaḥ | abhidhīyate ca adhyetā adhīte gantā gacchatīti kārakamabhidhāya kriyā, tasmāt tato 'nyā |
9. paryāyāprasiddheḥ; iha yeṣāmeva paryāyaprasiddhiḥ, teṣāmeva ca tebhyo na bhedaḥ, yathā nirvartiriti; na ca pacannadhīte pacatyadhīta iti pacanpacatyoḥ paryāyatvam, (na ca) api pacannadhīta iti kartuḥ pacatīti kriyāyāḥ paryāyayogyatvam; ato 'sau tato 'nyaḥ |
10. abhinnaśabdābhidhāne 'pi viśeṣaṇānāṃ liṅgavacanabhedāt | iha khalu kriyākartrorabhinna— śabdābhidheyatve 'pi tadviśeṣaṇānāṃ liṅgavacanabhedo dṛś‍yate, yathā śobhanaṃ pacati śobhanaṃ pacataḥ śobhanaṃ pacantīti | sa cārthābhede 'bhinnaśabdopādāna eva dṛś‍yate | taṭaḥ taṭī taṭaṃ, puṣyaḥ tārakā nakṣatraṃ, rasaḥ āpaḥ jalam, dārāḥ kalatraṃ bhāryā ityādiviśeṣaṇānām | na tūdāhṛtasadṛśeṣviti kriyā karturanyā |
11. śabdāvṛttibhedeṣu tad‌dhī bhedāt | iha khalu kriyākārakayośśabdāvṛttibhede buddhibhedo dṛś‍yate; adhyetā paṭhati paṭhati, gantā gantā gacchatīti pūrvayorvīpsā, uttarayorābhīkṣṇyam | yasya ca yato buddhibhedastat tato vyatiriktaṃ, yathā mṛdaṅgadhvanermeghadhvaniḥ ghaṭādibhyaḥ paṭādaya iti kriyāyāḥ kārakebhyo vyatirekaḥ |
12. siddhe cāsminnabhedadarśanaṃ bhedavyatirekaś‍ca vivekata eveti draṣṭavyam |
(kriyāyā anekatvam)
1. dṛś‍yate ca pradīpapravāhaśabdaśarīrasaṃskārajñānasukhaduḥkhecchādveṣaprayat‍narūpādiṣu bhinneṣu abhinnapratyayaḥ pravartate, teṣvabhedenaiva tadanukūlo vyapadeśaḥ | corasya rujatītyatra tu ruk‍sādhakasya karturabhāvāllakāraḥ kartari vartamānāṃ tāmeva rujadhātvabhihitāmabhidheyīkaroti | asti ca sādhyasyāpi vastuno bhavataḥ kartṛtvam, atastadeva kartṛpratyayenābhidhīyate | na corasya rujatītyasyāyamarthaḥ corasya rugutpadyata iti |
kutaḥ punarayaṃ kārakakriyayorviśeṣaḥ yadekatra vīpsā anyatrābhīkṣṇyamiti ?
kriyāyā ekatvena vīpsānadhigamāt | bahūnāṃ hi kriyāguṇadravyaiḥ prayokturyuga— pad‌vyāp‍tumicchā vīpsā; sā tvekatve kriyāyā nopapadyate iti |
2. nanu ca kriyāyā ekatvaṃ nopapadyate, kālatrayeṇātyantavirodhinā yugapadabhisaṃbandhavyapadeśāt; iha khalu kriyāyā ekaikasminnapi kāle kālatrayābhisaṃbandhaheturvyapadeśo dṛś‍yate, pacati devadattaḥ apākṣīd yajñadattaḥ, pakṣyati viṣṇumitra iti | tac‍caikatve na ghaṭate ityanekā kriyā|
3. bhedanibandhanā ātiśayikatarabādipratyayayogāt; iha khalu kriyāyāḥ pacatitarāṃ pacati— tamāmityātiśāyanikapratyayo dṛṣṭaḥ; sa ca dvayorbahūnāṃ ca prakarṣe siddha ityanekā kriyā |
4. ekena yugapadanekādhikaraṇasya nirdhāraṇāt; iha yadekaikasmin kāle anekādhārasthaṃ pṛthak‍tvenāvadhāryate tadanekam, yathā aṅgulīṣu nakhāni nirdhāryante; nirdhāryate cānekādhikena yugapad goṣu gatirityanekā kriyā |
5. pūrvakāle 'pi pratyayadarśanāt; iha dvayorekakartṛkayoḥ kriyayoḥ pūrvakāle k‍tvāpratyayo dṛś‍yate | yathā bhuk‍tvā bhuṅkte, pak‍tvā pacatīti; dvitvaṃ caikatvapratyanīkamityanekā kriyā |
6. yugapallakṣyalakṣaṇayogāt; iha kriyāṇāmabhinnakālaṃ lakṣyalakṣaṇayogo dṛśyate; gavi duhyamānāyāmapi dogdhi; tayaikatve 'nupapannamityanekā kriyā |
7. hetuphalabhāvāt; iha khalu hetuphalayoḥ prasiddho bhedaḥ; sa ca kriyāsu dṛśyate 'odanaṃ pacati, śākaṃ pacati, bhuñjāna odanaṃ bhuṅkta' iti, bhedaś‍caikatvavirodhītyanekā kriyā |
8. kriyārthakriyopapadatumunādipratyayotpatteḥ; iha ye tu kriyārthāyāmupapade tumunādayassmaryante, te ca bhoktuṃ gacchati, pākāya vrajati bhokṣyāmīti | pacatiprabhṛtiṣu yathā 'bhinnadhātu— vācyatve 'pi dṛś‍yante, yathā gantuṃ gacchati, bhojanāya bhuṅkte, pakṣyāmīti pacatīti | sa cāyaṃ tadarthaphalabhāvo 'nekatvaṃ evopapadyata ityanekā kriyā |
9. abhihitānabhihitaśaktiprādurbhāvanimittatvāt; iha dhātrīṃ dhayati, dātreṇa dāti, dāśāya dāśate, bhīmād bibheti, āsane āste, śayane śete, sthāne tiṣṭhati, prāsāde prasīdati (iti) pratyayavibhak‍tyordarśanādabhihitānabhihitaśaktiprādurbhāva upalabhyate; sa cānaik‍yanimittaṃ kriyābhedamantareṇa na saṅgacchata ityanekā kriyā |
10. bhāvābhidhāne 'pi tantrādibhyo dvivacanabahuvacanopalabdhiḥ; iha khalu śuddhe 'pi bhāve tantrādibhyaḥ pākau pākāḥ, uṣṭrāsikā āsyante, hataśāyikāśśayyanta iti dvivacanabahuvacanopalabdhiḥ; tac‍ca kriyaikatve na yuktamityanekā kriyā |
11. kṛdākhyātābhihitāyāḥ kriyāyāḥ sarvasaṃkhyāsāmānādhikaraṇyāt | iha kṛdabhihitāyā ākhyātābhihitāyāś‍ca kriyāyā bhinnārthābhidhāyibhissaṃkhyāśabdaiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ dṛś‍yate; yathaikaḥ pākaḥ, dvau pākau, bahavaḥ pākāḥ; ekā uṣṭrāsikā āsyate, dve āsyete, bahvaya āsyante; tac‍caikatve kriyāyā na sāṃpratamityanekā kriyā |
12. iha bhavatinimantṛprabhṛtīnāmavadhṛtabhedaparispandāśrayakāryābhinirvṛtteḥ; iha yāsāṃ kriyāṇāmavacchedakadhātvarthopādhibhedādanekatvaṃ pratyavivādaḥ, tāsu ye bhedāśrayā dharmāḥ prasiddhāḥ, tadyathā bhoktumicchati, bhavati pacati, bhavati pakṣyati, bhavatyapākṣīt, āmantrayai samājam, utsavamāmantrayai iti—(te) samānadhātuvācyāsvapi dṛś‍yante; eṣitumicchati, bhavedapi bhavet, syādapi syāt, nimantraye nimantraṇārtham, āmantraye
āmantraṇārthamiti; tasmād bhavedāśrayakāryasaṃbandhād bhavitavyamanekatvam; ekena dhātunā sarvatra bhedenetyanekā kriyā |
13. sādhyasādhanabhāvāt; iha sādhyasādhanayoḥ prasiddho bhedaḥ; pradṛśyate ca sādhyasādhanatā kriyāṇām; yathā 'sa imān poṣānapuṣat', tapyate tapastāpasa iti | tac‍caikatve na ghaṭate ityanekā kriyā |
tadetadanekatve kriyāyāssarvamasādhanaṃ sādhanabhedādevopacaritabhedāyā ekatve vā tadupapatteḥ |
(kriyāyāmanekatvopacāraḥ)
bhinnānāmapyupāśrayādibhedād bhinnādhārāt pratītadeśavyapadeśādayaś‍ca dṛśyante; yathendorjaleṣu, jyots‍nā jāleṣu, jaladharāṇām āśāsu, diśo vyavasthāsu, pṛthaktvasyārtheṣu, buddherviṣayeṣu, vidyuto 'bdeṣu, śabdasya kandareṣu, citrasya nīlādiṣu, ākāśasyāvakāśeṣu, bhāvasya bhāveṣu, bhedābhāveṣu ca yā bhedabuddhiḥ; yathā ca saṃpanno yavo yavaneṣu, śuṣkaḥ turūṣkeṣu, sujāto vrīhiḥ suhmeṣu vinaṣ‍ṭassurāṣṭreṣu, darśanīyau stanau indraseneṣu ākṣiṇī kaliṅgeṣu, parūd bhavān, paṭurāsīt, paṭutara aiṣamaḥ (mabhā. 3.5.57), mārge kūpo 'bhūt, kūpo bhaviṣyati, priyo manyuste priyā na vayam, maithilī rāmasya dārāḥ, āpaḥ pavitraṃ, varaṇā nagaraṃ, śirīṣāḥ grāmaḥ, pāñcālā janapadā ityabhinnasyāpi jātyāderarthabhedasya bhedato vyapadeśaḥ | tathā kriyāyā api kālayogadayaḥ sādhanabhedād bhaviṣyanti; anekādhārasamavetāyāś‍ca yugapadekena grahaṇaṃ jātivadupapatsyate |
kṛdabhihitānāṃ tu śuddhabhāvānām ākhyātavadbhiḥ kriyābhiḥ dravyavad vaidharmyādayuktastaddharmopanayaḥ | kṛdabhihito hi bhāvo dravyavat prakāśamāno liṅgasaṃkhyā— karmādiśaktīnāmāśrayo bhavati (mabhā. 2.2.19,3.1.67) na tvākhyātavācyaḥ tasyāpariniṣpannatvenāśrayatvānupapatteḥ | tathā hi, yathā pāko varttate, pākaṃ pacatīti śaktisaṃkhyādiyogaḥ kṛdanteṣu dṛśyate, naiva tiṅanteṣu | na hi bhavati, pacati vartate, pacati pakṣyatīti | nanu ca bhavati paśyati, mṛgo dhāvati, iha paśyāmaḥ, karmaṇi dvivacanabahuvacana— nānyudāhriyanta iti dhāvatīnāṃ dṛśi karmatvaṃ, kevalaṃ tvaprātipādikatvāt supo 'nutpattiḥ; tanna; yathā kriyāyāḥ kriyamāṇatvādeva naisargikaṃ bhavati pacati, bhavati pakṣyati, bhavatyapākṣīditi ca dṛśyate pacādīnāṃ bhavateḥ kartṛtvaṃ dṛśyate | bhavati dhāvati paśyati
paśyeti karmatvaṃ kriyāviśeṣaṇānāṃ karmatayā 'vagamyate | tathotpadyamānatvādeva gatau kartṛtvamapi naisargikameva | mṛgo dhāvatītyādau gamyamānetiśabdopasaṃhṛtasya vākyārthasya karmatvaṃ, na kriyāyāḥ | tasmādaśaṅkanīyaṃ kriyā sakartṛśaktiyogā, karaṇādiyogāyogābhyām | śaktistu vyaktameva kṛdākhyātābhidheyabhāvayormitho vaidharmyamiti | tasmādanekārthaviṣayayā vīpsayā '— nabhisandhānāt siddhamekatvaṃ kriyāyāḥ | śabdapratyayayorabhedāc‍ca; yatrābhidhānajñānayoḥ atyantamabhedastasyaikatvaṃ siddham, yathā jāteḥ pratyekaṃ ca vyaktiviśeṣāṇām | abhinnau ca deśakālau bhede ca kriyāyāḥ śabdapratyayau dṛśyete, yathā ca pacati pacataḥ pacantīti; tasmācchabdapratyayābhedahetuḥ ekā kriyā |
nanu ca jalacandrādidṛṣ‍ṭānte bhedavyavahāre sandehaḥ, kiṃ sādhanamabhedāśrayāṇi kriyāyāḥ kālatrayayogādīni pratyayavyapadeśādīni ca bhedakāryāṇi, uta svabhedāśrayāṇīti |
atrocyate kriyāyā abhede 'pi sādhanabhedād dvivacanabahuvacanotpattessaṃdehābhāvaḥ | iha bhedasyābhedapūrvakatvād, bhedamabhyupagatavatā 'vaśyamabhedo 'bhyupagantavyaḥ; tasya yasyāḥ kriyāyā ekatvamabhyupagamyate tasyāssādhanabhedād dṛṣ‍ṭo dvivacanabahuvacanayogaḥ; yathā paramāṇuṃ pacataḥ, paramāṇuṃ pacanti | anekatvābhyupagame ca sādhanasyābhede duṣ‍ṭamekavacanameva, bhinatti kusūlamiti | tasmāt sādhanabhedānuvidhānāc‍ca kriyāyāḥ, kriyābhedānuvidhānāc‍ca sādhanānāṃ sādhanāśrayāṇi bhedābhedakāryāṇi kriyāyāḥ, na svāśrayāṇīti |
kathaṃ tarhi pacyete odanau pacyante odanā devadatteneti kartrabhede vacanabhedaḥ ? yasmin sādhane lādayo 'bhidhīyante, tad‍bhedamanu vidhīyante kriyāyāḥ kriyābhedasādhanānītya— śaṅkanīyametat | pradīpādiṣu bhedayoranātyantikatvāt jñānābhidhānayorapi tathātve 'sti, na tairvyabhicāraḥ |
14. itaś‍cānekā kriyā kriyābhyāvṛttibhāvād bahusaṃkhyāyāḥ kriyābhyāvṛttigaṇane kṛtvasujādayassmaryante; pañcakṛtvo bhuṅkte, catuṣpacatīti; tac‍cābheda evopapadyate | na hi devadatte gate, yajñadatte cāyāte punarāvṛtta iti vyapadeśo dṛśyate; dṛśyate ca tatraivāyāta ityekā kriyā, samuc‍cayābhāvāt | iha bhinnānāmekāviṣayasannipāte samuc‍cayo dṛṣ‍ṭaḥ; tathā devadattasya gauś‍cāśvaś‍ca purūṣaś‍ca; devadattasya yajñadattasya viṣṇumitrasya ca gauriti | na ca pakturabhede guḍatilaudanādi paṃktibhedāt kriyābhedābhyupagame 'pi kriyāsamuc‍cayo dṛśyate, devadattaḥ paṭhati pacati ceti | tasmād
